44021001	Muxu to fatan, muxu naxa siga keren na Kosi kunkui kui. Na kuye iba, muxu naxa siga Rodi. Muxu to keli Rodi, muxu naxa siga Patara.
44021002	Muxu to kunkui to naa, naxan nu baa igirife sigafe Fenisiya biri ra, muxu naxa baki na kui.
44021003	Muxu to bara Sipiri suri to, muxu naxa dangi na ra kɔɔla ma, sigafe Siriya biri ra. Muxu naxa ti Tire alako kote xa ragoro.
44021004	Muxu naxa Isa fɔxirabirɛe ndee li naa. Muxu naxa xi solofere radangi e xɔnyi. Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi naxa goro Isa fɔxirabirɛe ma, e xa a fala Pɔlu bɛ a naxa te Darisalamu.
44021005	Kɔnɔ xi solofere kamali lɔxɔɛ, muxu naxa kira tongo sigafe ra. E birin naxa muxu mati, a nun e xa ginɛe nun e xa die ra, han taa fari ma. Muxu naxa muxu xinbi sin baa dɛ ra Ala maxandife ra.
44021006	Ɲungui to ɲɔn, muxu naxa baki kunkui kui. Booree tan naxa gbilen e xɔnyi.
44021007	Muxu naxa keli Tire sigafe ra Pitolomayi. Muxu naxa ngaxakerenyie xɛɛbu mɛnni, muxu naxa fɛɛɲɛn naa.
44021008	Na kuye iba, muxu naxa siga Sesare, Filipu xibaaru fanyi kawandila xɔnyi, naxan nu na mixi sugandixi solofere ya ma.
44021009	A xa di ginɛ naani nu na naxee mu nu dɔxɔ xɛmɛ taa. E nu namiɲɔnmɛ wali rabama.
44021010	Muxu to bara xi wuyaxi raba naa, Ala xa namiɲɔnmɛ naxan xili Agabu, naxa fa muxu xɔnyi kelife Yudaya.
44021011	A naxa Pɔlu xa bɛlɛti tongo, a naxa a yɛtɛ kan sanyie nun a bɛlɛxɛe xiri. A naxa a fala, «Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi yi nan masenxi. Xɛmɛ naxan gbe yi bɛlɛti ra, Yuwifie a xirima yi mɔɔli nan na Darisalamu, e a so mixie yi ra naxee findi si gbɛtɛe ra.»
44021012	Muxu to na mɛ, muxu nun naakae naxa Pɔlu maxandi a naxa te Darisalamu.
44021013	A naxa muxu yaabi, «Munfe ra wo wama n bɔɲɛ maɲaaxufe wo yaye ra? N bara tin e xa n xiri Darisalamu, e xa n faxa, Marigi Isa xili xa fe ra.»
44021014	A to mu tin muxu xui suxude, muxu mu tin a karaxande. Muxu naxa a fala, «Marigi sago xa raba.»
44021015	Na lɔxɔɛe to dangi, muxu naxa muxu yailan, muxu naxa te Darisalamu.
44021016	Isa fɔxirabirɛe ndee Sesarekae naxa muxu mati. E naxa muxu xanin Menason Sipirika xɔnyi, naxan findixi Isa fɔxirabirɛ ra a rakuya. A naxa muxu yigiya.
44021017	Muxu to so Darisalamu, Isa fɔxirabirɛe naxa muxu rasɛnɛ ɲɛlɛxinyi ra.
44021018	Na kuye iba, muxu nun Pɔlu naxa siga Yaki xɔnyi. Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama kuntigi birin naxa e malan naa.
44021019	A to gɛ e xɛɛbude, Pɔlu naxa a xa wali dɛntɛgɛ sa Ala naxan nabaxi si gbɛtɛe tagi a saabui ra.
44021020	E to na mɛ, e naxa Ala matɔxɔ. E naxɛ, «Muxu ngaxakerenyi, i bara a to Yuwifi wulu wuyaxi bara danxaniya, kɔnɔ e man e tunnabɛxixi birafe Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ fɔxɔ ra.
44021021	Mixi ndee bara a fala e bɛ a i Yuwifie xaranma, naxee na si gbɛtɛe ya ma, a e xa gbilen Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛe fɔxɔ ra, a e naxa e xa die sunna, a e naxa bira Yuwifie xa naamunyie fɔxɔ ra.»
44021022	«Won na ma di? Siikɛ yo mu na, ɲama a kolonma nɛ a i bara fa.
44021023	Na na a ra, muxu naxan falama i bɛ i xa a raba. Mixi naani na muxu ya ma, naxee bara laayidi tongo Ala bɛ.
44021024	I xa kafu e ma, wo birin xa wo yɛtɛ rasɛniyɛn, i man xa e sare fi, e xa e xunyi bi. Na na a ra birin a kolonma a mixie naxan falaxi i xun ma, wule na a ra. E xa a kolon i fan biraxi Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ nan fɔxɔ ra.
44021025	Muxu naxa natɛ tongo, muxu man fa na sɛbɛ. Danxaniyatɔɛe naxee keli si gbɛtɛe ma, e naxa sube don naxan baxi sɛrɛxɛ ra kuyee bɛ, nun sube yufaxie. E naxa wuli fan min. E man naxa yɛnɛ fan naba.»
44021026	Awa na kuye iba, Pɔlu naxa na mixie tongo, e naxa e yɛtɛ rasɛniyɛn. Na xanbi a naxa so hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, a xa a masen, marasɛniyɛnyi rakamalima lɔxɔɛ naxan ma, a nun sɛrɛxɛ naxan bama kankan bɛ.
44021027	Na xi solofere raɲɔnyi, Yuwifie Asikae to Pɔlu to hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, e naxa ɲama birin ya iso, e man naxa Pɔlu suxu.
44021028	E nu sɔnxɔɛ rate, «Isirayilakae, wo muxu mali! Na xɛmɛ nan yi ki naxan kawandi ɲaaxi rabama yire birin mixi birin bɛ, Yuwifie, nun Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ, nun yi hɔrɔmɔbanxi xa fe ra. A man bara Girɛkikae raso hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui. Na bara yi yire sɛniyɛnxi findi yire sɛniyɛntare ra.»
44021029	E na fala nɛ barima e nu bara Pɔlu nun Tirofimo Efɛsɛka to e boore fɔxɔ ra taa kui. E naxa a maɲɔxun a Pɔlu a raso nɛ hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui.
44021030	Taa kui birin ya naxa iso. Mixie naxa fa e gi ra keli yire birin. E naxa Pɔlu suxu, e naxa mini a bubu ra tande ma. E naxa naadɛe ragali keren na.
44021031	E nu wama Pɔlu faxafe nɛ. Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa a kolon Darisalamu birin ya isoxi.
44021032	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa sɔɔrie nun e xa xunmatie tongo, e siga Pɔlu fɔxɔ ra keren na. Ɲama to sɔɔrie to, e naxa ba Pɔlu bɔnbɔfe.
44021033	Awa, sɔɔri mangɛ naxa yaamari fi e xa a xiri yɔlɔnxɔnyi firin na. A naxa maxɔrinyi ti fa nde a ra, nun a munfe rabaxi.
44021034	Ɲama sɛɛti nde sɔnxɔma e gbe ki, booree fan sɔnxɔma e gbe ki. A to mu nɔ fe fiixɛ sɔtɔde e ra sɔnxɔɛ xa fe ra, a naxa a fala e xa Pɔlu xanin sɔɔri banxi kui.
44021035	Pɔlu to ti banxi dɛ ra, sɔɔrie naxa a tongo ɲama xa ɲaaxui ma,
44021036	barima mixi gali nan nu biraxi e fɔxɔ ra, e nu fa a fala e xui itexi ra, «A xa faxa!»
44021037	E wama a rasofe sɔɔri banxi kui tɛmui naxɛ, Pɔlu naxa sɔɔri mangɛ maxɔrin, «I nɔma n sago sade n xa fe nde fala i bɛ?» Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa a yaabi, «I Girɛki xui mɛma?
44021038	I tan xa mu na Misiraka ra, naxan mixie ya iso yi dɔnxɔɛ ra, a naxa suute wulu naani xanin wula kui?»
44021039	Pɔlu naxa a yaabi, «Yuwifi nan n na, Tariseka. Na taa xungbe a munafanyi gbo Silisi bɔxi ma. N sago sa n xa wɔyɛn yi gali bɛ.»
44021040	Sɔɔri mangɛ to a sago sa, Pɔlu tixi banxi tede dɛ ra, a naxa mixie masabari a bɛlɛxɛ ra. Kuye naxa bolon yen! Pɔlu naxa wɔyɛn Eburu xui.
44022001	«N ngaxakerenyie, n babae, wo xa wo tuli mati n na, n xa n yɛtɛ kan xun mafala.»
44022002	E to a mɛ a Eburu xui falama, e naxa dundu dangi singe ra. Pɔlu naxa a fala,
44022003	«Yuwifi nan n na, n barixi Tarise nɛ, Silisi bɔxi ma, kɔnɔ n mɔxi be nɛ. Gamaliyɛli naxa n xaran alako n xa bira won babae xa sɛriyɛ fɔxɔ ra. Ala xa fe nu n bɔɲɛ suxuma alɔ a wo fan suxuma ki naxɛ to.
44022004	N mixie tɔɔrɔ nɛ han n naxa e faxa, naxee nu biraxi Isa xa kira fɔxɔ ra. N naxa ginɛe nun xɛmɛe suxu, n naxa e sa geeli kui.
44022005	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi nun diinɛ forie birin na n seedee ra. E naxa kɛɛdie so n yi ra katarabi e ngaxakerenyie ma Damasi alako n na danxaniyatɔɛe to, n xa e xiri, n xa fa e ra Darisalamu, n xa e ɲaxankata.»
44022006	«N to makɔrɛ Damasi ra yanyi tagi, yanbɛ xungbe naxa goro n ma kelife koore ma.
44022007	N naxa bira bɔxi. N naxa xui mɛ naxan nu a falama n bɛ, ‹Sɔlu, Sɔlu, munfe ra i n ɲaxankatama?›
44022008	N naxa a yaabi, ‹Nde i ra, Marigi?› A naxa n yaabi, ‹Isa Nasarɛtika nan n na, i naxan ɲaxankatafe.›
44022009	Naxee nu na n fɔxɔ ra, e naxa yanbɛ to, kɔnɔ naxan nu wɔyɛnfe, e mu na tan xui mɛ. Awa, n naxa a fala,
44022010	‹N xa munse raba, Marigi?› Marigi naxa a fala n bɛ, ‹Keli, i siga Damasi. Mɛnni a fama falade i bɛ i lan i xa naxan naba.›
44022011	N mu nu se toma na yanbɛ xa naiyalanyi saabui ra. Naxee nu na n fɔxɔ ra, e naxa n bɛlɛxɛ rasuxu han Damasi.»
44022012	«Awa, xɛmɛ nde naxan xili Ananiyasi, mixi tinxinxi na a ra Ala xa sɛriyɛ ki ma, naxan nafanxi Damasi Yuwifie ma,
44022013	a naxa fa n yire. A naxa a fala, ‹N ngaxakerenyi Sɔlu, to ti.› N ya naxa rabi keren na, n naxa se birin to.
44022014	A naxa a fala, ‹Won babae Marigi Ala bara i sugandi i xa a sago kolon, i xa Tinxintɔɛ to, nun i xa a wɔyɛnyi mɛ a tan yati dɛ ra,
44022015	barima i findima a xa seede nan na mixi birin ya i, i fee naxee toxi nun i naxee mɛxi.
44022016	Yakɔsi, i munse mamɛfe? Keli, i xa i xunxa ye xɔɔra, i xa yunubi xa ba i ma, i xa Marigi xili maxandi.› »
44022017	«N naxa gbilen Darisalamu. N to nu na Ala maxandife hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, n naxa laamatunyi to.
44022018	Marigi naxa a fala n bɛ, ‹I xa mini mafuren Darisalamu, barima e mu tinma i xa seedeya ra n ma fe ra.›
44022019	N naxa a fala, ‹Marigi, e yati a kolon a n nu sigama salidee kui danxaniyatɔɛe fende alako n xa e sa geeli, n man xa e bɔnbɔ.
44022020	E to nu i xa seede Etiyɛn faxama, n tan yati nu na, n nu ɲɛlɛxinxi na ra. N tan nan man nu booree xa dugie suxuxi.›
44022021	Awa, Marigi naxa a fala n bɛ, ‹Siga, n i xɛɛma yire makuye si gbɛtɛe ma.› »
44022022	E naxa e tuli mati a xa masenyi birin na, han a yi wɔyɛnyi falaxi tɛmui naxɛ. E fa gbelegbele, «Wo yi xɛmɛ faxa. A mu lan a xa balo.»
44022023	E naxa sɔnxɔɛ rate, e nu e xa donmae rate e ma, e nu xube ite kuye i.
44022024	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa a fala a e xa Pɔlu raso sɔɔri banxi kui, e man xa a bɔnbɔ luxusinyi ra alako e xa a kolon ɲama sɔnxɔma fe naxan ma.
44022025	E to nu a xirife alako e xa a bɔnbɔ, Pɔlu naxa sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati maxɔrin naxan nu tixi naa, «Sɛriyɛ na wo yi ra naxan a masenxi a wo xa Rɔmaka bɔnbɔ luxusinyi ra hali a mu makiitixi?»
44022026	Sɔɔri kɛmɛ xunmati to na mɛ, a naxa sa sɔɔri mangɛ rakolon. A naxɛ, «Yi xɛmɛ Rɔmaka lasiri na a ra. Won na ma di?»
44022027	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa fa, a naxa Pɔlu maxɔrin, «A fala n bɛ xa Rɔmaka na i ra?» Pɔlu naxa a yaabi, «Iyo xɛ.»
44022028	Sɔɔri mangɛ man naxa a fala, «N tan naafuli gbegbe nan baxi, n fa findi Rɔmaka lasiri ra.» Pɔlu naxa a fala a bɛ, «N tan barixi lasiriya nan kui nɛ.»
44022029	Kabi na raba, naxee nu wama a bɔnbɔfe alako a xa wɔyɛn, e birin naxa e magbilen. Sɔɔri mangɛ yɛtɛ naxa gaaxu a kolonfe ra Pɔlu Rɔmaka na a ra, a naxan xiri yɔlɔnxɔnyi ra.
44022030	Na kuye iba, sɔɔri mangɛ to wa a kolonfe a fiixɛ ra Yuwifie Pɔlu kalamuxi fe naxan ma, a naxa a fulun. A naxa yaamari fi, sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie nun Yuwifi kiitisae birin xa malan. A naxa Pɔlu ragoro, a ti e tagi.
44023001	Pɔlu naxa a ya ti Yuwifi kiitisae ra. A naxa a masen, «N ngaxakerenyie, n naxan nabaxi han to, n a rabaxi n bɔɲɛ fiixɛ nan na Ala ya xɔri»
44023002	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi, Ananiyasi naxa mixie yaamari, naxee nu na a fɛ ma, e xa a dɛ ragarin.
44023003	Awa, Pɔlu naxa a fala a bɛ, «Ala nan fama i tan bɔnbɔde. I luxi nɛ alɔ banxi naxan fari fiixɛ kɔnɔ a kui nɔxɔxi. I bara wa n makiitife kiiti sɛriyɛ ra, kɔnɔ i to yaamari fixi e xa n bɔnbɔ, i bara sɛriyɛ matandi.»
44023004	Naxee nu na a fɛ ma, e naxa a fala a bɛ, «I Ala xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi nan konbima yi ki!»
44023005	Pɔlu naxa a fala, «N ngaxakerenyie, n mu nu a kolon xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi na a ra, barima a sɛbɛxi, ‹I naxa wɔyɛn kobi fala ɲama mangɛ bɛ.› »
44023006	Pɔlu to a kolon Sadusenie nun Farisɛnie nu na Yuwifi kiitisae xa malanyi kui, a naxa a fala a xui itexi ra, «N ngaxakerenyie, Farisɛni nan n na. N baba fan Farisɛni nan nu a ra. To n na kiiti banxi barima n laxi a ra Ala fama won nakelide faxɛ ma kiiti lɔxɔɛ.»
44023007	A to na fala, boore matandi naxa lu Farisɛnie nun Sadusenie tagi. Ɲama naxa itaxun.
44023008	Sadusenie tan bɛ, mixi mu kelima faxɛ ma. E man mu laxi malekɛe nun ɲinnɛe xa fe ra. Kɔnɔ Farisɛnie tan la nee birin xa fe ra.
44023009	Sɔnxɔɛ xungbe naxa mini. Sɛriyɛ karamɔxɔ ndee Farisɛnie tagi e naxa wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ fala. E naxɛ, «Muxu mu fefe ɲaaxi yo rakɔrɔsixi yi xɛmɛ ma. Tɛmunde ɲinnɛ nde, xa na mu a ra malekɛ nde, nan wɔyɛnxi a ra.»
44023010	Sɔnxɔɛ to nu sigama gbo ra, sɔɔri mangɛ naxa gaaxu e fa Pɔlu faxafe. A naxa sɔɔrie ragoro e xa Pɔlu tongo e tagi, e xa a xanin sɔɔri banxi kui.
44023011	Na kɔɛ ra, Marigi naxa mini Pɔlu ma. A naxa a fala a bɛ, «I xa limaniya barima i findima n ma seede nan na Rɔma alɔ i a rabaxi Darisalamu ki naxɛ.»
44023012	Kuye to iba, Yuwifie naxa lanyi xiri kali ra, e naxa e dɛge, e naxa e min sinden, a fo e xa Pɔlu faxa.
44023013	Naxee na lanyi xiri, e nu dangi mixi tongo naani ra.
44023014	E naxa a masen sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie nun forie bɛ, «Muxu bara muxu kali Ala ra, muxu mu sese donma sinden fo muxu xa Pɔlu faxa.
44023015	Awa, yakɔsi, wo tan nun Yuwifi kiitisae xa mangɛ mayandi a xa fa a ra alako wo xa a xa fe mato a fanyi ra. Na kui, muxu tan a faxama kira ra.»
44023016	Pɔlu maaginɛ xa di naxa na yanfɛ kolon. A naxa siga sɔɔri banxi kui, a naxa na birin masen Pɔlu bɛ.
44023017	Pɔlu naxa sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati nde xili, a naxɛ, «Yi sɛgɛtala xanin sɔɔri mangɛ xɔn ma, alako a xa fe nde fala a bɛ.»
44023018	Sɔɔri kɛmɛ xunmati naxa sɛgɛtala tongo, a naxa a xanin sɔɔri mangɛ xɔn ma. A naxɛ, «Pɔlu, geelimani nan n xilixi, a naxa n mayandi a n xa fa yi sɛgɛtala ra i xɔn ma, a xa fe nde masen i bɛ.»
44023019	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa sɛgɛtala tongo, e naxa e mamini. Mangɛ naxɛ, «I wama munse falafe n bɛ?»
44023020	A naxa a yaabi, «Yuwifie bara lan a ma, e xa i maxandi i xa Pɔlu xanin Yuwifi kiitisae yire, alako e man xa maxɔrinyi nde ti a ma.
44023021	I naxa i tuli mati e ra, barima mixi tongo naani nun nde bara yanfɛ xiri a xun e ya ma. E bara e kali a e mu sese donma, e mu sese minma a fo e na Pɔlu faxa tɛmui naxɛ. Yakɔsi e bara gɛ e yailande, e fa i sago nan mamɛfe.»
44023022	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa sɛgɛtala rabolo, a naxa tɔnyi dɔxɔ a ma, fa fala, a fe naxan falaxi a bɛ, a naxa na fala mixi yo bɛ.
44023023	A naxa sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati firin xili, a naxa a fala e bɛ, «Wo sɔɔri kɛmɛ firin yailan, sɔɔri soe ragie tongo solofere, nun xali woli kɛmɛ firin. Wo xa e yailan sigafe ra Sesare to kɔɛ ra.
44023024	Wo xa soe nde yailan Pɔlu bɛ, alako a xa mangɛ Felisi li hɛɛri kui.»
44023025	Sɔɔri mangɛ naxa yi fe sɛbɛ bataaxɛ ra.
44023026	«N tan Kilɔdi Lisiya, i tan Mangɛ Felisi mafanxi, n bara i xɛɛbu.
44023027	Yi xɛmɛ Yuwifie nan a suxuxi. E naxa wa a faxafe. N to a kolon a Rɔmaka na a ra, n nun sɔɔrie naxa fa, muxu naxa a ba e yi.
44023028	N to wa a kolonfe e a suxuxi naxan ma, n naxa siga a ra e xa kiitisae yire.
44023029	N naxa a li e a kalamuxi e xa sɛriyɛ xa fe nan ma, kɔnɔ a mu fe kobi yo rabaxi a lanma a xa faxa naxan ma, xa na mu a ra a xa sa geeli kui.
44023030	N to bara a mɛ a Yuwifie bara gali malan a xili ma, n naxa a rasanba i ma keren na. N a kalamumae rakolonma e yɛtɛ kan xa sa a kalamu i xɔn a xa fe ra. Wo salamu.»
44023031	Sɔɔrie naxa Pɔlu tongo alɔ e yamarixi ki naxɛ. E naxa a xanin kɔɛ ra han Antipatiri.
44023032	Na kuye iba, sɔɔrie naxa gbilen sɔɔri banxi. Soe ragie naxa Pɔlu tongo.
44023033	E to so Sesare, soe ragie naxa bataaxɛ nun Pɔlu so mangɛ yi ra.
44023034	Mangɛ to gɛ bataaxɛ xarande, a naxa Pɔlu maxɔrin a keli dɛnnaxɛ. A to bara a mɛ a Silisika na a ra, a naxa a fala,
44023035	«N fama nɛ i makiitide i tɔɔɲɛgɛlae na fa tɛmui naxɛ.» A naxa yaamari fi e xa Pɔlu xanin geeli banxi Herode naxan tixi.
44024001	Xi suuli dangi xanbi, Ananiyasi, naxan findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi ra, nun forie naxa fa e nun xunmafalɛ nde, naxan xili Teritulo. E naxa Pɔlu kalamu mangɛ xɔn ma.
44024002	E to Pɔlu xili, Teritulo naxa so a tɔɔɲɛgɛfe yi masenyi ra. «Felisi mangɛ fanyi, yi bɔxi birin dɔxɔxi bɔɲɛsa kui i xa fe kolonyi nun i xa xaxili fanyi nan saabui ra.
44024003	I bara muxu rasɛɛwa hɛɛri xungbe ra.
44024004	N mu wama i rabufe, kɔnɔ n bara i maxandi i xa i tuli mati muxu xa masenyi ra dondoronti.
44024005	Muxu bara a to yi xɛmɛ mixi ɲaaxi na a ra. A Yuwifie tagi isoma naxee na duniɲa birin. A tan nan na Isa Nasarɛtika xa ɲama xunyi ra.
44024006	A man naxa wa hɔrɔmɔbanxi maberefe. Muxu naxa a suxu. Muxu naxa wa a makiitife muxu xa sɛriyɛ ki ma,
44024007	kɔnɔ sɔɔri mangɛ Lisiya naxa fa, a naxa a ba muxu yi sɛnbɛ xungbe ra.
44024008	A naxa a kalamulae yaamari e xa fa i xɔn ma. Xa i fan Pɔlu maxɔrin, i fama a kolonde muxu a suxuxi fe naxan ma.»
44024009	Yuwifie naxa tin na masenyi ra, e fan naxa a fala a na na ki nɛ.
44024010	Mangɛ naxa Pɔlu yaamari a fan xa wɔyɛn. Pɔlu naxa a masen a bɛ, «N a kolon, yi bɔxi makiitima nan i ra kabi ɲɛ wuyaxi. Na kui, n nan ma fe xunmafalama nɛ i bɛ lanlanteya kui.
44024011	Xi fu nun firin mu dangi kabi n naxa siga Darisalamu salide.
44024012	E mu nu muxu nun mixi li sɔnxɔ ra hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, xa na mu a ra salide xunxurie kui. N mu sɔnxɔɛ ratexi taa kui, n mu gali kui isoxi.
44024013	E mu nɔma sese masende, e n kalamuma naxan ma.
44024014	N naxan masenma i bɛ na nan ya. N nan n benbae Marigi Ala nan batuma alɔ Isa xa kira a masenxi ki naxɛ, e a falama kira naxan bɛ a wule kira. Naxan sɛbɛxi Tawureta Munsa nun namiɲɔnmɛe xa Kitaabui kui, n la na birin na.
44024015	N laxi Ala xa masenyi ra naxan masenxi a tinxintɔɛe nun tinxintare birin fama nɛ kelide faxɛ ma. Yuwifie fan laxi na ra.
44024016	Na nan a toxi n nan n yɛtɛ karaxanma alako n xa n ma simaya radangi bɔɲɛ fiixɛ kui Ala nun mixie tagi.
44024017	N mu nu na be ɲɛ wuyaxi bun ma, kɔnɔ yakɔsi n faxi harige nde ra n bɔnsɔɛ bɛ. N fan faxi sɛrɛxɛ bade Ala bɛ.
44024018	E n lixi na tɛmui nɛ hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, n sɛniyɛnxi, gali mu na n fɔxɔ ra, sɔnxɔɛ yo fan mu keli n saabui ra.
44024019	Kɔnɔ Yuwifi nde naxee keli Asi bɔxi ma, e mu tin n ma fe ra. E tan xa e yɛtɛ masen i bɛ, xa fe nde na e bɛ n ma fe ra.
44024020	Xa na mu a ra naxee na be, e xa a masen i bɛ e n toxi fe ɲaaxi naxan xun, n to siga Yuwifi kiitisae yire.
44024021	N wɔyɛnyi naxan falaxi e tagi na nan ya: ‹Wo n makiitima nɛ to barima n laxi a ra Ala fama nɛ mixi faxaxie rakelide.› »
44024022	Felisi naxan nu Isa xa kira kolon a fanyi ra, a naxa e xa fe sa sinden. A naxɛ, «Mangɛ Lisiya na fa, n wo xa fe matoma.»
44024023	A naxa sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati yamari a xa Pɔlu kanta, a naxa a tɔɔrɔ, a man naxa a xa mixi yo ratɔn fe fanyi rabafe ra a bɛ.
44024024	Xi ndee to dangi, Felisi nun a xa ginɛ Dirusila, naxan na Yuwifi ra, e naxa fa. Felisi naxa Pɔlu xili kawandi rabade Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra. Pɔlu naxa danxaniya xa fe fala e bɛ Isa ma,
44024025	kɔnɔ a xa masenyi to nu binyaxi tinxinyi ma, nun yɛtɛ xurufe ma, nun Ala xa kiiti naxan fama, Felisi naxa gaaxu. A naxɛ, «Siga sinden. N na n yɛtɛ masɔtɔ tɛmui naxɛ, n man i xilima.»
44024026	A man nu waxi nɛ Pɔlu xa kɔbiri fi a ma. A nu a xilima na nan ma tɛmui birin, e xa sa e bore to.
44024027	Ɲɛ firin to dangi, Felisi masarama naxa fa, Pɔrusu Fɛsitu. Felisi to wa a yɛtɛ mafanfe Yuwifie bɛ, a naxa Pɔlu lu geeli kui.
44025001	Fɛsitu naxa xi saxan naba Sesare. Na xanbi, a naxa te Darisalamu.
44025002	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi nun Yuwifi kuntigie naxa Pɔlu kalamu Fɛsitu bɛ.
44025003	E naxa Fɛsitu mayandi a xa fa a ra Darisalamu. E nu wama nɛ e xa a faxa kira ra.
44025004	Fɛsitu naxa e yaabi, «Pɔlu makantaxi Sesare. A gbegbe mu luxi n tan fan xa siga naa.
44025005	Wo xa yarerati ndee xa n mati, wo xa Pɔlu kalamu naa xa a bara sa fe ɲaaxi nde raba.»
44025006	Fɛsitu mu se sa xi solomasaxan fari, xa na mu a ra xi fu Darisalamu, a naxa goro Sesare. Na kuye iba, a naxa dɔxɔ a xa kiiti kibanyi ma. A naxa yaamari fi e xa fa Pɔlu ra.
44025007	A to fa, Yuwifie naxee fa keli Darisalamu, e naxa a rabilin. E naxa tɔɔɲɛgɛ gbegbe sa a xun, e mu nu nɔma naxan masende nɔndi ra.
44025008	Pɔlu naxa so a yɛtɛ xunmafalafe, a nu a fala, «N mu fe ɲaaxi yo rabaxi Yuwifie xa sɛriyɛ ra, xa na mu hɔrɔmɔbanxi ra, xa na mu a ra Rɔma mangɛ ra.»
44025009	Fɛsitu to wa a yɛtɛ mafanfe Yuwifie xɔn, a naxa Pɔlu maxɔrin, «I wama tefe Darisalamu i xa sa makiiti yi fee ma n ya xɔri?»
44025010	Pɔlu naxa a yaabi, «N lanma n xa makiiti mangasanyi xa kiiti banxi nan kui, n tixi dɛnnaxɛ yi ki. N mu fe kobi yo rabaxi Yuwifie ra. I fan na kolon a fanyi ra.
44025011	Xa n bara fe ɲaaxi raba a lanma n xa faxa naxan ma, n mu tondima n xa faxa, kɔnɔ xa e naxan falama wule na a ra, a mu lan mixi yo xa n so e yi ra. Mangɛ xungbe xa sa n makiiti Rɔma.»
44025012	Fɛsitu to wɔyɛn a rasimae ra, a naxa a fala Pɔlu bɛ, «I bara wa sigafe mangɛ xungbe xɔn. Awa, i sigama nɛ.»
44025013	Xi nde to dangi, mangɛ Agiripa nun Berinisi naxa so Sesare Fɛsitu xɛɛbude.
44025014	E to bara xi wuyaxi radangi naa, Fɛsitu naxa Pɔlu xa fe fala mangɛ Agiripa bɛ. A naxɛ, «Felisi bara geelimani nde lu be.
44025015	N nu na Darisalamu tɛmui naxɛ, sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie nun Yuwifie forie naxa a kalamu, e man naxa wa a xa faxa.
44025016	N naxa e yaabi a Rɔmakae xa sɛriyɛ mu mixi faxama, fo a xa a gbe fala kalamusae bɛ kiitisa ya xɔri.
44025017	Na fe nan e rafaxi be. N fan mu dugundi. Na kuye iba, n naxa dɔxɔ n ma kiiti banxi. N naxa yaamari fi e xa fa na xɛmɛ ra.
44025018	Kalamusae to e dɛntɛgɛ, e mu fe ɲaaxi yo fala a xun ma, n nu naxee maɲɔxunxi.
44025019	E nu xɔrɔxɔma e xa diinɛ nan ma fe ra, a nun Isa xa fe ra. E naxɛ a bara faxa, kɔnɔ Pɔlu naxɛ a baloxi.
44025020	Awa, n to mu a kolon a lan n xa naxan naba, n naxa a maxɔrin xa a wama sigafe Darisalamu, a xa makiiti naa.
44025021	Kɔnɔ Pɔlu naxa wa a xa fe xaninfe mangɛ xungbe xɔn ma. Na tɛmui n naxa yaamari fi e xa a kanta han n a rasanbama mangɛ xungbe ma tɛmui naxɛ.»
44025022	Agiripa naxa a fala Fɛsitu bɛ, «N fan wama n tuli matife na xɛmɛ ra.» Fɛsitu naxa a yaabi, «Tina, i a xui mɛma.»
44025023	Awa, na kuye iba, Agiripa nun Berinisi naxa so malan yire e nun taa kuntigie. E nu maxirixi a fanyi ra. Fɛsitu xa yaamari ma, e naxa fa Pɔlu ra.
44025024	Fɛsitu naxa a fala, «Mangɛ Agiripa nun wo tan naxee birin na be, wo bara yi xɛmɛ to Yuwifi naxan birin kalamuxi n xɔn Darisalamu nun be. E naxɛ a a xa faxa.
44025025	N tan bɛ, a mu fefe rabaxi a lan a xa faxa naxan ma, kɔnɔ a tan yati bara mayandi ti sigafe ra mangɛ xungbe xɔnyi Rɔma. Awa, n fan bara tin na ra.
44025026	N mu fe xɔri yo sɔtɔxi naxan sɛbɛma mangɛ xungbe ma a xa fe ra. Na na a ra, n a raminixi wo ya i, a gbengbenyi i tan mangɛ Agiripa, alako won na gɛ a maxɔrinde n xa a kolon a lanma n xa naxan sɛbɛ.
44025027	N mu nɔma geelimani rasanbade mangɛ ma, n mu a masen a naxan nabaxi.»
44026001	Agiripa naxa a fala Pɔlu bɛ, «I xa i yɛtɛ xun mafala.» Pɔlu to a bɛlɛxɛ ite, a naxa a yɛtɛ rafiixɛ yi masenyi ra.
44026002	«Mangɛ Agiripa, to n ɲɛlɛxinxi n ma fe rafiixɛfe ra Yuwifie n kalamuxi naxan ma.
44026003	I e xa diinɛ nun e xa sɛriyɛ kolon ki fanyi ra. Awa yandi, i xa i tuli mati n na.
44026004	Kabi n dimɛdi tɛmui, n nu na Darisalamu n bɔnsɔɛ ya ma. Yuwifi birin n ɲɛrɛ ki kolon
44026005	a rakuya. E man a kolon Farisɛni nan nu n na diinɛla tagi naxee xa fe maxɔrɔxɔ. E nɔma na seedeɲɔxɔya bade.
44026006	Yakɔsi, e n nakiitife barima n laxi Ala xa laayidi ra a naxan tongoxi muxu benbae bɛ,
44026007	muxu bɔnsɔɛ fu nun firinyi naxan mamɛfe. E Ala batuma tɛmui birin, kɔɛ nun yanyi. N laxi na laayidi nan na. Mangɛ, Yuwifie n kalamuxi na nan ma.
44026008	Wo nɔma lade a ra a Ala mixi faxaxie rakelima?»
44026009	«N tan kata nɛ kira mɔɔli birin na n xa Isa Nasarɛtika xili kana.
44026010	N na nan naba Darisalamu. Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie naxa tin n xa sɛniyɛntɔɛ wuyaxi sa geeli kui. N man naxa tin e xa faxa.
44026011	N nu sigama salide banxie kui alako n xa e tɔɔrɔ, e xa gbilen e xa danxaniya fɔxɔ ra. N ma xɔnɛ kui, n nu e tɔɔrɔ hali taa gbɛtɛe kui.»
44026012	«Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie naxa tin n xa siga Damasi na fe ma.
44026013	Mangɛ, yanyi tagi n naxa yanbɛ to kira xɔn ma kelife koore, n tan nun n booree rabilinyi. A yanbɛ nu dangi soge ra.
44026014	Muxu naxa bira bɔxi ma. N naxa xui nde mɛ naxan nu a falama n bɛ Eburu xui, ‹Sɔlu, Sɔlu, munfe ra i n ɲaxankatama? Na fe xɔrɔxɔma nɛ i bɛ.›
44026015	N naxa a yaabi, ‹Marigi, nde i ra?› Marigi naxa n yaabi, ‹Isa nan n na, i naxan ɲaxankatafe.
44026016	Keli, ti i sanyie xun na. N minixi nɛ i ma alako n xa i findi walikɛ nun seede ra fee ma i naxee toxi nun i fama naxee tode.
44026017	N i ratangama nɛ Yuwifie ma nun si gbɛtɛe ma, n i xɛɛma naxee ma, alako i xa e yae rabi,
44026018	e xa mini dimi kui, e xa so naiyalanyi kui. E xa keli Sentanɛ xa nɔɛ bun, e xa so Ala xa mangɛya niini bun ma. Na kui, e xa yunubi xafarima nɛ, e man fama nɛ kɛ sɔtɔde sɛniyɛntɔɛe ya ma naxee danxaniyaxi n ma.› »
44026019	«Na kui, mangɛ Agiripa, n mu tondi na xɛɛraya ra naxan keli koore ma.
44026020	N naxa na kawandi ti Damasi, Darisalamu, Yudaya, nun si gbɛtɛe tagi. N naxa a masen e bɛ e xa tuubi, e xa danxaniya Ala ma, nun e xa wali fanyi raba naxan e xa togondiya masenma.»
44026021	«Yuwifie naxa n suxu hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, e waxi n faxafe na nan ma.
44026022	Kɔnɔ, Ala tantu, n baloxi a tan nan saabui ra han to. N naxa na seedeɲɔxɔya ba dimɛe nun forie birin bɛ. N mu fefe gbɛtɛ falaxi fo namiɲɔnmɛe nun Annabi Munsa nu naxee falama a e fama nɛ rabade.
44026023	E naxa a masen Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi tɔɔrɔma nɛ, a singe nan kelima faxamixie ya ma, a nun a Yuwifie nun si gbɛtɛe kawandima kisi ra.»
44026024	A to nu wɔyɛnfe a yɛtɛ rafiixɛfe ra, Fɛsitu naxa a fala a xui itexi ra, «Pɔlu, i daxu! I xa fe gbegbe kolonyi bara i findi daxui ra.»
44026025	Pɔlu naxa a yaabi, «Fɛsitu mafanxi, daxui mu na n na. N nɔndi nun lɔnni nan masenfe.
44026026	Mangɛ Agiripa tan yi fee kolon. N yi birin falama a tan nan bɛ, barima a ɲan a kolon, a a mu raba gundo xa kui.»
44026027	Pɔlu naxa a fala Agiripa bɛ, «Mangɛ Agiripa, i laxi namiɲɔnmɛe ra? I la e ra, n na kolon.»
44026028	Agiripa naxa a fala Pɔlu bɛ, «A gbe mu luxi i xa n fan findi Isayanka ra!»
44026029	Pɔlu naxa a yaabi, «A fa findi yakɔsi ra, xa na mu tɛmui gbɛtɛ, n Marigi maxandima nɛ alako i tan yo, a nun naxan birin n xui ramɛfe be to, wo fan xa lu alɔ n tan, ba yi yɔlɔnxɔnyi ra naxan na n ma.»
44026030	Mangɛ Agiripa, mangɛ Fɛsitu, Berinisi, nun naxee birin nu dɔxɔxi e sɛɛti ma, e naxa keli.
44026031	E to nu sigama, e naxa a fala e bore bɛ, «Yi xɛmɛ mu fefe rabaxi a lanma a xa faxa naxan ma, xa na mu a ra a lanma a xa sa geeli kui naxan ma.»
44026032	Agiripa naxa a fala Fɛsitu bɛ, «Yi xɛmɛ nu lan a xa bɛɲin, kɔnɔ a bara maxandi ti Mangɛ Xungbe xa a makiiti.»
44027001	E to natɛ tongo muxu xa baki kunkui kui sigafe ra Itali, e naxa Pɔlu nun geelimani ndee so sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati yi ra naxan xili Yuliyusi, naxan na mangɛ xungbe xa sɔɔrie ya ma.
44027002	Muxu nun Arisitaraki, naxan keli Tɛsaloniki Masedon bɔxi ma, naxa baki kunkui kui naxan keli Adiramiti. A nu lan a xa dangi Asi sɛɛti ma.
44027003	Na kuye iba, muxu naxa kilɔn Sidɔn. Yuliyusi, naxan nu a ɲɔxɔ saxi Pɔlu xɔn ma a fanyi ra, a naxa a sago sa a xa siga a booree xɔnyi biyaasi fandɛ fende.
44027004	Muxu to keli naa, muxu naxa dangi Sipiri suri ma, barima foye mu nu tinxi muxu bɛ.
44027005	Muxu to Silisi nun Panfiliya baa igiri, muxu naxa so Mira, Lisi bɔxi ma.
44027006	Mɛnni, sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati naxa kunkui to naxan keli Alesandire, a sigafe Itali. Muxu naxa baki na kui.
44027007	Xi wuyaxi bun ma kunkui nu tɔɔrɔma ɲɛrɛde. Kata nun kata muxu fa Sinidi li kɔnɔ foye mu tin muxu xa kilɔn naa. Na nan a to muxu naxa dangi Kirɛti suri laabe ra, Salemone sɛɛti ma.
44027008	Naa iɲɛrɛfe nu xɔrɔxɔ. Muxu naxa yire nde li, naxan xili Wafu Tofanyi, Laseya fɛ ma.
44027009	Muxu naxa bu naa. Ɲɛrɛ man nu xɔrɔxɔ barima sunyi tɛmui nu bara dangi.
44027010	Na na a ra, Pɔlu naxa a fala, «N biyaasibooree, n bara a kolon won ma ɲɛrɛ fama nɛ xɔrɔxɔde. Kotee, kunkui, nun mixie fama nɛ tɔɔrɔde.»
44027011	Sɔɔri kɛmɛ xunmati naxa a tuli mati kɛpini nun kunkui kanyi xa wɔyɛnyi ra, a tondi Pɔlu xa marasi ra.
44027012	Mixi gbegbe naxa wa Feniki life, barima e nu na wafu dɛnnaxɛ, mɛnni mu nu fan ɲɛmɛ radangide ra. Feniki, Kirɛti suri wafu nan a ra, naxan ya rafindixi sogegorode biri ma. E naxa wa e xa ɲɛmɛ radangi naa.
44027013	Foye di nde naxa mini keli kɔɔla ma. E naxa a maɲɔxun a biyaasi bara fan. E naxa hanga bɛndun, e kunkui radangi Kirɛti suri fɛ ma.
44027014	Kɔnɔ na tɛmui foye xungbe, naxan xili Yurakilɔn, a naxa fa keli suri ma.
44027015	Foye naxa kunkui tutun, han kunkui mu nu nɔma matinxinde. Muxu naxa muxu raxara foye yi ra.
44027016	Muxu naxa dangi suri lanmadi laabe ra, naxan xili Kiloda. Muxu naxa tɔɔrɔ kunkui lanma masɔtɔfe ra.
44027017	E to gɛ a ratede, e naxa luuti mafilin kunkui ma. E to nu gaaxuxi dɔxɔfe ra Sirite bɛnki ma, e naxa bɛla ragoro, foye nu fa siga muxu ra.
44027018	Foye naxa muxu bɔnbɔ a fanyi ra. Na kuye iba, muxu naxa kote nde woli baa ma.
44027019	Xi saxan to dangi, muxu yati naxa kunkui isee birin nagoro ye ma.
44027020	Xi wuyaxi naxa dangi, soge mu na, tunbuie mu na, foye sɛnbɛ nu gboma nan tui. Muxu mu nu laxi muxu kisife ra sɔnɔn.
44027021	Kabi xi wuyaxi muxu mu nu donse donma. Awa Pɔlu naxa ti mixie tagi, a naxa a fala e bɛ, «N booree, xa wo wo tuli mati n na nu, won mu kelima Kirɛti nu, won mu yi kasarɛ nun lɔsi sɔtɔma nu.
44027022	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, n wo rasima nɛ, wo xa limaniya, barima mixi yo mu faxama wo ya ma, kunkui nan gbansan kasarama.
44027023	N Marigi Ala, n walima naxan bɛ, a xa malekɛ nde bara mini n ma yi kɔɛ ra.
44027024	A naxa a fala n bɛ, ‹Pɔlu, i naxa gaaxu, fo i xa ti nɛ mangɛ xungbe ya i. Ala bara tin i biyaasiboore birin natangade.›
44027025	Na na a ra, wo xa limaniya barima n laxi Ala xa masenyi ra.
44027026	Won fama suri nde lide.»
44027027	Kɔɛ fu nun naani nde, muxu naxa Adiriyatike baa li. Na kɔɛ tagi kunkui raɲɛrɛ naxa sogi a muxu bara makɔrɛ bɔxi nde ra.
44027028	E to ye tilinyi maniyase ragoro, e naxa kanke ya mɔxɔɲɛn sɔtɔ. E to makuya dondoronti, e man naxa a ragoro, e naxa kanke ya fu nun suuli sɔtɔ.
44027029	E to gaaxu garinde fanye nde ra, e naxa hanga naani woli kunkui xanbi ra. E naxa gbata kuye ibafe ra.
44027030	Kɔnɔ kunkui raɲɛrɛe nu wama kelife kunkui xun. E naxa kunkui lanma ragoro baa ma alɔ e na hangae nan nagorofe kunkui ya ra.
44027031	Pɔlu naxa a fala sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati nun sɔɔrie bɛ, «Xa yi mixie mu lu kunkui kui, wo mu nɔma kiside.»
44027032	Awa, sɔɔrie naxa kunkui lanma luuti bolon, e naxa a rabɛɲin a xa siga.
44027033	Beenun kuye xa iba, Pɔlu naxa e birin nasi e xa donse don. A naxa a fala e bɛ, «A xi fu nun naani nan to wo mamɛ tife, wo mu tinxi wo dɛgede.
44027034	N bara wo rasi wo xa donse don, barima na nan fan wo fate bɛ. Mixi yo mu halakima, hali wo xunsɛxɛ keren mu lɔɛma.»
44027035	A to na fala, a naxa taami tongo, a Ala nuwali sa e birin ya xɔri, a taami igira, a naxa a don fɔlɔ.
44027036	Na tɛmui e birin naxa limaniya, e fan naxa so taami donfe.
44027037	Muxu mixi kɛmɛ firin mixi tongo solofere a nun senni nan nu na kunkui kui.
44027038	E to wasa donse ra, e naxa farin woli baa ma alako kunkui xa yelebu.
44027039	Kuye to iba, e mu a kolon e na dɛnnaxɛ, kɔnɔ e naxa bɔxi nde to. E naxa natɛ tongo e xa kata kunkui rasigade naa.
44027040	E naxa hangae fulun, e xa sin baa ma. E naxa fɛya luutie fan bolon. E naxa yare bɛla rate, e xa e xun sa xare ma.
44027041	Kɔnɔ e naxa bɛnki li, kunkui naxa kankan. Kunkui xunyi to kankan, mɔrɔnyi naxa a xɔrɛ kana sɛnbɛ ra.
44027042	Sɔɔrie naxa lan geelimanie faxafe ma, alako e naxa ye masa, e e gi.
44027043	Kɔnɔ sɔɔrie kɛmɛ xunmati, naxan nu wama Pɔlu rakisife, a naxa e ratɔn. A naxa yaamari fi e ma a naxee fata ye masade, e singe xa bagan ye ma alako e xa xare masɔtɔ.
44027044	Booree xa gbaku xebenyie ra, xa na mu a ra kunkui xuntunyie ra. E birin naxa xare masɔtɔ hɛɛri kui.
44028001	Muxu to xare masɔtɔ, muxu naxa a kolon a na suri xili Malita.
44028002	Malitakae naxa sɛɛwa muxu ra ki fanyi ra. E naxa muxu birin malan tɛ xungbe fɛ ma, e nu naxan xuruxi, barima tunɛ nu fafe nun xinbeli gbegbe ra.
44028003	Pɔlu to bolee matongo safe tɛ i, bɔximase naxa mini na tɛ wuyenyi xa fe ra, a naxa a bɛlɛxɛ xin.
44028004	Malitakae to bɔximase to, a bara a bɛlɛxɛ xin a singanxi a ra, e naxa a fala e bore bɛ, «Nɔndi ra, niba nan yi mixi ra, barima haakɛ mu tinxi a xa balo, hali a to tangaxi baa ma.»
44028005	Pɔlu naxa bɔximase ralisan tɛ, sese mu a to.
44028006	Na mixie nu mamɛ tife nɛ a xinde xa funtu, xa na mu a ra a xa faxa keren na, kɔnɔ sese mu a to. E to mamɛ ti, e naxa e xa maɲɔxunyi masara. E naxa a fala ala nde nan a ra.
44028007	Suri kuntigi xungbe, naxan xili Pubiliyu, naxa muxu yigiya a fanyi ra a xɔnyi xi saxan bun ma.
44028008	Pubiliyu baba nu saxi, a furaxi, mangafaxɛ nu na a ma. Pɔlu to a makɔrɛ a ra, a naxa a bɛlɛxɛ sa a ma, a Ala maxandi, a naxa a rayalan.
44028009	Na xanbi, suri furema gbɛtɛe naxa fa, Pɔlu naxa e fan nayalan.
44028010	E naxa muxu binya a fanyi ra. Muxu to keli sigade, e naxa fandɛ fi muxu ma.
44028011	Muxu to kike saxan nadangi naa, muxu naxa baki kunkui kui, naxan keli Alesandire. A nu bara ɲɛmɛ radangi suri ma. Tɔnxuma nu a ma naxan findixi kuye masolixi firinyi ra.
44028012	Muxu to so kilɔn Sirakusi, muxu naxa lu naa xi saxan.
44028013	Muxu to keli naa, muxu naxa siga Regiyo baa dɛ ra. Foye to keli yirefanyi ma na kuye iba, muxu naxa xi firin ɲɛrɛ raba han Pusoli.
44028014	Muxu naxa ngaxakerenyie li naa naxee muxu mayandi xi solofere radangife ra e xɔnyi. Na tɛmui muxu siga nɛ han Rɔma.
44028015	Muxu ngaxakerenyi Rɔmakae, naxee muxu xa fe mɛ, e naxa fa muxu ralande, keli Rɔma han Apiyusi malan yire nun taa naxan xili Banxi Saxanyie. Pɔlu to e to a naxa Ala nuwali sa, a naxa limaniya.
44028016	Muxu to so Rɔma, sɔɔri mixi kɛmɛ xunmati naxa geelimanie so mangɛ yi ra, kɔnɔ a naxa Pɔlu lu a kerenyi ma, a nun sɔɔri keren naxan a kantama.
44028017	Xi saxan to dangi, Pɔlu naxa Yuwifi kuntigie xili. E to malan, a naxa yi wɔyɛnyi ti e bɛ, «N ngaxakerenyie, hali n to mu fefe rabaxi won ma mixie ra, nun won benbae xa naamunyie ra, Yuwifie bara n sa geeli kui Darisalamu, na xanbi e man fa n so Rɔmakae yi ra.
44028018	E to gɛ n maxɔrinde, e nu wama n nabolofe nɛ, barima e mu sese toxi n faxama naxan ma.
44028019	Kɔnɔ Yuwifie mu tin. Na ma, n naxa mangɛ xungbe xa kiiti maxandi, kɔnɔ n mu wa n bɔnsɔɛ nan kalamufe.
44028020	Na na a ra, n naxa wa wo tofe alako n xa wɔyɛn wo ra, barima Isirayilakae xaxili tixi xɛɛra naxan na, na xa fe nan a toxi e yi yɔlɔnxɔnyi saxi n ma.»
44028021	E naxa a yaabi, «Muxu mu bataaxɛ yo sɔtɔxi i xa fe ra keli Yudaya. Won ngaxakerenyi yo mu faxi fe ɲaaxi falade i xa fe ra.
44028022	Kɔnɔ, muxu wama a kolonfe nɛ i naxan maɲɔxunxi, barima muxu a kolon e yi diinɛ xa fe ibaxantinma yire birin.»
44028023	Pɔlu naxa lɔxɔɛ keren so e yi. Mixi wuyaxi to fa a xɔnyi, Pɔlu naxa Ala xa mangɛya seedeɲɔxɔya ba. A naxa Isa xa fe masen e bɛ Tawureta Munsa nun namiɲɔnmɛe xa Kitaabui saabui ra keli gɛɛsɛgɛ han nunmare.
44028024	Ndee naxa la a ra, kɔnɔ booree mu danxaniya.
44028025	E to nu fatanma lantareya kui, Pɔlu naxa yi masenyi sa a fari, «Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi a fala nɛ wo benbae bɛ nɔndi ki ma Annabi Esayi saabui ra. A naxɛ,
44028026	‹Siga yi mixie xɔn ma, i xa a fala e bɛ: "Wo a mɛma wo tulie ra, kɔnɔ wo mu a fahaamuma. Wo a toma wo yae ra, kɔnɔ wo mu a igbɛma."
44028027	Barima yi mixie sondonyi bara xɔrɔxɔ. E bara e tulie dɛsɛ. E bara e yae raxi, alako e naxa a to e yae ra, e naxa a mɛ e tulie ra, e naxa a fahaamu e xaxili ra. Xa na mu a ra e e sondonyi mafindima nɛ, alako Ala xa e rayalan.› »
44028028	«Awa, wo xa a kolon a Ala xa kisi bara rasanba si gbɛtɛe ma. E fama e tuli matide a ra.»
44028029	A to na fala, Yuwifie naxa siga xɔrɔxɔɛ kui e booree tagi.
44028030	Pɔlu naxa lu banxi nde kui ɲɛ firin, a nu a sare fi. Naxee birin nu fama a tode, a nu e birin nasɛnɛma.
44028031	A nu Ala xa mangɛya niini xa fe nan kawandima a nun Marigi Isa xa fe, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi. A naxa na birin naba limaniya ra, mixi yo mu a tɔɔrɔ.
45001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa konyi di. Ala bara n xili n xa findi a xa xɛɛra ra, a n sugandi n xa a xa xibaaru fanyi rayensen yɛ.
45001002	Tɛmui dangixi, Ala nu bara a xa yi xibaaru fanyi laayidi a xa namiɲɔnmɛe xui ra Kitaabui sɛniyɛnxi kui.
45001003	Yi xibaaru fanyi findixi a xa Di nan xa fe ra, naxan bari Dawuda bɔnsɔɛ kui a adama ki ma.
45001004	Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fan bara a masen sɛnbɛ ra a Ala xa Di na a ra. A na masen a xa marakeli nan saabui ra faxɛ ma. Won Marigi nan na Isa ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
45001005	A tan nan saabui a niyaxi Ala hinnɛxi muxu ra muxu xa findi xɛɛrae ra a xili xa fe ra, alako si birin xa danxaniya a ma, e xa bira a fɔxɔ ra.
45001006	Wo fan na na ya ma, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa wo tan naxee xilixi.
45001007	N yi sɛbɛfe wo tan Rɔmakae nan ma Ala naxee xanuxi, a naxee xilixi wo xa findi a xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe ra. Won Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
45001008	A fɔlɛ ra, n nan n Marigi Ala tantuma nɛ wo birin xa fe ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra, barima wo xa danxaniya xili bara din duniɲa birin na.
45001009	N Marigi Ala, n naxan batuma n nii birin na n to a xa Di xa xibaaru fanyi rayensenma, a tan a kolon a n na nɔndi nan falafe wo bɛ. A tan nan n seede ra, fa a fala, n a maxandima wo bɛ tɛmui birin.
45001010	N man Ala maxandima, xa a sago na a ra, a xa a niya n xa nɔ sigade wo xɔnyi fa.
45001011	Barima wo to xɔli na n ma ki fanyi, alako n xa nɔ wo sɛnbɛ sode Ala xa ki ndee ra.
45001012	A xɔli n ma won xa won bore ralimaniya won ma danxaniya saabui ra, won birin xa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ won bore ra.
45001013	N ngaxakerenyie, n wama wo xa a kolon a sanmaya wuyaxi nan yi ki n bara natɛ tongo n xa siga wo xɔnyi n xa sa n ma wali tide nde to wo tagi alɔ n a toxi ki naxɛ ɲamanɛ gbɛtɛe tagi, kɔnɔ han to a mu sɔɔnɛya n bɛ.
45001014	Fo n xa wɔyɛn mixi birin bɛ, taa idɔxɔɛe nun daaxa idɔxɔɛe, xaran mixie nun xarantaree.
45001015	Na na a ra a xɔli n ma ki fanyi n xa xibaaru fanyi kawandi wo tan Rɔmakae fan bɛ.
45001016	N mu yaagima Marigi xa xibaaru fanyi masende mixi yo bɛ, barima a tan nan saabui a niyama Ala danxaniyatɔɛ birin nakisima. Yi kisi fixi Yuwifie nan singe ma, a fa fi si gbɛtɛe fan ma.
45001017	Yi xibaaru fanyi bara a makɛnɛn a tinxinyi naxan kelima Ala ma a sɔtɔma danxaniya nan tun saabui ra, alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ: «Mixi tinxinxi kisima danxaniya nan saabui ra.»
45001018	Ala xa xɔnɛ goroma keli koore tinxintaree nun kaafirie xili ma. Yi mixie nɔndi nɔxunma e xa tinxintareya saabui ra.
45001019	Anun mixi nɔma naxan kolonde Ala xa fe kui, a fiixɛxi e bɛ fɔɛn, barima Ala bara a makɛnɛn e bɛ.
45001020	Kabi duniɲa daa tɛmui, Ala naxan mu toma, a naxa a yɛtɛ masen. Adamadi birin nɔma a kolonde a Ala na na yati, naxan sɛnbɛ mu danma, barima yi bara makɛnɛn e bɛ a fiixɛ ra a xa wali fɔxi saabui ra. Na kui, tinxintaree mu nɔma sese falade naxan kiiti fanma e bɛ,
45001021	barima hali e to Ala kolonxi, e bara tondi a tantude, e tondi a binyade a xa mangɛya kui. E xaxili bara bira fe fufafu fɔxɔ ra, e bɔɲɛ bara lu dimi kui.
45001022	E e yɛtɛ matɔxɔma e xa xaxilimaya ra, kɔnɔ e bara findi daxuie ra.
45001023	E bara tondi Ala batude naxan na na abadan, e kuye masolixie batu naxee misaalixi adamadi ra naxan faxama, a nun naxee misaalixi xɔni, sube, nun bubuse ra.
45001024	Na nan a niya Ala naxa e rabolo e xa yunubi fee kui, e bɔɲɛ kɛnɛnyi ma. Na kui, e naxa fe mayaagixie raba e bore ra.
45001025	E naxa Ala xa nɔndi masara wule ra, e man fa daali batu, beenun e xa Daali Mangɛ nan batu, a tan naxan lan a xa batu abadan. Amina.
45001026	Na na a ra Ala naxa e rabolo e xa bira e waxɔnfe mayaagixie fɔxɔ ra. E xa ginɛe naxa e nun xɛmɛ xa kafuɲɔxɔya masara ginɛ firin xa kafuɲɔxɔya ra.
45001027	Xɛmɛe fan naxa mɛɛ ginɛe xa kafuɲɔxɔya ra, e fa bira e boore xɛmɛe kafuɲɔxɔya fɔxɔ ra. E naxa fe mayaagixie raba e bore ra, e e xa wali kobi sare sɔtɔ naxan daxa.
45001028	E to tondi Ala kolonde Ala ra, a naxa e rabolo e yɛtɛ kan xaxili kobie yi, e nu fee raba naxee mu radaxa.
45001029	E bɔɲɛ rafexi tinxintareya mɔɔli birin na: wali kobi rabafe, wasatareya, ɲaaxuɲa. Milanteya, mixi faxafe, mixi tagi isofe, mixi mayendenfe, nun ya ixareya mu ɲɔnma e tagi.
45001030	Naafixie, mixi mafalɛe, Ala yaxuie, konbitie, yɛtɛ igboee nun dɛ igboee nan e ra. E fe kobie xabuma naxee singe mu nu kolon, e ɲan mu e barimixie danxunma.
45001031	Xaxilitare, dugutɛgɛ yanfɛ, kinikinitare, nun hinnɛtare nan na e ra.
45001032	Ala xa sɛriyɛ a masenxi nɛ, a naxee na fee rabama, faxɛ nan daxaxi e bɛ. Hali e to na kolon, e na fe haramuxie nan yati rabama, e man mixi ralimaniyama naxee fan na fe mɔɔli rabama.
45002001	Na kui, xa i mixi yuge makiitima, diɲɛ yo mu na i bɛ, i findi mixi yo ra. I nɛ i boore yuge makiitima, i na i yɛtɛ nan safe geeli, barima i tan naxan mixi yuge makiitima, wo birin wali kobi keren nan xun ma.
45002002	Won birin a kolon a Ala xa kiiti tinxin a na yi mixi mɔɔlie xa wali kobie sare fi.
45002003	I tan naxan mixi yuge makiitima, a man fa li wo birin na wali kobi keren nan xun ma, i ɲɔxɔ a ma a i fama tangade Ala xa kiiti ma?
45002004	Ka i yoxi nɛ Ala ma ba, a xa fanyi nun a xa diɲɛ nun a xa bɔɲɛ bɛxi to gboxi? I mu a kolon a Ala a xa fanyi nan masenma i bɛ alako i xa tuubi?
45002005	Kɔnɔ i to i tuli xɔrɔxɔxi, i tondi tuubide, i na Ala xa xɔnɛ nan nagbofe i yɛtɛ xili ma kiiti sa lɔxɔɛ, Ala xa kiiti tinxinxi makɛnɛnma tɛmui naxɛ.
45002006	Ala kankan xa wali sare fima nɛ.
45002007	Naxee e tunnabɛxi wali fanyi rabafe ma, e xunnakeli, yigi, nun kisi fen Ala ra, Ala kisi fima nɛ e ma.
45002008	Kɔnɔ naxee e yɛtɛ kɛnɛnfe tun nabama, e tondi nɔndi nun tinxinyi ra, e bira fe kobi fɔxɔ ra, Ala xa xɔnɛ nun gbaloe nan tun nagataxi e bɛ.
45002009	Ɲaxankatɛ nun bɔɲɛkanɛ nan luma adamadi birin bɛ naxee fe kobi rabama, a fɔlɔ Yuwifie ma, a sa dɔxɔ si gbɛtɛe ra.
45002010	Kɔnɔ xunnakeli, binyɛ, nun bɔɲɛsa luma mixi birin bɛ naxee fe fanyi rabama, a fɔlɔ Yuwifie ma, a sa dɔxɔ si gbɛtɛe ra,
45002011	barima Ala tan mu mixi yo rafisa a boore bɛ.
45002012	Yunubitɔɛe naxee birin mu Ala xa sɛriyɛ kolon Annabi Munsa naxan fixi, e bɔnɔma nɛ, kɔnɔ e mu makiitima na sɛriyɛ ra. Yunubitɔɛe naxee sɛriyɛ kolon Annabi Munsa naxan fixi, e tan nan makiitima na sɛriyɛ ra.
45002013	Naxee e tuli matima Ala xa sɛriyɛ ra, nee xa mu findixi tinxintɔɛe ra Ala ya i. Naxee Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuma, nee nan findima tinxintɔɛe ra.
45002014	Annabi Munsa mu Ala xa sɛriyɛ so si gbɛtɛe yi, naxee mu findi Yuwifie ra. Kɔnɔ e na Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatu tɛmui naxɛ e yɛtɛ ɲanige ma, e bara a kolon a lanma e xa naxan naba, hali e to mu Ala xa sɛriyɛ sɔtɔ.
45002015	E bara a masen a Ala xa sɛriyɛ sɛbɛxi e bɔɲɛ ma. Won a kolon a nɔndi na a ra barima e xaxili e rasima, «Yi ɲanige mu fan,» xa na mu, «Yi ɲanige nan fan.»
45002016	A rabama na ki nɛ, Ala nɛ kiiti sama lɔxɔ naxɛ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra, a mixie gundo birin makiiti. N xibaaru fanyi naxan kawandima, a na nan masenxi.
45002017	Kɔnɔ i tan naxɛ a Yuwifi nan na i ra. I xaxili tixi Munsa xa Sɛriyɛ nan na. I a maɲɔxunxi a i kisima na nan saabui ra. I to bara Ala kolon, na na a ra i i yɛtɛ igboma.
45002018	I Ala sago kolon. I fata fe fanyi sugandide barima i Ala xa sɛriyɛ xaranxi.
45002019	I laxi a ra a i tan nan findixi dɔnxuie raɲɛrɛma ra, a i tan nan findixi tɛ radɛxɛ ra mixie bɛ naxee na dimi kui.
45002020	I laxi a ra a i tan nan findixi xaxilitaree rasima nun dimɛe karamɔxɔe ra, barima lɔnni nun nɔndi birin na i yi ra i to diinɛ sɛriyɛ kolonxi.
45002021	I tan naxan boore xaranma, i mu i yɛtɛ xaranma! I tan naxan mixie tuli ibama muɲɛ tife ra, i muɲɛ tima!
45002022	I tan naxan a falama a mixie naxa yɛnɛ raba, i yɛnɛ rabama! I tan naxan yele na kuye batufe ra, i kuye batude see muɲama!
45002023	I tan naxan i yɛtɛ igboma i to Ala xa sɛriyɛ kolonxi, i na Ala yelebufe nɛ na ki, i na a xa sɛriyɛ matandife!
45002024	Na na a ra, a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Si gbɛtɛe Ala bɛxuma wo tan Isirayilakae xa fe ra.»
45002025	Sunnɛ tide na na nɛ xa i sa Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuxi. Kɔnɔ xa i sa a xa sɛriyɛ matandima, i xa sunnɛ bara findi i bɛ sunnatareya ra.
45002026	Na kui, xa a sa li sunnatare sa ɲɛrɛ Ala xa sɛriyɛ ma, a a rabatu, a xa sunnatareya mu findima a bɛ sunnɛ xa ra?
45002027	Naxee mu sunnaxi e fate bɛndɛ ma, kɔnɔ e Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuxi, nee wali ki nan fama i makiitide. Mixi sunnaxi nan i ra, Ala xa sɛriyɛ sɛbɛxi na i yi, kɔnɔ i Ala xa sɛriyɛ matandima.
45002028	I naxan masenma kɛnɛ ma mixie ya i, na xa mu i findixi Yuwifi ra. Tɔnxuma naxan toma i fate ma, na xa mu a masenxi a i sunnaxi yati.
45002029	Mixi findife Yuwifi ra, na kolonma bɔɲɛ nan ma. Sunnɛ yɛtɛ yɛtɛ fan, sunnɛ na a ra naxan sɔtɔma bɔɲɛ ma, Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra. A mu kelima diinɛ sɛriyɛ sɛbɛxi xa ma. Sunnɛ na mixi naxan bɔɲɛ ma, a xa matɔxɔɛ mu kelima mixi xa ma, a kelima Ala nan ma.
45003001	Tide mundun fa na findife Yuwifi ra? Sunnɛ tide na na yire?
45003002	Iyo, yi fee tide gbo ki fanyi. A fɔlɛ ra, Ala a xa masenyi taxu Yuwifie nan na.
45003003	Kɔnɔ xa a sa li go, ndee na e ya ma e kobe rasoxi Ala ra, na nɔma a niyade Ala fan xa a kobe raso e ra?
45003004	Astɔfulahi. Adamadi birin findixi wule falɛ nan na, kɔnɔ a xa kolon a Ala nɔndi kanyi mu nɔma wule falade. A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui: «Na kui, i xa wɔyɛnyi findima nɔndi nan na. Kiiti luma i tan nan bɛ tɛmui birin.»
45003005	Kɔnɔ xa won ma tinxintareya fa a masenma nɛ mixie bɛ a Ala tinxin, won fa na ma di? Ala na xɔnɔ won ma, won xa a fala a mu tinxin? (N wɔyɛnfe nɛ alɔ mixie wɔyɛnma ki naxɛ.)
45003006	Astɔfulahi! Xa Ala mu tinxin, a duniɲa makiitima di?
45003007	Nde nɔma a falade, «Xa n ma wule Ala xa nɔndi makɛnɛnma duniɲa bɛ alako Ala xa tantui sɔtɔ, munfe ra a fa n findima yunubitɔɛ ra?»
45003008	Won ɲan xa a fala, «Won xa fe ɲaaxi raba alako a xa sa findi fe fanyi ra.» Muxu xili kanɛe na nan falama muxu xun ma, a muxu xa masenyi nan na ki. Kɔnɔ Ala na e makiiti, e fan e sare sɔtɔma nɛ.
45003009	Won munse falama fa? Won xa a fala a won tan Yuwifie tinxin dangi si gbɛtɛe ra? Ade, na mu a ra feo, barima alɔ won ɲan bara a to, Yuwifie ba, si gbɛtɛe ba, birin na yunubi nan xa nɔɛ bun ma.
45003010	A sɛbɛxi: «Mixi yo mu tinxin, hali mixi keren.
45003011	Fe kolonyi yo mu na, mixi yo mu Ala fenfe.
45003012	Birin bara kira fanyi bɛɲin, e birin xun bara rakana. Mixi yo mu na naxan fe fanyi rabama, hali mixi keren, a mu na.
45003013	E dɛ findixi gaburi dɛ ibixi nan na, e nɛnyi findixi mixi mayenden se nan na. Bɔximase xɔnɛ nan minima e dɛ kiri ra,
45003014	dankɛ nun wɔyɛn xɔnɛ nan e dɛ rafexi.
45003015	E sanyi xulun wuli raminife ra,
45003016	e dangi dɛdɛ, e kanari nun nimisɛ nan luma e xanbi ra.
45003017	E mu bɔɲɛsa kira kolon,
45003018	e mu Ala yaragaaxui kolon.»
45003019	Won a kolon Ala xa sɛriyɛ naxan birin masenxi, a a masenxi mixie nan bɛ naxee na a xa sɛriyɛ nɔɛ bun ma, alako dɛ birin xa balan, sɛriyɛ xa birin suxu Ala ya i.
45003020	Na kui, adamadi yo mu findima tinxintɔɛ ra Ala ya i sɛriyɛ rabatufe saabui ra, barima sɛriyɛ tan yunubi nan tun makɛnɛnma, adamadi xa a kolon a yunubitɔɛ na a ra.
45003021	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, tinxinyi bara makɛnɛn naxan mu kelima sɛriyɛ rabatufe ma. A kelima Ala yɛtɛ nan ma, alɔ a sɛbɛxi sɛriyɛ nun namiɲɔnmɛe xa Kitaabuie kui ki naxɛ.
45003022	Yi tinxinyi naxan kelima Ala ma a sɔtɔma danxaniya nan saabui ra, birin a sɔtɔ naxee danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma. Ala mu mixi yo rafisaxi a boore bɛ,
45003023	barima birin findixi yunubitɔɛ nan na, birin bara gan Ala xa nɔrɛ ra,
45003024	birin tinxinyi sɔtɔma Ala xa hinnɛ nan tun saabui ra. Ala adama kima yi tinxinyi ra won xunsarama Isa nan saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi.
45003025	Ala a tan nan findi sɛrɛxɛ ra, a wuli raminixi nɛ alako naxee na danxaniya a ma, e xa yunubie xa xafari. Yi a masenxi nɛ a Ala tinxin, barima a xa diɲɛ kui, a nu bara adamadie xa yunubie lu na e mu makiiti, e naxee rabaxi waxati dangixi.
45003026	Kɔnɔ yi waxati Ala bara a xa tinxinyi masen alako birin xa a kolon a a tinxin, e man xa a kolon a a tan nan tinxinyi fima mixi ma naxan danxaniyaxi Isa ma.
45003027	Na kui, mixi fa a yɛtɛ igboma munse xa fe ra? Fefe! Munfe ra? Mixi nɔma a yɛtɛ matɔxɔde a to diinɛ sɛriyɛ rabatuxi? Ade, barima tinxinyi sɔtɔma danxaniya nan tun saabui ra.
45003028	Won a kolon a danxaniya nan mixi matinxinma Ala ya i, sɛriyɛ xa kɛwalie xa mu a ra.
45003029	Ka Ala findixi Yuwifie gbansan nan Marigi Ala ra? Si gbɛtɛe fan Marigi Ala xa mu a ra? Iyo, si gbɛtɛe fan Marigi Ala nan yati a ra,
45003030	barima Ala keren peti na a ra. A tan nan mixi sunnaxie matinxinma a ya i danxaniya saabui ra, a man tinxinyi fima sunnataree fan ma na danxaniya kerenyi nan saabui ra.
45003031	Won fa na ma di? Won xa a fala a Ala xa sɛriyɛ tide mu na won to danxaniyaxi Isa ma? Astɔfulahi! Won ɲan bara Ala xa sɛriyɛ tide ramini.
45004001	Won xa misaali tongo Iburahima ma, won tan Yuwifie benba. A munse kolon yi xa fe ra?
45004002	Xa a sa li nu Iburahima findi tinxintɔɛ ra a xa wali nan saabui ra, a nu nɔma a yɛtɛ matɔxɔde, kɔnɔ Ala tan ya i mu a ra.
45004003	Kitaabui munse falaxi na xa fe ra? «Iburahima naxa danxaniya Ala ma, Ala naxa na findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ.»
45004004	Walikɛ na a sare sɔtɔ, na mu findima a bɛ ki xa ra, barima a xa wali sare na a ra a lanma a xa naxan sɔtɔ.
45004005	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan xaxili mu tixi a xa wali ra, naxan danxaniyaxi Marigi ma naxan mixi kobi findima tinxintɔɛ ra, Ala na kanyi xa danxaniya findima a bɛ tinxinyi nan na.
45004006	Dawuda fan a masen nɛ a hɛɛri na mixi bɛ Ala bara naxan findi tinxintɔɛ ra a ya i, bafe a xa walie ra:
45004007	«Hɛɛri na mixie bɛ, Ala bara diɲɛ naxee xa wali kobie ma, naxee xa yunubie bara xafari.
45004008	Hɛɛri na mixi bɛ, Ala mu naxan xa yunubi rabaxi maxɔrinma.»
45004009	Na kui, yi hɛɛri naxan ma fe falaxi, mixi sunnaxie gbansan nan a sɔtɔma, ka mixi sunnataree fan nɔma a sɔtɔde? Won ɲan bara a fala a Iburahima to danxaniya Ala ma, Ala a xa danxaniya nan findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ.
45004010	Na rabaxi a bɛ mun tɛmui? A to nu sunnaxi ba, ka a to mu nu sunnaxi? Ala na rabaxi a bɛ tɛmui naxɛ, Iburahima mu nu sunnaxi.
45004011	Na xanbi, a naxa sunna alako a xa findi tɔnxuma ra naxan a masenma a Ala bara a xa danxaniya findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ beenun a xa sunna. Na kui, a naxa findi danxaniyatɔɛ birin benba ra naxee mu sunnaxi, Ala bara naxee xa danxaniya findi tinxinyi ra e bɛ.
45004012	A tan nan findixi mixi sunnaxie fan benba ra naxee mu e xaxili tima e xa sunnɛ ra, kɔnɔ naxee man ɲɛrɛma danxaniya kui alɔ won benba Iburahima ɲɛrɛ ki naxɛ beenun a xa sunna.
45004013	Ala laayidi tongo nɛ Iburahima nun a bɔnsɔɛ bɛ, a e fama duniɲa sɔtɔde kɛ ra. Kɔnɔ na laayidi mu keli a xa diinɛ sɛriyɛ rabatufe xa ma. A kelixi tinxinyi nan ma a naxan sɔtɔ danxaniya saabui ra.
45004014	Xa a sa li nu sɛriyɛ rabatufe nan a niyama mixie xa findi kɛtongoe ra, danxaniya tide yo mu luma na fa, Ala xa laayidi fan bara kana na tɛmui.
45004015	Barima sɛriyɛ fama Ala xa xɔnɛ nan na, kɔnɔ sɛriyɛ mu na dɛnnaxɛ, sɛriyɛ matandi fan mu na.
45004016	Na kui, Ala xa laayidi sɔtɔma danxaniya nan saabui ra, alako a xa findi Ala xa hinnɛ ra Iburahima xa die birin bɛ, birin xa a sɔtɔ. A mu findima sɛriyɛ rabatumae gbansan xa gbe ra, kɔnɔ birin gbe na a ra naxee danxaniyaxi alɔ Iburahima. A bara findi won birin benba ra
45004017	alɔ a sɛbɛxi ki naxɛ, «N bara i findi si gbegbe benba ra.» A findixi won benba ra Ala nan ya i, a danxaniya naxan ma, naxan nii rasoma faxamixie fate, naxan se birin daaxi.
45004018	Iburahima to danxaniya, a naxa la a ra a Ala fama a xa laayidi rakamalide alɔ a falaxi a bɛ ki naxɛ, «I bɔnsɔɛ wuyama yi ki nɛ.» A naxa a xaxili ti na ra hali a ya to mu nu tixi sese ra naxan a masenma a bɛ a na fe fama nɛ rakamalide. Na kui, a naxa findi si gbegbe benba ra.
45004019	Iburahima nu bara simaya ɲɛ kɛmɛ ɲɔndɔn sɔtɔ, a xa simaya nu bara xurun, a xa ginɛ Sara fan mu nu nɔma di baride sɔnɔn. Kɔnɔ hali a to na birin fahaamu, sese mu ba Iburahima xa danxaniya ra.
45004020	A mu siikɛ Ala xa laayidi ma, a xa danxaniya ɲan naxa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ, a nu Ala batu.
45004021	A nu laxi a ra feo, a Ala nɔma a xa laayidi rakamalide.
45004022	Na na a ra «Ala naxa na findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ.»
45004023	Kɔnɔ Kitaabui naxan masenxi a falafe ra, «Ala naxa na findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ,» na mu sɛbɛ Iburahima gbansan xa bɛ.
45004024	A sɛbɛxi won tan nan fan yati bɛ, won tan naxee danxaniyaxi Ala ma naxan won Marigi Isa rakeli faxɛ ma. Ala won fan ma danxaniya findima nɛ tinxinyi ra won bɛ.
45004025	Won Marigi faxa won ma yunubie nan ma fe ra, a man naxa keli faxɛ ma, alako won xa findi tinxintɔɛe ra Ala ya i.
45005001	Na kui won to bara findi tinxintɔɛe ra Ala ya i danxaniya saabui ra, lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa bara lu won nun Ala tagi won Marigi Isa saabui ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
45005002	Won ma danxaniya Marigi Isa ma, na bara won naso Ala xa hinnɛ kui won fa sabatixi naxan ma. Won sɛɛwaxi nan fa a ra won xaxili to tixi Ala xa nɔrɛ ra.
45005003	Dangi na fan na, won man sɛɛwama won ma tɔɔrɛ kui, barima won a kolon a tɔɔrɛ duluxɔtɔya nan naminima.
45005004	Won ma tunnabɛxi fan a niyama nɛ won xa yuge fanyi sɔtɔ naxan Ala kɛnɛnma. Na yuge mɔɔli fan a niyama nɛ won xa won xaxili ti Ala ra.
45005005	Won man mu yaagima won xaxili to tixi Ala ra, barima Ala bara a xa xanunteya xɛlɛ won bɔɲɛ kui a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra a bara naxan fi won ma.
45005006	Waxati to kamali, won sɛnbɛ yo mu nu na tɛmui naxɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi naxa faxa yunubitɔɛe bɛ.
45005007	A xɔrɔxɔ ki fanyi mixi diɲɛfe a nii ma tinxin mixi xa fe ra. Kɔnɔ tɛmunde, mixi nde fan nɔma limaniyade a xa faxamixi fanyi nde bɛ.
45005008	Kɔnɔ Ala a xa xanunteya masenxi won bɛ yi nan na: Won nu findixi yunubitɔɛe ra tɛmui naxɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi naxa diɲɛ a nii ma won ma fe ra.
45005009	Na kui, won to bara findi tinxintɔɛe ra Ala ya i Isa xa sɛrɛxɛ saabui ra, won xa a kolon a man mu taganma won nakiside Ala xa gbaloe ma.
45005010	Barima won nu findixi Ala yaxuie ra tɛmui naxɛ, a xa Di xa faxɛ saabui naxa won tagi yailan, yakɔsi won nun Ala tagi to bara yailan, won a kolon a won nakisima nɛ a xa Di xa kisi saabui ra.
45005011	Na man fari, won sɛɛwaxi nɛ Ala ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa saabui ra, naxan bara won nun Ala tagi yailan.
45005012	Na kui, yunubi naxa so duniɲa mixi keren saabui ra. Faxɛ fan naxa so duniɲa yunubi xa fe ra, a din mixi birin na barima adamadie birin bara yunubi raba.
45005013	Yunubi nu na duniɲa ma beenun Ala xa a xa sɛriyɛ fi Annabi Munsa ma, kɔnɔ xa sɛriyɛ mu na, yunubi fan mu na mixi yo ma.
45005014	Kɔnɔ faxɛ tan nu na duniɲa ma, keli won benba Adama ma han Annabi Munsa, hali na mixie xa yunubi to mu nu luxi alɔ won benba Adama gbe naxan Ala xui yati matandi. Adama nu misaalixi mixi nan na naxan nu fafe.
45005015	Kɔnɔ Ala won kixi naxan na, na nun Benba Adama xa yunubi keren mu a ra. Iyo, adamadi gbegbe faxaxi yi mixi keren xa yunubi nan saabui ra, kɔnɔ Ala xa hinnɛ dangi na ra ki fanyi, barima a adamadie kixi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa naxan na, na bara mixi gbegbe rakisi a xa hinnɛ saabui ra.
45005016	Adama xa yunubi nun Ala adamadie kixi naxan na, e fɔxi tagi ikuya. Mixi keren xa yunubi to makiiti, gbaloe nan fa. Kɔnɔ Ala adamadie kixi naxan na, a fa mixi gbegbe xa yunubi raba xanbi nɛ, a fa fɛɛrɛ ra mixi matinxinma ki naxɛ Ala ya i.
45005017	Mixi keren xa yunubi raba naxa a niya faxɛ xa nɔ duniɲa ra, kɔnɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa wali fɔxi dangi na ra pon! Adamadie naxee bara Ala xa hinnɛ sɔtɔ naxan dande mu na, a nun a xa tinxinyi a won kixi naxan na, nee nɔɛ sɔtɔma kisi kui mixi keren nan saabui ra, naxan findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ra.
45005018	Na kui, mixi keren xa yunubi naxa a niya adamadie birin xa lu yunubi xa gbaloe bun ma, kɔnɔ mixi keren xa wali tinxinxi nan man tinxinyi nun kisi fima adamadie birin ma.
45005019	Alɔ mixi keren to Ala xa yaamari matandi, adamadi birin naxa findi yunubitɔɛe ra na mixi kerenyi saabui ra, adamadi gbegbe man findima tinxintɔɛe ra Ala ya i mixi keren nan fan saabui ra a to Ala xa yaamari rabatu.
45005020	Sɛriyɛ fi nɛ yunubi xa gbo. Kɔnɔ yunubi to gbo, Ala xa hinnɛ naxa gbo ki fanyi dangi na ra!
45005021	Na kui, yunubi xa nɔɛ findixi faxɛ nan na, kɔnɔ Ala xa hinnɛ xa nɔɛ findima tinxinyi nan na alako mixi xa kisi abadan. Na birin nabama won Marigi Isa nan saabui ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
45006001	Won fa munse falama fa? Won man xa nu lu yunubi raba ra, alako Ala xa hinnɛ xun xa masa?
45006002	Astɔfulahi! Won bara won kobe so yunubi ra alɔ faxamixi a kobe soma duniɲa ra ki naxɛ. Won man fa nɔma ɲɛrɛde yunubi kui di?
45006003	Won tan birin naxee bara won xunxa ye xɔɔra, won nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan fa a ra fa. Wo mu a kolon a won xunxafe ye xɔɔra na bara misaali Isa xa faxɛ ra?
45006004	Won xunxafe ye xɔɔra saabui ra, won nun Marigi Isa bara faxa, won man bara sa gaburi a sɛɛti ma. Yi rabaxi nɛ alako won fan xa duniɲɛigiri nɛɛnɛ tongo, alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi keli faxamixie tagi ki naxɛ Baba Ala sɛnbɛ makaabaxi saabui ra.
45006005	Na kui, xa won nun Marigi Isa bara findi keren na won won xunxaxi ye xɔɔra tɛmui naxɛ a xa faxɛ ma misaali ra, won man fama nɛ rakelide faxɛ ma alɔ a tan.
45006006	Won xa a kolon a won ma fe fori bara banban wuri magalanbuxi ma a nun Marigi Isa ra, alako won yuge fori xa masara naxan nu yunubi rabama, won naxa findi yunubi xa konyie ra sɔnɔn.
45006007	Barima xa mixi bara faxa, a kanyi bara gbilen yunubi rabafe fɔxɔ ra.
45006008	Yakɔsi, xa won bara faxa won nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, won man laxi a ra a won kisima nɛ won nun a tan,
45006009	barima won a kolon a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi to bara rakeli faxɛ ma na ki a mu faxama sɔnɔn. Faxɛ xa nɔɛ yo mu na a fari sɔnɔn.
45006010	A to faxa, yunubi mu sese nɔma a ra sɔnɔn. A to bara rakeli faxɛ ma, a fa kisixi Ala nan bɛ.
45006011	Na kui, wo xa wo yɛtɛ to faxamixi ra yunubi tan mabiri. Wo man to kisixi, wo bara findi Ala nan xa kisi mixi ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra.
45006012	Na nan a toxi a mu lan yunubi xa nɔ wo nii ra sɔnɔn, alako wo naxa bira wo nii waxɔnfe kobie fɔxɔ ra.
45006013	Wo naxa wo fate rabolo yunubi yi, a xa findi fe kobi rabase ra. Wo xa wo yɛtɛ birin sa Ala sagoe alɔ mixi naxee kelixi faxɛ ma, e kisi. Wo fate birin xa findi tinxinyi rabase nan na Ala bɛ
45006014	Na kui, wo naxa a lu yunubi xa nɔ wo ra, barima sɛriyɛ xa nɔɛ mu wo fari sɔnɔn. Wo fa na Ala xa hinnɛ nan kui.
45006015	Won fa na ma di? Sɛriyɛ xa nɔɛ to mu won fari sɔnɔn won to fa na Ala xa hinnɛ nan kui, won xa yunubi raba yire? Astɔfulahi!
45006016	Wo mu a kolon a wo na wo yɛtɛ findi mixi nde xa konyi ra, fo wo xa a xa yaamari birin nabatu? Wo mu a kolon a wo na naxan xa yaamari rabatu, na nan findixi wo marigi ra, a na fa findi yunubi ra naxan wo xaninma faxɛ ma, xa na mu a findi Ala ra naxan wo xaninma kisi ma?
45006017	Kɔnɔ Ala tantu! Wo tan naxee nu findixi yunubi xa konyie ra, nɔndi to kawandi wo bɛ, wo na nan nabatufe fa wo bɔɲɛ birin na.
45006018	Wo bara xɔrɛya yunubi xa konyiya ma, wo fa findixi Ala xa konyie nan na, alako wo xa bira tinxinyi fɔxɔ ra.
45006019	N wɔyɛnfe nɛ wo bɛ alɔ mixie wɔyɛnma ki naxɛ, alako wo xa fahaamui sɔtɔ. Singe ra nu, wo nu wo yɛtɛ findixi yunubi xa konyie nan na, wo xa wali kobie nu siga xun masa ra tun. Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, wo xa findi tinxinyi nan xa konyie ra, wo lu sɛniyɛnyi kira xɔn.
45006020	Wo to nu na yunubi xa konyiya kui, tinxinyi xa nɔɛ yo mu nu na wo fari.
45006021	Wo nu ɲɛrɛma fe kobi naxee kui, wo fa yaagixi naxee ra to, nee munse fanxi wo ma? Faxɛ gbansan nan fama na fe mɔɔlie xanbi ra.
45006022	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, wo to bara mini yunubi xa konyiya kui, wo findi Ala xa konyie ra, wo sɛniyɛnyi nan sɔtɔfe yi ki naxan a niyama wo xa kisi abadan.
45006023	Barima yunubi sare findixi faxɛ nan na, kɔnɔ Ala xa ki findixi a xa hinnɛ nan na: Won xa kisi abadan won Marigi Isa saabui ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
45007001	N ngaxakerenyie, wo to sɛriyɛ kolon, wo mu a kolon a sɛriyɛ xa nɔɛ na mixi fari han a xa simaya dande gbansan nɛ?
45007002	Na kui, ginɛ naxan xa futi bara xiri, a na futi sɛriyɛ bun ma han a xa mɔri xa simaya dan tɛmui nɛ. Kɔnɔ xa a xa mɔri xa simaya dan, na futi sɛriyɛ fan bara dan.
45007003	Xa a sa li a xa mɔri na duniɲa ma, a tan fa dɔxɔ xɛmɛ gbɛtɛ xɔn, a bara findi yɛnɛla ra. Kɔnɔ xa a xa mɔri faxa, a fan bara fulun na futi sɛriyɛ ma. Hali a dɔxɔ xɛmɛ gbɛtɛ xɔn ma kɔrɛ, yɛnɛla mu ara.
45007004	N ngaxakerenyie, a na na ki nɛ wo fan bɛ. Wo fan bara lu alɔ faxamixie sɛriyɛ tan mabiri, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa faxɛ saabui ra. Wo fa findixi gbɛtɛ nan gbe ra, a tan naxan kelixi faxamixie tagi, alako won xa wali fanyi raba Ala bɛ.
45007005	Barima, won to nu ɲɛrɛma won yɛtɛ waxɔnfe kobie ma, sɛriyɛ nu won bɔɲɛ ratema yunubi rabafe ma. Won to nu biraxi na waxɔnfe kobie fɔxɔ ra, nee nu won xun tixi faxɛ nan na.
45007006	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi fa, won bara xɔrɛya sɔtɔ sɛriyɛ xa konyiya ma, won lu alɔ faxamixie sɛriyɛ tan mabiri. Na kui, won mu fa walima Ala bɛ a kɛɲa fori xa ma sɔnɔn, alɔ won to nu na sɛriyɛ sɛbɛxi xa nɔɛ bun ma tɛmui naxɛ. Won fa walima Ala bɛ a kɛɲa nɛɛnɛ nan na, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra.
45007007	Won fa na ma di? Sɛriyɛ findixi yunubi nan na? Astɔfulahi! Sɛriyɛ nan a niya n xa yunubi kolon, barima n mu milanteya kolonma nu xa sɛriyɛ xa mu a fala n bɛ nu, «I naxa mila.»
45007008	Kɔnɔ yunubi naxa fɛɛrɛ sɔtɔ yaamari ra, a milanteya mɔɔli birin naso n bɔɲɛ ma, barima sɛriyɛ mu na dɛnnaxɛ, yunubi fan mu luma naa.
45007009	Singe ra n nu baloxi sɛriyɛtareya nan kui, kɔnɔ sɛriyɛ to fa, yunubi naxa balo n bɔɲɛ kui fa, a n findi faxamixi ra.
45007010	Yaamari naxan nu lan a xa findi kisi ra, na naxa findi n bɛ faxɛ ra,
45007011	barima yunubi to fɛɛrɛ sɔtɔ yaamari ra, a naxa n mayenden, a n faxa yaamari saabui ra.
45007012	Na kui, sɛriyɛ sɛniyɛn, yaamari fan sɛniyɛn, a tinxin, a man fan.
45007013	Won xa a fala fa, a fe fanyi bara findi faxɛ ra n bɛ? Astɔfulahi! Yunubi nan findixi faxɛ ra n bɛ fe fanyi saabui ra, alako yunubi xa makɛnɛn yunubi ra, a xa mini a yunubi ki yati ma yaamari saabui ra.
45007014	Won a kolon a sɛriyɛ kelixi Ala nan ma, kɔnɔ n tan findixi adamadi nan na, yunubi xa konyi.
45007015	N naxan nabama, n mu a ya yo kolon, barima n wama n xa naxan naba, n mu na xa rabama. N fe naxan xɔnxi, n na nan yati rabama.
45007016	Xa a sa li n fe rabama n mu wama n xa naxan naba, na a masenma nɛ a n bara la a ra a sɛriyɛ fan.
45007017	Na kui, n tan yɛtɛ yati xa mu yi fe rabafe. Yunubi naxan na n bɔɲɛ ma, na nan a rabafe,
45007018	barima n a kolon, a fe fanyi yo mu na n bɔɲɛ ma n yɛtɛ fate bɛndɛ tan kɛɲa ma. Natɛ na n bɛ n xa fe fanyi raba, kɔnɔ nɔɛ mu na n bɛ n xa a raba.
45007019	N wama fe fanyi naxan nabafe, n mu na xa rabama. N mu wama fe kobi naxan nabafe, n na nan yati rabama.
45007020	Na kui, xa a sa li n fe rabama n mu wama naxan nabafe, n tan yɛtɛ yati xa mu a rabafe. Yunubi naxan na n bɔɲɛ ma, na nan na a rabafe.
45007021	Na kui, n yi fe nan toxi n ma duniɲɛigiri kui: N na wa fe fanyi rabafe, n mu nɔma fefe ra fo fe kobi.
45007022	N bɔɲɛ tan kui, Ala xa sɛriyɛ rafan n ma,
45007023	kɔnɔ n fe gbɛtɛ nan toma n ma, naxan a niyama n xa yunubi raba. Yi fe naxan n xaninma yunubi ma, a sɛriyɛ gerema naxan nafan n xaxili ma, a n findi a xa konyi ra.
45007024	N ɲaxankataxi mato! Nde nɔma n nakiside yi fate bɛndɛ xa nɔɛ ma naxan na n xaninfe faxɛ ma?
45007025	Tantui xa rasiga Ala ma naxan won nakisima won Marigi Isa saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi! Na kui, n xaxili tan ma, n bara findi Ala xa sɛriyɛ xa konyi ra, kɔnɔ n fate bɛndɛ tan ma, n findixi sɛriyɛ xa konyi nan na naxan n natutunma yunubi ma.
45008001	Na kui, kiiti mu kanama mixie ra sɔnɔn naxee danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, naxee na Isa i,
45008002	barima Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa sɛriyɛ naxan kisi fima, a bara won namini yunubi nun faxɛ xa sɛriyɛ xa nɔɛ bun ma Marigi Isa saabui ra.
45008003	Diinɛ sɛriyɛ mu nɔ naxan na, barima mixi waxɔnfe kobi nu bara a rahalaki, Ala tan na nan nabaxi. A naxa mixi xa yunubi sɛnbɛ xun nakana a to a xa Di xɛɛ yunubitɔɛ fate bɛndɛ maniyɛ ra a xa findi yunubi sɛrɛxɛ ra.
45008004	Na rabaxi nɛ, alako sɛriyɛ tinxinyi naxan masenxi, a xa nɔ rakamalide won bɛ, won tan naxee mu ɲɛrɛfe adama waxɔnfe kobi ma, won tan naxee na ɲɛrɛfe Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ma.
45008005	Naxee ɲɛrɛma adama waxɔnfe ma, e xaxili rafexi adama waxɔnfe nan na. Kɔnɔ naxee ɲɛrɛma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ma, e tan nafexi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi waxɔnfe nan na.
45008006	Naxee e xaxili luxi fe kobi rabafe ma, e xun tixi faxɛ nan na. Kɔnɔ naxee e xaxili luxi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa fe ma, e kisi nun bɔɲɛsa nan sɔtɔma.
45008007	Naxee e xaxili luxi e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe yi, e findixi Ala yaxuie nan na. E mu Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuma, e ɲan mu nɔma a rabatude.
45008008	Naxee biraxi e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra, e xa fe mu nɔma Ala kɛnɛnde.
45008009	Kɔnɔ wo tan mu na wo yɛtɛ sagoe sɔnɔn. Xa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi sabatixi wo i, wo fa na Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan sagoe. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Xaxili mu na naxan yo yi ra, na kanyi mu findixi Isa gbe ra.
45008010	Xa wo nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara findi keren na, wo fate bɛndɛ tan faxama yunubi nan ma fe ra, kɔnɔ Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi tan wo rakisima nɛ barima wo bara matinxin Ala ya i.
45008011	Ala nan Isa rakeli faxamixie tagi. Xa a tan Ala Xaxili nan sabatixi wo i, a tan naxan a xa Mixi Sugandixi rakeli faxɛ ma, a man fama nɛ wo fate bɛndɛ rakiside a Xaxili saabui ra naxan sabatixi wo i.
45008012	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, doni nde na won ma, kɔnɔ a mu na won ma won yɛtɛ fate bɛndɛ xa sɛɛti xɛ. A mu lan won man xa lu a sagoe sɔnɔn won man xa a waxɔnfe kobi raba.
45008013	Xa wo ɲɛrɛ fate bɛndɛ waxɔnfe kobie ma, wo faxama nɛ, kɔnɔ xa wo gbilen e fɔxɔ ra Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, wo kisima nɛ,
45008014	barima Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi mixi naxee birin naɲɛrɛma, e tan findixi Ala xa die nan na.
45008015	Ala mu xaxili fixi wo ma naxan man wo findima gaaxui xa konyie ra. A a yɛtɛ Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan fixi wo ma naxan wo findixi a xa die ra, naxan a niyama won xa nɔ won xui itede Ala ma, won na a xili, «N Ba, n Ba!»
45008016	Na kui, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nun won yɛtɛ xaxili a masenma a won findixi Ala xa die nan na.
45008017	Anun, won to findixi a xa die ra, won bara findi Ala xa kɛtongoe ra, won nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi. Barima, xa won tɔɔrɔ a xa tɔɔrɛ, won man fama nɛ xunnakeli sɔtɔde alɔ a tan.
45008018	N laxi a ra won tɔɔrɛ naxan tima yi duniɲa ma yi ki, a nun won fama xunnakeli naxan sɔtɔde, e tagi ikuya ki fanyi! E ɲan mu nɔma sade e boore ma.
45008019	Daali birin mamɛ tife waxati ra, Ala a xa die makɛnɛnma tɛmui naxɛ,
45008020	barima duniɲa birin na Sentanɛ xa nɔɛ bun ma, tide yo mu naxan ma. Na mu kelixi duniɲa yɛtɛ xa ma, a kelixi Ala nan ma. Kɔnɔ na birin kui xaxili tide luxi birin bɛ.
45008021	Waxati fama fade daali fulunma tɛmui naxɛ kanari xa konyiya bun, a fan xɔrɛya nun xunnakeli sɔtɔ a nun Ala xa die ra.
45008022	Won a kolon, a kabi a fɔlɛ han to, daali birin na a kui iwafe nɛ tɔɔrɛ kui, alɔ ginɛ di furi na keli a ra.
45008023	Kɔnɔ daali gbansan xa mu a ra. Hali won tan naxee bara Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi sɔtɔ a xa ki singe ra, won tan yati na won kui iwafe, han Ala won findima a xa die ra tɛmui naxɛ, a won fate nɔrɔ.
45008024	Won xaxili to ti a ra, na nan a ra won bara kisi, kɔnɔ won xaxili man tixi a ra. Kɔnɔ xa mixi ya fe to a xaxili nu tixi naxan na, na kanyi mu a xaxili tima na ra sɔnɔn. Mixi nɔma a xaxili tide fe nde ra a ɲan bara naxan sɔtɔ?
45008025	Kɔnɔ xa won xaxili tixi fe nde ra won mu naxan toxi sinden, won na mamɛma tunnabɛxi nan kui.
45008026	Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fan fama nɛ won malide won ma sɛnbɛtareya kui. Won mu a kolon a lan won xa maxandi naxan naba, kɔnɔ Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan Ala maxandima won bɛ mayandi xui ra naxan mu nɔma masarade wɔyɛnyi ra.
45008027	Anun, Ala, naxan won bɔɲɛ ma fe kolon, a a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa maxandie kolon, barima Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi maxandi tima sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɛ Ala sagoe nan ma.
45008028	Won man a kolon a Ala walima fe birin kui a xanuntenyie xa munafanyi nan bɛ, a bara naxee xili a yɛtɛ sagoe ma.
45008029	Barima Ala bara mixi naxee sugandi, a nu e kolon kabi fe fɔlɔ fɔlɛ, a naxa a ragiri e ma e xa findi a xa Di maniyɛe ra, alako a xa Di tan xa findi di singe ra a ngaxakerenyi gbegbe tagi.
45008030	A bara na ragiri naxee ma, a man bara e xili. A bara naxee xili, a man bara e findi tinxintɔɛe ra a ya i. A bara naxee findi tinxintɔɛe ra, a man bara xunnakeli fi e ma.
45008031	Won munse falama na kui fa? Ala to na won bɛ, nde fa nɔma tide won kanke?
45008032	A tan naxan mu tondi a xa Di yati ma, a a ba sɛrɛxɛ ra won birin bɛ, a mu fama xɛ won kide se birin na safe ra a xa Di xun ma?
45008033	Nde nɔma Ala xa mixi sugandixie kalamude? Ala yɛtɛ nan e findixi tinxintɔɛe ra a ya i.
45008034	Nde fa kiiti rakanama e ra sɔnɔn? Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa naxan faxa, Ala naxan man nakeli faxɛ ma, a magoroxi Ala yirefanyi ma, a nu a maxandi won bɛ.
45008035	Nde fa won bama Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xanunteya yi? Munse nɔma na ra? Tɔɔrɛ, ka xɔrɔxɔɛ, ka ɲaxankatɛ, ka kaamɛ, ka lufe xɛɲɛ ra, ka fitinɛ, ka santidɛgɛma?
45008036	Alɔ a sɛbɛxi ki naxɛ, «Fɛɛɲɛn, e muxu faxama i tan nan ma fe ra. E muxu findixi yɛxɛɛe nan na e naxee kɔn naxabama.»
45008037	Kɔnɔ na birin kui, won bara nɔɛ sɔtɔ na fe birin xun ma won xanuntenyi saabui ra.
45008038	Barima n laxi a ra, a sese mu nɔma won bade Ala xa xanunteya yi. A findi faxɛ ra ba, gbaloe ba, malekɛ ba, ɲinnɛe ba, yi waxati ba, waxati naxan sa fama ba, sɛnbɛma naxee kuye ma ba,
45008039	naxan birin na duniɲa xun ma, naxan birin na bɔxi bun ma, a findi daali yo ra, e sese mu nɔma won nun Ala xa xanunteya rafatande, a bara naxan masen won bɛ won Marigi Isa saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi!
45009001	N xa nɔndi fala wo bɛ. N mu wule falama barima n findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi gbe nan na. N sondonyi nun Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fan findixi seedee nan na, a nɔndi nan a ra
45009002	n bɔɲɛ sunnunxi ki fanyi, danyi mu naxan ma,
45009003	n ngaxakerenyie xa fe ra. Xa a sa e malima nɛ nu, n tinxi a ra n tan yɛtɛ yati xa dankɛ sɔtɔ, muxu nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fatan e tan ma fe ra, n barenyie muxu nun naxee si keren a ra.
45009004	Yuwifie nan na e ra, Ala naxee sugandi e xa findi a xa die ra, a naxa a xa nɔrɛ masen e bɛ. Ala saatɛe nun laayidie tongo e tan nan bɛ, a a xa sɛriyɛ nun a batu ki fi e ma.
45009005	E tan nan bɔnsɔɛ benbae na Kitaabuie kui, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan kelixi e tan nan bɔnsɔɛ tagi a fate bɛndɛ ki ma. Tantui nun batui xa rasiga Ala ma abadan, a tan naxan na birin xun ma. Amina.
45009006	Kɔnɔ a mu luxi xɛ alɔ Ala xa laayidi kanaxi nɛ. Barima naxee keli Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ, e birin xa mu findi Isirayila die yati ra.
45009007	E to barixi Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ, na mu a falaxi xɛ de a e birin nan findixi a xa die yati ra, barima Ala a masen nɛ Iburahima bɛ, «Isiyaga nan fama findide i bɔnsɔɛ ra n naxan laayidi i bɛ.»
45009008	Yi a masenxi nɛ, a di naxee bari Iburahima bɛ a fate bɛndɛ ki ma, nee xa mu findixi Ala xa die ra. Kɔnɔ di naxee bari Ala xa laayidi saabui ra, nee nan findi Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ ra Ala ya i.
45009009	Barima Ala yi nan laayidi Iburahima bɛ, «N gbilenma tamuna yi tɛmui ɲɔndɔn, n a lima Sara bara di xɛmɛ sɔtɔ.»
45009010	Na gbansan fan mu a ra. Won benba Isiyaga nan findixi Rebeka xa di firin birin baba ra.
45009011	Kɔnɔ beenun gulie xa bari e xa fe fanyi xa na mu fe ɲaaxi nde raba, Ala naxa di keren sugandi e firin tagi alako a sagoe xa raba.
45009012	Yi di mu sugandi kɛwalie yo xa fe ra. Na sugandi findixi Ala xa xili nan na. Na kui, Ala naxa a masen Rebeka bɛ, «Fori nan luma a xunya xa nɔɛ bun ma.»
45009013	Alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «N bara Yaxuba xanu, kɔnɔ n bara mɛɛ Esayu tan na.»
45009014	Won fa na ma di? Won xa a fala a Ala mu tinxin? Astɔfulahi!
45009015	Ala a masen nɛ Munsa bɛ, «N hinnɛma mixi nan na n na wa hinnɛfe naxan na. N kinikinima mixi nan ma n na wa kinikinife naxan ma.»
45009016	Na kui, Ala xa sugandi mu kelima mixi waxɔnfe xa ma, xa na mu mixi xa katɛ ma. A kelima Ala xa hinnɛ nɛ.
45009017	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, Ala naxa a fala Firawuna bɛ, «N i rakelixi nɛ, n mangɛya fi i ma, alako n xa n sɛnbɛ masen i saabui ra, duniɲa birin xa n xili kolon.»
45009018	Na kui, a hinnɛma mixi ra a na wa hinnɛfe naxan yo ra, a man mixi sondonyi raxɔrɔxɔma a na wa naxan sondonyi raxɔrɔxɔfe.
45009019	Nde nɔma a falade n bɛ, «Ala fa kote sama mixi xun ma munfe ra? Mixi nɔma tondide a xa maragiri ra yire?»
45009020	Kɔnɔ i tan adamadi findixi nde ra i to fa Ala matandima? Fɛɲɛ yailanxi xa a fala a yailanma bɛ, «Munfe ra i n yailanxi yi ki?»
45009021	A di, fɛɲɛ yailanyi na fɛɲɛ firin yailan bɛndɛ keren na, a mu nɔma fɛɲɛ keren yailande wali nde xa fe ra naxan tide gbo, a boore fan yailan wali nde xa fe ra naxan tide mu gbo?
45009022	Xa a sa li Ala wama a xa xɔnɛ nun a sɛnbɛ masenfe, a mu nɔma na rabade xɛ? Kɔnɔ a xa sabari xungbe kui, Ala diɲɛxi mixie ma a xɔnɔxi naxee ma, gbaloe ragataxi naxee bɛ.
45009023	A yi rabaxi nɛ alako a xa a xa nɔrɛ makaabaxi masen a to hinnɛma mixie ra, a nu bara naxee sugandi kabi a fɔlɛ, e xa nɔrɛ sɔtɔ.
45009024	Won tan nan findixi na mixie ra a bara naxee xili keli si birin kui. Yuwifie gbansan mu a ra.
45009025	A a masenxi Annabi Hose xa Kitaabui kui, «Naxee mu findixi n ma mixie ra, n e xili falama ‹n ma mixie.› Naxan mu findixi n ma ɲama xanuxi ra, n a xili falama ‹n ma ɲama xanuxi.› »
45009026	«Ala man a fala e bɛ dɛnnaxɛ, ‹N ma ɲama mu wo ra,› a e xili falama nɛ naa, ‹Ala xa die, Ala naxan na na.› »
45009027	Annabi Esayi fan a xui ite nɛ a to nu kawandi tima Isirayila xa fe ra, «Hali Isirayila mixie wuya alɔ mɛyɛn xɔri naxan na baa dɛ, a dɔnxɔɛ di nan tun kisima,
45009028	barima Ala naxan masenxi, a a rabama nɛ duniɲa ma, a a rakamali kerenyi ra.»
45009029	Annabi Esayi man a masen nɛ, «Xa Ala Sɛnbɛ Birin Kanyi mu bɔnsɔɛ nde lu won bɛ nu, won luma nɛ nu alɔ Sodoma, won maniyama Gomora nan na nu.»
45009030	Won fa na ma di? Si gbɛtɛ naxee mu nu katama e xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ Ala ya i, e tan bara fa a sɔtɔ danxaniya saabui ra,
45009031	kɔnɔ Isirayila ɲama naxan nu katama e xa sɛriyɛ rabatu alako e xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ Ala ya i, e tan mu nɔ na sɛriyɛ rabatude.
45009032	Munfe ra? Barima e mu bira tinxinyi fɔxɔ ra danxaniya saabui ra, e ɲɔxɔ a ma a e nɔma a sɔtɔde e xa kɛwalie saabui ra. E bara e sanyi radin gɛmɛ ra naxan xili falama, «mixi rabira gɛmɛ».
45009033	Alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Wo a mato, n bara gɛmɛ dɔxɔ Siyoni, mixie e san nadinma naxan na, gɛmɛ naxan mixie rabirama. Kɔnɔ naxan yo danxaniya a ma, na kanyi mu yaagima.»
45010001	N ngaxakerenyie, n bɔɲɛ waxɔnfe birin na naxan na, Yuwifie xa kisi sɔtɔ. N ma Ala maxandi nan na ki e bɛ.
45010002	N na e seede ra, a e sɛnbɛ saxi Ala xa fee kui, kɔnɔ na mu kelixi lɔnni xa ma.
45010003	E to mu a kolon Ala mixi matinxinma a ya i ki naxɛ, e naxa kata e xa e yɛtɛ kan matinxin. Na kui, e mu e yɛtɛ magoro Ala bɛ a tan xa tinxinyi fi e ma.
45010004	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara gɛ Munsa xa sɛriyɛ rakamalide, alako naxan yo na danxaniya a ma, na kanyi xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ.
45010005	Annabi Munsa to nu tinxinyi xa fe masenfe naxan sɔtɔma sɛriyɛ rabatufe ma, a yi nan sɛbɛ Kitaabui kui, «Mixi naxan yi sɛriyɛ rabatuma a simaya sɔtɔma nɛ a saabui ra.»
45010006	Kɔnɔ a to nu tinxinyi xa fe masenfe naxan sɔtɔma danxaniya saabui ra, a yi nan sɛbɛ, «I naxa i yɛtɛ maxɔrin, ‹Nde tema koore?› » Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu goroxi xɛ keli koore ma?
45010007	«Xa na mu a ra i i yɛtɛ maxɔrin, ‹Nde goroma bɔxi bun?› » Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu kelixi faxamixie xa tagi?
45010008	Kitaabui munse masenxi? «Ala xa masenyi makɔrɛ i ra. A na i dɛ kiri ma, a na i bɔɲɛ fan ma.» Na masenyi findixi danxaniya masenyi nan na muxu naxan kawandife:
45010009	A i na a fala i dɛ ra a Marigi nan na Isa ra, i man naxa la a ra i bɔɲɛ kui a Ala bara a rakeli faxamixie tagi, i kisima nɛ.
45010010	Mixi danxaniyama yi masenyi ma a bɔɲɛ nan kui, a tinxinyi sɔtɔ Ala ya i. A na la a ra, a a falama a dɛ nan na, a kisi sɔtɔ.
45010011	Kitaabui a masenxi, «Mixi yo danxaniya a ma, a kanyi mu yaagima.»
45010012	Tagi rasa yo mu na Yuwifie nun si gbɛtɛe tagi. Marigi keren nan na e birin bɛ, a man mixi birin kima ki fanyi ra naxee na a xili.
45010013	Alɔ Kitaabui a masenxi ki naxɛ, «Naxan yo na Alatala xili, na kanyi kisima nɛ.»
45010014	Kɔnɔ na kui, e nɔma a xilide di xa e mu danxaniyaxi a ma? E fa danxaniyama a ma di xa e mu nu a xa fe mɛ? E fa a xa fe mɛma di xa mixi yo mu e kawandima?
45010015	Na kawandi fan tima e bɛ di xa mixie mu xɛɛxi na fe ma? A sɛbɛxi, «Xɛɛrae, naxee fama xibaaru fanyi ra, e fafe fan ki fanyi!»
45010016	Kɔnɔ birin xa mu yi xibaaru fanyi suxuxi, barima Annabi Esayi a masen nɛ, «Marigi, nde laxi muxu xa masenyi ra?»
45010017	Na kui, mixie danxaniyama nɛ e to bara Ala xa masenyi ramɛ. E Ala xa masenyi ramɛma a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa masenyi nan saabui ra.
45010018	Kɔnɔ n xa maxɔrinyi ti, e mu yi masenyi ramɛxi xɛ? Iyo xɛ, barima Kitaabui naxɛ, «E xui bara mini duniɲa birin ma, e xa masenyi bara siga han duniɲa dande.»
45010019	N man xa maxɔrinyi ti, Isirayila ɲama mu masenyi fahaamuxi xɛ? Yaabi fɔlɛ ra, Ala yi nan masen Annabi Munsa saabui ra, «N a niyama nɛ wo mixie tɔɔnɛ naxee ɲan mu findixi si yati ra. N a niyama nɛ wo bɔɲɛ xa te si fahaamutare ma.»
45010020	Annabi Esayi fan naxa xɛɛra iba limaniya ra Ala to yi masenyi fi a ma, «Mixie bara n to naxee mu nu n fenma. N bara n yɛtɛ masen mixie bɛ naxee mu nu n maxɔrinma sese ma.»
45010021	Kɔnɔ Isirayila xa fe ra, a naxɛ, «Keli sogetede ma han sogegorode, n bɛlɛxɛe italaxi yi ɲama bɛ, naxan n xui matandima, naxan tondima n bɛ.»
45011001	Na kui, n xa maxɔrinyi ti, Ala mɛɛxi nɛ a xa ɲama ra? Astɔfulahi! N tan yɛtɛ findixi Isirayilaka nan na, Iburahima xa mamadi, kelife Bunyamin bɔnsɔɛ.
45011002	Ala mu mɛɛxi a xa ɲama ra a bara naxan sugandi nu. Wo mu a kolon Kitaabui naxan masenxi Annabi Eliya xa fe ra, a to a xui rasiga Ala ma Isirayila xili ma?
45011003	A naxɛ, «Marigi, e bara i xa namiɲɔnmɛe faxa, e bara i xa sɛrɛxɛbadee rabira. N keren peti nan fa luxi, e katafe e xa n tan fan faxa.»
45011004	Ala fa a yaabi di? A naxɛ, «N bara mixi wulu solofere ragata n yɛtɛ bɛ naxee mu nu e xinbi sin Baali kuye bɛ.»
45011005	A man na na ki nɛ yakɔsi. Ala xa ɲama dɔnxɔɛ luxi, a bara naxee sugandi a xa hinnɛ saabui ra.
45011006	Kɔnɔ xa a bara e sugandi hinnɛ saabui ra, kɛwali saabui xa mu a ra sɔnɔn, xa na mu Ala xa hinnɛ mu findima hinnɛ yati yati ra nu.
45011007	Won fa na ma di? Isirayila nu naxan fenfe a mu a sɔtɔ, kɔnɔ Ala nu bara naxee sugandi, nee tan bara a sɔtɔ. A dɔnxɔɛe tan bɔɲɛe naxa balan.
45011008	A sɛbɛxi, «Ala naxa e xaxili dɔnxu, a a niya e yae mu se to, e tulie mu fe mɛ, han yi to lɔxɔɛ.»
45011009	Annabi Dawuda fan naxa a masen, «E xa xulunyie xa findi gantanyi ra e bɛ, yɛlɛ naxan e suxuma, gɛmɛ naxan e rabirama. Na xa findi e xa wali sare ra.
45011010	E ya xa rafɔɔrɔ, e xa dɔnxu. E xa kunkurun e xa tɔɔrɛ bun ma waxati birin.»
45011011	Na kui, n man xa maxɔrinyi ti, Isirayilakae to bara tantan, e bira, e mu nɔma rakelide sɔnɔn? Astɔfulahi! Kɔnɔ e xa tantanyi bara a niya si gbɛtɛe birin xa nɔ kisi sɔtɔde, alako na kisi xɔli xa Isirayilakae fan suxu.
45011012	A di, xa e xa tantanyi findixi hɛɛri xungbe nan na duniɲa bɛ, a findi barakɛ ra si gbɛtɛe fan bɛ, e xa fe na rakamali, hɛɛri nun barakɛ xun mu masama xɛ ki fanyi?
45011013	N xa fa wɔyɛn wo bɛ, wo tan naxee mu findixi Isirayilakae ra. N to findixi xɛɛra ra wo tan si gbɛtɛe bɛ, n sɛɛwama nɛ n ma wali ra, n a matɔxɔ,
45011014	alako tɛmunde na xa a niya n boore Yuwifie xa mila n ma masenyi ma, ndee xa nɔ kiside e ya ma.
45011015	Ala a kobe sofe e ra, xa na bara a niya lanyi xa so Ala nun duniɲa tagi, a di, Ala e ragbilenfe a yɛtɛ ma, na mu luma xɛ alɔ mixi na rakeli faxamixie ya ma?
45011016	Xa sansi xɔri xun singe bara fi Ala ma, a dɔnxɔɛ birin bara findi a gbe ra. Xa wuri bili sanke bara fi Ala ma, a salonyie fan bara findi a gbe ra.
45011017	A luxi nɛ alɔ oliwi bili salonyi ndee na xaba a bili ma alako wula oliwi salonyie xa dafu na xabade ra. I tan misaalixi na wula oliwi salonyi nan na, naxan baloma na oliwi bili saabui ra, i dafuxi naxan na.
45011018	Na kui, i naxa i yɛtɛ igbo na salonyi xabaxie ma. Beenun i xa i yɛtɛ igbo, i maɲɔxun sinden, a i tan xa mu wuri bili sanke rabaloxi. Wuri bili sanke nan i tan nabaloxi.
45011019	Kɔnɔ i fama nɛ a falade, «Wuri salonyie xabaxi nɛ alako n tan xa dafu e xabade ra.»
45011020	Nɔndi na a ra. E xaba e xa danxaniyatareɲa nan ma, i fan dafuxi naa i xa danxaniya nan ma fe ra. Kɔnɔ i naxa i yɛtɛ igbo. I ɲan xa gaaxu,
45011021	barima xa Ala mu oliwi bili fanyi salon singee lu na, a mu i fan luma na de!
45011022	Na kui, i ɲɔxɔ sa a xɔn ma a Ala xa fanyi gbo, kɔnɔ a xa fe man maxɔrɔxɔ. A xa fe maxɔrɔxɔ mixie nan ma naxee bara a xa kira bɛɲin, kɔnɔ a xa fanyi gbo i tan bɛ xa i luma a xa fanyi kira xɔn ma. Xa na mu a ra a i fan ma fe rabama nɛ alɔ a na oliwi salonyi xa fe raba ki naxɛ.
45011023	Yuwifie fan, xa e e xa danxaniyatareɲa bɛɲin, e man fama dafude wuri bili ra, e xaba naxan ma, barima Ala sɛnbɛ gbo. A tan nɔma e ragbilende e lude fori.
45011024	I tan nu findixi wula oliwi salonyi nan na, naxan xabaxi a dafu oliwi bili gbɛtɛ ma, wo nun naxan keren mu a ra. Xa Ala bara na raba i bɛ, a mu taganma oliwi bili fanyi salonyi ragbilende a lude fori, a a dafu na oliwi bili fanyi ma, e nun naxan keren a ra.
45011025	N ngaxakerenyie, n waxi nɛ wo xa yi gundo kolon, alako wo naxa wo yɛtɛ maɲɔxun lɔnnilae ra. Isirayilakae bɔɲɛ balanxi nɛ sinden, han beenun si gbɛtɛ danxaniyatɔɛe kɔnti xa kamali.
45011026	Na kui, Isirayila birin fama nɛ rakiside, alɔ a sɛbɛxi ki naxɛ: «Mixi xunsarama fama nɛ keli Siyoni, a Yaxuba bɔnsɔɛ ba Ala kolontareya fɔxɔ ra.
45011027	Saatɛ nan na ki n naxan tongoma e bɛ, n na e xa yunubie xafari lɔxɔ naxɛ.»
45011028	Yuwifie to tondixi Ala xa Xibaaru Fanyi ra, e findixi Ala yaxuie ra wo tan nan ma munafanyi xa fe ra. Kɔnɔ Ala to e sugandi a yɛtɛ bɛ, a e xanuxi e benbae nan ma fe ra,
45011029	barima xa Ala bara a ɲanige a xa mixi ndee xili, a xa e baraka, na fe mu kanama feo!
45011030	Singe ra nu wo nu findixi Ala matandilae nan na, kɔnɔ yakɔsi wo hinnɛ sɔtɔxi Yuwifie nan ma Ala matandi saabui ra.
