45011031	E tan bara fa findi Ala matandilae ra alako wo tan xa hinnɛ sɔtɔ Ala yi, na xanbi, a man xa hinnɛ e fan na.
45011032	Na kui, Ala bara adama birin lu tinxintareya xa nɔɛ bun ma alako a xa hinnɛ e birin na.
45011033	Ee! Danyi mu na Ala xa munafanyi ma! A xaxili nun a xa fahaamui tilinyi dan mu na! A xa natɛ tongoxi kui mu kolonma, a ɲɛrɛ ki mu fahaamuma!
45011034	Nde Marigi xa maɲɔxunyi kolon? Nde nɔma a raside?
45011035	Nde bara a doni, a naxan xa doni ragbilenma a ma?
45011036	Se birin kelixi a tan nan ma, se birin baloxi a tan nan saabui ra, a se birin daaxi a yɛtɛ nan bɛ. Tantui na a bɛ abadan! Amina.
45012001	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, Ala to bara hinnɛ wo ra, n bara wo maxandi wo xa wo yɛtɛ ba sɛrɛxɛ ra Ala bɛ, sɛrɛxɛ sɛniyɛnxi naxan bama a ɲiɲɛ ra, naxan nafanxi Ala ma. Na nan findima wo xa batui xɔri ra.
45012002	Wo naxa wo ɲɛrɛ yi duniɲa mixie ɲɛrɛ ki ma. Wo xa a lu Ala xa wo ɲɛrɛ ki fori masara, a bɔɲɛ nɛɛnɛ nun xaxili nɛɛnɛ fi wo ma. Na kui, wo nɔma nɛ Ala waxɔnfe fanyi kolonde, naxan a kɛnɛnxi, naxan kamalixi.
45012003	Ala to hinnɛ n na, a n findi a xa xɛɛra ra, n xa wo rasi: Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ sa yire, wo xa fe mu dɛnnaxande lixi. Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ igbo, wo xa wo yɛtɛ mato danxaniya xasabi nan ma, Ala bara naxan fi kankan ma.
45012004	Fate keren nan na kankan bɛ, kɔnɔ na fate salonsee wuya. Fate salonse birin nun a gbe wali.
45012005	Won fan na na ki nɛ. Hali won to wuyaxi, won birin bara findi fate keren na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra. Won luxi nɛ alɔ fate salonsee naxee fatuxi Isa fate ra won man fatu won bore ra, won birin findi fate keren na.
45012006	Ala won kima kie ra naxee dɔxɔ wuya. A na rabama a xa hinnɛ bɛrɛ nan ma a bara naxan ɲanige kankan bɛ. Xa a mixi nde kixi a xa nɔ wɔyɛnde Ala xili ra, na kanyi xa wɔyɛn Ala xili ra a xa danxaniya xasabi ma.
45012007	Xa a nde kixi mixi mali wali nan na, na kanyi xa mixie mali. Xa a nde kixi mixi kawandife nan na, na kanyi xa kawandi ti.
45012008	Xa a nde kixi mixi ralimaniyafe nan na, na kanyi xa mixie ralimaniya. Xa a nde findi mixi ra naxan ki tima, na kanyi xa mixie ki a fanyi ra. Xa a nde findi yarerati ra, a kanyi xa na raba a ki ma. Xa a nde findi tɔɔrɔmixie malima ra, a kanyi xa na raba sɛɛwɛ ra.
45012009	Wo xa mixie xanu bɔɲɛ fiixɛ ra. Wo xa fe kobi xɔn, wo xa fe fanyi suxu wo sɛnbɛ birin na.
45012010	Wo xa wo bore xanu ngaxakerenya xanunteya nan na. Wo xa wo bore binya dangife wo yɛtɛ ra.
45012011	Wo tun naxa raxɔnɔ, wo xa wo tunnabɛxi. Wo xa wakili wo bɔɲɛ birin na. Wo xa wali wo Marigi bɛ.
45012012	Wo xa sɛɛwa fe ma wo xaxili tixi naxan na. Wo xa duluxɔtɔ wo xa tɔɔrɛ kui. Wo naxa tagan Ala maxandide.
45012013	Wo xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe mali e xa tɔɔrɛ kui. Wo xa xɔɲɛe rasɛnɛ.
45012014	Wo xa Ala maxandi mixie bɛ naxee wo ɲaxankatama. Wo xa duba e bɛ, wo naxa e danka.
45012015	Wo xa sɛɛwa booree xa sɛɛwɛ, wo xa sunnun boore xa sunnunyi.
45012016	Wo xa lan wo bore ma. Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ igbo, yɛtɛ magore nan xa rafan wo ma. Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ maɲɔxun lɔnnilae ra.
45012017	Wo naxa fe kobi ɲɔxɔ fe kobi ra. Wo xa kata mixie xa wo kolon fe fanyi rabae nan na.
45012018	Wo xa wo nɔ fe birin naba alako lanyi xa lu wo nun mixi birin tagi.
45012019	N xanuntenyie, wo naxa wo gbeɲɔxɔ wo yɛtɛ ra, wo xa na lu Ala ma, barima a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Ala naxɛ, n tan nan wo gbeɲɔxɔma, n tan nan fe kobi ragbilenma a rabama ma.»
45012020	A man sɛbɛxi, «Xa kaamɛ na i yaxui ma, i xa a ki donse ra. Xa ye xɔli na a ma, i xa a ki ye ra. Na kui a luxi nɛ alɔ i na tɛ wolee ibaganfe a xunyi ma.»
45012021	Wo naxa tin fe kobi xa nɔ wo ra, wo tan nan xa fe kobi nɔ, fe fanyi raba ra.
45013001	Birin xa a yɛtɛ magoro a xa mangɛe bɛ, barima mangɛya birin kelima Ala nan ma, a na a ragiri naxan ma.
45013002	Na nan a ra, mixi naxan na mangɛ matandi, na kanyi Ala nan xa yaamari matandixi. A fama nɛ a xa na wali kobi sare sɔtɔde.
45013003	Wali fanyi rabae mu gaaxuma mangɛe ya ra, wali kobi rabae nan gaaxuma e ya ra. Xa i mu wama i xa gaaxu mangɛ ya ra, i xa lu kira fanyi nan xɔn ma. Na kui, mangɛ fama nɛ i matɔxɔde,
45013004	barima mangɛ walima Ala nan bɛ wo xa munafanyi xa fe ra. Kɔnɔ xa i fe kobi raba, a lanma i xa gaaxu, barima santidɛgɛma mu na mangɛ yi fufafu xa ra. A to na Ala xa wali nan na, a Ala xa xɔnɛ nan masenma fe kobi rabae xili ma.
45013005	Na nan a toxi, fo wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro nɛ mangɛe bɛ. Wo na rabama na ɲaxankatɛ xa fe gaaxui ma, a nun man wo bɔɲɛ nan yati wama wo xa a raba na ki.
45013006	Wo lan wo xa duuti fi na nan ma, barima duuti maxilie fan na Ala xa yaamari nan na.
45013007	Wo kankan gbe so a yi, a lan a xa naxan sɔtɔ. Wo duuti so duuti maxilie yi, wo wo magoro mixie bɛ wo lanma wo xa wo magoro naxee bɛ, wo mixie binya wo lan wo xa naxee binya.
45013008	Mixi yo xa doni naxa lu wo ma, wo xa xanunteya nan lan a xa lu wo bore bɛ, barima naxan na a boore maxanu, a bara sɛriyɛ rakamali.
45013009	Ala xa yaamarie alɔ, «I naxa yɛnɛ raba, i naxa mixi faxa, i naxa muɲɛ ti, i naxa mila,» a nun yaamari gbɛtɛe birin, nee malanxi findixi masenyi keren nan na: I xa i boore xanu alɔ i yɛtɛ yati.
45013010	I na i boore xanu, i mu fefe kobi niyama a ra. Na na a ra, i boore xanufe findixi Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin nabatufe nan na.
45013011	Na fe birin kui, wo a kolon won na waxati naxɛ. Xunu tɛmui bara a li xi xɔli ma, kisi bara makɔrɛ won na dangi waxati ra won danxaniyaxi tɛmui naxɛ.
45013012	Kɔɛ bara masiga, a gbe mu luxi kuye xa iba. Won xa Sentanɛ xa dimi walie bɛɲin, won fa Ala xa naiyalanyi ma, won xa a xa geresosee tongo.
45013013	Won xa ɲɛrɛ tinxinyi kui alɔ a lanma won xa ɲɛrɛ ki naxɛ Ala xa naiyalanyi kui. Won naxa siga xulun ɲaaxi, won naxa siisi, won naxa yɛnɛ nun langoeɲa raba, won xa gere nun tɔɔnɛ lu na.
45013014	Wo xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa fe nan suxu, wo naxa bira wo fate bɛndɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra.
45014001	Wo xa danxaniyatɔɛ rasɛnɛ hali a xa danxaniya mu tilin. Wo naxa a rakiiti a xa maɲɔxunyi birin xa fe ra.
45014002	Mixi nde nɔma lade a ra, a donse birin radaxaxi a bɛ, kɔnɔ mixi gbɛtɛ naxan xa danxaniya mu tilin, a nɔma lade a ra a sansi bogi gbansan nan nadaxaxi a bɛ.
45014003	Mixi naxan donse mɔɔli birin donma, na mu lan a xa a boore raɲaaxu naxan tondima donse nde donfe ra. Mixi naxan mu sube donma, na kanyi fan mu lan a xa a boore makiiti naxan sube donma, barima Ala na kanyi fan nasɛnɛma nɛ.
45014004	Nde i findixi kiitisa ra mixi gbɛtɛ xa konyi xun ma? A na ti a marigi ya i a xa wali xa fe ra, a xan ba, a mu xan ba, na na a tan nun a marigi nan tagi. Anun, a xanma nɛ, barima Marigi Ala nɔma a raxande.
45014005	Mixi nde nɔma lade a ra a lɔxɔɛe tide gbo e boore bɛ, kɔnɔ mixi gbɛtɛ tan bɛ, lɔxɔɛ birin lan. Kankan laxi naxan na, a xa la a ra a bɔɲɛ nan yati ma.
45014006	Naxan laxi a ra a lɔxɔɛe tide gbo e boore bɛ, na kanyi laxi a ra Marigi nan bɛ. Naxan donse mɔɔli birin donma, a kanyi a rabama Marigi nan bɛ, barima a tantui rasigama Ala ma a xa baloe xa fe ra. Mixi naxan mu donse nde donma, na kanyi fan na rabama Marigi nan bɛ, barima a fan tantui rasigama Ala ma.
45014007	Mixi yo gbe mu a yɛtɛ ra, keli yi duniɲa, han laaxira.
45014008	Xa won balo, xa won faxa, na birin nabama Marigi nan bɛ. Xa won baloxi, xa won faxaxi, won findixi Marigi gbe nan na,
45014009	barima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi faxa nɛ, a man keli faxɛ ma, alako a xa findi mixi faxaxie nun a baloxie Marigi ra.
45014010	Munfe ra i tan fa i boore makiitima? Munfe ra i a raɲaaxuma? Won birin mu fama tide xɛ Ala ya i kiiti lɔxɔɛ?
45014011	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, Marigi naxɛ, «N xa nɔndi masen wo bɛ. Birin fama nɛ e xinbi sinde n bɛ. Adamadi dɛ birin fama a masende, a n tan nan na Ala ra.»
45014012	Kankan fama nɛ a xa wali dɛntɛgɛde Ala bɛ.
45014013	Na kui, won naxa won bore makiiti. Won xa fe birin nan naba alako won naxa won ngaxakerenyi ratantan.
45014014	N to danxaniyaxi Marigi Isa ma, n a kolon, n man laxi a ra, a donse yo mu na naxan findixi donse sɛniyɛntare ra. Kɔnɔ xa i xaxili bara siikɛ donse nde xa sɛniyɛntareɲa ma, na bara findi i bɛ se sɛniyɛntare ra.
45014015	Xa a sa li i donse nde donma naxan i ngaxakerenyi tɔɔrɔma, i mu ɲɛrɛfe xanunteya xa ma. I xa donse xa fe naxa a niya i ngaxakerenyi xa gan kisi ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi faxa naxan ma fe ra.
45014016	Na kui, a mu lan mixie xa fe kobi fala se nde xa fe ra, naxan findixi a fanyi ra wo bɛ.
45014017	Ala xa mangɛya niini mu findixi donse nun minse fe xa ra. A findixi tinxinyi nun sɛɛwɛ fe nan na, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra.
45014018	Mixi naxan walima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bɛ yi mɔɔli ra, a rafanma nɛ Ala ma, a rafan mixie fan ma.
45014019	Na kui, won xa fe birin naba alako lanyi xa lu won tagi, won xa won bore xa danxaniya sɛnbɛ so.
45014020	I naxa Ala xa wali xun nakana donse nde xa fe ra. A nɔndi ki ma, donse birin daxa, kɔnɔ a mu lan mixi yo xa donse nde don naxan a ngaxakerenyi ratantanma.
45014021	Hali mixi mu sube yo don, a mu wɛni yo min, a mu fefe yo raba naxan a ngaxakerenyi ratantanma, na nan fan.
45014022	Maɲɔxunyi yo na i bɛ yi xa fe ra, i xa a lu i nun Ala tagi. Sɛɛwɛ na mixi bɛ naxan mu a yɛtɛ ratɔnma a xa maɲɔxunyi saabui ra.
45014023	Kɔnɔ xa mixi donse nde donma a siikɛxi naxan ma fe ra, na kanyi bara kiiti kana a yɛtɛ bɛ, barima a bara fe raba a mu laxi naxan na. Mixi mu laxi fe naxan na, na tan bara findi yunubi fe ra a bɛ.
45015001	Won tan naxee xa danxaniya tilin, a lanma won xa diɲɛ mixie bɛ naxee xa danxaniya mu tilin. Won naxa won yɛtɛ waxɔnfe gbansan xa fen.
45015002	Kankan xa a boore nan xa hɛɛri fen, naxan nɔma a malide a xa danxaniya xun xa masa.
45015003	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu a yɛtɛ waxɔnfe xa fen. A a fala nɛ alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Konbie naxee ilanxi i ra, nee n tan nan lixi.»
45015004	Fe naxan birin sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui waxati dangixi, e sɛbɛxi nɛ alako won xa fahaamui sɔtɔ, won xa won tunnabɛxi, won xa limaniya, alako xaxili tide xa lu won bɛ.
45015005	Ala, a tan naxan tunnabɛxiya nun limaniya fima, a xa lanyi raso wo tagi alɔ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa a masenxi wo bɛ ki naxɛ,
45015006	alako wo xa Ala matɔxɔ xaxili nun xui keren na, a tan naxan findixi a xa Mixi Sugandixi nun won Marigi Isa Baba ra.
45015007	Na kui, wo xa wo bore rasɛnɛ alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wo rasɛnɛ ki naxɛ, alako Ala xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ.
45015008	N xa a fala wo bɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wali nɛ Yuwifie bɛ alako a xa a masen a Ala na a xui xanbi ra a to bara a xa laayidie rakamali a naxee tongo e benbae bɛ.
45015009	Si gbɛtɛe fan Ala matɔxɔma a xa hinnɛ xa fe ra, alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Na nan a ra n i matɔxɔma si birin tagi, n bɛɛti bama nɛ i xili xa binyɛ bun ma.»
45015010	A man sɛbɛxi, «Si gbɛtɛe, wo nun Ala xa ɲama xa sɛɛwa.»
45015011	A man sɛbɛxi, «Wo tan ɲamanɛe birin, wo Marigi matɔxɔ, si birin xa a tantu.»
45015012	Annabi Esayi man naxa a masen, «Yisayi xa di fama nɛ. A findima nɛ mangɛ ra si birin xun ma, e fan e xaxili tima nɛ a ra.»
45015013	Ala, a tan naxan xaxili tide fima, a xa wo rafe sɛɛwɛ nun bɔɲɛsa ra danxaniya kui a mɔɔli birin na. Na kui, xaxili tide luma nɛ wo bɛ tɛmui birin, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa sɛnbɛ saabui ra.
45015014	N ngaxakerenyie, n tan a kolon wo bɔɲɛ fan, wo bara lɔnni sɔtɔ a fanyi ra, wo fata wo bore raside.
45015015	Kɔnɔ n to sɛbɛli tixi wo ma, n ma masenyi ndee findixi masenyi xɔrɔxɔɛe nan na alako n xa wo ratu, barima Ala to hinnɛxi n na,
45015016	a bara n findi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa walikɛ ra sigafe ra si gbɛtɛe ma. Na kui, n sɛrɛxɛdubɛ wali nan nabama n to Ala xa xibaaru fanyi kawandima si gbɛtɛe bɛ, alako Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa e findi sɛrɛxɛ sɛniyɛnxi ra naxan Ala kɛnɛnma.
45015017	Na birin kui, n nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa to a ra, n nɔma sɛɛwade n ma wali ra Ala bɛ,
45015018	barima n mu suusama fefe xa fe falade fo Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara naxan naba n saabui ra, alako si gbɛtɛe xa Ala xui rabatu. A bara na raba n ma masenyie nun n ma kɛwalie saabui ra,
45015019	kaabanakoe nun tɔnxumae xa sɛnbɛ saabui ra, a nun Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi sɛnbɛ saabui ra. Na kui, kelife Darisalamu han a sa dɔxɔ Iliri ra, n bara Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi rayensen yɛ.
45015020	Na birin kui, n kataxi nɛ n xa mixie kawandi Isa xa xibaaru fanyi ra naxee mu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi kolon. N mu wa na rabafe kawandila gbɛtɛ dangi fɔxi.
45015021	Alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «A xa fe singe mu nu fala naxee bɛ, e fama nɛ a kolonde. Mixi naxee singe mu nu a xa fe mɛ, e fama nɛ a fahaamude.»
45015022	Yi wali nan a niyaxi n mu nɔxi sigade wo yire.
45015023	Yakɔsi n ma wali bara ɲɔn yi bɔxie ma. N nu bara wa sigafe wo yire kabi ɲɛ wuyaxi.
45015024	A xɔli n ma n xa dangi wo yire n na kira suxu sigafe ra Sipanyi bɔxi ma. Won xa lu yire keren waxati nde ma alako n xa ɲɛlɛxin wo tofe ra, a xɔli n ma wo xa n mali sigafe ra Sipanyi.
45015025	Yakɔsi n na sigafe Darisalamu sɛniyɛntɔɛe malide,
45015026	barima danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae naxee na Masedon nun Akayi bɔxi ma, e a ɲanige nɛ e xa e harige nde malan, e xa a rasanba Darisalamu misikiinɛe ma naxee na na sɛniyɛntɔɛe ya ma.
45015027	E tan nan a ɲanigexi. Anun, a lanma e xa na natɛ tongo barima Yuwifie to findi saabui ra e tan si gbɛtɛe bɛ Ala xa fee kui, a lan nɛ e fan xa Yuwifie mali baloe fe ra.
45015028	Na kui, n na gɛ na wali ra, n yi kɔbiri so e yi danxaniyatɔɛe bara naxan nasanba, n dangima wo yire sigafe ra Sipanyi bɔxi ma.
45015029	N a kolon n to sigafe wo yire, na findima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa barakɛ nan na wo bɛ.
45015030	N ngaxakerenyie, n bara wo mayandi won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, a nun xanunteya xa fe ra naxan kelima Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ma, wo xa n mali, wo xa wakili n bɛ Ala maxandi kui.
45015031	Wo Ala maxandi n bɛ a xa n natanga Yudaya danxaniyataree ma, a nun man, Darisalamu sɛniyɛntɔɛe xa ɲɛlɛxin e malise ra n sigafe naxan na e xɔn.
45015032	Na kui, xa Ala tin, n wo yire lima sɛɛwɛ kui, won nɔ won bore sɛnbɛ sode.
45015033	Ala, a tan naxan bɔɲɛsa fima, a xa lu wo birin sɛɛti ma. Amina.
45016001	N bara wa won ngaxakerenyi ginɛma Fowebe masenfe wo bɛ, naxan danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama malima Senxereya taa kui.
45016002	Wo xa a rasɛnɛ Isayanka ki ma, alɔ a lanma sɛniyɛntɔɛe xa a raba ki naxɛ. Xa a hayi na se nde ma, wo xa a mali, barima a fan bara n tan nun mixi gbegbe mali.
45016003	Wo xa Pirisila nun Akila xɛɛbu n bɛ, n walibooree Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa fe kui.
45016004	E fe birin naba nɛ e xa n nii ratanga beenun e xa e yɛtɛ ratanga. Bafe n tan na, si gbɛtɛe danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae birin e tantuma na fe ma.
45016005	Wo man xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xɛɛbu naxan e malanma e xɔnyi. Wo xa n xanuntenyi Epeneto xɛɛbu n bɛ. A tan nan singe danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma Asi bɔxi ma.
45016006	Wo xa Mariyama xɛɛbu n bɛ, naxan bara wali wo ya ma ki fanyi.
45016007	Wo xa n boore Yuwifie Andironiku nun Yuniya xɛɛbu, muxu nun naxee bara sa geeli. Ala xa xɛɛrae nan e ra, naxee bara kolon a fanyi ra, naxee singe danxaniya n bɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma.
45016008	Wo xa Anpiliyatu xɛɛbu n bɛ, n xanuntenyi Marigi fɔxɔ ra.
45016009	Wo xa muxu waliboore Urubano nun n xanuntenyi Sitaxusi xɛɛbu.
45016010	Wo xa Apɛlɛsi xɛɛbu, naxan bara a xa danxaniya masen Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma. Wo xa Arisitobulo xa mixie xɛɛbu n bɛ.
45016011	Wo xa n boore Yuwifi Herodiyon xɛɛbu n bɛ. Wo xa Narisiso xa mixie xɛɛbu n bɛ, naxee danxaniyaxi Marigi ma.
45016012	Wo xa Tirifena nun Tirifosa xɛɛbu n bɛ. Ginɛe naxee e ra, e walima Marigi bɛ. Wo xa n xanuntenyi Peresidi xɛɛbu. A fan bara wali Marigi bɛ ki fanyi.
45016013	Wo Rufu xɛɛbu, naxan sugandixi Marigi xa fe kui. Wo a nga fan xɛɛbu n bɛ, naxan bara lu n bɛ alɔ n fan nga.
45016014	Wo xa Asinkirito, Felegon, Heremɛsi, Patiroba, nun Heremasi xɛɛbu n bɛ, a nun ngaxakerenyie birin naxee na e xɔnyi.
45016015	Wo xa Filologo, Yuli, Nerewu nun a maaginɛ xɛɛbu, a nun Olimipa nun sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin naxee na e xɔnyi.
45016016	Wo xa wo bore xɛɛbu sunbui sɛniyɛnxi ra. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae birin wo xɛɛbu.
45016017	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa wo rasi, wo xa wo yɛtɛ ratanga mixie ma, naxee lanyi kanama wo tagi, e nu fa mixi ratantan xaranyi ma wo bara naxan sɔtɔ. Wo xa wo makuya e ra.
45016018	Na mixi mɔɔlie mu walima won Marigi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa bɛ. E birama e yɛtɛ furi nan fɔxɔ ra, e nu fa lɔnnitaree madaxu wɔyɛn ɲɔxunmɛe nun matɔxɔɛ ra.
45016019	Mixi birin a kolon a wo Ala xui rabatuma. N ɲɛlɛxinxi wo ra, kɔnɔ a xɔli n ma wo xa fahaamui sɔtɔ fe fanyi ma, wo naxa wo manɔxɔ fe kobi ra.
45016020	Ala, a tan naxan bɔɲɛsa fima, a gbe mu luxi a xa Sentanɛ ibutuxun wo sanyi bun. Won Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ wo ra.
45016021	N waliboore Timote wo xɛɛbu, a nun Lususi, Yason, nun Sosipateri, n boore Yuwifie.
45016022	N tan Teritiyo naxan bara yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛ, n fan bara wo xɛɛbu Marigi xili ra.
45016023	-
45016024	Gayu fan wo xɛɛbu, naxan findixi n tan nun danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama birin yatigi ra. Erasito, naxan findixi taa naafuli ragatama ra, a fan wo xɛɛbu, a nun won ngaxakerenyi Karatusi.
45016025	Matɔxɔɛ na Ala bɛ, naxan nɔma wo sɛnbɛ sode danxaniya kui, alɔ n Marigi Isa xa xibaaru fanyi naxan kawandima a masenxi ki naxɛ. Na xibaaru fanyi gundo fe nan masenma naxan nu ragataxi kabi tɛmui xɔnnakuye,
45016026	kɔnɔ naxan bara fa makɛnɛn alako si birin xa a kolon namiɲɔnmɛe xa sɛbɛlie saabui ra, Ala naxee yamarixi. Na kui, birin xa danxaniya Ala ma, Ala naxan na na, e a xui rabatu.
45016027	Ala, a tan keren naxan fe birin kolon, matɔxɔɛ na a bɛ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra abadan. Amina!
46001001	N tan Pɔlu, Ala naxan ɲanigexi a xa findi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra ra, a nun Sositene, muxu yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛxi wo tan nan ma,
46001002	Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama, naxan na Korinti. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa bara wo xili wo xa findi Ala gbe ra, wo xa findi sɛniyɛntɔɛe ra. Muxu bara yi sɛbɛ wo ma, a nun mixi birin ma naxee e xaxili tima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ra, naxan findixi e tan nun won tan Marigi ra.
46001003	Won Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa, naxan findixi won Marigi ra, e xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
46001004	N Ala tantuma tɛmui birin wo xa fe ra, a to hinnɛ wo ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra.
46001005	A bara wo xa fe birin nakamali masenyi nun fahaamui kamalixi ra.
46001006	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa nɔndi to sabatixi wo ya ma,
46001007	wo bara Ala xa ki birin sɔtɔ, wo hayi mu na fe gbɛtɛ ma sɔnɔn, beemanu won Marigi Isa fa waxati wo naxan mamɛfe.
46001008	A sɛnbɛ fima nɛ wo ma han duniɲa raɲɔnyi, alako yunubi yo naxa lu wo ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi won Marigi Isa fa tɛmui.
46001009	Ala na a xui xanbi ra, a tan naxan wo xilixi alako lanyi xa lu wo nun a xa Di tagi, won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
46001010	N ngaxakerenyie, n bara wo rasi won Marigi Isa xili ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, lanyi xa lu wo tagi. Wo naxa mɛɛ wo bore ra, wo xa lan xaxili nun ɲanige keren ma.
46001011	N ngaxakerenyie, Xolowe xa mixie bara a fala n bɛ, a lantareya na wo tagi.
46001012	N bara a mɛ a nde a falama, «N tan biraxi Pɔlu nan fɔxɔ ra,» nde fan a falama, «N tan biraxi Apolosi nan fɔxɔ ra,» nde a falama, «N tan biraxi Kefasi nan fɔxɔ ra,» a nde fan a falama, «N tan biraxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan fɔxɔ ra.»
46001013	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi keren xa mu a ra? Pɔlu nan banban wuri magalanbuxi ma wo bɛ? Wo wo xunxaxi ye xɔɔra Pɔlu xili nan na?
46001014	N bara Ala tantu n mu mixi yo xunxaxi ye xɔɔra wo ya ma, bafe Kirisipu nun Gayu ra.
46001015	Na kui, mixi yo mu nɔma a falade a xunxa ye xɔɔra n xili nan na.
46001016	N bara Sitefana xa denbaya fan xunxa ye xɔɔra, kɔnɔ na dɔnxɔɛ, n mu laxi a ra xa n bara mixi gbɛtɛ xunxa ye xɔɔra fa.
46001017	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu n xɛɛ mixi xunxade ye xɔɔra. A n xɛɛxi nɛ n xa a xa xibaaru fanyi kawandi ti. Na mu rabama adamadi xa lɔnni ra de, xa na mu a ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa wuri magalanbuxi tide yelebuma nɛ.
46001018	Isa faxafe wuri magalanbuxi ma, na masenyi findixi xaxilitareɲa nan na mixi lɔɛxie bɛ, kɔnɔ a findixi Ala xa sɛnbɛ nan na muxu tan kisi mixie bɛ.
46001019	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «N lɔnnilae xa lɔnni xun nakanama nɛ, n xaxilimae xaxili findi fuyan na.»
46001020	Lɔnnila go? Sɛriyɛ karamɔxɔ go? To xaxilima go? Ala bara yi duniɲa xa lɔnni mafindi xaxilitareɲa ra.
46001021	Duniɲa mixie to mu nɔ Ala xa lɔnni kolonde e yɛtɛ xa lɔnni saabui ra, Ala naxa tin danxaniyatɔɛe rakiside a xa kawandi saabui ra, duniɲa mixie naxan maɲɔxunma xaxilitareɲa ra.
46001022	Yuwifie wama tɔnxumae tofe, Girɛkikae na lɔnni fenfe,
46001023	kɔnɔ muxu tan Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa faxɛ nan kawandima. Yuwifie birama nɛ barima e mu lama na ra, si gbɛtɛe fan ɲɔxɔ a ma a daxuɲa na a ra.
46001024	Kɔnɔ Ala naxee xilixi Yuwifie nun si gbɛtɛe ya ma, e lama nɛ a ra a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Ala sɛnbɛ nun Ala xa lɔnni nan masenma nɛ.
46001025	Adamadie e maɲɔxunxi a Ala xa lɔnni findixi xaxilitareɲa nan na, kɔnɔ a nɔndi ki ma a dangi adamadie xa lɔnni ra. E maɲɔxunxi a Ala sɛnbɛ mu gbo, kɔnɔ a sɛnbɛ dangi e gbe ra pon!
46001026	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa a mato Ala mixi mɔɔli mundun xilixi wo ya ma. Lɔnnila gbegbe mu na, adamadi ki ma. Sɛnbɛmae fan mu gbo. Bannamixie fan mu wuya.
46001027	Kɔnɔ Ala bara duniɲa lɔnnilae rayaagi. A na raba mixie nan saabui ra, e naxee findixi lɔnnitaree ra. Ala bara duniɲa sɛnbɛmae rayaagi. A na raba mixie nan saabui ra, naxee luxi e bɛ alɔ sɛnbɛtaree.
46001028	Ala bara mixi sugandi, naxan tide mu gbo duniɲa mixie bɛ, naxee mu xili xungbe sɔtɔ, naxee mu kolonxi sese ra, alako na xa findi yaagi ra booree bɛ.
46001029	Na kui, mixi yo mu nɔma a yɛtɛ matɔxɔde Ala ya i.
46001030	Ala nan a niyaxi wo xa lu a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa i. Ala bara Isa findi won ma lɔnni, won ma tinxinyi, won ma marasɛniyɛnyi, nun won xunsare ra.
46001031	Na nan na ki, won xa a raba alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Xa mixi wama a yɛtɛ matɔxɔfe fe nde ma, a xa a yɛtɛ matɔxɔ a Marigi xa fe nan na.»
46002001	N ngaxakerenyie, n to fa wo yire, n mu Ala xa seedeɲɔxɔya masenxi wo bɛ wɔyɛnyi xungbee xa ra, xa na mu a ra adamadi xa lɔnni ra.
46002002	N nu bara natɛ tongo n xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa fe nun a xa faxɛ xa fe gbansan nan masen wo bɛ.
46002003	N naxa ti wo ya i sɛnbɛtareya ra. Na tɛmui n nu na sɛrɛnfe gaaxui ra.
46002004	N ma masenyi nun n ma kawandi mu nu fatanxi adamadi xa lɔnni ra. N mu kawandi tixi wɔyɛnyi xungbee ra. N na ti Ala Xaxili sɛnbɛ nan na,
46002005	alako wo naxa danxaniya adamadi xa lɔnni saabui ra, wo xa danxaniya Ala sɛnbɛ nan saabui ra.
46002006	Muxu lɔnni masenma mixi kamalixie bɛ, kɔnɔ lɔnni naxan mu fatanxi to mixie nun to mangɛe ra. E tan xa fe xun fama nɛ rakanade.
46002007	Muxu Ala xa lɔnni nan masenma, Ala lɔnni naxan nɔxunxi kabi duniɲa fɔlɛ, naxan findima won bɛ nɔrɛ ra.
46002008	To mangɛe mu nu fahaamui sɔtɔ na xa fe ma, xa na mu a ra e mu Marigi Nɔrɛ Kanyi mabanbanma wuri magalanbuxi ma nu.
46002009	Na fe luxi alɔ Kitaabui a masenxi ki naxɛ, «Ala naxan yailanxi a xanuntenyie bɛ, adama ya mu a toma, adama tuli mu a mɛma, adama xaxili mu a kolonma.»
46002010	Ala bara na masen won bɛ a yɛtɛ Xaxili saabui ra. Ala Xaxili fe birin kolon, hali Ala yati xa fe tilinxie. A nee birin kolon.
46002011	Nde adama xa fe kolon, xa a yɛtɛ xaxili mu a ra? Ala xa fe fan, mixi yo mu a kolon. Ala Xaxili gbansan nan na fe mɔɔli kolon.
46002012	Won mu nɔma Ala xa hinnɛ fahaamude adamadi xaxili saabui ra. Ala, a Xaxili naxan fixi won ma, na nan nɔma na masende won bɛ.
46002013	Won mu na fe masenma adamadi xa lɔnni ra, won na masenma Ala Xaxili nan ma lɔnni ra. Ala xa fe nan masenma Ala Xaxili saabui ra.
46002014	Kɔnɔ adama naxan mu Ala Xaxili sɔtɔ, a mu nɔma Ala Xaxili xa fe fahaamude. Na luma nɛ a bɛ alɔ daxuɲa, barima a mu nɔma sode a kui Ala Xaxili xanbi.
46002015	Adama naxan Ala Xaxili sɔtɔxi, na kanyi nan nɔma fe birin fahaamude. A booree mu nɔma a makiitide na fee kui.
46002016	Na nan a toxi a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Nde Marigi Xaxili kolon, a xa marasi nde fi a ma?» Kɔnɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Xaxili na won tan bɔɲɛ i.
46003001	N mu nu nɔma wɔyɛnde wo bɛ alɔ n nu wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ, barima wo mu luxi alɔ Ala Xaxili kanyie. Wo luxi nɛ alɔ duniɲa mixie, naxee xa danxaniya mu gɛxi kamalide sinden.
46003002	N nu bara wo xaran fe singee ra, alɔ dingɛ xiɲɛ fima a xa diyɔrɛ ma ki naxɛ. N mu wo xaran fe xɔrɔxɔɛ ra, barima wo mu nu nɔma na fahaamude. Dingɛ fan mu sube fima diyɔrɛ ma. Han ya wo mu nɔma xaranyi xɔrɔxɔɛ kolonde, barima wo na birafe duniɲa fee nan fɔxɔ ra.
46003003	Tɔɔnɛ nun lantareya to gbo wo ya ma, na mu a masenma xɛ a duniɲa mixie nan wo ra, naxee na birafe adamadi waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra?
46003004	Mixi nde to a falama wo ya ma, «N biraxi Pɔlu nan fɔxɔ ra,» mixi gbɛtɛ fan a fala, «N tan biraxi Apolosi nan fɔxɔ ra,» na mu a masenma xɛ a wo luxi nɛ alɔ duniɲa mixie?
46003005	Nde na Apolosi ra? Nde na Pɔlu ra? Muxu findixi Ala xa walikɛe nan tun na Ala naxee xɛɛxi alako wo xa danxaniya. Ala wali naxan soxi muxu yi ra, muxu bara na raba.
46003006	N tan bara sansi xɔri si, Apolosi bara ye sa a ma, kɔnɔ Ala nan a niya a xa bula, a xa mɔ.
46003007	Mixi naxan sansi xɔri sima, a nun mixi naxan ye sama a ma, e tide mu gbo. Ala nan tide gbo, barima a tan nan a niya sansi xa mɔ.
46003008	Naxan sansi xɔri sima, nun naxan ye sama a ma, e birin lan, e birin fama nɛ e xa wali sare sɔtɔde.
46003009	Muxu tan findixi Ala xa walikɛe nan na. Wo tan luxi nɛ alɔ Ala xa xɛ, xa na mu a ra a xa banxi.
46003010	Ala bara a ɲanige a xa hinnɛ kui, n xa wali suxu a bɛ. Na misaalixi banxi ti wali nan na. N bara lu alɔ banxiti. N tan nan banxi kɔɔrinma, boore biriki dɔxɔ. Kɔnɔ kankan xa mɛɛni a wali ki ma.
46003011	Mixi yo mu nɔma fe gbɛtɛ findide na banxi bunyi ra, bafe Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ra.
46003012	Mixi naxee banxi tima na bunyi fari xɛɛma ra, xa na mu a ra gbeti, xa na mu a ra gɛmɛ tofanyi, xa na mu a ra wuri, xa na mu a ra sɛxɛ fanyi, xa na mu a ra sɛxɛ fori ra. Kankan xa wali matoma nɛ.
46003013	Kiiti lɔxɔɛ na wali birin makɛnɛnma nɛ. Na kiiti luma nɛ alɔ tɛ naxan fama kankan xa wali makɛnɛnde.
46003014	Xa banxiti xa wali sa na tɛ imini, a fama nɛ wali sare sɔtɔde.
46003015	Kɔnɔ xa a sa li a xa wali naxa gan na tɛ ra, a tɔɔrɔma nɛ. A fama nɛ kiside alɔ mixi naxan natangaxi tɛ ma.
46003016	Wo mu a kolon wo findixi Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi nan na? Ala Xaxili sabatixi wo bɔɲɛ i.
46003017	Xa mixi nde Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi kana, Ala na kanyi fan kanama nɛ, barima a xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi sɛniyɛn. Wo tan nan findixi na hɔrɔmɔbanxi ra.
46003018	Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ madaxu. Xa mixi nde a yɛtɛ findixi lɔnnila ra duniɲa ki ma, a xa a yɛtɛ magoro alako a xa lɔnni yati kolon.
46003019	Yi duniɲa mixie xa lɔnni findixi daxuɲa nan na Ala bɛ. A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Ala gantanyi tema nɛ lɔnnilae bɛ e yɛtɛ xa lɔnni nan na.»
46003020	A man sɛbɛxi, «Marigi a kolon duniɲa mixie xa lɔnni findixi fe fufafu nan na.»
46003021	Wo naxa wo xaxili ti mixi yo ra, barima e findixi wo malima nan na.
46003022	Pɔlu yo, Apolosi yo, Kefasi yo, e birin findixi wo malima nan na. Fe naxan birin na duniɲa, fe naxan birin na wo xa duniɲɛigiri kui, fe naxan birin na na, a nun fe naxan birin sa fama, hali faxɛ, na birin na na wo tan nan malife ra.
46003023	Wo tan na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan bɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan na Ala nan bɛ.
46004001	Na na a ra, wo xa a kolon muxu tan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa walikɛe nan na, Ala xa gundoe taxuxi naxee ra.
46004002	Xa fe nde taxuxi mixi ra, a lanma a xa na rawali a rawali ki ma.
46004003	Xa wo wama n makiitife, xa na mu a ra kiitisa gbɛtɛ wama n makiitife, fefe mu a ra. N mu n yɛtɛ yati makiitima.
46004004	N tan bɛ, n mu fe ɲaaxi yo rabaxi, kɔnɔ n yɛtɛ makiitife tan mu findixi tinxinyi ra n bɛ. N Marigi nan findixi n ma kiitisa ra.
46004005	Na kui, wo naxa kiiti yo sa beenun Marigi xa kiiti waxati. A tan nan fe makɛnɛnma naxan nɔxunxi dimi kui. A tan nan ɲanige makɛnɛnma naxan na mixi bɔɲɛ ma. Na waxati, Ala mixie matɔxɔma e xa wali bɛrɛ nan na.
46004006	N ngaxakerenyie, n bara misaali nde masen wo bɛ n tan nun Apolosi xa fe ra, alako wo xa yi sɛbɛli fahaamu, «Wo naxa yaamari sɛbɛxi matandi.» Na kui, wo naxa wo yɛtɛ igbo lufe ra mixi nde xanbi ra.
46004007	Nde i findixi fisamante ra? Munse na i yi ra, i mu naxan sɔtɔxi Ala saabui ra? Xa wo na sɔtɔxi Ala nan saabui ra, munfe ra wo wo yɛtɛ igboma alɔ a fatanxi wo tan nan na?
46004008	A luxi alɔ wo bara wo waxɔnfe birin sɔtɔ muxu xanbi, wo bara banna, wo bara findi mangɛe ra. Xa a sa na na ki nɛ, na birin xa sɔɔnɛya wo bɛ, alako muxu fan xa lu wo sɛɛti ma mangɛya kui.
46004009	A luxi n bɛ alɔ Ala bara a ragiri muxu tan xɛɛrae ma, muxu xa findi xanbiratie ra, alɔ mixie e naxee faxama duniɲa birin ya tode ra, malekɛe nun adamadie ya xɔri.
46004010	A luxi alɔ muxu bara daxu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, kɔnɔ wo tan bara findi xaxilimae ra a xa fe ra. Muxu sɛnbɛ bara ɲɔn, kɔnɔ wo tan gbe xun bara masa. Muxu bara mayele sɔtɔ, kɔnɔ wo tan bara binyɛ sɔtɔ.
46004011	Han ya muxu tɔɔrɔma kaamɛ nun ye xɔli ma. Dugi mu na muxu yi ra. Mixie muxu bɔnbɔma, e bara muxu findi mixi rabɛɲinxie ra.
46004012	Muxu baloxi muxu yɛtɛ xa wali nan na. Mixie na muxu konbi, muxu dubama nɛ e bɛ. Mixie na muxu ɲaxankata, muxu diɲɛma nɛ e ma.
46004013	Mixie na muxu xili kana, muxu wɔyɛn fanyi falama nɛ e bɛ. Han ya muxu tide mu na duniɲa mixie bɛ, muxu bara lu e bɛ alɔ mixi fufafu.
46004014	N mu wama wo ifufe nɛ, kɔnɔ n wama wo rasife nɛ alɔ n ma di maxanuxie.
46004015	Wo nɔma karamɔxɔ gbegbe sɔtɔde Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, kɔnɔ n keren peti nan findixi wo baba ra, naxan bara Inyila Isa masen wo bɛ, wo xa danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma.
46004016	N ma marasi nan ya wo bɛ: Wo xa bira n ma misaali nan fɔxɔ ra.
46004017	Na na a ra, n bara Timote xɛɛ wo yire, alako a xa wo ratu n naɲɛrɛ ki ma Isa xa fe kui, n danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae birin xaranma naxan na yire birin. N ma di maxanuxi Timote danxaniyaxi Marigi keren nan ma.
46004018	Ndee bara e yɛtɛ igbo wo ya ma. E ɲɔxɔ a ma n mu sigama wo yire,
46004019	kɔnɔ, xa Ala tin, a gbe mu luxi n xa wo xɔnyi li. Na tɛmui n fama a kolonde xa na yɛtɛ igboe xa wɔyɛnyi fama findide nɔndi ra.
46004020	Ala xa mangɛya mu findixi wɔyɛnyi gbansan xa ra, a findixi sɛnbɛ yati nan na.
46004021	Wo wama munse xɔn? N xa siga wo xɔnyi luxusinyi ra, ka n xa siga xanunteya nun diɲɛ ra?
46005001	N bara a mɛ a fe ɲaaxi mɔɔli nde na wo ya ma, naxan mu toma hali kaafirie ya ma. A xɛmɛ nde luma a baba xa ginɛ kolon na ginɛ ra.
46005002	A nu lan nɛ yi fe xa wo bɔɲɛ tɔɔrɔ, wo fa na kanyi ramini wo tagi, kɔnɔ wo na wo yɛtɛ igbofe tun.
46005003	Hali n tan mu na wo yire, n xaxili tan na wo tagi. N ɲan bara na kanyi makiiti
46005004	Marigi Isa xili nun a sɛnbɛ ra. N na wo xanbi ra.
46005005	Yi mixi mɔɔli xa so Sentanɛ yi ra, na fe ɲaaxi xun xa rakana yakɔsi, alako na kanyi nii xa kisi Marigi xa lɔxɔɛ.
46005006	Yɛtɛ igbofe mu fan. Wo mu a kolon lɛbini siyadi farin gbegbe ratema nɛ?
46005007	Wo lɛbini fori ba wo ya ma, alako wo xa lu alɔ farin nɛɛnɛ lɛbini mu saxi naxɛ i. A nɔndi ki ma wo na na ki nɛ. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara findi won ma sɛrɛxɛ ra, naxan misaalixi yɛxɛɛ ra naxan kɔn naxabama Sayamalekɛ Dangi Sali.
46005008	Won xa na sali raba sɛniyɛnyi kui. Won xa fe kobi nun fe ɲaaxi ba won ya ma, alɔ lɛbini fori bama won ma banxie kui ki naxɛ na sali. Nɔndi nun bɔɲɛ fiixɛ xa lu won yi ra. Na kui won misaalima taami lɛbinitare nan na.
46005009	N bara a sɛbɛ wo ma bataaxɛ kui, wo nun yɛnɛlae naxa lu dɛfanbooreya kui.
46005010	Kɔnɔ n mu wama a falafe xɛ wo bɛ a wo nun yɛnɛla birin naxee na duniɲa, a nun milantee, muɲɛtie, nun kuye batuie, wo nun nee naxa dɛ masara. Xa a sa na na ki nɛ, a lima na fan fo wo keli duniɲa ma de!
46005011	N waxi a sɛbɛfe nɛ wo ma, dɛfanɲa naxa lu wo nun mixi tagi, naxan a yɛtɛ findima wo boore danxaniyatɔɛ ra, kɔnɔ a fa findi yɛnɛla ra, xa na mu a ra milante, kuye batui, konbiti, siisila, xa na mu a ra muɲɛti. Wo nun na mixi mɔɔli, wo naxa wo dɛge yati yire keren.
46005012	N tan mu nɔma mixie makiitide naxee mu na danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ya ma, kɔnɔ a lanma won xa won boore danxaniyatɔɛe nan makiiti.
46005013	Naxee mu na danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ya ma, Ala nan nee makiitima, kɔnɔ a lanma wo tan xa «mixi ɲaaxi keri wo tagi.»
46006001	Fe nde na mini wo tan danxaniyatɔɛe tagi, wo nɔma sigade di na kalamui sade kaafirie xa kiiti banxi kui? Wo mu sigama sɛniyɛntɔɛe xa yire?
46006002	Wo mu a kolon sɛniyɛntɔɛe nan fama duniɲa birin makiitide? Xa wo tan nan duniɲa makiitima, wo fa taganxi yi kiiti xunxurie sade di?
46006003	Wo mu a kolon a won fama nɛ malekɛe yati makiitide? Na kui, won fa taganxi yi duniɲa fee makiitide munfe ra?
46006004	Xa yi duniɲa fe nde bara mini wo tagi gere ra, hali wo mixi xuri nde tongo danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ya ma, na nɔma nɛ na kiiti sade wo bɛ.
46006005	Wo mu yaagima na ra? Lɔnnila yo mu na wo ya ma naxan nɔma kiiti sade danxaniyatɔɛe tagi?
46006006	Kɔnɔ danxaniyatɔɛe e boore kalamuma kaafiri xa kiiti banxi kui.
46006007	Gere to na wo tagi, na bara a masen a wo xun bara rakana. Munfe ra wo mu diɲɛma wo bore haakɛ ma, hali na findixi kasarɛ nan na wo bɛ?
46006008	Kɔnɔ wo tan harige bama wo boore danxaniyatɔɛe yi ra tinxintareya ra.
46006009	Wo mu a kolon a mixi ɲaaxi mu ariyanna sɔtɔma kɛ ra? Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ madaxu. Langoe ginɛ yo, kuye batui yo, yɛnɛla yo, langoe xɛmɛ yo, xɛmɛ naxan nun xɛmɛ kafuma,
46006010	muɲɛti, milante, siisila, konbiti, nun mixi madaxui, e sese mu ariyanna sɔtɔma kɛ ra.
46006011	Ndee na wo ya ma naxee nu na na fe mɔɔli kui, kɔnɔ wo bara rafiixɛ, wo bara rasɛniyɛn, wo bara matinxin, won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra, a nun Ala Xaxili saabui ra.
46006012	Fe birin nadaxaxi n bɛ, kɔnɔ a birin xa mu fan n bɛ. Fe birin nadaxaxi n bɛ, kɔnɔ n mu tinma na fe mɔɔli nde xa nɔ n na.
46006013	Ala nan donse daaxi adama xa baloe ra, a adama daaxi nɛ a xa na donse don, kɔnɔ Ala na birin ɲɔnma nɛ. Ala mu adama fate daaxi a xa yɛnɛ raba. A adama daaxi a Marigi nan bɛ. Marigi man mɛɛnima nɛ adama fate ma.
46006014	Ala naxan won Marigi rakelixi faxɛ ma, a fama nɛ won tan fan nakelide faxɛ ma a sɛnbɛ ra.
46006015	Wo mu a kolon wo fatuxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan ma, alɔ wo fate salonyie fatuxi e bore ra ki naxɛ? Xa mixi fatuxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, a mu lan na kanyi nun langoe xa kafu.
46006016	Astɔfulahi! Wo mu a kolon mixi naxan nun langoe kafuma, a tan nun na langoe findima fate keren nan na? A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Xɛmɛ nun ginɛ findima fate keren nan na.»
46006017	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan bara fatu Marigi ma, e xaxili findima keren nan na.
46006018	Wo wo gi langoeɲa ma. Yunubi gbɛtɛ mu findixi haakɛ ra mixi fate ma, kɔnɔ langoeɲa tan haakɛ sɔtɔma mixi fate nan na.
46006019	Wo mu a kolon wo fate findixi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi nan na? Ala bara a Xaxili raso wo bɔɲɛ i. Wo mu findixi wo yɛtɛ gbe xa ra sɔnɔn.
46006020	Ala nan wo xunsaraxi xunsare xɔrɔxɔɛ ra. Na nan a toxi wo xa Ala matɔxɔ wo fate nun wo xaxili ra, naxee findixi Ala gbe ra.
46007001	N wama wo xa sɛbɛli yaabife. A fan xɛmɛ bɛ a lufe a mu ginɛ dɔxɔ,
46007002	kɔnɔ yɛnɛ to bara gbo, a lanma xɛmɛ tan, kankan xa a gbe ginɛ sɔtɔ. Ginɛ fan, kankan xa a gbe mɔri sɔtɔ.
46007003	Xɛmɛ lanma a xa ginɛ waxɔnfe raba futi ki ma. Ginɛ fan lanma a xa a xa mɔri waxɔnfe raba futi ki ma.
46007004	Ginɛ fate luma a xa mɔri xa yaamari nan bun ma, xɛmɛ fan fate luma a xa ginɛ xa yaamari nan bun ma.
46007005	Wo naxa tondi wo bore bɛ, fo wo firin nalan a ma wo xa Ala maxandi tɛmui naxɛ waxatidi nde bun ma. Na dangi xanbi, wo man xa lu yire keren, xa na mu a ra, xa wo mu fata wo yɛtɛ suxude, Sentanɛ fama nɛ wo ratantande.
46007006	N xa marasi nde fi wo ma, kɔnɔ yaamari mu a ra.
46007007	A xɔli n ma mixi birin xa lu alɔ n tan, kɔnɔ Ala mu mixi birin kima kɛɲa keren. A a ragirixi nde xa nɔ fe nde rabade, boore fan xa nɔ fe gbɛtɛ rabade.
46007008	N xa a fala xɛmɛe bɛ, naxee mu nu ginɛ dɔxɔ sinden, xa na mu a ra ginɛ naxee mu na xɛmɛ taa sinden, xa na mu a ra kaaɲɛ ginɛe, xa na mu a ra xɛmɛ naxan xa ginɛ laaxirayaxi, e fan xa bira n ma misaali fɔxɔ ra.
46007009	Kɔnɔ xa wo mu nɔma wo yɛtɛ suxude, wo xa futi xiri. Futi xirife fisa fate waxɔnfe bɛ.
46007010	N bara xɛmɛ nun a xa ginɛ yamari, ginɛ naxa mɛɛ a xa mɔri ra. Na yaamari mu fatanxi n tan na, a fatanxi Marigi nan na.
46007011	Xa a sa li ginɛ naxa mɛɛ a xa mɔri ra, a xa lu xɛmɛtareɲa kui, xa na mu a ra a xa gbilen a xa mɔri xɔn ma. Xɛmɛ fan naxa mɛɛ a xa ginɛ ra.
46007012	Wo tan naxee luxi, n bara wo fan nasi, Marigi xa yaamari mu a ra. Xa a sa li danxaniyatɔɛ bara ginɛ danxaniyatare dɔxɔ, na ginɛ fa tin lude a yi ra, na xɛmɛ naxa mɛɛ a ra.
46007013	Xa na mu a ra, xa a sa li ginɛ bara dɔxɔ xɛmɛ danxaniyatare xɔn, na xɛmɛ fa tin na ginɛ ra, na ginɛ naxa mɛɛ a xa mɔri ra.
46007014	N a falama fe naxan ma, na ginɛ xa mɔri danxaniyatare nɔma sɛniyɛnde a xa ginɛ danxaniyatɔɛ saabui ra, xa na mu a ra na ginɛ danxaniyatare nɔma sɛniyɛnde a xa mɔri danxaniyatɔɛ saabui ra. Xa danxaniyatɔɛ mɛɛma a xa denbaya ra, a xa die mu sɛniyɛnma nu, kɔnɔ xa a lu a xa denbaya xun ma, e sɛniyɛnma nɛ.
46007015	Xa danxaniyatare bara mɛɛ a xa ginɛ ra, xa na mu a ra a xa mɔri ra, a xa siga. Xɛmɛ danxaniyatɔɛ, xa na mu a ra ginɛ danxaniyatɔɛ, a mu xirixi mixi danxaniyatare ma. Ala wama nɛ won xa lu bɔɲɛsa kui.
46007016	Ginɛ, i a kolon xa i nɔma a niyade i xa mɔri xa kisi? Xɛmɛ, i a kolon xa i nɔma a niyade i xa ginɛ xa kisi?
46007017	Kankan xa ɲɛrɛ kira xɔn ma Marigi a tixi naxan xɔn. Kankan xa wali raba Marigi bɛ a naxan soxi a yi ra. N na yaamari nan masenma danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama birin bɛ.
46007018	Xa Ala bara mixi sunnaxi xili danxaniya ma, na kanyi xa tin a xa sunnɛ ra. Xa Ala bara sunnatare xili danxaniya ma, na kanyi xa lu a sunnatareya kui.
46007019	Sunnafe nun sunnatareya, fefe mu a ra. Ala xa yaamari rabatufe, na nan tide gbo.
46007020	Kankan xa lu a kɛɲa, alɔ Ala a xilixi tɛmui naxɛ.
46007021	Konyi nan nu na i ra, Ala i xilixi tɛmui naxɛ? I naxa kɔntɔfili. Xa i nɔma xɔrɛya sɔtɔde, na fan.
46007022	Hali i Marigi Ala i xilixi konyiya nan kui, lasiri nan i ra i Marigi Ala mabiri. Hali i Marigi Ala i xilixi lasiriya nan kui, konyi nan i ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mabiri.
46007023	Wo xunsaraxi sare xɔrɔxɔɛ nan na. Wo naxa findi adama xa konyie ra.
46007024	N ngaxakerenyie, kankan xa lu a kɛɲa, alɔ Ala a xilixi tɛmui naxɛ.
46007025	Marigi mu n yamarixi ginɛdimɛdie xa fe ra, kɔnɔ n wama marasi nde fife wo ma, n tan, Ala kinikinixi naxan ma, a naxan matinxinxi.
46007026	N tan bɛ, a fisa xa ginɛdimɛdi mu dɔxɔ xɛmɛ taa sinden, barima yi waxati a xɔrɔxɔ.
46007027	Xa ginɛ kanyi nan i ra, i naxa a bɛɲin. Xa ginɛtare nan i ra, i naxa ginɛ fen.
46007028	Xa i ginɛ fenma, na mu findima yunubi ra. Xa ginɛdimɛdi dɔxɔ xɛmɛ taa, na fan mu findima yunubi ra. Kɔnɔ mixi naxee na mɔɔli rabama, e fama tɔɔrɔde yi duniɲɛigiri kui. N wama e ratangafe na tɔɔrɛ nan ma.
46007029	N ngaxakerenyie, n wama naxan masenfe wo bɛ, waxati gbegbe mu luxi sɔnɔn. Keli yakɔsi ma, ginɛ na naxan yi, a xa lu alɔ ginɛtare.
46007030	Naxan na wafe, a xa lu alɔ a mu wafe. Naxan sɛɛwaxi, a xa lu alɔ a mu sɛɛwaxi. Naxan na se sarafe, a xa lu alɔ se mu a yi.
46007031	Naxan na duniɲa fe rawalife, a xa lu alɔ a tide mu na, barima yi duniɲa na ɲɔnfe nɛ yi ki.
46007032	A xɔli n ma wo xa kɔntɔfili birin bɛɲin. Naxan mu futi xirixi, a xa bira Ala xa fee nan fɔxɔ ra, alako Marigi xa ɲɛlɛxin a xa wali ra.
46007033	Kɔnɔ naxan futi xirixi, a tan nan birama duniɲa fee fɔxɔ ra, alako a xa ginɛ xa ɲɛlɛxin a xa wali ra.
46007034	Na tɛmui a na fe firin nan kui na ki. Ginɛ fan, naxan mu na xɛmɛ taa, a findi ginɛdimɛdi ra, a birama Marigi xa fee nan fɔxɔ ra, alako a fate nun a xaxili xa sɛniyɛn. Kɔnɔ naxan dɔxɔxi xɛmɛ taa, a tan nan birama duniɲa fee nan fɔxɔ ra, alako a xa mɔri xa ɲɛlɛxin a xa wali ra.
46007035	N yi fe falama wo xa munafanyi nan xa fe ra. N mu a falama yanfanteya xa ma. A xɔli n ma wo xa lu fe fanyi nan kui, wo xa gbaku Marigi ma, kɔntɔfili gbɛtɛ yo naxa lu wo ma.
46007036	Mixi naxan bara ginɛ fen fɔlɔ, a fa a kolon a mu nɔma a yɛtɛ suxude, a a maɲɔxunxi nɛ a a lanma a xa na ginɛ dɔxɔ, a lanma a xa na raba. A mu findixi yunubi ra. Ginɛfenyie xa futi xiri e nun a xa ginɛ tagi.
46007037	Kɔnɔ ginɛfenyi naxan nɔma a yɛtɛ suxude, naxan bara natɛ tongo a yɛtɛ ra a naxa ginɛ dɔxɔ, na kanyi bara fe fanyi raba.
46007038	Na kui, naxan ginɛdimɛdi fenxi dɔxɔma, na bara fe fanyi raba, kɔnɔ naxan mu a dɔxɔma, na bara fe fanyi raba dangife boore ra.
46007039	Ginɛ nun a xa mɔri luma a ra han a xa simaya danyi nɛ. Kɔnɔ xa a xa mɔri faxa, a nɔma dɔxɔde xɛmɛ gbɛtɛ xɔn ma. A nɔma dɔxɔde xɛmɛ xɔn a nu wa naxan yo xɔn, kɔnɔ a xa findi Ala xa mixi nan na.
46007040	Kɔnɔ n tan bɛ, a xa sɛɛwɛ xun masama nɛ xa a sa lu kaaɲɛ kui. N laxi a ra a Ala Xaxili na n bɔɲɛ i.
46008001	Won birin bara fahaamui sɔtɔ sɛrɛxɛ sube xa fe ma naxan baxi kuyee bɛ. Fahaamui nɔma findide yɛtɛ igboɲa ra, kɔnɔ xanunteya nan mixie ralimaniyama.
46008002	Mixi naxan ɲɔxɔ a ma a bara gɛ fahaamui sɔtɔde, nde luxi a xa fahaamui ra.
46008003	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan Ala xanuma, Ala bara na kanyi kolon.
46008004	N xa fe nde masen wo bɛ sɛrɛxɛ sube donfe ma naxan baxi kuyee bɛ. Won a kolon kuye yo mu na duniɲa naxan findixi Ala ra. Ala keren peti nan na.
46008005	Duniɲa mixie fe gbegbe findima alae ra koore nun bɔxi ma. E e xilima «alae,» e e xilima «marigie.»
46008006	Kɔnɔ won tan bɛ Ala keren peti nan na, Baba Ala naxan se birin daaxi, won findixi naxan gbe ra. Marigi keren peti nan na, naxan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ra, se birin daaxi naxan saabui ra, won fan ɲɛngima naxan saabui ra.
46008007	Kɔnɔ mixi birin mu gɛxi fahaamui sɔtɔde na fe ma. Mixi naxee nu bara dari kuye fee ra, han yakɔsi e nɛ sɛrɛxɛ sube donma, e tan bɛ a baxi kuye nan bɛ. E xaxili to mu gɛxi fee fahaamude sinden, e yunubi sɔtɔma na sube donfe kui.
46008008	Donse mu mixi makɔrɛma Ala ra. Xa won bara a don, xa won bara a lu na, a birin keren.
46008009	Wo xa a mato a fanyi ra, alako wo xa xɔrɛya naxa a niya fahaamutare xa yunubi sɔtɔ.
46008010	Xa fahaamutare nde bara wo tan fahaamui kanyi to, wo dɔxɔxi teebili ra kuyee banxi kui, na nɔma a niyade fahaamutare fan xa kuye sɛrɛxɛ sube don.
46008011	Na kui, fahaamutare, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi faxa naxan bɛ, a fama lɔɛde i tan nan ma fahaamui saabui ra.
46008012	Na kui, wo bara yunubi raba wo ngaxakerenyi fahaamutaree ra, wo man bara yunubi raba Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra.
46008013	Na nan a toxi, xa donse nde a niyama n ngaxakerenyi xa yunubi tongo, n tan bara diɲɛ na donse ma, alako n naxa n ngaxakerenyi rabira.
46009001	Lasiri xa mu na n na? Xɛɛra xa mu na n na? N mu won Marigi Isa toxi xɛ? Marigi mu n xɛɛxi wo yire xɛ, alako wo xa danxaniya?
46009002	Tɛmunde booree mu n kolon xɛɛra ra, kɔnɔ wo tan n kolon, barima wo xa danxaniya findixi n ma xɛɛraya tɔnxuma nan na Marigi xa fe ra.
46009003	N ma xunmafalɛ nan na ki mixie bɛ naxee wama n makiitife.
46009004	A mu daxa muxu xa muxu dɛge, muxu xa muxu min?
46009005	A mu daxa muxu xa ginɛ danxaniyaxi dɔxɔ, naxan luma muxu sɛɛti ma muxu xa ɲɛrɛ kui, alɔ xɛɛra booree a rabama ki naxɛ, a nun Marigi ngaxakerenyie nun Kefasi?
46009006	Ka n tan nun Baranabasi gbansan nan lan muxu xa wali muxu xa baloe xa fe ra?
46009007	Sɔɔri mundun a yɛtɛ rabaloma? Bɔxi rawali mundun mu a xa sansi bogi donma? Xuruse dɛmadonyi mundun mu a xa xuruse xiɲɛ minma?
46009008	Adama xaxili gbansan nan na ki? Ala xa sɛriyɛ fan mu na mɔɔli masenma xɛ?
46009009	A sɛbɛxi Tawureta Munsa kui, «Ninge nɛ mɛngi luxutama, wo mu lan wo xa a dɛ xiri.» Na kui, Ala wama mɛɛnife ningee nan gbansan ma,
46009010	ka a na fala won tan nan fan ma fe ra? Iyo, a na sɛbɛ won tan nan ma fe ra. Walikɛ walima fe nde nan ma. Mixi maale boronma nɛ alako a xa baloe sɔtɔ.
46009011	Xa muxu bara wakili wo bɛ alako wo xa Ala kolon, a mu lanma xɛ muxu xa se sɔtɔ wo yi ra?
46009012	Xa mixi gbɛtɛe na mɔɔli sɔtɔma wo ra, a mu lanma xɛ muxu singe xa na sɔtɔ? Kɔnɔ muxu mu na findixi teku ra wo mabiri. Muxu bara diɲɛ na birin ma, alako Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi kawandife naxa matɔɔrɔ.
46009013	Wo mu a kolon sɛrɛxɛdubɛe fan baloma sɛrɛxɛe nan na naxee baxi Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi bɛ? Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ naxee sɛrɛxɛ sama sɛrɛxɛbade, e xa baloe minima na sɛrɛxɛe nan kui.
46009014	Na ki Marigi bara yaamari fi a Ala xa xibaaru fanyi kawanditie xa balo e xa kawandi ti kui.
46009015	N tan mu na findixi teku ra fefe ma. N man mu yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛxi xɛ alako wo xa n ki. Kawandi tife kɔbiri xanbi a bara findi ɲɛlɛxinyi ra n bɛ. N mu tin mixi yo xa na ɲɛlɛxinyi ba n yi ra, hali na findi faxɛ nan na n bɛ.
46009016	N mu nɔma n yɛtɛ igbode n ma kawandi wali xa fe ra. Kawandi tife findixi Ala xa yaamari nan na n bɛ. Ɲaxankatɛ na n bɛ, xa n mu Ala xa xibaaru fanyi kawandi.
46009017	Xa n keren nan a ɲanigexi nu, a lanma n xa sare sɔtɔ. Kɔnɔ xa a mu fatanxi n yɛtɛ ɲanige xa ra, n na xɛɛraya nan nabafe tun, naxan taxuxi n na.
46009018	Na kui, n sare findima munse ra? N sare findima na ɲɛlɛxinyi nan na, naxan fatanxi Ala xa xibaaru fanyi kawandife ra sare xanbi n nu nɔma naxan maxɔrinde.
46009019	Hali lasiri nan n na, n nan n yɛtɛ findima mixi birin xa konyi nan na alako n xa mixi gbegbe sɔtɔ Ala bɛ.
46009020	N nan ɲɛrɛma Yuwifi ki nan ma Yuwifie ya ma alako n xa e sɔtɔ Ala bɛ. N nan ɲɛrɛma Munsa xa sɛriyɛ ki nan ma, hali n mu na na yaamari bun ma, alako n xa mixie sɔtɔ Ala bɛ naxee na na sɛriyɛ bun ma.
46009021	Xa n na mixie ya ma naxee mu na Munsa xa sɛriyɛ bun ma, n fan luma e gbe ki nɛ, alako n xa na mixi mɔɔli sɔtɔ Ala bɛ. N nan ɲɛrɛma na ki nɛ hali n tan to na Ala xa sɛriyɛ bun ma. N na a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yaamari nan bun ma.
46009022	N bara ɲɛrɛ fahaamutareɲa ki ma fahaamutaree ya ma, alako n xa e fan sɔtɔ Ala bɛ. N bara fe mɔɔli birin naba, n bara ɲɛrɛ mixi mɔɔli birin gbe ki ma, alako n xa mixi ndee sɔtɔ Ala bɛ.
46009023	N fe birin nabama alako Ala xa xibaaru fanyi xa kawandi, n fan xa lu na nɛmɛ kui.
46009024	Wo mu a kolon gi mixi naxee gbatama ɲama ya xɔri, mixi keren gbansan nan geenima, a sare sɔtɔ? Wo fan xa ɲɛrɛ a fanyi ra wo xa duniɲɛigiri kui, alako wo xa sare sɔtɔ Ala ra.
46009025	Gi mixi naxee gbata rabama, e fe xɔrɔxɔɛ mɔɔli birin nabama, alako e xa geeni, hali na sare mu bu. Won tan nan sare nde sɔtɔma naxan buma abadan.
46009026	Na nan a toxi n luma n ɲɛrɛ ki mato ra a fanyi ra, n mu bɔnbɔma fe fufafu ra.
46009027	N nan n yɛtɛ suxuma nɛ sɛnbɛ ra, alako n tan kawanditi fan naxa fa Ala xa masenyi matandi, n xa lɔɛ.
46010001	N ngaxakerenyie, n mu wama wo xa nɛɛmu a ma won babae naxan nabaxi. E naxa ɲɛrɛ nuxui bun ma, e naxa baa igiri.
46010002	E nun Annabi Munsa, e birin naxa fe keren idangi nuxui kui a nun baa igiri kui.
46010003	E birin naxa donse don naxan fatanxi Ala ra.
46010004	E birin naxa minse min, Ala naxan namini fanye ma. Na fanye, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan a ra, naxan nu biraxi e fɔxɔ ra.
46010005	Kɔnɔ mixi gbegbe nu na e ya ma, naxee mu nu gɛxi rafande Ala ma, na nan a to e naxa faxa gbengberenyi ma.
46010006	E xa ɲɛrɛ birin findixi misaali nan na won bɛ, alako won naxa bira fe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra alɔ e a rabaxi ki naxɛ.
46010007	Wo naxa kuyee batu, alɔ ndee a raba ki naxɛ e tagi. A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Ɲama naxa dɔxɔ e dɛgede, e naxa e min, e fa keli yɛnɛ rabade.»
46010008	Won naxa bira yɛnɛ fɔxɔ ra alɔ ndee a raba ki naxɛ e ya ma. Na kui, mixi wulu mɔxɔɲɛn mixi wulu saxan naxa sɔntɔ lɔxɔɛ keren kui.
46010009	Won naxa Marigi mato alɔ ndee a mato ki naxɛ e ya ma, bɔximasee naxee faxa.
46010010	Wo naxa wo mawa, alɔ ndee e mawa ki naxɛ e ya ma, sayamalekɛ fa e faxa.
46010011	Na fe mɔɔli e lixi nɛ, a xa findi misaali ra won tan mixie bɛ naxee na waxati dɔnxɔɛ. A birin sɛbɛxi na nan ma.
46010012	Na kui, naxan laxi a ra a tixi, a xa mɛɛni a yɛtɛ ma alako a naxa bira.
46010013	Maratantanyi yo mu wo lixi, adamadi mu nɔma naxan na. Ala na a xui xanbi ra. A mu a luma maratantanyi yo xa wo li, naxan nɔma wo ra. Maratantanyi na wo li, Ala fɛɛrɛ nde fima nɛ wo ma, alako wo xa nɔ minide a kui, wo xa nɔ a ra.
46010014	Na kui, n xanuntenyie, wo xa gbilen kuye batufe fɔxɔ ra.
46010015	N na wɔyɛnfe xaxilimae nan bɛ, wo xa wo tuli mati n ma masenyi ra.
46010016	Won Ala tantuma minse naxan ma, na minse mu a masenma xɛ won nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wuli na a ra? Won taami naxan itaxunma won bore ma, na taami mu a masenma xɛ won nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fate na a ra?
46010017	Taami keren nan a ra. Won fan, hali won wuya, won bara boni won bore ra, won bara findi mixi keren na, barima won birin taami keren nan donma.
46010018	Wo Isirayilakae yati mato. Naxee sɛrɛxɛ sube donma, e mu lama xɛ na wali ra naxan nabama sɛrɛxɛbade?
46010019	N wama munse masenfe na kui? Sɛrɛxɛ sube naxan fixi kuye ma a tide gbo? Xa na mu a ra na kuye tide gbo? Astɔfulahi.
46010020	N xa a fala wo bɛ, kuye batuie sɛrɛxɛ bama ɲinnɛe nan bɛ, e mu a bama Ala xa bɛ. N tan mu tinma wo nun ɲinnɛe xa lu fe keren.
46010021	Wo mu nɔma minse minde Marigi xili ra, wo man xa minse min ɲinnɛe xili fan na. Wo mu nɔma taami donde Marigi xili ra, wo man xa taami don ɲinnɛe xili ra.
46010022	Wo wama Marigi raxɔnɔfe nɛ, naxan mu wama a firin nde xɔn? Wo ɲɔxɔ a ma won sɛnbɛ dangi a gbe ra?
46010023	A birin daxa, kɔnɔ a birin mu fe fanyi raminima. A birin daxa, kɔnɔ a birin mu findima munafanyi ra.
46010024	Mixi naxa a yɛtɛ kan xa munafanyi gbansan xa fen, a xa a boore xa munafanyi fan fen.
46010025	Wo nɔma sube mɔɔli birin donde naxan matima makiiti. Hali wo mu gaaxu, na sese mu findixi yunubi ra,
46010026	barima «Alatala nan gbe na bɔxi nun a ise birin na.»
46010027	Xa danxaniyatare nde wo xili wo xa wo dɛge yire keren, xa wo wama sigafe, wo xa siga, wo xa donse mɔɔli birin don a naxan fima wo ma. Na sese mu findima yunubi ra.
46010028	Kɔnɔ xa a sa li mixi nde fa a fala wo bɛ, «Yi donse baxi sɛrɛxɛ nan na,» wo naxa na don na kanyi xa fe ra, barima yunubi nan a ra a bɛ a xaxili ki ma.
46010029	Yunubi fe mu a ra i tan bɛ i xaxili ki ma, kɔnɔ a mu lanma i naxan nabama i xa yɛtɛralu kui, i boore xa na maɲɔxun i bɛ yunubi ra.
46010030	A mu lanma mixi xa fe ɲaaxi maɲɔxun n ma donse xa fe ra, n Ala tantuma naxan ma fe ra.
46010031	Na nan na ki, wo naxan yo donma, wo naxan yo minma, wo naxan yo rabama, wo xa na birin naba alako Ala xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ.
46010032	Wo naxa mixi yo ratantan, Girɛki yo, Yuwifi yo, Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ yo.
46010033	N fan ɲɛrɛma na ki nɛ, alako n ma fe birin xa rafan mixi birin ma. N mu na n yɛtɛ xa munafanyi xa fenfe. N na mixi gbegbe xa munafanyi nan fenfe, alako e xa kisi.
46011001	Wo xa bira n ma misaali fɔxɔ ra, alɔ n fan biraxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa misaali fɔxɔ ra ki naxɛ.
46011002	N bara wo matɔxɔ barima wo ratuma n ma fe ma tɛmui birin, wo man n ma yaamarie rabatuma.
46011003	A xɔli n ma wo xa a kolon xɛmɛ birin na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yaamari nan bun ma, ginɛ birin na xɛmɛ xa yaamari nan bun ma, a nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan na Ala xa yaamari nan bun ma.
46011004	Xɛmɛ naxan birin salima, xa na mu a ra a wɔyɛnma Ala xili ra, a xunyi makotoxi, a bara a Marigi yelebu.
46011005	Ginɛ naxan birin salima, xa na mu a ra a wɔyɛnma Ala xili ra, a xunyi mu makotoxi, a bara a xa mangɛ yelebu. A luxi nɛ alɔ a xunyi bara bi.
46011006	Ginɛ naxan mu a xunyi makotoma, hali a xunyi bi. Ginɛ xunyi bife to findixi yaagi ra, xa na mu a ra a xunsɛxɛ maxabafe, a lanma nɛ a xa a xunyi makoto.
46011007	Xɛmɛ tan mu lanma a xa a xunyi makoto, barima a findixi Ala misaali nun a nɔrɛ nan na, kɔnɔ ginɛ tan findixi xɛmɛ xa nɔrɛ nan na.
46011008	Xɛmɛ xa mu minixi ginɛ i. Ginɛ nan minixi xɛmɛ i.
46011009	Xɛmɛ xa mu daaxi ginɛ xa fe ra. Ginɛ nan daaxi xɛmɛ xa fe ra.
46011010	Na nan a toxi ginɛ lanma a xa a xunyi makoto malekɛe xa fe ra. A xunyi makotofe findixi tɔnxuma nan na a a na xɛmɛ xa yaamari nan bun ma.
46011011	Kɔnɔ Marigi xa fe kui, ginɛ hayi na xɛmɛ ma, xɛmɛ fan hayi na ginɛ ma.
46011012	Ginɛ minixi xɛmɛ i ki naxɛ, xɛmɛ fan barima ginɛ nan saabui ra. Na birin kelixi Ala nan ma.
46011013	Wo xa na kiiti sa wo yɛtɛ ra. A daxa ginɛ xa sali a xunyi mu makotoxi?
46011014	Wo daa ki yɛtɛ yati a masenxi wo bɛ a xɛmɛ xunsɛxɛ na kuya a findixi yaagi nan na a bɛ,
46011015	kɔnɔ ginɛ tan xunsɛxɛ na kuya, na findixi a bɛ nɔrɛ nan na. Xunsɛxɛ kuye fixi ginɛ ma a xunyi makotose nan na.
46011016	Xa mixi nde wama na fe matandife, a xa a kolon muxu nun Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae birama na sɛriyɛ nan fɔxɔ ra.
46011017	Kɔnɔ fe nde na na wo naxan nabama wo xa malanyie kui, n mu nɔma naxan matɔxɔde. Na nde bama wo xa fe fanyi nan na, a findi fe ɲaaxi ra wo bɛ.
46011018	A fɔlɛ, n bara a mɛ a wo mu lanma wo bore ma wo wo malanma tɛmui naxɛ. N laxi a ra nɔndi nde na na kui.
46011019	Lantareya na mini wo tagi, na nɔma nɛ a masende nɔndi na naxee bɛ wo ya ma.
46011020	Wo na wo malan, wo naxan donma a mu findixi Marigi xa sɛrɛxɛ tɔnxuma xa ra,
46011021	barima ndee e dɛgema e booree xanbi. Donse nun minse luma ndee yi ra, kɔnɔ e booree tan luma kaamɛ ra.
46011022	Banxie mu na wo yi ra wo wo dɛgema a nun wo wo minma dɛnnaxɛ? Munfe ra wo yoma Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ma, wo fa setaree rayaagi? N xa munse fala wo bɛ? N xa wo matɔxɔ? N mu wo matɔxɔma na xa fe ra.
46011023	Marigi naxan masenxi n bɛ, n bara na dɛntɛgɛ wo bɛ. E Marigi Isa yanfa kɔɛ naxan na, a naxa taami tongo,
46011024	a naxa tantui rasiga Ala ma, a fa taami igira, a a so a fɔxirabirɛe yi ra a falafe ra, «Wo n ko, wo a don. Yi findixi n fate nan na, naxan fixi wo bɛ. Wo xa ratu n ma yi saabui ra.»
46011025	E to gɛ e dɛgede, Isa man naxa tɔnbili tongo, a a fala, «N wuli nan ya, saatɛ wuli naxan baxi mixi gbegbe bɛ. Wo na a min tɛmui yo tɛmui, wo xa ratu n ma yi saabui ra.
46011026	Tɛmui yo tɛmui, wo nɛ na taami donma, wo nɛ na minse minma, wo luma Marigi xa faxɛ nan masen na han a gbilen waxati.»
46011027	Na na a ra, mixi yo naxan na taami don, a na minse min binyɛtareɲa kui, a bara yunubi sɔtɔ Marigi fate nun a wuli ra.
46011028	Beenun mixi xa na taami don, beenun mixi xa na minse min, a lanma a xa a yɛtɛ mato,
46011029	barima naxan na taami don, a na minse min, a mu a kolon Marigi fate nan a ra, a bara kiiti ɲaaxi sɔtɔ.
46011030	Na nan a toxi furemae nun sɛnbɛtaree wuyaxi wo ya ma. Ndee ɲan bara bɛlɛ.
46011031	Xa won luma won yɛtɛ mato ra, won mu fama kiiti ɲaaxi sɔtɔde.
46011032	Marigi won makiitima nɛ, alako a xa won matinxin, won naxa kiiti ɲaaxi sɔtɔ alɔ duniɲa mixie.
46011033	N ngaxakerenyie, na kui, wo xa wo bore mamɛ, wo wo malanma tɛmui naxɛ Marigi xa sɛrɛxɛ tɔnxuma donde.
46011034	Xa kaamɛ na mixi ma, a xa a dɛge a xɔnyi, alako a naxa findi kiiti ɲaaxi ra wo xa malanyi kui. N na fa, n fama na fe gbɛtɛe yailande naxee kanaxi wo tagi.
46012001	N ngaxakerenyie, a xɔli n ma wo xa fahaamui sɔtɔ fee ra Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi wo kima naxee ra.
46012002	Wo to nu na kaafiriɲa kui, fe nde naxa a niya wo xa bira kuye dunduxie fɔxɔ ra.
46012003	Na na a ra, n xa a fala wo bɛ, mixi naxan wɔyɛnma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, a mu nɔma a falade, «Isa dankaxi.» Mixi yo fan mu nɔma a falade, «Isa findixi Marigi nan na,» xa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui xa mu a ra.
46012004	Ala xa ki dɔxɔɛ wuya, kɔnɔ a birin fatanxi Ala Xaxili keren nan na.
46012005	Ala xa wali dɔxɔɛ wuya, kɔnɔ a birin fatanxi Marigi keren nan na.
46012006	Ala xa fe rabaxi dɔxɔɛ wuya, kɔnɔ a birin fatanxi Ala keren nan na. Ala keren nan a ragirima wo xa nɔ na fee rabade.
46012007	Ala Xaxili a yɛtɛ masenma kankan bɛ ɲama xa munafanyi xa fe ra.
46012008	Ala Xaxili ndee kima xaxilimaya masenyi ra, a ndee kima fe kolonyi masenyi ra,
46012009	a ndee kima sɛnbɛ ra naxan fatanxi danxaniya ra, a ndee kima sɛnbɛ ra naxan a niyama e xa nɔ mixi rayalande,
46012010	a ndee kima sɛnbɛ ra naxan findima kaabanakoe rabafe ra, a ndee kima masenyi ra e xa wɔyɛn Ala xili ra, a ndee kima kolonyi ra alako e xa fata Ala xa fe nun Sentanɛ xa fe tagi rasade, a ndee kima sɛnbɛ ra e xa nɔ xui gbɛtɛe falade, a ndee kima na xuie madangife ra.
46012011	Ala Xaxili keren nan na wali mɔɔli birin nabama. A kankan kima alɔ a a ɲanigexi ki naxɛ.
46012012	Mixi salonsee wuya, kɔnɔ e findixi fate gundi keren nan na. E birin nadɔxɔxi e bore ra, e findi keren na. Won nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na na ki nɛ.
46012013	Won tan danxaniyatɔɛ birin bara Ala Xaxili kerenyi sɔtɔ. Won birin bara findi fate keren na. Yuwifi yo, Girɛki yo, konyi yo, lasiri yo, won birin baloma Xaxili keren nan saabui ra.
46012014	Fate mu findixi salonse keren gbansan xa ra, e wuya.
46012015	Xa a sa li i sanyi a fala, «N mu na i fate ma, barima n mu findixi bɛlɛxɛ ra,» na mu a niyama a xa ba i fate ma.
46012016	Xa a sa li i tuli a fala, «N mu na i fate ma, barima n mu findixi ya ra,» na mu a niyama a xa ba i fate ma.
46012017	Xa fate birin sa findixi ya nan na, mixi fe mɛma di? Xa fate birin sa findixi tuli nan na, mixi se xiri mɛma di?
46012018	Ala bara salonse birin dɔxɔ mixi fate ma, alɔ a wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
46012019	Xa na birin findi salonse keren na, fate fa findima a ra di?
46012020	Salonsee wuya, kɔnɔ fate gundi keren na a ra.
46012021	I ya mu nɔma a falade i bɛlɛxɛ bɛ, «N hayi mu na i ma.» I xunyi mu nɔma a falade i sanyi bɛ, «N hayi mu na i ma.»
46012022	Na mu nɔma rabade feo! Hali fate salonse naxee sɛnbɛ mu gbo, fate hayi na e ma.
46012023	Won won fate salonse naxee maɲɔxunxi a e tide xurun, won mɛɛnixi nee ma dangi booree ra. Won won fate salonse naxee suturaxi, won mɛɛnixi nee ma dangi booree ra.
46012024	Salonse naxee mu suturaxi, e hayi mu na a ma mixi xa mɛnni e ma a gbe ra. Ala naxa mixi fate yailan alako salonse naxee maɲɔxunxi a e tide xurun, e tide xa dangi booree ra.
46012025	A mu wama won xa fate salonse nde rafisa a boore bɛ. A wama nɛ won xa mɛɛni e birin ma.
46012026	Xa a sa li salonse keren tɔɔrɔ, salonse booree fan tɔɔrɔma nɛ. Xa a sa li salonse keren bara tide sɔtɔ, salonse birin sɛɛwama nɛ na kui.
46012027	Wo findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fate nan na. Wo birin bara findi salonsee ra na fate kerenyi ma. Kankan xa wali na na.
46012028	A fɔlɛ, Ala bara ndee ti Isa xa xɛɛrae ra danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ya ma. Na dangi xanbi, a bara ndee ti namiɲɔnmɛe ra. A saxan nde, a bara ndee ti karamɔxɔe ra. A man bara a niya ndee xa nɔ kaabanako rabade, ndee xa nɔ mixi rayalande, ndee xa nɔ e booree malide ki gbɛtɛ. A bara ndee ti yareratie ra, a bara ndee ki alako e xa nɔ xui gbɛtɛe falade.
46012029	Nee birin findixi xɛɛrae nan na? Nee birin findixi namiɲɔnmɛe nan na? Nee birin findixi karamɔxɔe nan na? Nee birin nɔma kaabanako rabade?
46012030	Nee birin fata mixi rayalande? Nee birin nɔma xui gbɛtɛe falade? Nee birin nɔma na xuie madangide e booree bɛ?
46012031	Wo xa fe birin naba alako Ala xa wo ki fee ra naxee dangi fe birin na. Yakɔsi n xa kira fisamante masen wo bɛ.
46013001	Hali n nɔma adamae nun malekɛe xui falade, xa xanunteya mu na n bɔɲɛ kui, n xui luma nɛ alɔ paani nun tɔlɔnyi bɔnbɔ xui.
46013002	Hali n masenyi ti Ala xili ra, n gundo birin kolon, n man fe tilinxi birin fahaamu, xa xanunteya mu na n bɔɲɛ kui, mixi fufafu nan n na. Hali n ma danxaniya gbo han n fa nɔ geya tongode a tide, xa xanunteya mu na n bɔɲɛ kui, n tide yo mu na.
46013003	Hali n nan n harige birin itaxun setaree balofe ra, hali n faxa tɛ xɔɔra Ala xa fe ra, xa xanunteya mu na n bɔɲɛ kui, na mu findima geeni yo ra n bɛ.
46013004	Xanunteya a niyama nɛ mixi xa findi mixi diɲɛxi ra, a findi mixi malima ra. A mu milama, a mu a yɛtɛ matɔxɔma, a mu a yɛtɛ igboma,
46013005	a mu xurutareɲa rabama, a mu a yɛtɛ xa geeni fenma, a mu xɔnɔma. Gbɛsɛnxɔnnɛya mu luma a bɔɲɛ kui,
46013006	a mu ɲɛlɛxinma wule ra, a ɲɛlɛxinma nɔndi nan na.
46013007	Xanunteya na naxan bɛ, a diɲɛma fe birin ma, a mu tɛgɛ fefe, a a xaxili tima fe fanyi ra tɛmui birin, a tunnabɛxi fe birin ma.
46013008	Xanunteya mu ɲɔnma abadan. Wɔyɛnfe Ala xili ra a ɲɔnma nɛ, xui gbɛtɛe falafe danma nɛ, kolonyi fan ɲɔnma nɛ.
46013009	Won mu fe birin kolon, won mu gɛma namiɲɔnmɛ masenyi birin falade,
46013010	kɔnɔ fe kamalixi na a li, fe kamalitare ɲɔnma nɛ.
46013011	N dimɛdi tɛmui, n ma wɔyɛnyi yo, n ma maɲɔxunyi yo, n xaxili yo, a birin nu findixi dimɛdiɲa nan na. Kɔnɔ n to mɔ, n bara dimɛdi fee lu na.
46013012	To won mu fee igbɛma a fanyi ra. A luxi alɔ won na won yɛtɛ matofe kike ma naxan mu igbɛma a fanyi ra. Kɔnɔ waxati na fafe, won fee igbɛma nɛ a fanyi ra, a luma nɛ alɔ won nun na fee na ti yire keren. To n mu fe birin kolon, kɔnɔ waxati na fafe, n ma fahaamui fama kamalide, n fa fe kolon alɔ Ala n kolonxi ki naxɛ.
46013013	Fe saxan nan buma: danxaniya, xaxili tide, nun xanunteya. Kɔnɔ xanunteya nan dangi nee birin na.
46014001	Xanunteya xa lu wo bɔɲɛ kui. Wo kata wo xa Ala xa kie sɔtɔ a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra. Wɔyɛnfe Ala xili ra, wo xa na nan singe fen.
46014002	Mixi naxan xui gbɛtɛe falama, a mu wɔyɛnfe adama xa bɛ, a wɔyɛnma Ala nan bɛ, barima adamadi mu na xui mɔɔli mɛma. Na xui naxan findima gundo ra, Ala Xaxili na nan falama.
46014003	Mixi naxan wɔyɛnma Ala xili ra, a tan fe nan falama adamadie bɛ naxan nɔma e xa danxaniya rasabatide, a e ralimaniya, a sunnunyi ba e ma.
46014004	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan wɔyɛnma xui gbɛtɛe ra, a a yɛtɛ gbansan nan malima. Naxan wɔyɛnma Ala xili ra, a danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama nan malima.
46014005	A xɔli n ma wo birin xa xui gbɛtɛe fala, kɔnɔ n wama naxan xɔn dangife na ra, wo xa nɔ wɔyɛnde Ala xili ra. Na nan tide gbo dangife xui gbɛtɛe falafe ra, fo na xui gbɛtɛe xa madangi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama bɛ, alako e xa danxaniya xa sabati.
46014006	Yakɔsi, n ngaxakerenyie, xa a sa li n naxa fa wo yire n xui gbɛtɛe falafe ra wo mu naxee mɛma, na wo malima di? Kɔnɔ xa n fa laamatunyi, kolonyi, Ala xa masenyi, nun xaranyi masende wo bɛ, na nan findima munafanyi ra wo bɛ.
46014007	Hali xule nun kɔra, se naxee mu ɲɛngima, xa e sigi sa xui mu fiixɛ, mixi mu nɔma a kolonde.
46014008	Xa sara xui mu fiixɛ, sɔɔri gali mu nɔma a kolonde gere waxati bara a li.
46014009	Wo tan fan, xa wo xui fala mixie mu naxan kolon, e fa fahaamui sɔtɔma na ma di? Wo wɔyɛnma fufafu.
46014010	Xui wuyaxi nan na duniɲa, kɔnɔ e birin masenyi nde nan tima.
46014011	Xa mixi wɔyɛn n bɛ xui nde ra n mu naxan kolon, muxu birin bara findi xɔɲɛ ra muxu bore bɛ.
46014012	Na kui, wo tan naxee wama Ala xa wo ki, wo xa kata a xa wo ki ki ra naxan danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama rasabatima.
46014013	Naxan xui gbɛtɛe falama, a xa Ala maxandi alako a man xa fata na xui madangide a booree bɛ.
46014014	Xa n salima xui gbɛtɛe ra, n bɔɲɛ salima, kɔnɔ n salima fahaamutareɲa nan kui.
46014015	A lanma n xa munse raba? A lanma n xa sali n bɔɲɛ ra, n man xa sali fahaamui ra. N xa bɛɛti ba n bɔɲɛ ra, n man xa bɛɛti ba fahaamui ra.
46014016	Xa na mu a ra, i na Ala tantu i bɔɲɛ ra, mixi naxan dɔxɔxi i sɛɛti ma, a mu nɔma «Amina» ratinde, barima a mu i xa xui fahaamuma.
46014017	I tantui fanyi rasigama Ala nan ma, kɔnɔ boore xa danxaniya mu nɔma sabatide na saabui ra.
46014018	N bara Ala tantu, barima n xui gbɛtɛe falama dangife wo birin na,
46014019	kɔnɔ mixi wɔyɛn suuli naxan fahaamuma, e tide gbo xaranyi ki ma dangife wɔyɛn wulu ra, naxee falaxi xui gbɛtɛe danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama mu naxee kolon.
46014020	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa wali alɔ dimɛdie, wo xa wali nɛ alɔ kuntigie. Fe ɲaaxi ma, wo xa lu alɔ diyɔrɛ gbeeli. Kɔnɔ xaxili ma, wo xa lu alɔ mixi mɔxi.
46014021	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Marigi naxa a masen, ‹N fama wɔyɛnde yi ɲama bɛ xui gbɛtɛ ra naxan fatanxi xɔɲɛe ra, kɔnɔ hali n wɔyɛn na ki, e mu n xui suxuma.› »
46014022	Na nan a toxi, xui gbɛtɛe falafe findixi tɔnxuma ra danxaniyataree nan bɛ, danxaniyatɔɛe xa mu a ra. Kɔnɔ wɔyɛnfe Ala xili ra, na nan findixi tɔnxuma ra danxaniyatɔɛe bɛ, danxaniyataree xa mu a ra.
46014023	Xa a sa li danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama birin na yire keren xui gbɛtɛe falafe ra, danxaniyatare ndee na so, xa na mu a ra mixi gbɛtɛ naxee wama wo xa fe ramɛfe, e mu a falama xɛ a wo bara daxu?
46014024	Kɔnɔ xa wo birin na wɔyɛnfe Ala xili ra, danxaniyatare nde na so, xa na mu a ra mixi gbɛtɛ naxan wama wo xa fe ramɛfe, a a yɛtɛ kolonma nɛ yunubitɔɛ ra, a wo xa masenyi kolon nɔndi ra,
46014025	a gundo birin makɛnɛn. Na kui, a a yɛtɛ igoro bɔxi, a Ala batu, a a fala, «Ala yati na wo ya ma.»
46014026	N ngaxakerenyie, a lanma won xa munse raba? Wo na wo malan, ndee xa bɛɛti ba, ndee xa mixie xaran, ndee xa laamatunyi masen, ndee xa wɔyɛn xui gbɛtɛ ra, ndee xa na xui gbɛtɛ madangi. Na birin xa raba alako danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa sabati.
46014027	Xa mixie xui gbɛtɛe falama, e naxa dangi mixi firin na, xa na mu a ra mixi saxan. Kankan xa wɔyɛn a wɔyɛn tɛmui, kankan xa mixi sɔtɔ naxan na xui madangima booree bɛ.
46014028	Xa mixi mu na naxan na xui madangima, na kanyi xa a sabari malanyi kui, a xa wɔyɛnyi xa lu a tan nun Ala gbansan tagi.
46014029	Xa mixie wɔyɛnma Ala xili ra, e fan naxa dangi mixi firin na, xa na mu a ra mixi saxan. Booree xa na masenyie mato a fanyi ra.
46014030	Xa Ala masenyi fi mixi nde ma a xili ra, boore na wɔyɛnfe tɛmui naxɛ, naxan na wɔyɛnfe a lanma a xa dundu sinden.
46014031	Kankan nɔma wɔyɛnde Ala xili ra a xa waxati, alako birin xa xaranyi nun limaniya sɔtɔ.
46014032	Namiɲɔnmɛ tan, a masenyi tima a ɲanige nan na.
46014033	Ala mu wama xurutareɲa xɔn, a wama nɛ fe birin xa raba a raba ki ma bɔɲɛsa kui. Sɛniyɛntɔɛ ɲama birin bara lan a ma,
46014034	a ginɛe xa e sabari malanyie kui. E mu lan e xa wɔyɛn, e xa lu magore kui alɔ Ala xa sɛriyɛ a masenxi ki naxɛ.
46014035	Xa e wama maxɔrinyi tife, e xa e xa mɔri maxɔrin banxi, barima a mu daxa ginɛ xa wɔyɛn malanyi kui.
46014036	Ala xa masenyi fatanxi wo tan nan na? A masenxi wo tan nan gbansan bɛ?
46014037	Xa mixi nde a maɲɔxun a namiɲɔnmɛ na a ra, xa mixi nde a maɲɔxun a Ala bara a ki, a xa n ma sɛbɛli kolon Marigi xa yaamari ra.
46014038	Xa a mu na kolon nɔndi ra, Ala fan mu na kanyi kolonma a xa mixi ra.
46014039	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, wɔyɛnfe Ala xili ra a xa rafan wo ma. Wo naxa tɔnyi dɔxɔ xui gbɛtɛe falafe ra,
46014040	kɔnɔ wo xa na raba a raba ki ma sɛriyɛ ra.
46015001	N ngaxakerenyie, n bara wo ratu Ala xa xibaaru fanyi ra, n naxan masenxi wo bɛ, wo danxaniyaxi naxan ma, wo biraxi naxan fɔxɔ ra.
46015002	Xa wo lu na fɔxɔ ra alɔ n a masenxi wo bɛ ki naxɛ, wo fama nɛ kiside na saabui ra. Xa wo mu lu na fɔxɔ ra, wo xa danxaniya bara findi fe fufafu ra wo bɛ.
46015003	N nu bara masenyi hagigɛ ti wo bɛ, n naxan sɔtɔ. A tan nan ya. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi naxa faxa won ma yunubie xafari fe ra, alɔ a nu sɛbɛxi ki naxɛ.
46015004	A naxa ragata gaburi kui, a man naxa keli faxɛ ma a xi saxan nde, alɔ a nu sɛbɛxi ki naxɛ.
46015005	A naxa mini Kefasi nun Isa xa xɛɛra fu nun firinyie ma.
46015006	Na dangi xanbi, a naxa mini danxaniyatɔɛ kɛmɛ suuli ma tɛmui keren. Han ya na danxaniyatɔɛ gbegbe baloxi, kɔnɔ ndee bara laaxira.
46015007	Na dangi xanbi, a naxa mini Yaki ma, a man naxa mini a xa xɛɛra birin ma.
46015008	A dɔnxɔɛ ra, a naxa mini n fan ma. N mu nu findixi a xa xɛɛra ra, a booree sugandixi tɛmui naxɛ.
46015009	N tide mu nu gbo alɔ xɛɛra booree. Xɛɛra xili mu lanma a xa fala n xun, barima n nu bara Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ɲaxankata.
46015010	Kɔnɔ n bara findi Isa xa xɛɛra ra Ala xa hinnɛ saabui ra. Na hinnɛ mu findixi fe fufafu ra n bɛ. N bara wali dangife xɛɛra birin na, kɔnɔ n tan mu a ra. Ala xa hinnɛ nan walixi n bɛ n ma duniɲɛigiri kui.
46015011	Xa n tan nan na kawandi tixi ba, xa e tan nan na kawandi tixi ba, na nan kawandixi wo bɛ. Wo bara gɛ danxaniyade na nan ma.
46015012	Xa kawandi sa tife a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara keli faxɛ ma, munfe ra ndee a falama wo ya ma a mixi mu kelima faxɛ ma?
46015013	Xa mixi mu kelima faxɛ ma nu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan mu kelixi faxɛ ma.
46015014	Xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu kelixi faxɛ ma nu, muxu xa kawandi nun wo xa danxaniya findixi fe fufafu nan na.
46015015	Na kui, muxu bara findi seede wule falɛe ra Ala bɛ, barima muxu bara seedeɲɔxɔya raba a Ala bara a xa Mixi Sugandixi rakeli faxɛ ma. Kɔnɔ xa nɔndi na a ra mixie mu kelima faxɛ ma nu, Ala fan mu a rakelima nu.
46015016	Xa mixie mu kelima faxɛ ma nu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan mu kelixi faxɛ ma.
46015017	Xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu kelixi faxɛ ma nu, wo xa danxaniya findixi fe fufafu nan na, wo xa yunubie man na wo ma,
46015018	a nun Isa xa danxaniyatɔɛ laaxiraxie fan bara lɔɛ.
46015019	Xa won won xaxili tima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra yi duniɲɛigiri gbansan nan ma fe ra, a lima nu won ma fe bara makinikini dangi adamadi birin na.
46015020	Kɔnɔ n xa a fala wo bɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan kelixi faxɛ ma. A bara findi mixi singe ra naxan kelixi faxamixie ya ma.
46015021	Faxɛ to so duniɲa adama saabui ra, marakeli fan soxi adama nde nan saabui ra.
46015022	Mixi birin faxama Benba Adama nan xa fe ra. Mixi birin man kelima faxɛ ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan ma fe saabui ra.
46015023	Kɔnɔ kankan kelima a waxati nɛ. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi singe nan keli. A na fa tɛmui naxɛ, a xa mixie fan kelima nɛ.
46015024	A na mangɛya ragbilen Baba Ala ma, a na gɛ nɔde mangɛya nun sɛnbɛ birin na, duniɲa ɲɔnma nɛ na waxati.
46015025	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa ti mangɛ ra, han Ala xa a sanyi ti a yaxui birin ma.
46015026	A yaxui dɔnxɔɛ a naxan ibutuxunma, na findixi faxɛ nan na.
46015027	Ala nan na birin saxi a xa yaamari bun ma. A to a fala a birin saxi a xa yaamari bun ma, a kolonxi a Ala naxan birin saxi a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yaamari bun ma, Ala tan mu na na yaamari bun ma.
46015028	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na na birin nagbilen Ala ma, a tan fan fama lude Ala xa yaamari nan bun ma, naxan singe nu bara yaamari so a yi ra. Ala fama yaamari rabade na tɛmui fe birin xun ma.
46015029	Xa marakeli mu na nu, munfe ra ndee fa e xunxama ye xɔɔra faxamixie bɛ? Xa faxamixie mu kelima faxɛ ma nu, munfe ra ndee e xunxama ye xɔɔra e bɛ?
46015030	Munfe ra muxu tan bara tin lude fe xɔrɔxɔɛ kui tɛmui birin?
46015031	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa a fala wo bɛ a nɔndi ki ma, lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ n na faxɛ nan dɛ ma. N a falama wo tan bɛ, n sɛɛwaxi wo tan naxee xa fe ra, barima wo danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan ma, naxan findixi won Marigi ra.
46015032	Munafanyi mundun na n bɛ adama ki ma, xa n bara sube xaaɲɛxie gere Efɛsɛ? Xa faxamixie mu kelima faxɛ ma nu, «won xa won dɛge, won xa won min, barima tina won faxama nɛ.»
46015033	Wo naxa tantan. Ɲɛrɛboore kobie nan yuge fanyi masarama.
46015034	Wo xa sɔɔbɛ suxu, wo xa yunubi lu na. Ndee wo ya ma e mu Ala kolon. N xa a fala wo bɛ, na bara findi yaagi ra wo bɛ.
46015035	Nde nɔma a yɛtɛ maxɔrinde, a naxɛ, «Mixi faxaxie kelima di? Fate mɔɔli mundun luma e ma?»
46015036	Xaxilitaree, wo mu a kolon sansi xɔri mu nɔma findide sansi ra, fo a faxa sinden?
46015037	Sansi xɔri naxan sima bɔxi, a nun a soli naxan tema, e keren mu a ra. Sansi xɔri tan, a xɔri gbansan na a ra, tɛmunde maale xɛɛta, xa na mu a ra sansi xɔri gbɛtɛ.
46015038	Ala sansi xɔri birin findima sansi ra alɔ a wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ. Sansi xɔri mɔɔli birin a soli nan naminima.
46015039	Nimase fate birin mu luma ki keren. Mixi fate na ki keren. Sube fate na ki gbɛtɛ. Xɔni fate nun yɛxɛ fate fan na e xati ma.
46015040	Se naxee na bɔxi ma, a nun se gbɛtɛ naxee na koore ma, e tagi rasa. E birin daaxi e gbe ki nɛ.
46015041	Soge yanbama ki naxɛ, a nun kike yanbama ki naxɛ, a nun tunbuie yanbama ki naxɛ, e birin keren mu a ra. Hali tunbuie na a ra e mu yanbama ki keren.
46015042	Faxamixi rakelixie luma na ki nɛ. Mixi na duniɲa tɛmui naxɛ, a fate nɔma kanade, kɔnɔ a na keli faxɛ ma, a fate mu nɔma kanade sɔnɔn.
46015043	Mixi ragataxi gaburi kui tɛmui naxɛ, a bɔrɔma nɛ, a sɛnbɛ ɲɔn, kɔnɔ a kelima faxɛ ma sɛnbɛ nun nɔrɛ nan na.
46015044	Mixi na ragata a fate na duniɲa ki nan ma, kɔnɔ a kelima a laaxira ki nan ma. Duniɲa fate na na, laaxira fate fan na.
46015045	Na nan a toxi a sɛbɛxi, «Adama singe findixi nimase nan na.» Adama dɔnxɔɛ findixi xaxili nan na naxan mixi rakisima.
46015046	Adama singe findixi duniɲa mixi nan na, koore ma daaxi mu a ra. Koore ma daaxi nan fama duniɲa ma daaxi xanbi ra.
46015047	Adama singe fatanxi duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi nan na. Adama firin nde fatanxi koore nan na.
46015048	Adamadie maniyaxi won benba Adama nan na, naxan daaxi bɛndɛ ra. Mixi naxee tema koore, e masarama nɛ, e fa lu alɔ na Adama naxan kelixi koore.
46015049	Won to maniya won benba Adama ra duniɲa, won man fama maniyade na Adama nan na naxan kelixi koore ma.
46015050	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa a fala wo bɛ, duniɲa fate mu nɔma Ala xa ariyanna sɔtɔde kɛ ra. Nimasee fate mu nɔma ariyanna sɔtɔde kɛ ra. E fate bɔrɔma nɛ, kɔnɔ fate bɔrɔxi mu nɔma sode ariyanna.
46015051	N xa gundo fala wo bɛ. Won birin mu faxama, kɔnɔ won birin masarama nɛ
46015052	mafuren mafuren sara dɔnxɔɛ xui ma. Na sara na fe, faxamixie kelima nɛ faxɛ ma fate nɛɛnɛe ra e ma naxee mu bɔrɔma sɔnɔn. Won fama nɛ masarade.
46015053	Naxan lan a xa bɔrɔ, na mu bɔrɔma sɔnɔn. Naxan lan a xa faxa, na mu faxama sɔnɔn.
46015054	Fate bɔrɔxi na findi fate bɔrɔtare ra, fate faxaxi na findi fate faxatare ra, yi sɛbɛli fama kamalide na tɛmui nɛ: «Wo bara xunnakeli sɔtɔ faxɛ ma.
46015055	Faxɛ xa xunnakeli na minden? Faxɛ xa tɔɔrɛ na minden?»
46015056	Yunubi findixi tɔɔrɛ nan na naxan bara mixi faxa. Yaamari findixi yunubi xa sɛnbɛ nan na.
46015057	Ala tantu, naxan bara won xun nakeli won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
46015058	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, wo xa danxaniya xa sabati. Wo naxa a lu limaniya xa ba wo yi ra. Wo xa wakili Marigi bɛ tɛmui birin, barima wo a kolon a wo naxan nabama a bɛ fe fufafu xa mu a ra.
46016001	Wo xa kɔbiri malan sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɛ, alɔ n Galati bɔxi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae yamarixi ki naxɛ.
46016002	Kankan xa kɔbiri nde sa a xati ma a harige bɛrɛ ra sande lɔxɔɛ birin, alako kɔbiri xa gɛ malande beenun n fa tɛmui.
46016003	N na fa, n bataaxɛ soma mixie yi ra wo naxee sugandima kɔbiri xaninfe ra Darisalamu.
46016004	Xa a lanma n fan xa siga, muxu birin na a ra.
46016005	N na dangi Masedon bɔxi ra, alɔ n wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ, n fama nɛ wo yire.
46016006	Tɛmunde n saxanyi raba wo xɔnyi, xa na mu a ra n ɲɛmɛ radangi naa, alako wo xa nɔ n malide n ma biyaasi kui.
46016007	Xa Ala tin, n mu findima dangimixi tun na. A xɔli n ma n xa lu wo yire dondoronti.
46016008	Kɔnɔ n xa lu be Efɛsɛ han Xɛ Xabɛ Sali xa ba a ra,
46016009	barima n ma wali na sɔɔnɛyafe, hali n yaxuie to wuyaxi n bɛ.
46016010	Xa Timote fa wo yire, wo a rasɛnɛ alako a naxa fa gaaxu wo ya ra, barima a walima Marigi nan bɛ alɔ n tan.
46016011	Mixi yo naxa yo a ma. Wo xa a mali a xa biyaasi kui alako a xa n li bɔɲɛsa kui. N tan nun n ngaxakerenyie na a mamɛfe.
46016012	Wo xa a kolon n bara won ngaxakerenyi Apolosi karaxan a xa siga wo yire a nun danxaniyatɔɛ ndee. A singe a mu nu tinxi, kɔnɔ yakɔsi a bara natɛ tongo a xa siga a na fɛɛrɛ sɔtɔ tɛmui naxɛ.
46016013	Wo xa wo yɛtɛ mato, wo xa wo xa danxaniya rasabati, wo xa limaniya, wo xa wo sɛnbɛ so.
46016014	Wo xa fe birin naba xanunteya ra.
46016015	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa marasi nde sa na xun ma. Wo a kolon a Sitefana xa denbaya nan singe danxaniya Akayi bɔxi ma. E bara wali sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɛ ki fanyi ra.
46016016	Wo xa lu na mixi mɔɔli xa yaamari bun ma, a nun mixi naxan birin Ala xa wali rabama.
46016017	N bara ɲɛlɛxin Sitefana, Forotunatu, nun Axayikusu fafe ra, barima e bara n mali wo xanbi.
46016018	E bara limaniya fi won birin ma. Wo xa na kolon e bɛ.
46016019	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama naxee na Asi bɔxi ma e bara wo xɛɛbu. Akila, Pirisila, nun danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama naxan e malanma e xɔnyi, e fan bara wo xɛɛbu Marigi xili ra.
46016020	Ngaxakerenyi naxee na be, e birin wo xɛɛbu. Wo xa wo bore xɛɛbu danxaniyatɔɛe xa xanunteya kui.
46016021	N tan Pɔlu bara yi xɛɛbui sɛbɛ n yɛtɛ bɛlɛxɛ ra.
46016022	Ɲaxankatɛ xa lu mixi bɛ naxan mu Marigi xanuma. Won Marigi xa fa.
46016023	Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ wo ra.
46016024	N bara wo xanu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xili ra. Amina.
47001001	N tan Pɔlu, Ala bara tin naxan xa findi a xa xɛɛra ra, n nun n ngaxakerenyi Timote, muxu bara wo xɛɛbu, wo tan Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ naxee na Korinti, a nun sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin naxee na Akayi.
47001002	Won Baba Ala nun won Marigi, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa, e xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
47001003	Tantui na Ala bɛ, naxan findixi won Marigi Isa Baba ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi. Baba kinikininte na a ra, naxan mixie ralimaniyama e xa fe birin kui.
47001004	Ala won nalimaniyama won ma tɔɔrɛ kui, alako won fan xa nɔ tɔɔrɔmixi gbɛtɛe ralimaniyade na ki.
47001005	Won ma tɔɔrɛ xun masama Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra ki naxɛ, won ma limaniya fan xun masama a saabui ra na ki nɛ.
47001006	Muxu na tɔɔrɔfe alako wo tan xa limaniya nun kisi sɔtɔ. Muxu xa limaniya a niyama nɛ wo fan xa limaniya sɔtɔ alako wo fan xa nɔ wo xa tɔɔrɛ ra. Won birin na tɔɔrɔfe ki keren.
47001007	Muxu a kolon a fanyi ra wo xa danxaniya sɔɔnɛyama nɛ, barima wo limaniya sɔtɔma wo xa tɔɔrɛ nan kui.
47001008	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu wama wo xa a kolon muxu ɲaxankatɛ naxan sɔtɔ Asi. A nu gbo dangi muxu sɛnbɛ ra, muxu fa a maɲɔxun muxu na faxafe nɛ.
47001009	Na maɲɔxunyi bara lu muxu xunyi alako muxu naxa muxu xaxili ti muxu yɛtɛ ra, muxu xa muxu xaxili ti Ala nan na naxan faxamixie rakelima.
47001010	A tan nan gbansan muxu ratangaxi na faxɛ ɲaaxi ma. A man fama na rabade muxu bɛ. Muxu bara la a ra a man fama nɛ muxu ratangade.
47001011	Wo fan nɔma muxu malide na kui wo xa Ala maxandi ra. Mixi gbegbe na Ala maxandi muxu bɛ, mixi gbegbe fama nɛ Ala tantude a xa hinnɛ xa fe ra a naxan fima muxu ma.
47001012	Muxu sɛɛwaxi yi nan ma. Muxu a kolon muxu bɔɲɛ kui a muxu bara ɲɛrɛ duniɲa kui wo ya ma sɛniyɛnyi nun bɔɲɛ fiixɛ kui, naxan fatanxi Ala ra. Muxu ɲɛrɛxi na ki nɛ wo ya ma dangife yire birin na. Na ɲɛrɛ mɔɔli mu kelixi adamadi xa lɔnni xa ma. A kelixi Ala xa hinnɛ nan ma.
47001013	Muxu mu sese sɛbɛ wo ma wo mu nɔma naxan tode nun a kolonde a fiixɛ ra. A xɔli n ma wo xa fahaamui xa kamali na xa fe ra.
47001014	Wo ɲan bara nde kolon, kɔnɔ wo xa fahaamui fama nɛ kamalide a kolonfe ra a won birin binyɛ sɔtɔma nɛ won Marigi Isa fa tɛmui won bore xa fe ra.
47001015	N to na kolon, n naxa wa sigafe wo yire alako wo man xa hinnɛ sɔtɔ.
47001016	N naxa wa dangife wo yire n sigama Masedon tɛmui naxɛ, n man xa dangi wo yire n kelima Masedon tɛmui naxɛ. Na ki wo nɔma n malide n ma biyaasi kui sigafe ra Yudaya.
47001017	Wo ɲɔxɔ a ma natɛ tongoxi na a ra adamadi ki ma, naxan wɔyɛn firin falama?
47001018	N bara a fala wo bɛ Ala tinxinxi xili ra, n mu wule falama n ma masenyi kui.
47001019	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa, naxan findixi Ala xa Di ra, muxu naxan masenxi wo bɛ, a fan mu a yɛtɛ matandima. N tan, Silasi, nun Timote, muxu naxan kawandixi wo bɛ, na birin findixi nɔndi nan na.
47001020	Ala fama a xa laayidi birin nakamalide Isa saabui ra. Na nan a ra won «Amina» ratinma Isa xili ra Ala xa nɔrɛ xa fe ra.
47001021	Ala nan won birin ma danxaniya rasabatixi a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra. A bara won sugandi,
47001022	a fa a xa tɔnxuma sa won ma, naxan a masenxi a won findixi a gbe nan na. A bara a yɛtɛ Xaxili raso won bɔɲɛ i naxan a masenma a fama nɛ won kide ariyanna ra.
47001023	Ala na n seede ra. N mu gbilenxi Korinti, alako a naxa findi tɔɔrɛ ra wo bɛ.
47001024	Muxu mu wama danxaniyatɔɛe yamarife, kɔnɔ muxu wama kafufe nɛ wo ma alako wo xa sɛɛwa barima wo sabatixi danxaniya kui.
47002001	Na kui, n nu bara natɛ tongo a mu lanma n xa siga wo yire sunnunyi kui.
47002002	Xa n bara wo tan tɔɔrɔ, nde nɔma n nasɛɛwade sɔnɔn? N wo tan naxee rasunnunxi, wo tan nan fa nɔma na ra?
47002003	N nu bara na bataaxɛ sɛbɛ alako wo ɲɛrɛ ki, n naxan lima wo yi ra, a naxa findi sunnunyi ra n bɛ. A lanma wo xa findi sɛɛwɛ nan na n bɛ. N a kolon naxan na findi sɛɛwɛ ra n bɛ, a findima nɛ sɛɛwɛ ra wo fan bɛ.
47002004	N to na bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma, n bɔɲɛ nu n tɔɔrɔxi, n yaye nu minima. N mu na sɛbɛxi xɛ alako n xa wo tɔɔrɔ. N a sɛbɛxi nɛ alako wo xa a kolon n wo xanuxi nɛ yati.
47002005	N xa a fala wo bɛ, mixi naxan findixi yi tɔɔrɛ saabui ra, a mu n tan xa tɔɔrɔxi. A wo tan nan tɔɔrɔxi, xa na mu a ra a bara ndee tɔɔrɔ wo ya ma.
47002006	Mixi gbegbe wo ya ma e ɲan bara na kanyi ɲaxankata. Na bara wasakɛ.
47002007	Wo diɲɛ a ma, wo xa a ralimaniya, alako na tɔɔrɛ naxa gbo yɛ, a fa nɔ a ra.
47002008	Wo naxan nabama, wo xa xanunteya masen a bɛ.
47002009	N bara na bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma, alako n xa a kolon xa wo tinma n ma yaamari birin suxude.
47002010	Xa wo bara diɲɛ mixi nde ma, n fan bara diɲɛ na kanyi ma. Xa fe nde bara lu wo tagi, n bara diɲɛ na birin ma wo xa fe ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ya xɔri
47002011	alako Sentanɛ naxa nɔ won na. Won bara a wali ki kolon.
47002012	N to siga Tiroyasi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi kawandide, n naxa a to Marigi nu bara sɔɔnɛya raba n bɛ.
47002013	Kɔnɔ n bɔɲɛ mu nu saxi, barima n mu n ngaxakerenyi Tito lixi naa. Na nan a toxi n naxa ɲungu rabira e ma, n fa siga Masedon.
47002014	Tantui na Ala bɛ, naxan won xun nakelima a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra. Isa kolonfe fan alɔ labundɛ xiri fanyi. Ala won tan nan xɛɛxi alako yire birin xa rakolon na masenyi ra.
47002015	Won luxi nɛ alɔ labundɛ xiri fanyi Ala naxan nayensenma kisi mixie nun kisitaree tagi.
47002016	Won findixi mixi xiri ɲaaxi nan na kisitaree bɛ naxee na yahannama kira xɔn ma. Won findixi mixi xiri ɲɔxunmɛ nan na kisi mixie bɛ naxee na ariyanna kira xɔn ma. Kɔnɔ adamadi mundun nɔma na wali mɔɔli rabade?
