47002017	Muxu tan mu Ala xa masenyi masenma kɔbiri xa fe ra alɔ kawanditi ndee. Muxu kawandi tima bɔɲɛ fiixɛ nan na Ala ya xɔri naxan muxu xɛɛxi. Muxu na rabama Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan saabui ra.
47003001	A lanma muxu man xa muxu yɛtɛ xunmafala? Ade. Muxu hayi na bataaxɛe nan ma naxee muxu xunmafalama wo bɛ? Ade. Muxu hayi na wo xa bataaxɛe nan ma naxee muxu xunmafalama mixi gbɛtɛe bɛ? Ade.
47003002	Wo naxan nabama wo xa duniɲɛigiri kui a luxi nɛ alɔ bataaxɛ naxan muxu xunmafalama mixi birin bɛ. Na masenyi ragataxi muxu bɔɲɛ kui, alɔ masenyi sɛbɛxi bataaxɛ kui ki naxɛ alako mixi birin xa a kolon.
47003003	Wo tan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa bataaxɛ nan na. Muxu xa wali bara a niya na bataaxɛ xa sɛbɛ wo bɔɲɛ ma. A mu sɛbɛxi dubɛ xa ra, a sɛbɛxi Ala Xaxili nan na, naxan na na. A mu sɛbɛxi gɛmɛ walaxɛ xa ma, a sɛbɛxi wo bɔɲɛ nan ma.
47003004	Lanlanteya na muxu bɛ Ala ya i, a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
47003005	Won mu fata fefe ra won yɛtɛ sɛnbɛ ra. Won ma fatɛ fatanxi Ala nan na.
47003006	Ala nan a niyaxi won xa nɔ a xa saatɛ nɛɛnɛ kawandide. Na saatɛ mu fatanxi Ala xa yaamarie xa ra naxee sɛbɛxi. A fatanxi Ala Xaxili nan na, naxan mixi rakisima. Ala xa yaamari sɛbɛxie mu mixi rakisima.
47003007	Ala xa yaamarie to sɛbɛ gɛmɛ walaxɛe ma, Annabi Munsa yatagi naxa nɔrɔ han Isirayilakae mu nɔ e ya tide a ra. Hali na yaamarie to fa findixi faxɛ nan na mixie bɛ, e xa nɔrɛ nu gbo. Kɔnɔ nde nu luma ba ra na nɔrɛ ra.
47003008	Ala Xaxili naxan nabaxi, na wali nɔrɔma dangife na nɔrɛ singe ra naxan fatanxi na yaamari sɛbɛxie ra.
47003009	Na yaamarie sɛbɛxi gɛmɛ walaxɛe nan ma, naxee nu nɔrɔxi, kɔnɔ e findi faxɛ nan na mixie bɛ. Ala Xaxili naxan nabaxi, naxan a niyama mixie xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ, na nɔrɛ gbo na nɔrɛ singe bɛ.
47003010	Naxan singe nu nɔrɔxi, a xa nɔrɛ bara ɲɔn nɔrɛ fisamante sɛɛti ma.
47003011	Na fe singe nu nɔrɔxi, kɔnɔ a mu bu. Ala Xaxili naxan nabaxi, na buma nɛ abadan. Na nɔrɛ gbo na nɔrɛ singe bɛ pon!
47003012	Won to won xaxili tixi na ra, won bara limaniya sɔtɔ a fanyi ra.
47003013	Won mu luxi alɔ Annabi Munsa naxan a yatagi makoto mafelenyi ra alako Isirayilakae naxa e ya ti na nɔrɛ ra, naxan nu luma ba ra.
47003014	Kɔnɔ e xaxili xɔrɔxɔ. Han to e mu fe fahaamuma a fanyi ra, e saatɛ fori xaranma tɛmui naxɛ. A luxi nɛ alɔ na mafelenyi, naxan nu Annabi Munsa yatagi makotoxi, a man na e yatagi ma, e mu fefe igbɛma. Na fahaamutareɲa mu nɔma bade, fo mixi na la Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra.
47003015	Han to e luxi alɔ na mafelenyi na e yatagi makotofe, e mu fahaamui sɔtɔ e bɔɲɛ kui, e Tawureta Munsa xaranma tɛmui naxɛ.
47003016	Kɔnɔ mixi na a ya rafindi Marigi ma, na luxi nɛ alɔ na mafelenyi bara ba na kanyi yatagi ma, a fa fahaamui sɔtɔ.
47003017	Won Marigi findixi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan na. Marigi Xaxili nan xɔrɛya fima mixi ma.
47003018	Xa na mafelenyi baxi won yatagi ma, Marigi xa nɔrɛ naxan yanbama won ma, won fama nɛ na nɔrɛ masende mixi gbɛtɛe bɛ. Won Marigi Xaxili won masarama nɛ a misaali ra, won ma nɔrɛ xun nu masa.
47004001	Ala to a xa wali soxi muxu yi ra a xa hinnɛ saabui ra, limaniya mu bama muxu yi ra.
47004002	Muxu wali ki mu nɔxunxi, yaagi yo mu na a kui. Muxu mu mixi madaxuma, muxu mu Ala xa masenyi mafindima. Muxu nɔndi nan masenma mixi birin bɛ, alako e xa la muxu ra Ala ya i.
47004003	Muxu xa xibaaru fanyi fiixɛ mixi birin bɛ, fo kisitaree,
47004004	barima e mu danxaniyaxi. Yi waxati mixie marigi bara a ragiri e xaxili naxa fahaamui sɔtɔ xibaaru fanyi ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nɔrɔxi xa fe ra, naxan findixi Ala misaali ra.
47004005	Muxu mu muxu yɛtɛ kan xa fe xa kawandima. Muxu xa kawandi a masenma nɛ a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan findixi muxu Marigi ra, a nun muxu fan findixi wo xa konyie nan na Isa xa fe ra.
47004006	Ala naxan a masenxi, «Naiyalanyi xa yanba dimi kui,» a tan bara a xa nɔrɛ masen muxu bɛ a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
47004007	Kɔnɔ na nɔrɛ hagigɛ saxi muxu bɔɲɛ ma, bɔɲɛ naxan sɛnbɛ xurun alɔ fɛɲɛ, alako mixie xa a kolon na sɛnbɛ xungbe fatanxi Ala nan na, a mu fatanxi muxu tan xa ra.
47004008	Kɔntɔfili bara muxu xɛtɛn, kɔnɔ muxu mu butuxunxi. A bara muxu xaxili ifu, kɔnɔ limaniya mu baxi muxu yi ra.
47004009	Muxu bara ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ, kɔnɔ Ala mu muxu raboloxi. Fe xɔrɔxɔɛ bara muxu rabira, kɔnɔ a mu nɔxi muxu ra.
47004010	Muxu xa tɔɔrɛ muxu xa duniɲɛigiri kui, a maniyaxi Isa gbe nan na naxan faxa wuri magalanbuxi ma. Muxu na tɔɔrɛ sɔtɔxi nɛ alako muxu xa Isa xa xunnakeli fan masen muxu xa duniɲɛigiri kui.
47004011	Muxu na tɔɔrɔfe Isa xa fe nan na muxu xa duniɲɛigiri kui, alako Isa xa xunnakeli fan xa makɛnɛn muxu xa simaya kui.
47004012	Na nan na ki muxu na saya kira nan xɔn ma, alako wo tan xa kisi sɔtɔ.
47004013	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «N to danxaniya, na nan a to n naxa wɔyɛn.» Muxu fan to danxaniyaxi, muxu wɔyɛnxi na nan ma.
47004014	Muxu na rabaxi nɛ, barima muxu bara a kolon naxan Marigi Isa rakelixi faxɛ ma, a fama nɛ muxu fan nakelide faxɛ ma Isa xa fe ra, a won birin xanin a yire.
47004015	Muxu tinxi na tɔɔrɛ birin na wo xa fe ra. Muxu tɔɔrɔma nɛ alako mixi gbegbe xa Ala xa hinnɛ kolon, e fa tantui nun matɔxɔɛ rasiga a ma.
47004016	Na kui, limaniya mu bama muxu yi ra. Hali muxu fate to na kanafe, muxu bɔɲɛ na fanfe lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ,
47004017	barima muxu xa tɔɔrɛ xunxuri naxan mu buma, a na xunnakeli xungbe raminife muxu bɛ, xunnakeli naxan maniyɛ mu na, naxan mu ɲɔnma abadan.
47004018	Muxu xaxili mu tixi fe toxi xa ra. Muxu xaxili tixi fe nan na naxan mu toma. Fe toxi mu buma, kɔnɔ fe naxan mu toma na tan buma nɛ abadan.
47005001	Won a kolon, won fate luxi nɛ alɔ bage, won nii sabatixi dɛnnaxɛ. Na bage na kana, won banxi gbɛtɛ sɔtɔma nɛ ariyanna, won luma dɛnnaxɛ abadan. Ala nan na banxi yailanxi won bɛ, adamadi mu naxan tixi.
47005002	Won wa xui minima yi bage kui, barima won sabatide naxan na koore, na xɔli na won ma, taa fanyi naxan na ariyanna.
47005003	Na banxi nɛɛnɛ misaalixi donma nan na. Won wama donma nɛɛnɛ ragorofe won ma, alako won naxa lu won mageli ra.
47005004	Danmi won na yi bage kui, won wa xui raminima, barima won mu wama donma xa ba won ma. Won wama nɛ donma nɛɛnɛ xa ragoro won ma, alako kisi xa nɔ faxɛ ra.
47005005	Ala won daaxi na kisi nan ma fe ra. A bara a yɛtɛ Xaxili ragoro won ma naxan a masenma a fama nɛ won kide ariyanna ra.
47005006	Na nan a toxi won limaniyaxi. Won a kolon, danmi won nii sabatixi yi fate i, won makuya Marigi ra.
47005007	Won ma ɲɛrɛ kui won xaxili tixi fe nan na won mu naxan toxi sinden.
47005008	Won ma limaniya xa fe ra, won wama kelife yi fate kui, won xa sabati Marigi xɔnyi.
47005009	Na kui, xa won nii na won fate kui, xa na mu a ra won nii bara keli won fate kui, won fe birin nabama Ala sago rakamalife nan na.
47005010	Won na rabama nɛ barima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fama nɛ won birin makiitide, alako kankan xa a sare sɔtɔ a xa fe fanyie nun a xa fe ɲaaxie ma, a naxee rabaxi a xa duniɲɛigiri kui.
47005011	Muxu to Marigi xa yaragaaxui kolon, muxu katama mixie nan nafade Ala ma. Ala muxu ɲɛrɛ ki kolon. N wama lafe a ra, wo fan muxu ɲɛrɛ ki kolon wo bɔɲɛ kui.
47005012	Muxu mu wama gbilenfe muxu xunmafalafe ra wo bɛ. Muxu wama nɛ tun wo xa ɲɛlɛxin muxu xa fe ra, alako wo xa nɔ mixie yaabide naxee e yɛtɛ igboma fee fufafu ra, naxee mu kelima e bɔɲɛ kui.
47005013	Xa muxu bara so fe ndee kui naxan luxi alɔ daxuɲa duniɲa mixie bɛ, muxu na rabaxi Ala nan bɛ. Kɔnɔ xa muxu bara ɲɛrɛ xaxili fanyi bɛrɛ ra, muxu na rabaxi wo tan nan bɛ.
47005014	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xanunteya nan muxu tutunma. Muxu bara a kolon mixi keren bara faxa adama birin bɛ. Na kui, mixi birin bara faxa.
47005015	A bara faxamixi birin bɛ, alako naxee ɲiɲɛ a ra e xa e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe lu na, e xa wali Isa bɛ naxan faxa e bɛ, naxan man keli faxɛ ma e bɛ.
47005016	Na nan a toxi, kelife yakɔsi, won mu mixi toma alɔ duniɲa mixie e toma ki naxɛ. Singe won nu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi toma nɛ alɔ duniɲa mixie a toxi ki naxɛ, kɔnɔ yakɔsi won mu a kolonxi na ki sɔnɔn.
47005017	Mixi nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na lu fe keren kui, a findima mixi nɛɛnɛ nan na. A xa fe fori bara masara fe nɛɛnɛ ra.
47005018	Na birin fatanxi Ala nan na, naxan won nagbilenxi a yɛtɛ ma a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra. A man bara wali taxu won na adamadie ragbilenfe ra a ma.
47005019	Ala bara duniɲa ragbilen a ma a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra, a diɲɛ adamadie xa yunubie ma. A man bara na masenyi so won yi ra naxan a niyama mixie xa gbilen a ma.
47005020	Na kui, won bara findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xɛɛrae ra. A luxi nɛ alɔ Ala na kawandi tife won tan nan saabui ra. Muxu bara wo mayandi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra, wo xa gbilen Ala ma.
47005021	Isa naxan mu yunubi yo rabaxi, Ala bara a findi won ma yunubi sare ra. Na nan a toxi won findixi tinxin mixie ra Ala ya tode ra Isa saabui ra.
47006001	Muxu tan, Ala xa walikɛe, muxu bara wo rasi wo naxa Ala xa hinnɛ sɔtɔ fu ra.
47006002	Ala bara a masen Kitaabui kui, «N bara wo xa duba suxu n ma hinnɛ waxati, n bara wo mali wo xa kisi lɔxɔɛ.» Wo xa a kolon Ala xa hinnɛ waxati bara a li. To nan findixi kisi lɔxɔɛ ra wo bɛ.
47006003	Muxu tan mu sese rabama naxan nɔma mixi ratantande, mixie fa a fala a muxu wali kobi nan nabaxi.
47006004	Muxu bara fe birin naba xili fanyi sɔtɔfe ra Ala xa walikɛ lanma a xa naxan naba. Muxu bara tunnabɛxiya raba ɲaxankatɛ, setareɲa, nun kɔntɔfili kui.
47006005	E bara muxu bɔnbɔ, e muxu raso geeli kui, e gali bɔɲɛ rate muxu xili ma. Muxu bara wali xɔrɔxɔɛ raba, muxu mu xi, muxu bara kaamɛ.
47006006	Muxu bara muxu tunnabɛxi sɛniyɛnyi, fahaamui, diɲɛ, fe fanyi, xaxili sɛniyɛnxi, nun xanunteya fiixɛ kui.
47006007	Muxu mu ba nɔndi falafe, muxu fe birin nabama Ala sɛnbɛ saabui nan na. Muxu bara Ala xa gere fanyi suxu tinxinyi kui muxu bɛlɛxɛ firin na.
47006008	Muxu walima binyɛ nun yelebui sɔtɔɛ nan kui. Muxu bara xili fanyi nun xili kanɛ sɔtɔ. Ndee bara muxu findi wule falɛe ra, kɔnɔ muxu nɔndi gbansan nan falama.
47006009	Hali e muxu kolon, e fe rabama muxu ra alɔ e mu mixi naxan kolon. Muxu maniyama mixi ra naxan na saya kira xɔn ma, kɔnɔ muxu mu faxaxi. Muxu bara ɲaxankata, kɔnɔ muxu mu faxaxi.
47006010	Sunnun mixie nan muxu ra, kɔnɔ sɛɛwɛ na muxu bɔɲɛ kui. Setaree nan muxu ra, kɔnɔ bannaya na muxu yi ra. Misikiinɛe nan muxu ra, kɔnɔ fe birin na muxu yi ra.
47006011	Muxu mu masenyi yo nɔxunxi wo ma. Wo xa fe bara lu muxu sondonyi ma.
47006012	Muxu bɔɲɛ mu balanxi wo ma, kɔnɔ wo tan bara wo bɔɲɛ balan muxu mabiri.
47006013	N ma die, yandi, wo fan xa xanunteya xun xa masa muxu mabiri.
47006014	Lanyi naxa lu wo nun danxaniyataree tagi. Munse na tinxinyi nun tinxintareya tagi? Naiyalanyi nun dimi nɔma lude yire keren?
47006015	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nun Sentanɛ lanma fe keren ma? Danxaniyatɔɛ nun danxaniyatare lanma munse ma?
47006016	Kuye toma Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui? Won tan nan findixi Ala Ɲiɲɛ xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi ra. Ala yati a fala nɛ, «N ɲɛrɛma nɛ wo ya ma. Wo Marigi Ala nan n na, wo fan findima nɛ n ma ɲama ra.»
47006017	Na nan a toxi Marigi naxa a fala, «Wo xa mini e ya ma, wo xa lu wo xati ma. Wo naxa din fe sɛniyɛntare ra, alako n xa wo rasɛnɛ.»
47006018	Ala Xili Xungbe Kanyi xa masenyi nan ya, «N findima wo baba nan na, wo tan fan findi n ma die ra.»
47007001	N xanuntenyie, Ala to na laayidi mɔɔlie tongo won bɛ, won fate nun won bɔɲɛ xa lu sɛniyɛnyi kui. Won ma sɛniyɛnyi xa kamali Ala xa yaragaaxui kui.
47007002	Wo xa tin muxu xa fe ra. Muxu mu fe ɲaaxi yo rabaxi wo ra, muxu mu wo xun nakana, muxu mu wo rawali.
47007003	N mu wama kiiti ɲaaxi safe wo ma. N ɲan bara a fala wo bɛ xanunteya na won tagi han muxu bara tin fe birin nabade wo bɛ, hali na findima faxɛ nan na.
47007004	Lanlanteya fanyi na won tagi. N bara ɲɛlɛxin wo xa fe ra, na fan bara findi limaniya ra n bɛ. Hali n na tɔɔrɛ kui, wo bara a niya n ma sɛɛwɛ xa kamali.
47007005	Muxu to fa Masedon, muxu mu malabui sɔtɔ, muxu tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli birin nan li naa: Gere na muxu rabilinyi, gaaxui fan na muxu bɔɲɛ ma.
47007006	Kɔnɔ Ala, naxan mixi limaniyatare ralimaniyama, a bara muxu fan nalimaniya Tito fafe saabui ra.
47007007	A fafe gbansan xa mu a ra. Wo mɛɛnixi a ma ki naxɛ, na fan bara findi limaniya ra muxu bɛ. A bara a fala muxu bɛ n xɔli bara wo suxu, han na bara findi yaye ra wo bɛ. A bara wo xa marafanyi xa fe fala muxu bɛ n tan mabiri. Na bara n nasɛɛwa a fanyi ra.
47007008	N a kolon n ma bataaxɛ bara wo rasunnun, kɔnɔ a mu ɲaaxu n bɛ. Hali n to mu nu wama n ma bataaxɛ xa wo rasunnun, n a kolon na sunnunyi xɔn mu kuya fa.
47007009	Yakɔsi n bara ɲɛlɛxin na xa fe ra. N mu ɲɛlɛxin wo xa sunnunyi xa ra, kɔnɔ n ɲɛlɛxinxi nɛ barima na sunnunyi bara a niya wo xa tuubi. Na kui, n a kolon na sunnunyi fatanxi Ala nan na, a mu fatanxi muxu tan xa ra.
47007010	Ala mixie rasunnunma nɛ alako e xa tuubi, e fa kisi. Na sunnunyi mɔɔli mu findima mɔnɛ ra, kɔnɔ sunnunyi naxan fatanxi duniɲa ra, na findima faxɛ nan na.
47007011	Ala bara na sunnunyi rawali wo xa fe ra, alako wo xa wo tunnabɛxi, wo xa wo yɛtɛ xunmafala, wo xa xɔnɔ fe ɲaaxi ma, wo xa gaaxu Ala ya ra, wo xa fe fanyi suxu sɛnbɛ ra, wo xa fe ɲaaxi makiiti. Wo bara a masen wo bɔɲɛ fiixɛ ra fe dangixi kui.
47007012	N to bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma, n mu a sɛbɛxi na fe ɲaaxi rabae xa fe xa ra, n mu a sɛbɛ na mixi xa fe ra naxan bara fe ɲaaxi sɔtɔ. N a sɛbɛ nɛ alako muxu xa marafanyi naxan na wo bɛ a xa mini kɛnɛ ma Ala bɛ.
47007013	Na birin bara muxu ralimaniya. Muxu man bara ɲɛlɛxin Tito xa sɛɛwɛ xa fe ra, wo naxan bɔɲɛ ralimaniyaxi a fanyi ra.
47007014	N nu bara fe fanyi fala a bɛ wo xa fe ra. Wo mu n nayaagixi na kui. Muxu naxan falaxi wo bɛ, a birin findixi nɔndi nan na. Muxu naxan falaxi Tito bɛ wo xa fe ra, na fan birin findixi nɔndi nan na.
47007015	Wo xa marafanyi a bɛ, a xun bara masa, barima wo to a rasɛnɛ, a bara wo xa batui nun wo xa yaragaaxui to.
47007016	N bara ɲɛlɛxin na lanlanteya ra naxan na won tagi, a mu kanama fefe ma.
47008001	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa a fala wo bɛ Ala hinnɛxi Masedon danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae ra ki naxɛ.
47008002	Hali e to nu na ɲaxankatɛ xɔrɔxɔɛ kui, e xa sɛɛwɛ xungbe nun e xa setareɲa xɔrɔxɔɛ a niyaxi nɛ e xa ki ti a fanyi ra.
47008003	N bara findi e xa seede ra. E bara mixi ki alɔ e nu nɔma naxan na, e man dangi na ra.
47008004	E naxa muxu mayandi e yɛtɛ ɲanige ra, a e fan xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe mali alɔ booree a rabama ki naxɛ.
47008005	Na bara dangi muxu waxɔnfe ra. A singe e naxa e yɛtɛ fi Marigi ma. Na dangi xanbi, e man naxa e yɛtɛ fi muxu ma alɔ Ala nu wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
47008006	Muxu bara Tito rasi, a xa na wali fanyi rakamali wo bɛ a naxan fɔlɔxi.
47008007	Wo bara xunnakeli sɔtɔ fe birin kui, alɔ wo xa danxaniya, wo xa masenyie, wo xa lɔnni, wo xa tunnabɛxi, nun wo xa xanunteya muxu xa fe ra. Wo xa xunnakeli sɔtɔ yi wali fanyi fan xa fe ra.
47008008	N mu wo yamarife xɛ. N wama a kolonfe nɛ xa wo xa xanunteya fiixɛ alɔ booree gbe fiixɛxi ki naxɛ.
47008009	Wo a kolon won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, a hinnɛxi won na ki naxɛ. Fe birin nu na a yi ra, kɔnɔ a naxa diɲɛ na birin ma wo tan bɛ, alako wo xa banna a xa setareɲa saabui ra.
47008010	N bara wo rasi na ma alako a xa findi fe fanyi ra wo bɛ. Yaala wo tan nan singe na natɛ tongo, wo tan nan singe kɔbiri malan fɔlɔ.
47008011	Yakɔsi fa, wo xa na raɲɔn, alako wo ɲanige fanyi xa kamali wo xa fɛɛrɛ bɛrɛ ra.
47008012	Xa wo mixie kima ɲanige fanyi ra, wo e mali wo nɔma naxan na, na findima fe fanyi ra. Xa na fɛɛrɛ mu na wo yi ra, fefe mu a ra.
47008013	Muxu mu wama wo tan xa tɔɔrɔ alako booree xa se sɔtɔ. Wo birin xa lan.
47008014	Yi waxati, wo harige fanyi nɔma nɛ e malide e xa setareɲa kui. Waxati gbɛtɛ, e tan fan harige fanyi nɔma nɛ wo fan malide wo xa setareɲa kui. Na kui, wo birin bara lan,
47008015	alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Naxan a gbegbe malanxi, a mu dangi a i. Naxan dondoronti malanxi, a a hayi lixi nɛ.»
47008016	Ala tantu, barima Ala bara a niya wo xa fe xa lu Tito bɔɲɛ kui, alɔ muxu tan.
47008017	A bara muxu xa marasi suxu. A man bara natɛ tongo a yɛtɛ ra ɲɛlɛxinyi kui, a xa siga wo yire.
47008018	Muxu na muxu ngaxakerenyi nde xɛɛfe a matide, danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama naxan birin matɔxɔma a xa kawandi xa fe ra.
47008019	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae bara a sugandi a xa muxu fan mati na kɔbiri xaninde. Muxu na birin nabama nɛ alako Ala xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ, a nun man muxu xa ɲanige fanyi xa raba.
47008020	Muxu mu wama mixi yo xa fe ɲaaxi to muxu wali ki ma, muxu na kɔbiri ya rafanyi rawalima ki naxɛ.
47008021	Muxu fe fanyi nan tun fenma na wali kui Marigi nun adamadie ya xɔri.
47008022	Muxu na won ngaxakerenyi gbɛtɛ fan xɛɛfe booree matide. Muxu bara a to sanya wuyaxi, muxu xa fe na a bɔɲɛ ma sɛnbɛ ra. Yakɔsi, nde bara sa na sɛnbɛ fari, barima a man bara la wo tan na.
47008023	N waliboore Tito findixi n tan nan ma xɛɛra ra wo bɛ. A matimae findixi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae nan ma xɛɛrae ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa binyɛ xa fe ra.
47008024	Na kui, wo xa wo xa xanunteya masen yi mixie bɛ alako danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama birin xa a kolon muxu fe fanyi naxee falaxi wo xa fe ra, a nɔndi na a ra.
47009001	Hali n mu bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma sɛniyɛntɔɛe malife xa fe ra.
47009002	N ɲan bara wo ɲanige fanyi kolon. N bara wo matɔxɔ Masedonkae bɛ, a falafe ra wo tan Akayikae rɛdixi na kɔbiri malanfe ra kabi yaala. Wo to na natɛ suxu sɛnbɛ ra, e fan bara wa sofe na kui.
47009003	Yakɔsi n na n ngaxakerenyie xɛɛfe wo yire, alako n matɔxɔɛ naxan nabaxi wo xa fe ra, a naxa findi wule ra. Wo xa kɔbiri malan sinnanyi ma, alako e xa a li naa alɔ n wo xa fe fala e bɛ ki naxɛ.
47009004	Xa a sa li n nun Masedonkae mu wo xa laayidi tongoxi rakamalixi lima naa, na findima yaagi nan na n bɛ, a findima yaagi belebele nan na wo fan bɛ.
47009005	Na kui, n bara n ngaxakerenyie xɛɛ wo yire sinnanyi ma, alako wo xa laayidi xa kamali. Na ki wo nɔma na rabade wo waxɔnki, alako a naxa findi fe xɔrɔxɔɛ ra wo bɛ.
47009006	Wo xa ratu a ma, a naxan sansi xɔri xuri rawalima, a fan sansi xuri di nan sɔtɔma. Naxan sansi xɔri gbegbe rawalima, a fan sansi gbegbe sɔtɔma nɛ.
47009007	Kankan xa mixi ki a yɛtɛ ɲanige ra. Teku mu a ra. A naxa mixi ki nimisɛ kui. Naxan mixi kima sɛɛwɛ kui, na nan nafan Ala ma.
47009008	Ala nɔma barakɛ mɔɔli birin nagorode wo ma. Nee wo hayi lima nɛ, e man dangi a ra, alako wo xa nɔ wali fanyi mɔɔli birin nabade.
47009009	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «A bara setaree ki a fanyi ra. A xa tinxinyi buma abadan.»
47009010	Ala naxan sansi xɔri fima sansisi ma, a a rabalo taami ra, a man wo tan ma fɛɛrɛ rawuyama nɛ, alako wo xa wali tinxinxie fan xa wuya.
47009011	Ala wo kima fɛɛrɛ gbegbe nan na, alako wo fan xa mixie ki a fanyi ra. Mixie fama nɛ Ala tantude wo xa mali xa fe ra, muxu naxan soma e yi ra wo xili ra.
47009012	Wo naxan fima sɛniyɛntɔɛe ma, a e hayi lima nɛ, a man findi tantui gbegbe ra Ala bɛ.
47009013	Mixie na wo xa wali to, e Ala tantuma nɛ, barima wo xa danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, a bara findi batui ra. E Ala tantuma nɛ wo xa mali xa fe ra, wo hinnɛxi e ra naxan na, a nun mixi birin.
47009014	E fama nɛ Ala maxandide wo bɛ xanunteya ra, barima e a kolon Ala bara hinnɛ wo ra a fanyi ra.
47009015	Ala tantu a xa hinnɛ xa fe ra naxan dangi fe birin na.
47010001	N tan Pɔlu, n wama wo rasife Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa diɲɛ nun a xa fanyi nan saabui ra. Wo naxɛ a n sɛnbɛ mu gbo n na wo ya ma tɛmui naxɛ, fo n na makuya wo ra, n fa wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ fala wo bɛ.
47010002	N bara wo mayandi, wo naxa a niya n ma wɔyɛnyi xa xɔrɔxɔ n fa tɛmui wo yire. Ndee ɲɔxɔ a ma muxu na ɲɛrɛfe adama ki nan tun ma. N wɔyɛnma a xɔrɔxɔɛ ra na mixie nan bɛ.
47010003	Adamadi nan muxu ra, kɔnɔ muxu mu gere soma adama ki xa ma.
47010004	Muxu mu gere soma adamadi xa geresosee xa ra. Muxu gere soma Ala xa geresosee nan na naxee nɔma Sentanɛ sɛnbɛe kanade. Muxu maɲɔxunyi birin xun nakanama nɛ
47010005	naxan Ala xa fe kolonyi matandima yɛtɛ igboɲa kui. Maɲɔxunyi birin xa lu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yaamari bun ma.
47010006	Wo na wo xa batui rakamali, naxan na tondi na ra, muxu fama nɛ na kanyi ɲaxankatade.
47010007	Wo xa na fe mato a fanyi ra. Xa mixi la a ra a findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan gbe ra, a xa a kolon muxu tan fan na na ki nɛ.
47010008	N mu yaagima wɔyɛnyi xungbe falafe ra wo bɛ Marigi xa yaamari xa fe ra, a naxan fixi n ma alako n xa wo mali sɛnbɛ sɔtɔde. A mu n xɛɛxi wo xun nakanade xɛ.
47010009	N mu findixi mixi xa ra naxan nɔma wo magaaxude n ma sɛbɛli ra, alɔ wo a maɲɔxunxi ki naxɛ.
47010010	Ndee a falama, «A xa bataaxɛe sɛnbɛ gbo, e xɔrɔxɔ, kɔnɔ a gundi yati na fa, a sɛnbɛ mu gbo, a xa masenyi yusi yo mu na.»
47010011	Na kanyie xa a kolon muxu naxan falama muxu xa bataaxɛe kui, muxu fama nɛ na birin nakamalide muxu fa tɛmui.
47010012	Muxu mu suusama muxu yɛtɛ misaalide yɛtɛ igboe ra. Muxu mu wama muxu yɛtɛ maniyafe e ra. E na e yɛtɛ igbo e yɛtɛ xa maɲɔxunyi ra, e bara gɛ e xa lɔnnitareɲa masende.
47010013	Muxu mu wama muxu yɛtɛ xa fe falafe han pon! Ala yaamari naxan fixi muxu ma mixie bɛ muxu naxee xaranma, muxu na nan falama wo bɛ.
47010014	A mu luxi alɔ muxu mu siga wo yire. Muxu singe nan wo lixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi ra.
47010015	Muxu mu matɔxɔɛ fenma han a dangi a i mixi gbɛtɛe xa walie xa fe ra, fo wali naxan soxi muxu tan yi ra. Muxu wama naxan xɔn, wo xa danxaniya xun xa masa, muxu xa wali xa gbo wo ya ma.
47010016	Na ki muxu nɔma nɛ Ala xa xibaaru fanyi masende yire gbɛtɛ naxee dangi wo ra. Muxu mu matɔxɔɛ fenma mixi gbɛtɛe xa wali fɔxie ra.
47010017	Xa mixi wa a yɛtɛ matɔxɔfe, Marigi wali naxan nabaxi a xa duniɲɛigiri kui, a xa a yɛtɛ matɔxɔ Marigi xa fe nɛ i.
47010018	Barima yɛtɛ matɔxɔɛ xa mu rafan Marigi ma, fo Marigi yɛtɛ naxan matɔxɔma.
47011001	Wo xa wo haakɛ to n bɛ, alɔ wo ɲan na a rabafe ki naxɛ, n xa n ma daxuɲa nde fala wo bɛ.
47011002	Wo rafan n ma Ala xa xanunteya ra, naxan mu wama a firin nde xɔn. N wo soxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi gbansan nan yi ra, alɔ ginɛ naxan fixi xɛmɛ ma a dimɛdi.
47011003	Kɔnɔ n gaaxuxi nɛ mixi ndee fa wo madaxufe, e fa wo xaxili makuya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, wo biraxi naxan fɔxɔ ra bɔɲɛ fiixɛ ra. Na kui, wo luma nɛ alɔ Nɛɛnɛ Mahawa bɔximase naxan madaxu yunubi xa fe ra.
47011004	N a falama na fe nan ma, wo wo tuli matima mixi nan na, naxan Isa xa fe masenma wo bɛ ki gbɛtɛ, bafe muxu gbe ki ra. Wo man tinma xaxili gbɛtɛ suxude, bafe Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ra wo naxan sɔtɔxi. Wo masenyi nde rabatuma naxan mu lanxi muxu xa masenyi ma, wo laxi naxan singe ra.
47011005	Kɔnɔ n a kolon n mu xurun na mixie bɛ, naxee e yɛtɛ findixi wo bɛ xɛɛra fisamantee ra.
47011006	Hali n wɔyɛn ki mu tofan a gbe ra, kɔnɔ n xaxili tan gbo. Muxu bara na masen wo bɛ a fanyi ra.
47011007	N to n yɛtɛ magoro Ala xa xibaaru fanyi masenfe ra wo bɛ sare xanbi, alako wo tan xa fe xa mate, na findixi tantanyi nan na wo bɛ?
47011008	N bara danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama gbɛtɛe makula, alako n xa nɔ walide wo bɛ sare xanbi. N mu n ma kɔntɔfili dɔxɔxi mixi yo xun ma wo ya ma.
47011009	Masedon danxaniyatɔɛe nan fa n malide n ma tɔɔrɛ kui. N na birin naba nɛ alako n naxa findi kote ra wo bɛ. Han ya na xaxili na n yi ra.
47011010	N xa nɔndi fala wo bɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra, n walixi wo bɛ sare xanbi ki naxɛ, n man walima na ki nɛ Akayi bɔxi birin ma, barima na findixi xunnakeli nan na n bɛ.
47011011	Munfe ra? N mu na rabaxi wo tan bɛ xanunteya xa ra? Ala a kolon.
47011012	N naxan nabaxi, n man gbilenma nɛ na raba ra, alako mixi yo naxa nɔ e misaalide muxu ra. Ndee wama na binyɛ nan xɔn.
47011013	Na mixie e yɛtɛ findixi wo bɛ xɛɛra fisamantee ra, kɔnɔ wule falɛe nan e ra, naxee mixi madaxuma, a falafe ra e tan nan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xɛɛrae ra.
47011014	Kɔnɔ na mu findima dɛ ixarɛ ra, barima hali Sentanɛ a mixi madaxuma, a a yɛtɛ kan misaali malekɛ nɔrɔxi ra.
47011015	Sentanɛ xa walikɛe fan birama na misaali nan fɔxɔ ra, e fa e yɛtɛ masen walikɛ tinxinxie ra. E fama nɛ e sare sɔtɔde.
47011016	Wo xa wo haakɛ to n bɛ, n fan xa n yɛtɛ matɔxɔ dondoronti, kɔnɔ wo naxa a maɲɔxun daxuɲa ra de! Hali wo a maɲɔxun daxui na n na, wo xa diɲɛ alako n xa n gbe fala wo bɛ.
47011017	Na kui, n mu wɔyɛnma Marigi waxɔnki ma. N wɔyɛnma daxui ki nan ma naxan wama a yɛtɛ matɔxɔfe.
47011018	Mixi gbegbe to so yɛtɛ igboɲa kui adamadi ki ma, n fan xa n kan matɔxɔ.
47011019	Wo tan xaxilimae, wo tinma xaxilitaree ra tɛmui birin.
47011020	Wo tan tinma wo xa findi konyie ra, mixie xa wo rawali a ɲaaxi ra, e xa se birin ba wo yi ra, e xa e ya ragoro wo ma, e man xa wo dɛ ragarin.
47011021	N bara a fala wo bɛ yaagi ra, muxu tan mu na sɛnbɛ mɔɔli masenxi wo bɛ. Kɔnɔ e suusaxi e yɛtɛ kan matɔxɔɛ naxan na, fo n fan xa suusa na ra, hali a findi xaxilitareɲa ra n bɛ.
47011022	Eburu mixie nan e ra? N tan fan findixi Eburu mixi nan na. Isirayilakae nan e ra? N tan fan findixi Isirayilaka nan na. Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ nan e ra? N tan fan Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ nan n na.
47011023	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa walikɛe nan e ra? Wo wo haakɛ to n bɛ de, n tan dangi e ra. N bara wali dangi e ra, n bara sa geeli dangife e ra, n bara bɔnbɔɛ sɔtɔ dangife e ra, n bara makɔrɛ faxɛ dɛ ra dangife e ra.
47011024	Sanmaya suuli Yuwifie n bɔnbɔma sɛbɛrɛ ya tongo saxan nun solomanaani ra.
47011025	Sanmaya saxan e n bɔnbɔma gbengbeta ra. Sanmaya keren e bara n magɔnɔ gɛmɛe ra. Sanmaya saxan n ma kunkui dulama baa ma. Sanmaya keren n bara xi keren nun kɔɛ keren nadangi ye xɔɔra baa ma.
47011026	N ma biyaasi wuyaxi kui, n bara tɔɔrɔ xure igirife ra, n bara tɔɔrɔ muɲɛtie xa fe ra, n yɛtɛ kan bɔnsɔɛ mixie bara n tɔɔrɔ, kaafirie fan nu bara n tɔɔrɔ. N bara tɔɔrɔ taae, gbengberenyi, nun baa ma. Danxaniyatɔɛ wule falɛe fan bara n tɔɔrɔ.
47011027	N bara tɔɔrɔ wali xɔrɔxɔɛe xa fe ra. Sanmaya wuyaxi n mu xi, n mu baloe sɔtɔ, n mu ye min, n lu kaamɛ ra, n mu sose sɔtɔ ɲɛmɛ ra.
47011028	Naxan saxi na birin fari, lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ n kɔntɔfilima danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae xa fe ra.
47011029	Sɛnbɛ na ba mixi nde, a bara ba n fan na. Danxaniyatɔɛ na yunubi fe raba, a n sondonyi tɔɔrɔma nɛ alɔ tɛ na sa a ma.
47011030	Iyo, xa a lanma n xa n yɛtɛ matɔxɔ fe nde ra, n nan n yɛtɛ matɔxɔma n ma sɛnbɛtareya nan na.
47011031	Ala, naxan findixi Marigi Isa baba ra, naxan matɔxɔma abadan, a a kolon n mu wule falama.
47011032	Damasi gomina, naxan nu na Mangɛ Aretasi xa yaamari bun ma, a naxa taa naadɛe balan alako a xa n suxu,
47011033	kɔnɔ danxaniyatɔɛe naxa n nagoro taa tɛtɛ wundɛri ra debe kui, n fa n ba a yi ra.
47012001	N lanma n xa nde sa na matɔxɔɛ fari? Na yusi mu na, kɔnɔ n man xa laamatunyie nun masenyie xa fe fala wo bɛ Marigi naxee fixi n ma.
47012002	Isayanka nde nu na, naxan xanin koore walaxɛ saxan nde. Na ɲɛ fu nun naani nan yi ki. N mu a kolon xa a fate yati nan siga, xa na mu a xaxili gbansan. Ala a kolon.
47012003	Hali Ala gbansan nan to a kolon, xa a fate yati nan siga, xa na mu a ra a xaxili gbansan, n fe keren nan kolon,
47012004	na xɛmɛ xaninxi nɛ ariyanna. Mɛnni a naxa fee mɛ, naxee mu daxa adama xa e masen a boore bɛ.
47012005	N bara na xɛmɛ matɔxɔ. N tan nan lanxi na xɛmɛ ma, kɔnɔ n mu wama n yɛtɛ matɔxɔfe. N nan n ma sɛnbɛtareya gbansan nan matɔxɔma.
47012006	Kɔnɔ xa n bara wa n yɛtɛ matɔxɔfe, na mu findima xaxilitareɲa ra, barima n naxan birin falama a findixi nɔndi nan na. N mu na birin falama xɛ, alako mixie naxa n ma fe ite dangife e naxan toma a nun e naxan mɛma n xun ma.
47012007	Na laamatunyie to magaaxu, n naxa dundu. Ala naxa tɔɔrɛ nde dɔxɔ n ma, naxan fatanxi Sentanɛ xa malekɛ ra, alako n naxa n yɛtɛ igbo na laamatunyi magaaxuxie xa fe ra.
47012008	N naxa Ala maxandi sanmaya saxan a xa na tɔɔrɛ ba n ma,
47012009	kɔnɔ a naxa a masen n bɛ, «N ma hinnɛ bara i rali. I n ma sɛnbɛ kamalixi kolonma i xa sɛnbɛtareya nan kui.» Na nan a toxi n nan n ma sɛnbɛtareya matɔxɔma, alako Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi sɛnbɛ xa lu n bɛ.
47012010	Na nan a toxi sɛnbɛtareya rafanxi n ma. Hali na findi konbi ra, hali na findi fe xɔrɔxɔɛ ra, hali na findi ɲaxankatɛ nun tɔɔrɛ ra n bɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, na birin nafan n ma, barima n a kolon n sɛnbɛ sɔtɔma n ma sɛnbɛtareya nan kui.
47012011	Wo bara a niya n xa wɔyɛn alɔ daxui. A nu lanma nɛ wo tan yati xa fe fanyi fala n ma fe ra. Hali n ma fe to goroxi, n mu xurun na xɛɛra fisamantee ya i.
47012012	N bara n ma xɛɛraya fɔxie masen wo bɛ, n to tɔnxumae, fe magaaxuxie, nun kaabanakoe raba wo tagi duluxɔtɔɛ xungbe kui.
47012013	Fe keren gbansan nan na, n mu naxan nabaxi wo ra alɔ n a raba danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama gbɛtɛe ra ki naxɛ. N mu tin findide kote ra wo tan bɛ. Xa na mu rafan wo ma, wo xa diɲɛ.
47012014	N rɛdixi n ma biyaasi saxan nde rabafe ra wo xɔnyi. N mu findima kote ra wo bɛ de, barima n mu wama wo harige xɔn ma. N wama wo tan yati nan xɔn ma. A mu lanma die xa fɛɛrɛ fen e barimixie bɛ. A lanma barimixie nan xa fɛɛrɛ fen e xa die bɛ.
47012015	N tan bara tin fɛɛrɛ fende wo bɛ. N bara tin n yɛtɛ fide wo bɛ. N to wo xanuxi a gbe ra, wo tan nde bama na xanunteya nan na n tan bɛ?
47012016	Awa yire, kɔnɔ n mu findixi kote ra wo bɛ. Nde a falama a kɔɔta mixi nan n na, a n bara wo masɔtɔ kɔɔta wali ra.
47012017	Kɔnɔ n xa wo maxɔrin, n bara wo rawali n ma xɛɛrae saabui ra?
47012018	N naxa Tito mayandi a xa siga wo yire. N man naxa n ngaxakerenyi gbɛtɛ xɛɛ naxan a matima. Tito wo rawali nɛ? N nun Tito mu ɲɛrɛ xaxili keren xa fari? A mu n tan xa fɔxi raba?
47012019	N xanuntenyie, kabi tɛmui xɔnnakuye wo ɲɔxɔ a ma muxu na muxu yɛtɛ nan xunmafalafe, kɔnɔ muxu na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa masenyi nan tife wo bɛ Ala ya xɔri alako wo xa danxaniya xa sabati.
47012020	Kɔnɔ n bara gaaxu n wo ɲɛrɛ ki nde life naa naxan mu rafan n ma. Tɛmunde n fan ɲɛrɛ ki mu fama rafande wo ma. N bara gaaxu n na siga wo xɔnyi n yi fee nan lima naa: lantareya, tɔɔnɛ, xɔnnanteya, boore matandi, wɔyɛn ɲaaxi, naafixiya, yɛtɛ igboɲa, nun ɲaxasi.
47012021	Yi biyaasi n bara gaaxu Ala fama nɛ n ma fe ragorode wo saabui ra, n fa nimisa wo xa yunubie xa fe ra, mixi ndee mu gbilen naxee fɔxɔ ra, alɔ sɛniyɛntareɲa, yɛnɛ, nun langoeɲa.
47013001	N ma biyaasi saxan nde nan yi ki wo xɔnyi. «Fe birin makiitima seede firin, xa na mu, seede saxan nan xui ma.»
47013002	N to n ma biyaasi firin nde raba wo xɔnyi, n naxa a fala wo bɛ, «N na fa, n mu diɲɛma mixi yo ma.» Yakɔsi, hali n na yire makuye, n man bara gbilen na wɔyɛnyi ma mixie bɛ, naxee nu bara yunubi raba, a nun mixi gbɛtɛe.
47013003	Wo wama a kolonfe xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na wɔyɛnfe n saabui nan na. Wo fama na kolonde, barima a sɛnbɛ mu xurun wo bɛ. A sɛnbɛ gbo wo ya ma.
47013004	Mixie naxa a mabanban wuri magalanbuxi ma a xa sɛnbɛtareya kui, kɔnɔ Ala naxa a rakeli faxɛ ma sɛnbɛ ra. Muxu tan fan, muxu sɛnbɛ mu gbo, kɔnɔ muxu fama nɛ lude a sɛɛti ma wo malife ra Ala sɛnbɛ saabui ra.
47013005	Wo xa wo yɛtɛ mato a kolonfe ra xa wo danxaniyaxi. Wo xa na mato a fanyi ra. Wo mu a kolon Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa na wo bɔɲɛ i? Kɔnɔ xa wo bara a to wo mu danxaniyaxi, Isa mu na wo bɔɲɛ i de!
47013006	Wo xa a kolon muxu tan danxaniyaxi.
47013007	Muxu Ala maxandima wo bɛ alako wo naxa fe ɲaaxi yo raba. Muxu mu wama wo xa lu tinxinyi kui alako muxu xa xili fanyi sɔtɔ. Muxu wama na nan xɔn wo tan bɛ, alako wo xa lu kira fanyi xɔn, hali mixi nde kiiti ɲaaxi dɔxɔma muxu ma.
47013008	Muxu tan mu nɔma nɔndi matandide, fo muxu xa bira a fɔxɔ ra.
47013009	Xa muxu sɛnbɛ xurun, kɔnɔ wo gbe naxa gbo, muxu bara ɲɛlɛxin. Muxu Ala maxandima nɛ alako wo xa danxaniya xa kamali.
47013010	N na bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe wo ma yire makuye barima n mu wama fe xɔrɔxɔɛ falafe wo bɛ wo ya xɔri. Marigi bara n xɛɛ a xili ra alako n xa wo mali, wo xun nakanafe mu na naxan na.
47013011	N ngaxakerenyie, a dɔnxɔɛ ra, Ala, xanunteya nun bɔɲɛsa kanyi xa lu wo sɛɛti ma, wo xa sɛɛwa, wo xa kamali, wo xa wo bore ralimaniya, wo xa lan wo bore ma, wo xa lu bɔɲɛsa kui.
47013012	Wo xa wo bore xɛɛbu sunbui sɛniyɛnxi ra. Sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin bara wo xɛɛbu.
47013013	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ wo ra, Ala xa wo xanu, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa lu wo bɔɲɛ i.
48001001	-
48001002	N tan Pɔlu nun n ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae xɛɛbu naxee na Galati bɔxi ma. Mixi yo mu n xɛɛxi. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nun Baba Ala naxan a rakelixi faxɛ ma, e tan nan n xɛɛxi.
48001003	Won Baba Ala nun won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, e xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
48001004	Isa a yɛtɛ baxi sɛrɛxɛ ra won ma yunubie xafarife nan na, a xa won natanga yi waxati ɲaaxi ma, alɔ won Baba Ala wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
48001005	Tantui na Ala bɛ abadan. Amina.
48001006	N dɛ bara ixara wo to gbilenfe wo xilima fɔxɔ ra yi ikɔrɛxi ra, naxan bara wo xili a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa hinnɛ saabui ra. Wo na birafe masenyi gbɛtɛ nan fɔxɔ ra,
48001007	naxan mu findixi masenyi fanyi ra. Mixi ndee wama wo xaxili ifufe, e xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi mafindi.
48001008	Kɔnɔ xa a sa li muxu tan, xa na mu a ra Ala xa malekɛ nde naxa masenyi ti wo bɛ, naxan mu lanxi na masenyi fanyi ma naxan masenxi wo bɛ a singe ra, dankari na na kanyi bɛ.
48001009	N xa gbilen na ma a firin nde. Xa mixi yo fa masenyi nde tide wo bɛ, naxan mu lanxi na masenyi fanyi ma naxan masenxi wo bɛ a singe ra, dankari na na kanyi bɛ.
48001010	Na kui, n na nde sago rabafe, ibunadama ba ka Ala? Wo ɲɔxɔ a ma a n wama adamadi sago nan nabafe? Xa na na a ra nu, n mu findima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa konyi ra.
48001011	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa a fala wo bɛ a n xibaaru fanyi naxan ibama a mu fatanxi adama xaxili xa ra.
48001012	N mu a sɔtɔ mixi xa ra. Mixi yo mu n xaranxi a ra. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa yati nan a masenxi n bɛ.
48001013	Wo bara a mɛ a singe n nu biraxi Yuwifie xa diinɛ fɔxɔ ra sɛnbɛ ra ki naxɛ. N nu Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae ɲaxankatama nɛ a ɲaaxi ra alako n xa e sɔntɔ.
48001014	N xaranyi naxan nabaxi Yuwifie xa diinɛ kui, a dangi n booree xa xaranyi ra. N nu birama n benbae xa naamunyie fɔxɔ ra sɛnbɛ nan na.
48001015	Kɔnɔ Ala nu bara n sugandi kafi n bari tɛmui. A naxa n xili a xa hinnɛ ra,
48001016	a fa a xa Di masen n bɛ, alako n xa a xa fe kawandi ti si gbɛtɛe tagi. A to n xili na ma, n mu marasi fen mixi yo ra,
48001017	n mu siga Darisalamu mixie yire naxee singe findi Isa xa xɛɛrae ra n tan bɛ. N naxa siga keren na Arabu bɔxi ma. Na dangi xanbi n naxa gbilen Damasi taa kui.
48001018	Ɲɛ saxan to dangi, n naxa siga Darisalamu, alako n xa Piyɛri kolon. N naxa lu a xɔnyi xi fu nun suuli.
48001019	N mu Isa xa xɛɛra gbɛtɛ to na tɛmui, fo Isa xunya Yaki.
48001020	N xa a fala wo bɛ Ala ya xɔri, n naxan sɛbɛfe wo ma, wule yo mu na a kui.
48001021	Na ɲɛrɛ dangi xanbi, n naxa siga Siriya nun Silisi bɔxi ma.
48001022	Isayanka ɲamae naxee nu na Yudaya, nee mu nu n kolonxi na tɛmui,
48001023	kɔnɔ e nu bara a mɛ a mixi naxan nu e tɔɔrɔma, a a bara findi danxaniya kawandila ra. «Singe a nu wama na danxaniya xun nakanafe, kɔnɔ yakɔsi a na a kawandife.»
48001024	Na kui, e naxa Ala matɔxɔ n ma fe ra.
48002001	Ɲɛ fu nun naani to dangi kelife na biyaasi singe ma, n man naxa gbilen Darisalamu. Baranabasi nun Tito nu na n fɔxɔ ra.
48002002	Ala nu bara a masen n bɛ n xa siga naa alako n xa dɛntɛgɛ sa e bɛ n xibaaru fanyi naxan ibama si gbɛtɛe tagi. N mu na dɛntɛgɛ sa e birin xa bɛ, fo danxaniyatɔɛ kuntigie, barima n mu nu wama n ma wali xun xa rakana.
48002003	Kɔnɔ hali Tito Girɛkika naxan nu na n fɔxɔ ra, e mu a karaxan a xa sunna.
48002004	Mixi sunnafe nu bara findi ɲɔxɔnsɔsɔɛ ra muxu tagi, barima mixi nde naxee mu findixi danxaniyatɔɛe ra, nee naxa so muxu ya ma gundo kui. E nu wama won ma xɔrɛya nan nabɛnfe, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa naxan fixi won ma, alako won man xa gbilen konyiya kui.
48002005	Kɔnɔ muxu mu tin na xaxili ra fefe ma, alako wo naxa ba Isa xa nɔndi kira xɔn ma.
48002006	N mu n xaxili tixi mixie ra ɲama biraxi naxee fɔxɔ ra, barima Ala mu mixi yo rafisama a boore bɛ. E tan mu sese sa n ma masenyi fari.
48002007	E naxa a to Ala nan na xɛɛraya taxuxi n na, n xa Isa xa xibaaru fanyi iba si gbɛtɛe bɛ, alɔ Piyɛri a rabama Yuwifie bɛ ki naxɛ.
48002008	Ala naxan Piyɛri xɛɛ a xa wali rabade Yuwifie tagi, a tan nan n fan xɛɛ a xa wali rabade si gbɛtɛe tagi.
48002009	Yaki, Piyɛri, nun Yaya naxee findixi kuntigi xungbee ra danxaniyatɔɛe tagi, e naxa n nun Baranabasi rasɛnɛ a ngaxakeren ki ma e to a kolon Ala hinnɛxi n na ki naxɛ. E naxa lan a ma a muxu xa xɛɛraya raba si gbɛtɛe tagi, e tan fan xa a raba Yuwifie tagi.
48002010	E man naxa muxu mayandi muxu xa setaree mali muxu xa wali kui. Fe nan na ki n nu wama naxan nabafe a fanyi ra.
48002011	Piyɛri to fa Antiyɔki, n naxa a matandi, barima a nu bara tantan.
48002012	Beenun Yaki xa mixi ndee xa siga a yire, a nu a dɛgema a nun si gbɛtɛe. Kɔnɔ e to a xɔnyi li, a naxa gbilen mixie fɔxɔ ra naxee findixi si gbɛtɛe ra. A nu bara gaaxu Yaki xa mixie ya ra, barima e nu laxi a ra a danxaniyatɔɛe lanxi nɛ e xa sunna.
48002013	Yuwifi gbɛtɛe naxa bira a xa filankafuiɲa fɔxɔ ra, han e naxa Baranabasi fan natantan.
48002014	N to e xa tinxintareya to, naxan mu lanxi Ala xa nɔndi ma, n naxa a fala Piyɛri bɛ e birin ya xɔri, «Hali i to findixi Yuwifi ra, i na ɲɛrɛfe si gbɛtɛe xa naamunyi ki nan ma, naxan mu findi Yuwifi xa naamunyi ra. Munfe ra i a falama si gbɛtɛe bɛ e xa ɲɛrɛ Yuwifie ɲɛrɛ ki ma?»
48002015	Won tan naxee barixi Yuwifiya kui, naxee mu findixi yunubitɔɛe ra si gbɛtɛe tagi,
48002016	won a kolon mixi yo mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin nabatude, a fa lu a mu tantan na xa a findi tinxintɔɛ ra. A findima tinxintɔɛ ra a to danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma. Na kui, won bara danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, alako won xa tinxin na danxaniya saabui ra. Won mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin natinmɛde, han won xa findi tinxintɔɛe ra. Mixi yo mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin natinmɛde, han a fa findi tinxintɔɛ ra.
48002017	Xa won na tinxinyi fenfe Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra, won fa yunubi nde raba, na a masenma yunubi rafan Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma? Astɔfulahi.
48002018	N mu lama a ra sɔnɔn n nɔma Ala xa yaamari birin natinmɛde, han n xa findi tinxintɔɛ ra. Xa a sa li n bara gbilen na xaxili ma, na mu findi Ala xa sɛriyɛ ra.
48002019	N to a to n mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin natinmɛde, n naxa na xaxili lu na, alako n ma ɲɛrɛ ki fanyi xa findi tantui ra Ala bɛ.
48002020	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi faxa ki naxɛ wuri magalanbuxi ma, n waxɔnfe fan bara faxa na ki. Yakɔsi n mu birama n waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan n ma duniɲɛigiri raɲɛrɛma. N n ma duniɲɛigiri raɲɛrɛma danxaniya nan saabui ra. N bara danxaniya Ala xa Di ma naxan a yɛtɛ baxi sɛrɛxɛ ra n bɛ a xa xanunteya xa fe ra.
48002021	N mu tinma Ala xa hinnɛ rabolode. Xa a sa li n nɔma Ala xa yaamarie ratinmɛde han n xa findi tinxintɔɛ ra, a lima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa faxɛ tide yo mu na won ma kisi xa fe ra.
48003001	Wo tan Galatika xaxilitaree, nde wo madaxuxi? A masenxi nɛ wo bɛ a fiixɛ ra a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi banban nɛ wuri magalanbuxi ma.
48003002	Wo a fala n bɛ munse a niyaxi wo xa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi sɔtɔ. Wo a sɔtɔxi Ala xa sɛriyɛ ratinmɛfe nan saabui ra, ka wo a sɔtɔxi nɛ barima wo danxaniyaxi Ala xa masenyi ma wo naxan mɛxi?
48003003	Wo xaxili mu na? Singe wo xaxili nu tixi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan na, kɔnɔ yakɔsi wo laxi wo yɛtɛ kan sɛnbɛ nan na. Munfe ra?
48003004	Wo bara tɔɔrɔ Ala Xaxili sɔtɔfe ra, yakɔsi munfe ra wo wama na bɛɲinfe? Na bara findi fe fufafu ra wo bɛ?
48003005	Ala a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fima wo ma, a man kaabanakoe rabama wo tagi. A wo kima nɛ, barima wo bara a xa sɛriyɛe rabatu, ka a wo kima nɛ barima wo bara danxaniya Ala xa masenyi ma wo naxan mɛxi?
48003006	Wo xa Iburahima xa fe mato. A to danxaniya Ala ma, a naxa tinxinyi sɔtɔ Ala mabiri.
48003007	Na nan na ki, mixi naxan danxaniya Ala ma, na bara findi Iburahima xa di ra.
48003008	Kitaabui na nan yati fala beenun a xa raba, a falafe ra Ala fama si gbɛtɛe ratinxinde e xa danxaniya saabui ra. A naxa na masenyi fanyi masen singe nu, a to a fala Iburahima bɛ, «Si birin fama nɛ duba sɔtɔde i tan saabui ra.»
48003009	Na kui, danxaniyatɔɛ birin duba sɔtɔma nɛ alɔ Iburahima danxaniyatɔɛ.
48003010	Mixi naxan katama Ala xa yaamarie ratinmɛde alako a xa kisi sɔtɔ, na findixi mixi dankaxi nan na, barima a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Mixi naxan mu yaamari birin nabama, naxee sɛbɛxi Ala xa sɛriyɛ Kitaabui kui, a dankaxi.»
48003011	Mixi yo mu nɔma Ala xa yaamarie birin nabatude, na xa a findi tinxintɔɛ ra. A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Tinxintɔɛ kisima a xa danxaniya nan saabui ra.»
48003012	A man sɛbɛxi, «Mixi naxan Ala xa yaamarie birin nabatuma, a kisima nee nan saabui ra.» Xaxili firin nan a ra. Naxan a xaxili tima danxaniya ra, a mu nɔma a xaxili tide yaamarie ratinmɛfe ra.
48003013	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara won xunsara dankɛ ma, won naxan sɔtɔ barima won mu a xa yaamari birin natinmɛxi. A won xunsara nɛ, a to won ma dankɛ tongo a xa kote ra. A findi mixi dankaxi ra a faxa ki nan ma, barima a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Dankɛ na mixi bɛ naxan gbakuma wuri ma.»
48003014	A bara won xunsara alako Ala hɛɛri naxan fixi Iburahima ma, a xa dangi si gbɛtɛe ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra. Na kui, won ma danxaniya saabui ra, won nɔma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi sɔtɔde naxan laayidixi won bɛ.
48003015	N ngaxakerenyie, n xa misaali nde masen wo bɛ. Mixi mu nɔma saatɛ masarade, xa na mu a ra a kanade, saatɛ naxan tongoxi ibunadama xa sɛriyɛ ki ma. Annabi Iburahima xa saatɛ luma na ki nɛ.
48003016	Ala naxa laayidi ndee tongo Iburahima nun a xa di bɛ. Kitaabui mu a falama «die,» wɔyɛnyi naxan wama a falafe «mixi wuyaxi.» Kitaabui a falama «a nun a xa di.» Wɔyɛnyi na a ra naxan wama a falafe «mixi keren.» Na mixi keren findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan na.
48003017	N wama naxan falafe wo bɛ, a Ala xa sɛriyɛ, naxan sɛbɛxi ɲɛ kɛmɛ naani ɲɛ tongo saxan dangi xanbi Ala xa saatɛtongoe Iburahima bɛ, na sɛriyɛ mu nɔma na laayidi singe kanade.
48003018	Xa won kisi sɔtɔma kɛ ra, barima won Ala xa yaamarie ratinmɛma, won mu a sɔtɔma sɔnɔn Ala xa laayidi saabui ra. Ala a fi Iburahima ma laayidi nan na a yɛtɛ xa hinnɛ xa fe ra.
48003019	Xa na nan a ra, munfe ra Ala a niya a xa yaamarie xa sɛbɛ Kitaabui kui? A a xa yaamarie sɛbɛ nɛ yunubie xa fe ra, beenun a xa Di laayidixi xa fa. Malekɛe naxa fa na sɛriyɛ ra, e na so saabui nde yi ra.
48003020	Saabui tan luma mixi firin nan tagi, kɔnɔ Ala tan, keren nan a ra.
48003021	Ala xa sɛriyɛ nun Ala xa laayidie e boore matandima? Ade de! Xa won nu nɔma kisi sɔtɔde Ala xa yaamarie rabatui nan na nu, na nu nɔma nɛ won findide tinxintɔɛe ra.
48003022	Kɔnɔ Ala xa Kitaabui a masenxi nɛ won bɛ a duniɲa mixi birin Ala xa yaamarie matandima, e findi yunubitɔɛe ra. Na kui, Ala naxan laayidixi mixie bɛ, naxee lama a ra, e fa danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, e nɔma na sɔtɔde.
48003023	Beenun mixi xa nɔ kisi sɔtɔde danxaniya saabui ra, won nu na katafe Ala xa yaamarie ratinmɛde, alako won xa kisi, kɔnɔ won mu nɔ.
48003024	Na kui, sɛriyɛ bara won xuru han beenun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fa alako won xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ danxaniya saabui ra.
48003025	Kɔnɔ danxaniya to bara fa, won mu na sɛriyɛ xa xurui bun ma sɔnɔn,
48003026	barima wo birin bara findi Ala xa die ra, wo to danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma.
48003027	Wo tan naxee bara wo xunxa ye xɔɔra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra, wo nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan fa a ra.
48003028	Yuwifi nun Girɛki, konyi nun xɔrɛ, xɛmɛ nun ginɛ, wo birin keren Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa i.
48003029	Xa wo bara findi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi gbe ra, wo bara findi Iburahima xa die nun kɛtongoe ra alɔ Ala a laayidixi ki naxɛ.
48004001	N wama naxan falafe, kɛ tongoma, a dimɛdi tɛmui, hali a baba kɛ to findixi a gbe ra, a luxi alɔ konyi naxan mu gɛxi a yɛtɛ sɔtɔde.
48004002	A luma yatigie nun karamɔxɔe xa yaamari nan bun ma, han a baba na tin tɛmui naxɛ a xa a yɛtɛ sɔtɔ.
48004003	Won tan fan to mu nu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa kolon, won nu luxi nɛ alɔ dimɛdie. Won nu na duniɲa fe kobie xa konyiya nan bun ma.
48004004	Waxati to kamali, Ala naxa a xa Di xɛɛ duniɲa ma ginɛ nde saabui ra. A naxa bari Ala xa sɛriyɛ bun ma,
48004005	alako a xa mixie xunsara naxee nu na Ala xa sɛriyɛ xa kiiti bun ma. A naxa won xunsara alako won xa findi Ala xa die ra.
48004006	Wo to findi a xa die ra, Ala naxa a xa Di Xaxili raso wo bɔɲɛ i, xaxili naxan xili tima, «n Ba.»
48004007	Na nan a ra wo bara mini konyiya kui, wo bara findi Ala xa die ra. Wo to findixi a xa die ra, Ala man bara wo findi a kɛtongoe ra.
48004008	Singe wo mu nu Ala kolon. Duniɲa fe kobie nan nu findixi wo marigi ra, a fa li nee nun Ala tagi ikuya.
48004009	Yakɔsi wo bara Ala kolon. Ala bara wo fan kolon. Munse fa a niyaxi sɔnɔn wo man gbilenma na duniɲa fee ma naxee sɛnbɛ nun tide mu gbo? Wo man wama lufe e xa konyiya bun ma?
48004010	Wo man bara bira yaamarie fɔxɔ ra, naxee a falama lɔxɔɛ ndee nun kike ndee tide gbo e boore bɛ. Wo waxati ndee nun ɲɛ ndee rafisa e boore bɛ.
48004011	N gaaxu nɛ wo naxa n ma xaranyi rabolo, n ma wali xa lu n ma fu.
48004012	N ngaxakerenyie, n bara wo mayandi, wo lu alɔ n tan, barima n fan luxi nɛ alɔ wo tan. Wo mu fe kobi yo raba n na.
48004013	Wo a kolon a n ma fure nan a niya, a singe singe n xa wo kawandi Isa xa masenyi fanyi ra.
48004014	Na nu xɔrɔxɔ wo bɛ, kɔnɔ n ma fe mu wo bɔɲɛ raɲaaxu wo ma, wo mu wo makuya n na. Wo n nasɛnɛ nɛ alɔ Ala xa malekɛ nde, xa na mu a ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa.
48004015	Wo xa na sɛɛwɛ fori na minden? Singe n ma fe nu rafan wo ma han wo nu nɔma tinde wo yae yati bade n bɛ.
48004016	N nɔndi falafe wo bɛ, na bara a niya n xa findi wo yaxui ra?
48004017	Na mixie wama wo xa bira e fɔxɔ ra, kɔnɔ na mu findima fe fanyi ra wo bɛ. E wama won tagi isofe, alako wo xa lu e tan mabiri.
48004018	Xa wo gbata fe fanyi rabafe ra, na mu ɲaaxu. Wo xa na mɔɔli raba tɛmui birin, hali n mu na wo yire.
48004019	N ma die, n man na tɔɔrɔfe wo bɛ alɔ ginɛ xa tɔɔrɛ ditinyi ra, han Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ɲɛrɛ ki sabatima wo i tɛmui naxɛ.
48004020	A xɔli n ma won birin xa lu yire keren, alako won xa won bore fahaamu, barima yakɔsi n bara hanmɛ wo xa fe ra.
48004021	Wo tan naxee wama kisi sɔtɔfe Ala xa yaamarie ratinmɛfe saabui ra, wo mu a kolon Ala xa sɛriyɛ naxan falaxi?
48004022	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui a di firin nan nu na Iburahima yi ra. Konyi ginɛ naxa keren bari a bɛ, xɔrɛ ginɛ fan naxa di gbɛtɛ bari a bɛ.
48004023	A naxan sɔtɔ konyi ginɛ saabui ra, na barixi nɛ alɔ ibunadama birin barixi ki naxɛ, kɔnɔ a naxan sɔtɔ xɔrɛ ginɛ saabui ra, a barixi laayidi nan kui.
48004024	Na ginɛ firinyi misaalixi saatɛ firin nan na. Saatɛ naxan xirixi Sinayi geya fari nan a niyama mixi xa lu konyiya kui. Hagara misaalixi na saatɛ nan na,
48004025	naxan xirixi Sinayi geya fari Arabu bɔxi ma. A misaalixi Darisalamu fan na, naxan na konyiya kui a nun a xa die.
48004026	Kɔnɔ Darisalamu naxan na ariyanna, xɔrɛ taa nan a ra. Won nga nan na ki.
48004027	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «I tan naxan mu di barima, i xa ɲɛlɛxin. I tan naxan mu di bari tɔɔrɛ kolon, i xui ramini, a ite ɲɛlɛxinyi kui, barima ginɛ naxan xa xɛmɛ bara mɛɛ a ra, a xa di wuyama nɛ, dangi xɛmɛ taa idɔxɔɛ ra.»
48004028	Wo tan ngaxakerenyie, wo bara findi laayidi die ra alɔ Isiyaga.
48004029	Na waxati, di naxan barixi ibunadama ki ma, a naxa di boore tɔɔrɔ, naxan barixi Ala Xaxili sɛnbɛ saabui ra. Han ya a na na ki nɛ.
48004030	Munse sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui? A sɛbɛxi, «I xa konyi ginɛ nun a xa di keri, barima konyi ginɛ xa di nun xɔrɛ ginɛ xa di mu kɛ itaxunma.»
48004031	N ngaxakerenyie, na nan a ra won mu findixi konyi ginɛ xa die xa ra. Won findixi xɔrɛ ginɛ xa die nan na.
48005001	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara won xunsara, alako won xa xɔrɛya sɔtɔ. Na kui, wo xa ti a fanyi ra. Wo naxa tin konyiya nde yo xa dɔxɔ wo fari sɔnɔn.
48005002	N tan Pɔlu, n xa nɔndi fala wo bɛ, xa wo tin na mixie xa wo sunna, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa wali tide yo mu na wo bɛ sɔnɔn.
48005003	N man xa a fala wo bɛ, xɛmɛ naxan tinma e xa a sunna, a lanma a xa Ala xa yaamari birin natinmɛ.
48005004	Wo tan naxee wama tinxinyi sɔtɔfe yaamarie ratinmɛfe saabui ra, wo nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi tagi bara ikuya. Ala mu hinnɛma wo ra sɔnɔn.
48005005	Won won xaxili tima Ala Xaxili ra won ma danxaniya kui, alako won xa tinxinyi sɔtɔ won xaxili tima naxan na.
48005006	Xa mixi biraxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fɔxɔ ra, sunnɛ nun sunnatareya tide yo mu na a bɛ. Fe keren nan tide gbo: Mixi xa danxaniya Ala ma, a xa mixi xanu.
48005007	Wo nu na ɲɛrɛfe a fanyi ra. Pe, nde a niyaxi wo xa nɔndi rabolo?
48005008	Naxan wo bɛndunxi na ki, na mu findixi Ala ra naxan wo xili.
48005009	Lɛbini dondoronti nɔma farin gbegbe ratede.
48005010	N bara la wo ra Ala saabui ra, mixi yo fa a xa fa wo ya iso, wo mu tinma na xaxili mɔɔli ra. Na kanyi fama nɛ a sare sɔtɔde.
48005011	N ngaxakerenyie, xa a li nu han ya n na kawandi tife mixie xa sunna, munfe ra Yuwifie luma n ɲaxankata ra? Xa a sa li nu n na kawandi mɔɔli tima, Isa xa sɛrɛxɛ wuri magalanbuxi ma, a mu findima wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ ra mixie bɛ nu.
48005012	N wama nɛ naxee na wo ya isofe, hali e mu a dan sunnɛ fe gbansan ma. E xa e xɛmɛya birin ba na.
48005013	N ngaxakerenyie, Ala wama wo xa lu xɔrɛya kui, kɔnɔ wo naxa na xɔrɛya mafindi yunubi ra. Wo wo bore mali xanunteya kui.
48005014	Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin na yi yaamari kerenyi nan kui: Wo xa wo boore adamadi xanu alɔ wo yɛtɛ.
48005015	Xa wo luma wo bore tɔɔrɔ ra, wo nu wo bore ɲaxankata, wo a niya dɔyin, xa na mu a ra wo wo bore xa fe xun nakanama nɛ.
48005016	N wama naxan falafe wo bɛ, wo xa a lu Ala Xaxili xa wo raɲɛrɛ. Wo naxa bira wo yɛtɛ waxɔnfe ɲaaxie fɔxɔ ra.
48005017	Adama waxɔnfe ɲaaxi nun Ala Xaxili sɛniyɛnxi, a keren mu a ra. Na firinyi na e bore gerefe, alako wo naxa wo waxɔnfe raba.
48005018	Xa Ala Xaxili na wo raɲɛrɛfe, wo xaxili mu tima wo xa yaamari ratinmɛxie ra sɔnɔn.
48005019	Yunubitɔɛ waxɔnfee nan ya: langoeɲa, sɛniyɛntareɲa, sɔn kobi,
48005020	kuye batufe, duureya, xɔnnanteya, lantareya, tɔɔnɛ, bɔɲɛ tefe, geeni fenfe i yɛtɛ bɛ, sɔnxɔfe, boore rafisafe a boore bɛ,
48005021	milanteya, siisife, xulunyi ɲaaxie, nun na maniyɛe. N man xa a fala wo bɛ, mixi naxee ɲɛrɛma na ki, e mu ariyanna sɔtɔma kɛ ra muku.
48005022	Kɔnɔ Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa kɛwalie nan ya: xanunteya, sɛɛwɛ, bɔɲɛsa, diɲɛ, yarawasɛ, fanyi, lanlanteya,
48005023	bɔɲɛ bɛxiya, nun yɛtɛ suxui. Tɔnyi yo mu na na fe mɔɔlie ma.
48005024	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fɔxirabirɛe bara yunubitɔɛ waxɔnfe rabɛɲin a nun fe ɲaaxi birin.
48005025	Won to kisi sɔtɔ Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, won xa bira a fɔxɔ ra.
48005026	Won naxa won yɛtɛ igbo, won naxa won bore raxɔnɔ, won naxa mila won bore ma.
48006001	N ngaxakerenyie, xa wo bara mixi nde suxu yunubi kui, wo tan naxee xa danxaniya tilinxi, wo xa a mafuruku alako a xa gbilen Ala ma. Kɔnɔ wo xa wo ɲɛngi sa wo yɛtɛ xɔn ma, alako wo fan naxa bira na yunubi kui.
48006002	Wo wo bore mali wo xa kote xaninde. Na kui, wo Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa sɛriyɛ nan natinmɛma.
48006003	Xa mixi a yɛtɛ igboma, a na a yɛtɛ madaxufe.
48006004	Kankan xa a yɛtɛ ɲɛrɛ ki mato, xa a fan, xa a mu fan. A naxa a boore ɲɛrɛ ki mato, a fa a fala, «N fan boore bɛ.» Na kui, a xa a yɛtɛ keren gbansan mato,
48006005	alako kankan xa a yɛtɛ xa kote xanin.
48006006	Mixi naxan xaranyi sɔtɔma Ala xa masenyi xa fe ra, a lanma a xa a karamɔxɔ ki fe fanyi mɔɔli birin na.
48006007	Mixi yo naxa wo madaxu. Adamadi mu nɔma Ala madaxude. Kankan fama a yɛtɛ xa wali sare sɔtɔde nɛ.
48006008	Mixi naxan birama a yɛtɛ waxɔnfe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra, a fama nɛ sɔntɔde na xaxili kobi xa fe ra. Kɔnɔ mixi naxan birama Ala Xaxili waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra, a fama kiside Ala Xaxili nan saabui ra.
48006009	Won naxa tagan fe fanyi rabafe ra. Xa won mu tagan, won fama nɛ sare fanyi sɔtɔde a waxati.
48006010	Xa won nɔma fe fanyi nde rabade, won xa a raba mixi birin bɛ. A gbengbenyi won xa a raba won ngaxakerenyi danxaniyatɔɛe bɛ dangife mixi birin na.
48006011	Wo yi sɛbɛli mato, a xɔri xungbo, barima n na a sɛbɛfe n yɛtɛ bɛlɛxɛ nan na.
48006012	Mixi naxee na wo karaxanfe wo xa sunna, e wama nɛ ɲama xa e matɔxɔ. E na na rabafe nɛ alako e naxa ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ kawandi xa fe ra, naxan Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa sɛrɛxɛ masenma.
48006013	Sunnamixie yati mu Ala xa yaamari birin natinmɛma, kɔnɔ e wama wo tan xa sunna, alako e xa xili fanyi sɔtɔ na xa fe ra.
48006014	Kɔnɔ n tan, n wama xili fanyi sɔtɔfe won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa sɛrɛxɛ nan ma fe ra, naxan bara a niya n ɲɛrɛ ki nun duniɲa ɲɛrɛ ki, e tagi xa ikuya.
48006015	Sunnɛ nun sunnatareya tide yo mu na na. Findife mixi nɛɛnɛ ra, na nan tide gbo.
48006016	Ala xa bɔɲɛsa nun hinnɛ fi mixi birin ma naxee birama na sɛriyɛ fɔxɔ ra, a nun a xa ɲama Isirayila.
48006017	A dɔnxɔɛ ra, mixi yo naxa n tɔɔrɔ, barima Isa xa tɔɔrɛ fɔxi na n fate ma.
48006018	N ngaxakerenyie, won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa hinnɛ wo xaxili ra. Amina.
49001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, Ala bara a ragiri naxan xa findi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra ra. N bara wo tan Efɛsɛ sɛniyɛntɔɛe xɛɛbu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa danxaniyatɔɛe.
49001002	Won Baba Ala nun won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
49001003	Tantui nan Ala bɛ, naxan findixi won Marigi Isa Baba ra. Isa saabui ra, a bara barakɛ birin nagoro won ma, naxan mɔɔli mu kelima yi duniɲa ma, naxan mɔɔli mu toma, naxan won malima ariyanna kira xɔn.
49001004	Beenun duniɲa gɛmɛ singe ɲan xa dɔxɔ, Ala nu bara won sugandi Isa saabui ra alako won xa sɛniyɛn, won xa tinxin a ya i. A xa xanunteya kui,
49001005	a naxa ɲanige tongo won xa findi a xa die ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra, Ala sago fanyi ma.
49001006	Na birin nabaxi nɛ alako won xa a xa hinnɛ xungbe matɔxɔ, a naxan masenxi won bɛ a xanuntenyi Isa saabui ra.
49001007	A tan Isa bara won xunsare fi a yɛtɛ wuli ra. Won ma yunubie xafarixi a tan nan saabui ra. Na birin nabaxi Ala xa hinnɛ makaabaxi nan kui,
49001008	a bara naxan fi won ma a yiriwaxi ra, lɔnni nun fahaamui ra.
49001009	A bara a sago gundo makɛnɛn won bɛ, a to wa a xɔn a sago xa raba a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra
49001010	waxati kamali tɛmui. Ala sago findixi yi nan na: A xa se birin malan, naxee na koore a nun naxee na bɔxi, a xa a xa Mixi Sugandixi findi a birin xunyi ra.
49001011	Won fan findixi kɛtongoe ra a tan nan saabui ra, alɔ Ala a ɲanige tongoxi ki naxɛ, naxan fe birin nagirima a yɛtɛ sagoe nun a xa natɛ ma.
49001012	Na birin nabaxi nɛ alako won tan naxee findi mixi singee ra naxee e xaxili ti Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra, won xa Ala Nɔrɛ Kanyi matɔxɔ.
49001013	Wo fan to nɔndi masenyi ramɛ Isa xa fe ra, xibaaru fanyi naxan kisi fi wo ma, wo naxa danxaniya a ma. Isa saabui ra, Ala naxa wo matɔnxuma a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ra alɔ a laayidi ki naxɛ.
49001014	A bara a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fi won ma won kɛ fɔlɛ ra. A fama won kɛ dɔnxɔɛ birin fide won ma a na fa a xa mixie fɔxɔ ra tɛmui naxɛ. Yi birin nabaxi nɛ alako Ala Nɔrɛ Kanyi xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ.
49001015	Na kui, kafi n a mɛ wo danxaniyaxi Marigi Isa ma ki naxɛ, wo man sɛniyɛntɔɛe birin xanuxi ki naxɛ,
49001016	danyi yo mu na n ma tantui ma wo xa fe ra n nɛ Ala maxandima wo bɛ.
49001017	N ma maxandi sigama Baba Ala Nɔrɛ Kanyi nan ma, won Marigi Isa naxan batuma, a xa a Xaxili ragoro wo ma naxan fahaamui fima, naxan fee makɛnɛnma, alako wo xa Ala kolonyi xun xa masa.
49001018	N a maxandima wo bɔɲɛ xa fe to a fiixɛ ra alako wo xa kolon sɔtɔ a ma a Ala bara wo xili, fe xa lu wo bɛ wo wo xaxili tima naxan na, alako wo xa kolon sɔtɔ Ala xa kɛ makaabaxi ma naxan findixi a xa sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin gbe ra,
49001019	alako wo man xa kolon sɔtɔ Ala xa sɛnbɛ xungbe ma naxan na won tan danxaniyatɔɛe bɛ. Yi sɛnbɛ findixi Ala xa sɛnbɛ magaaxuxi nan na,
49001020	a naxan namini a to a xa Mixi Sugandixi rakeli faxɛ ma, a a magoro a yirefanyi ma ariyanna.
49001021	Ala bara mangɛya fi a ma naxan dangi mangɛya, nɔɛ, nun sɛnbɛ birin na. A bara xili fi a ma naxan dangi xili birin na naxan falama yi duniɲa ma a nun aligiyama.
49001022	Ala bara fe birin sa a xa yaamari bun, a man fa a findi fe birin xunyi ra danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama bɛ.
49001023	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama fan luxi nɛ alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fate. Naxan fe birin nakamalima a mɔɔli birin na, a xa fe kamalixi birin na danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama tagi.
49002001	Wo fan nu findixi mixi faxaxie nan na wo xa fe kobie nun wo xa yunubie xa fe ra
49002002	wo nu ɲɛrɛma naxee ma. Wo nu biraxi yi duniɲa fe kobie nan fɔxɔ ra. Wo nu biraxi Sentanɛ nan fɔxɔ ra, ɲinnɛe xa mangɛ naxan na kuye ma. Wo nu biraxi a xaxili nan fɔxɔ ra naxan na walife Ala yaxuie tagi.
49002003	Singe, won birin nu ɲɛrɛma na mɔɔli nan na, won bira won fate waxɔnfe nun won yɛtɛ xaxili fɔxɔ ra. Na kui, a nu lanma won xa Ala xa xɔnɛ nan tun sɔtɔ alɔ booree.
49002004	Kɔnɔ Ala xa kinikini gbo. A won xanuxi xanunteya tilinxi nan na.
49002005	Na kui, hali faxamixie nan to nu won na won ma fe kobi rabaxie xa fe ra, Ala naxa won nakeli na faxɛ ma, won nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi. Wo kisixi Ala xa hinnɛ nan saabui ra.
49002006	Ala to bara won nakeli faxɛ ma won nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi ra, a bara won naso ariyanna, a won dɔxɔ a fɛ ma.
49002007	A xa fonisireya kui, Ala kisi fixi won ma a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan saabui ra, alako birin xa a xa hinnɛ makaabaxi to waxati birin naxan sa fama.
49002008	Wo kisixi Ala xa hinnɛ nan saabui ra, wo xa danxaniya xa fe ra. Kisi mu kelima wo tan xa ma, Ala nan a fima mixi ma.
49002009	A mu kelima mixi xa wali fanyie xa ma. Na kui, mixi yo mu nɔma a yɛtɛ matɔxɔde.
49002010	Ala xa wali fɔxi nan na won na. Yakɔsi, a bara won daa a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra, alako won xa nu wali fanyie raba, a bara naxee ti won ya i won xa nu ɲɛrɛ e ma.
49002011	Na kui, wo xa ratu a Yuwifie mu wo ra bari kɛɲa ma. Naxee xili falama «sunnamixie», e wo fan xili falama «sunnataree». Wo xa a kolon a sunnɛ findixi adama xa wali nan na, naxan nabama mixi fate ra.
49002012	Wo xa ratu a singe ra wo mu nu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe yo kolon. Xɔɲɛe nan nu wo ra Isirayilakae ya ma. Laayidi nun saatɛ yo mu nu xirixi wo nun Ala tagi. Xaxili tide yo mu nu na wo yi ra, Ala kolontaree nan nu wo ra duniɲa ma.
49002013	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, wo tan naxee danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, wo tan naxee nu makuyaxi, Ala bara wo maso a ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi wuli saabui ra.
49002014	A tan nan lanyi rasoxi won tagi, ɲama firin xa findi keren na. A to a yɛtɛ fate ba sɛrɛxɛ ra, a bara yaxuya tɛtɛ rabira naxan nu tixi won tagi.
49002015	A bara Yuwifie xa sɛriyɛ, e xa yaamarie, nun e xa tɔnyie sɛnbɛ kana. A bara na ɲama firin tongo, a lanyi xiri e tagi, a e findi ɲama nɛɛnɛ keren na a xa yaamari bun ma.
49002016	A xa faxɛ saabui ra wuri magalanbuxi ma, a bara e xa yaxuya kana, a e firin birin findi keren na, a lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa lu e tan nun Ala tagi.
49002017	A to fa, a naxa wo kawandi lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa ra, wo tan naxee nu makuya. Naxee fan nu makɔrɛ, a naxa nee kawandi lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa ra.
49002018	A tan nan naadɛ rabixi won firin birin bɛ, won nun Baba Ala xa lu yire keren, a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi kerenyi saabui ra.
49002019	Na kui, wo tan naxee mu nu na Ala xa mixie ya ma, yakɔsi wo fan bara findi sɛniyɛntɔɛe ra, wo bara so Ala xa mixie ya ma.
49002020	Wo bara lu alɔ banxi tixi naxan bunyi findi xɛɛrae nun namiɲɔnmɛe ra. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan findi na banxi gɛmɛ hagigɛ ra naxan tide gbo a birin bɛ.
49002021	Banxi yire birin a boore suxuxi a tan nan saabui ra, a ite, a findi hɔrɔmɔbanxi sɛniyɛnxi ra Marigi bɛ.
49002022	Isa bara a niya wo fan xa nu malan alɔ banxi biriki dɔxɔma a boore ra ki naxɛ. Ala na wo tife alɔ banxi a Xaxili sabatima dɛnnaxɛ.
49003001	Na nan a toxi, n Ala maxandima wo bɛ, n tan Pɔlu, naxan bara findi geelimani ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa bɛ wo xa fe ra, wo tan naxee mu findixi Isirayilakae ra.
49003002	N laxi a ra, wo bara a mɛ Ala naxa a xa hinnɛ taxu n na n xa a masen wo bɛ.
49003003	N ɲan bara a nde tagi raba, Ala bara a xa gundo masen n bɛ naxan singe nu nɔxunxi.
49003004	Wo na n ma sɛbɛli xaran, wo nɔma nɛ a kolonde a fahaamui bara fi n ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi gundo xa fe ra.
49003005	Yi gundo mu nu makɛnɛnxi a singe ra nu adamadie bɛ alɔ a fa makɛnɛnxi Ala xa xɛɛra sɛniyɛnxie nun namiɲɔnmɛe bɛ ki naxɛ to Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra.
49003006	A bara makɛnɛn fa, a si gbɛtɛe nun Isirayilakae bara findi ɲama keren na. E bara findi kɛ keren tongomae ra. Ala laayidi keren nan tongoxi e birin nalanxi bɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xibaaru fanyi saabui ra.
49003007	Ala to hinnɛxi n na a sɛnbɛ birin na, n fan bara findi yi xibaaru fanyi xa walikɛ ra.
49003008	Hali n to xurunxi dangi sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin na, Ala bara hinnɛ n na. A xa hinnɛ findixi n bɛ yi nan na: N tan xa si birin kawandi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi makaabaxi ra,
49003009	n xa Ala gundo makɛnɛn adamadie birin bɛ, naxan nu nɔxunxi Ala Daali Mangɛ yi ra. Kafi fe fɔlɔ fɔlɛ yi gundo nu nɔxunxi Ala yi,
49003010	kɔnɔ yakɔsi, a sago na a ra danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa a xa lɔnni birin makɛnɛn mangɛe nun nɔlae bɛ naxee na kuye ma.
49003011	Yi birin findixi Ala xa natɛ nan na naxan nu na a yi ra abadan. A a birin nakamalixi won Marigi Isa nan saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi.
49003012	A tan saabui ra, won to danxaniyaxi a ma, won nɔma won makɔrɛde Ala ra limaniya kui, siikɛ xanbi.
49003013	Na kui, n bara wo maxandi limaniya naxa ba wo yi n ma tɔɔrɛ kui wo xa fe ra, barima a findima wo bɛ xunnakeli nan na.
49003014	Na nan a toxi, n nan n xinbi sinma Baba Ala ya i,
49003015	bɔnsɔɛ birin fatanxi naxan na, naxee na koore nun bɔxi.
49003016	N a maxandima a xa wo mali a xa nɔrɛ makaabaxi saabui ra, a xa wo bɔɲɛ sɛnbɛ so a Xaxili saabui ra.
49003017	N a maxandima a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa sabati wo bɔɲɛ i danxaniya saabui ra, wo man xa sabati xanunteya kui. Wo xa xanunteya suxu alɔ wuri bili sanke bɔxi suxuxi ki naxɛ.
49003018	N a maxandima a xa sɛnbɛ fi wo ma, alako wo nun sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin xa nɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xanunteya gboya, a kuyɛya, a iteya, nun a tilinyi kolonde wo mabiri.
49003019	Wo xa kolon sɔtɔ a ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wo xanuxi ki naxɛ, xanunteya naxan mu nɔma fahaamude a gboya xa fe ra, alako Ala xa wo rakamali a xa fe kamalixi birin na.
49003020	Matɔxɔɛ na Ala bɛ naxan nɔma fe birin na a sɛnbɛ saabui ra a naxan fixi wo ma, naxan nɔma fe birin na, dangi won ma maxandi nun maɲɔxunyi ra
49003021	Matɔxɔɛ na a tan nan bɛ danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra waxati birin, abadan. Amina.
49004001	Na kui, n tan naxan bara findi geelimani ra Marigi xa fe ra, n bara wo mayandi wo ɲɛrɛ ki xa a masen a Ala nan yati wo xilixi.
49004002	Wo xa ɲɛrɛ yɛtɛ magore nun bɔɲɛ bɛxi kui, wo nu diɲɛ wo bore bɛ, wo ti wo bore san na xanunteya kui.
49004003	Wo xa fe birin naba alako lanyi naxa kana wo tagi, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi naxan fixi wo ma bɔɲɛsa ra.
49004004	Won findixi fate keren nan na. Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi keren nan a ra. Ala wo fan xilixi nɛ wo xa wo xaxili ti fe keren nan na.
49004005	Marigi keren, danxaniya keren, nun xunxa keren nan na won bɛ.
49004006	Ala keren nan na won bɛ naxan findixi birin Baba ra, naxan na birin xun ma, naxan walima birin saabui ra, naxan na birin i.
49004007	Kɔnɔ hinnɛ fixi kankan ma won ya ma alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi a xasabixi ki naxɛ.
49004008	Na nan a toxi a sɛbɛxi, «A to te koore, a naxa a yaxuie suxu, a naxa adamadie ki.»
49004009	A to sɛbɛxi, «A bara te,» na nan na ki a bara goro han bɔxi ma sinden, beenun a man xa te.
49004010	Naxan goro, na nan man texi koore birin xun ma, alako a xa fe birin nakamali.
49004011	A adamadie ki naxan na, a findi yi nan na: ndee xa findi xɛɛrae ra, ndee xa findi namiɲɔnmɛe ra, ndee xa findi xibaaru fanyi kawandilae ra, ndee xa findi danxaniyatɔɛe xunmatie nun karamɔxɔe ra.
49004012	A won kixi nɛ na birin na alako won xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe mali e xa fata Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama raɲɛrɛde yare.
49004013	Won xa bira na fɔxɔ ra han won birin xa lu lanyi kui naxan kelima danxaniya nun Ala xa Di kolonfe ma, han won birin xa kamali alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi kamalixi ki naxɛ.
49004014	Na tɛmui won mu luma sɔnɔn alɔ diyɔrɛe. Won mu lintanma sɔnɔn alɔ wuri naxan saxi ye fari, mɔrɔnyi nun foye naxan tutunma, e a xanin yire birin. Na kui, mixie mu nɔma won natantande sɔnɔn e xa wule kawandi ra, e xa kɔɔta, nun e xa yanfanteya ra.
49004015	Won xa nɔndi nan fala xanunteya kui. Fe birin kui, won xa danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, naxan findixi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xunyi ra. Won xa mɔ na danxaniya kui.
49004016	Xunyi nan fate salonse birin naɲɛrɛma. Kankan xirixi a boore ra, kankan a xa wali rabama, alako fate birin xa mɔ, a xa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ xanunteya kui.
49004017	Na kui, n yi nan falama wo bɛ, n man xa a mabanban Marigi xili ra: Wo naxa ɲɛrɛ sɔnɔn alɔ danxaniyataree ɲɛrɛma ki naxɛ. E xaxilie birama fe fufafu nan tun fɔxɔ ra.
49004018	E xaxilie ifɔɔrɔxi. E xa fe kolontareya nun e xa sondon xɔrɔxɔya bara a niya e xa gan Ala xa kisi ra.
49004019	E mu yaagima fefe ma sɔnɔn. E bara e yɛtɛ rabolo langoeɲa xili ma. E mu wasama fe kobi mɔɔli birin nabafe ra.
49004020	Kɔnɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu wo tixi na kira xa xɔn!
49004021	Wo a xa fe mɛxi nɛ, wo man bara xaran a xa fe ra. Wo a kolon yati a nɔndi na Isa nan yi.
49004022	Wo tinkanxi nɛ wo xa wo yi ba wo ɲɛrɛ ki fori ra, naxan wo xun nakanama wo waxɔnfe kobi saabui ra.
49004023	Wo bɔɲɛ nun wo xaxili xa mafindi bɔɲɛ nɛɛnɛ nun xaxili nɛɛnɛ ra.
49004024	Wo xa wo lahalɛ fori masara a nɛɛnɛ ra. Wo luma nɛ alɔ wo bara findi mixi nɛɛnɛ ra Ala naxan daaxi a xa ɲɛrɛ a xa tinxinyi nun sɛniyɛnyi yati kui.
49004025	Na kui, won xa wule lu, won xa nɔndi nan fala won bore bɛ, barima won findixi fate keren salonyie nan na.
49004026	Xa wo xɔnɔ, wo naxa yunubi raba. Wo naxa a lu soge xa dula xɔnɛ na wo bɔɲɛ kui,
49004027	alako wo naxa santide lu Ibulisa bɛ.
49004028	Muɲɛti xa muɲɛ lu. A xa wali tinxinyi kui alako a xa munafanyi sɔtɔ a naxan fima setaree ma.
49004029	Wo naxa a lu wɔyɛn kobi yo xa mini wo dɛ i. Wo xa wɔyɛn fanyi nan fala naxan nɔma mixi malide a hayi ki ma, alako wo xa wɔyɛnyi xa findi hinnɛ ra e bɛ.
49004030	Wo naxa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi tɔɔrɔ, Ala wo matɔnxumaxi naxan na han a fama won fɔxɔ ra lɔxɔ naxɛ.
49004031	Wo xa wo yi ba yi fe mɔɔli birin na: xɔnɛ, bɔɲɛte, ɲaaxuɲa, ɲɔxɔnsɔsɔɛ, konbi, a nun fe kobi mɔɔli birin.
49004032	Wo xa marafanyi nun bɔɲɛ fanyi masen wo bore bɛ. Wo xa diɲɛ wo bore ma alɔ Ala diɲɛxi wo fan ma ki naxɛ a xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
49005001	Na kui, wo to bara findi Ala xa di xanuxie ra, wo xa a fɔxi nan naba.
49005002	Wo xa ɲɛrɛ xanunteya kui alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi won xanuxi ki naxɛ, a a yɛtɛ fi won ma fe ra, a findi won ma sɛrɛxɛ ra naxan labundɛ xiri rafan Ala ma.
49005003	Kɔnɔ langoeɲa, milɛ, nun sɛniyɛntareɲa mɔɔli yo naxa lu wo yi ra. E xa fe ɲan naxa fala wo tagi, barima na mu lan sɛniyɛntɔɛe ya ma.
49005004	Wɔyɛnyi masuturatare, daxuɲa wɔyɛnyi, wɔyɛn ɲaaxi, e sese naxa mɛ wo tagi. Na mu lan. Wo xa nu tantu wɔyɛnyi nan fala wo bore tagi.
49005005	Wo xa a kolon a fanyi ra, a langoe, sɛniyɛntare, a nun milante (naxan maniya kuye batui ra), e sese mu findixi kɛ tongoma ra Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi xa mangɛya niini bun ma.
49005006	Wo naxa a lu mixi yo xa wo madaxu wɔyɛnyi fufafu ra. Yi yunubi mɔɔlie xa fe ra, Ala xa xɔnɛ goroma nɛ mixie ma naxee mu a xui suxuma.
49005007	Na kui, wo naxa gbaku e ra.
49005008	Singe, dimi nan nu wo ra, kɔnɔ yakɔsi, wo bara findi naiyalanyi ra Marigi saabui ra. Wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ alɔ a lan naiyalanyi xa die xa e ɲɛrɛ ki naxɛ.
49005009	Naiyalanyi xa wali toma fe fanyi birin, tinxinyi birin, nun nɔndi birin kui.
49005010	Wo xa kata wo xa kolon sɔtɔ fee ma naxee Ala kɛnɛnxi.
49005011	Wo naxa wo gbe raso dimi xa wali kobi ya ma feo! Wo xa na fe mɔɔli ramini kɛnɛ ma.
49005012	Barima na mixi mɔɔlie fe naxee rabama nɔxunyi kui, hali a ifalafe yɛtɛ mayaagi.
49005013	Kɔnɔ naiyalanyi fe naxan birin makɛnɛnma, a toma nɛ ya ra.
49005014	Fe naxan birin toma ya ra, a fan bara findi naiyalanyi ra. A falaxi na nan ma, «I tan naxan xife, xunu. Keli faxamixie ya ma, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yanbɛ xa ti i ma.»
49005015	Na kui, wo mɛɛni wo ɲɛrɛ ki ma. Wo naxa wo ɲɛrɛ alɔ xaxilitaree. Wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ nɛ alɔ xaxilimae.
49005016	Wo mɛɛni yi tɛmui ma, barima yi tɛmui mu fan.
49005017	Na na a ra, a mu lan wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ alɔ xaxilitare. Wo xa kolon sɔtɔ Marigi waxɔnfe ma.
49005018	Wɛni naxa wo rasiisi, barima xaxilitareɲa nan na ki. Wo xa kamali Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan na.
49005019	Wo xa wɔyɛn wo bore bɛ suuki nun bɛɛti ra. Wo xa suukie nun bɛɛtie ba Marigi bɛ naxee kelima wo bɔɲɛ yati yati ma.
49005020	Wo xa tantui rasiga Baba Ala ma fe birin xa fe ra, tɛmui birin. Wo xa na raba Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xili saabui ra.
49005021	Wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo bore bɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa yaragaaxui kui.
49005022	Ginɛe, wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo xa mɔrie bɛ, alɔ wo wo yɛtɛ magoroma Marigi bɛ ki naxɛ.
49005023	Xɛmɛ findixi a xa ginɛ xunyi nan na, alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi findixi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xunyi ra ki naxɛ. Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama fan findixi a fate nan na, a bara naxan nakisi.
49005024	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama a yɛtɛ magoroma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bɛ ki naxɛ, ginɛe fan lanma e xa e yɛtɛ magoro e xa mɔrie bɛ na ki nɛ fe birin kui.
49005025	Xɛmɛe, wo xa wo xa ginɛe xanu alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xanuxi ki naxɛ. A a yɛtɛ fi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa fe ra
49005026	alako a xa a rasɛniyɛn, a xa a rafiixɛ ye ra masenyi saabui ra,
49005027	a xa a dɛntɛgɛ a yɛtɛ bɛ nɔrɛ kui. Na kui, danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama luma nɛ alɔ dugi tofanyi, xɔsi yo mu na naxan ma, naxan mu matɔrɔɲɔxi. A xa sɛniyɛn, tantanyi yo naxa lu a ma.
49005028	Xɛmɛe lanma e xa e xa ginɛe xanu na mɔɔli nan na. E xa e xanu alɔ e e yɛtɛ fate xanuxi ki naxɛ. Naxan a xa ginɛ xanuma, a a yɛtɛ nan xanuxi.
49005029	Mixi yo mu na naxan a yɛtɛ fate xɔnma, barima mixi birin a yɛtɛ rabaloma, a mɛɛni a yɛtɛ fate ma. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan mɛɛnima danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ma na ki nɛ,
49005030	barima won findixi a fate salonyie nan na.
49005031	«Na kui, xɛmɛ fama nɛ kelide a baba nun a nga xun ma, a a maso a xa ginɛ ra, e findi fate keren na.»
49005032	Gundo belebele nan na ki, kɔnɔ n na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nun danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama nan ma fe falafe.
49005033	Kɔnɔ kankan xa a xa ginɛ xanu alɔ a yɛtɛ yati. Ginɛ fan lanma a xa a xa mɔri binya.
49006001	Die, wo xa wo nga nun wo baba binya Marigi xa fe ra, barima na nan findi fe tinxinxi ra.
49006002	Yaamari singe nan ya, barakɛ laayidixi naxan xanbi ra: «I xa i nga nun i baba binya,
49006003	alako fee xa sɔɔnɛya i bɛ, i xa simaya sɔtɔ duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari.»
49006004	Babae, wo fan naxa wo xa die raxɔnɔ. Wo xa e xuru, wo e rasi alɔ Marigi wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
49006005	Konyie, wo xa wo marigie sago raba, naxee na wo xun ma yi duniɲa ma. Wo xa e binya, wo gaaxu e ya ra. Wo xa e sago raba wo nii ra, alɔ wo Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi sago rabama ki naxɛ.
49006006	Wo naxa a raba e ya tode gbansan xa ra, alɔ naxee katama e yɛtɛ rafande mixi ma. Wo xa a raba nɛ alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa konyie naxee Ala sago rabama e bɔɲɛ birin na.
49006007	Wo a raba wo tinxi ra. Wo naxa wali e bɛ alɔ wo na walife e tan gbansan nan ma fe ra. Wo xa wali nɛ alɔ wo na walife Marigi nan bɛ,
49006008	barima wo a kolon, mixi fe fanyi yo raba, xa a findi konyi ra, xa a findi xɔrɛ ra, Marigi a sare fima nɛ.
49006009	Konyi marigie, wo fan xa a raba na ki nɛ wo xa konyie bɛ. Wo xa ba xaaɲɛfe e ma, barima wo a kolon Marigi keren nan na wo birin bɛ koore ma, naxan mu mixi yo rafisa a boore bɛ.
49006010	A dɔnxɔɛ ra, wo xa wo sɛnbɛ so Marigi saabui ra nun a xa sɛnbɛ magaaxuxi saabui ra.
49006011	Wo xa Ala xa geresose birin tongo, alako wo xa nɔ tide Ibulisa xa kɔɔta birin kanke.
49006012	Barima won mu na ibunadama xa gerefe. Mangɛe, nɔlae, yi duniɲa sɛnbɛma ɲaaxie, ɲinnɛ naxee na kuye ma, gere na won nun nee nan birin tagi.
49006013	Na nan a ra, wo xa Ala xa geresose birin tongo alako na lɔxɔɛ kobi na a li, wo xa nɔ tide. Na gere raɲɔnyi xa wo li wo tixi.
49006014	Na kui, wo xa ti nɛ. Wo wo tagi ixiri nɔndi ra. Wo tinxinyi findi wo kanke makantase ra.
49006015	Wakilife xibaaru fanyi masende naxan bɔɲɛsa fima mixi ma, wo xa na findi sankiri ra wo sanyie bɛ.
49006016	Safe na birin xun ma, wo xa danxaniya suxu wo yi ra alɔ wure lefa. Na nan nɔma Sentanɛ xa tanbɛ radɛxɛxie ratide, a e raxuben.
49006017	Wo man xa kisi suxu naxan findixi wo xun makantase ra. Wo Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa santidɛgɛma fan suxu naxan findixi Ala xa masenyi ra.
49006018	Wo xa Ala maxandi tɛmui birin a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, duba nun maxandi mɔɔli birin na. Na kui, wo naxa yanfa. Wo xa wo tunnabɛxi nɛ Ala maxandife ra sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin bɛ.
49006019	Wo xa Ala maxandi n fan bɛ, alako n na n dɛ ibi, Ala xa n mali a xa xibaaru fanyi gundo makɛnɛnde birin bɛ limaniya ra.
49006020	N findixi Ala xa santigi nan na yɔlɔnxɔnyi bara balan naxan ma na xibaaru fanyi xa fe ra. Wo xa Ala maxandi n bɛ alako n xa a masen limaniya ra alɔ n lan n xa a masen ki naxɛ.
49006021	Tikike n ma fe nun n ma wali xa fe birin masenma nɛ wo bɛ. Won ngaxakerenyi xanuxi nan a ra danxaniya kui. Tunnabɛxila nan a ra Marigi xa wali kui.
49006022	N a xɛɛxi wo ma na nan ma, alako a xa muxu xa fe tagi raba wo bɛ, a man xa wo bɔɲɛ ralimaniya.
49006023	Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa bɔɲɛsa, xanunteya, nun danxaniya fi ngaxakerenyie ma.
49006024	Ala xa hinnɛ fi birin ma Marigi Isa xa xanunteya mu ɲɔnma mixi naxee bɛ.
50001001	N tan Pɔlu nun Timote, naxee findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa konyie ra, muxu bara wo xɛɛbu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa sɛniyɛntɔɛ naxee na Filipi, a nun wo xa yareratie nun wo malimae.
50001002	Won Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
50001003	Tɛmui birin n na ratu wo ma, n Ala tantuma nɛ.
50001004	N Ala maxandima wo bɛ sɛɛwɛ ra tɛmui birin,
50001005	barima wo bara n mali Ala xa masenyi kawandife ra kabi a fɔlɛ han yakɔsi.
50001006	N a kolon, Ala, naxan wali fanyi fɔlɔxi wo tagi, a fama nɛ a rakamalide a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fa lɔxɔɛ.
50001007	A lan nɛ yi xaxili xa lu n bɛ barima wo rafan n ma. Xa n na geeli kui, xa n na Ala xa xibaaru fanyi xunmageresofe kawandi ra, Ala hinnɛma nɛ won birin na.
50001008	Ala a kolon n wo xanuxi alɔ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa wo xanuxi ki naxɛ.
50001009	N Ala maxandima nɛ wo bɛ alako wo xa xanunteya xun xa masa fe kolonyi nun fahaamui tilinxi ra,
50001010	alako wo xa nɔ a kolonde fe naxan tide gbo. Na kui, wo bɔɲɛ xa fiixɛ, marakɔrɔsi yo naxa lu wo ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fa lɔxɔɛ.
50001011	Na lɔxɔɛ Isa fama nɛ wo matinxinde alako Ala xa matɔxɔ, a sɛnbɛ xa kolon.
50001012	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa a kolon, tɔɔrɛ naxan n lixi, na bara Inyila Isa masenyi wali rasɔɔnɛya,
50001013	barima mangɛ xa sɔɔrie nun mixie birin bara a kolon n na geeli kui Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe nan ma.
50001014	N ngaxakerenyie bara limaniya Marigi xa fe ma n ma ɲaxankatɛ saabui ra. Yakɔsi e mu gaaxuma fefe ya ra, e Ala xa masenyi kawandima sɛnbɛ ra.
50001015	Nɔndi nan a ra, ndee na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe kawandife milɛ nun tɔɔnɛ nan ma, kɔnɔ ndee fan na kawandi tife bɔɲɛ fanyi nan na.
50001016	Nee a rabafe xanunteya nan na, barima e a kolon a n findixi Xibaaru Fanyi xunmagereso nan na.
50001017	Booree Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe kawandima e xa yɛtɛ igboɲa nan na. E bɔɲɛ mu fiixɛ. E ɲɔxɔ a ma a e nɔma n ma geeli ɲaxankatɛ xun masade e xa kawandi ra.
50001018	Fefe mu a ra. Xa e bɔɲɛ fiixɛ, xa e bɔɲɛ mu fiixɛ, e na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe masenfe. Yi findima sɛɛwɛ nan na n bɛ to nun tina,
50001019	barima n a kolon fe naxee bara n li, e findima kisi nan na n bɛ wo xa Ala maxandi saabui ra nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa Xaxili xa mali saabui ra.
50001020	N a kolon n fe birin nabama alako n naxa yaagi fefe ra. N xa limaniya yakɔsi alɔ tɛmui dangixi alako Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ n ma simaya xa na mu n ma faxɛ saabui ra.
50001021	N ma duniɲɛigiri kui, n birama nɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fɔxɔ ra. N ma faxɛ findima fe fanyi nan na n bɛ,
50001022	kɔnɔ xa n lu duniɲa, n nɔma nɛ wali gbegbe rabade Ala bɛ. Awa, n munse rabama? N mu a kolon.
50001023	Na fe na n bɛndunfe yire firin. A xɔli n ma n xa keli be, n xa siga Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi yire. Na fan dangi fe birin na.
50001024	Kɔnɔ a lanma n xa lu duniɲa wo tan ma fe ra.
50001025	N bara a kolon n luma nɛ wo ya ma alako wo xa siga yare, wo man xa sɛɛwa danxaniya kui.
50001026	N na gbilen wo yire, wo xa matɔxɔɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa bɛ, na xun fama masade n ma fe ra.
50001027	Wo ɲɛrɛ ki xa lan Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa Xibaaru Fanyi ma tun, alako xa n na wo ya ma ba, xa n mu na ba, n nɔma a kolonde xaxili keren nan na wo bɛ, wo birin walife danxaniya keren nan na, danxaniya naxan fatanxi Ala xa Xibaaru Fanyi ra.
50001028	Wo naxa gaaxu wo gerefae ya ra. Wo xa limaniya findixi tɔnxuma nan na e bɛ e lɔɛfe ra, wo fan xa a kolon wo kisima nɛ.
50001029	Na kisi kelixi Ala nan ma, barima a bara hinnɛ wo ra dɔxɔ firin: Wo danxaniyafe Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, a nun wo man tɔɔrɔfe a bɛ,
50001030	alɔ wo n fan to tɔɔrɔ ra ki naxɛ. Alɔ wo man bara a mɛ ki naxɛ, han ya n na na tɔɔrɛ nan kui.
50002001	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi to madundui nde fima wo ma, a xa xanunteya to limaniya nde fima wo ma, lanyi to na wo nun Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi tagi, xanunteya nun kinikini nde to na wo yi ra,
50002002	wo xa n ma ɲɛlɛxinyi rakamali. Wo lu lanyi kui. Xaxili keren, xanunteya keren, nun ɲɛrɛ ki keren nan xa lu wo tagi.
50002003	Wo naxa fefe raba tɔɔnɛ kui. Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ rafisa wo booree bɛ. Wo nde ba wo xa fe ra, wo a sa wo boore gbe xun yɛtɛ magore kui.
50002004	Wo naxa wo yɛtɛ xa munafanyi fen. Wo wo booree nan ma munafanyi fen.
50002005	Wo yuge xa lu alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa.
50002006	Kabi abadan, a nu na Ala kɛɲa nɛ, kɔnɔ a mu tin a xa a yɛtɛ tide sa Ala ilanyi.
50002007	A naxa diɲɛ a yɛtɛ birin ma, a tin lude konyi kɛɲa ma, a bari duniɲa ma alɔ adamadi, mixie fan naxa a kolon adamadi ra.
50002008	A naxa a yɛtɛ magoro, a xa Ala sago raba, han a naxa tin faxɛ ra wuri magalanbuxi ma.
50002009	Na nan a toxi Ala naxa a binya, a a xili gbo dangi xili birin na,
50002010	alako naxee na koore, naxee na bɔxi, naxee na bɔxi bun ma, e na Isa xili mɛ tɛmui naxɛ, e birin xa e xinbi sin a bun,
50002011	e xa a fala, «Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan na Marigi ra.» Na xa findi matɔxɔɛ ra Baba Ala bɛ.
50002012	N xanuntenyie, wo bara n xui suxu n nu na wo tagi tɛmui naxɛ. Yakɔsi fan, wo xa Ala xa yaamarie rabatu n xanbi dangife a singe ra. Wo xa gaaxu Ala ya ra, wo xa wakili wo xa kisi xa fe ra.
50002013	Ala nan fe ragirima wo ma alako wo ɲanige xa lan a gbe ma, wo xa a waxɔnfe raba.
50002014	Wo nɛ fefe rabama wo naxa wo yaxaseri masa, wo naxa sɔnxɔ,
50002015	alako nɔndi nun sɛniyɛnyi xa lu wo bɛ, wo tan Ala xa die naxee yanbama alɔ tɛ dɛxɛ yi duniɲa mixi ɲaaxi tinxintaree ya ma,
50002016	wo nɛ kisi masenyi tima tɛmui naxɛ. Na kui, n matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fa lɔxɔɛ, barima n mu duniɲa igirixi tɔɔrɛ kui fufafu ra.
50002017	Hali n faxa wo bɛ, n ma duniɲɛigiri fama findide wo bɛ sɛrɛxɛ nan na naxan sama wo xa danxaniya sɛrɛxɛ xun ma. Na n nasɛɛwama nɛ.
50002018	Wo fan xa sɛɛwa, won birin xa sɛɛwa.
50002019	N bara n xaxili ti Marigi Isa ra a xa n mali alako n xa Timote xɛɛ wo ma, alako a xa n nalimaniya wo xa xibaaru ra.
50002020	Mixi yo mu na n yi ra, wo xa fe rafan naxan ma alɔ a tan.
50002021	Birin wama e yɛtɛ kan xa geeni nan xɔn ma, e mu na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa geeni xa fenfe.
50002022	Wo a kolon Timote bara a tunnabɛxi tɔɔrɛ kui Ala xa Xibaaru Fanyi xa fe ra. Kabi a naxa wali fɔlɔ n sɛɛti ma tɛmui naxɛ, a bara lu alɔ di naxan birama a baba fɔxɔ ra.
50002023	Na kui, a xɔli n ma n xa a xɛɛ wo yire, n ma fe makɛnɛnma tɛmui naxɛ.
50002024	N a kolon a gbe mu luxi, Ala xa a ragiri n xa fa wo yire.
50002025	Kɔnɔ n ma maɲɔxunyi ma, fo n xa n ngaxakerenyi Epaforodite xɛɛ wo yire. A bara n mali ki fanyi ra Ala xa fe geremaso kui, alɔ wo a xɛɛxi n ma fe naxan ma.
50002026	Wo to xɔli bara a suxu ki fanyi. A bara kɔntɔfili barima wo bara a xa fure fe mɛ.
50002027	A fura nɛ a ɲaaxi ra. A gbe mu nu luxi a xa faxa, kɔnɔ Ala naxa kinikini a ma. Ala naxa kinikini n fan ma, alako na sunnunyi naxa sa n ma tɔɔrɛ xun.
50002028	Na na a ra n bara gbata a xɛɛfe ra wo ma alako wo xa ɲɛlɛxin a tofe ra, n fan bɔɲɛ ndedi xa sa.
50002029	Wo xa a rasɛnɛ Marigi xili ra sɛɛwɛ kui. Wo xa yi mixi mɔɔli binya,
50002030	barima a mu tondi fefe yo ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa wali kui, hali a findi a bɛ faxɛ ra. A bara n mali wo tan mu nu nɔma n malide naxee ra.
50003001	Yakɔsi, n ngaxakerenyie, wo xa sɛɛwa wo Marigi ra. N mu taganma gbilende fee tagi rabade wo bɛ, n naxee sɛbɛxi wo ma tɛmui dangixi, alako na xa wo ratanga.
50003002	Wo xa wo yɛtɛ ratanga mixi ɲaaxie ma, wali kobi rabae naxee wama finɛ rawalife tun mixi sunnafe ma.
50003003	Won tan nan na mixi sunnaxie ra a nɔndi ki ma, won tan naxee Ala batuma a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, naxee sɛɛwama Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, naxee mu e xaxili tima e yɛtɛ ra.
50003004	Xa n wa, n fan nɔma n xaxili tide n yɛtɛ ra. Xa mixi nde a maɲɔxunxi nɛ a a nɔma a xaxili tide a yɛtɛ ra, n dangi na kanyi ra pon!
50003005	N sunnaxi a xi solomasaxan lɔxɔɛ nɛ, Isirayilaka nan n na, naxan kelixi Bunyamin bɔnsɔɛ, Eburu yati yati nan lanxi n ma n bari ki ma.
