50003006	N nu biraxi Ala xa sɛriyɛ fɔxɔ ra a Farisɛni ki nɛ, n nu fa Isa xa danxaniyatɔɛe ɲaxankata. Marakɔrɔsi ɲaaxi yo mu nu na n ma.
50003007	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, n to bara danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, n nu se naxan birin maɲɔxunxi fe fanyie ra, e tide yo mu na n bɛ sɔnɔn.
50003008	Marigi Isa kolonfe nan tide gbo nee birin bɛ. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi sɔtɔfe dangi na fe birin na, n bara naxee lu a xa fe ra. Na fee bara lu n bɛ alɔ fee fufafu alako n xa Isa xa munafanyi sɔtɔ.
50003009	N xa lu a tan nan ma fe, barima n yɛtɛ sɛnbɛ mu nɔma n findide mixi tinxinxi ra. N mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin nabatude. Kɔnɔ xa n bara danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, Ala tan nɔma nɛ n matinxinde. Ala nan mixi matinxinma danxaniya saabui ra.
50003010	Na kui, n wama naxan xɔn, n xa Isa kolon. N xa a xa marakeli sɛnbɛ kolon, n man xa tɔɔrɔ alɔ a tɔɔrɔxi ki naxɛ. N wama lufe nɛ alɔ Isa nu na ki naxɛ a faxa tɛmui,
50003011	alako n fan xa keli faxɛ ma.
50003012	N a kolon n mu nu gɛ na birin sɔtɔde sinden, n ma fe mu gɛxi kamalide. Kɔnɔ n xa siga yare alako Isa n sugandixi fe naxan ma, n fan xa a xa fe suxu.
50003013	N ngaxakerenyie, n a kolon n mu gɛxi a suxude sinden, kɔnɔ n fe keren nan nabama: N mu n kobe ratoma, n sigama yare nan tun ma.
50003014	N birama nɛ n ma wali fɔxɔ ra, alako n xa sare sɔtɔ Koore Mangɛ Ala won xilixi naxan ma a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra.
50003015	Won tan naxee xa danxaniya bara tilin, a lanma na maɲɔxunyi nan xa lu won birin yi ra. Kɔnɔ xa a sa li mixi nde mu lanxi na fe ma, Ala fama na fan fiixɛde na kanyi bɛ.
50003016	Won xa siga yare alɔ won darixi a ra ki naxɛ.
50003017	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa n fɔxi raba. Mixi naxee ɲɛrɛ ki luxi alɔ muxu gbe, nee nan xa findi misaali ra wo bɛ.
50003018	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi yaxuie bara wuya, naxee mu lama a xa sɛrɛxɛ ra wuri magalanbuxi ma. N ɲan bara na fala wo bɛ sanya wuyaxi, kɔnɔ yakɔsi n a masenma nɛ wo bɛ n yaye ra.
50003019	E bara lɔɛ. E yɛtɛ waxɔnfe bara findi e xa ala ra. E naxan itema, na nan fama e ragorode. E birama yi duniɲa gbansan nan fɔxɔ ra.
50003020	Kɔnɔ won tan xɔnyi na ariyanna nan na, won nakisima Marigi Isa kelima dɛnnaxɛ fafe ra won fɔxɔ ra. Won na na nan mamɛfe.
50003021	A fama nɛ won fate makinikinixie masarade, e xa lu nɔrɛ kui alɔ a gbe. A na rabama a sɛnbɛ nan na, naxan dangi sɛnbɛ birin nalanxi ra.
50004001	N ngaxakerenyie, a xɔli n ma n xa siga wo xɛɛbude. N bara ɲɛlɛxin wo xa fe ra, naxan bara a niya n xa binyɛ sɔtɔ. N xanuntenyie, wo bira Marigi fɔxɔ ra alɔ wo darixi a ra ki naxɛ.
50004002	Ewodiye nun Sintike, yandi wo xa lan wo bore ma Marigi xa fe kui.
50004003	N malima fanyi, n bara i maxandi, i xa e mali, barima e fan bara n mali n ma kawandi tife geremaso kui. Kilementi fan bara n mali, alɔ n walibooree naxee xilie sɛbɛxi kisi buki kui.
50004004	Wo sɛɛwa Marigi ra tɛmui birin. N man xa a fala wo bɛ, wo xa sɛɛwa.
50004005	Wo xa bɔɲɛ bɛxi xa makɛnɛn birin bɛ. Marigi mu buma fafe ra sɔnɔn.
50004006	Wo naxa kɔntɔfili fefe ra, wo xa Ala maxandi fe birin kui, wo xa a mayandi, wo xa a tantu.
50004007	Na kui, Ala bɔɲɛsa nun xaxilisa fima nɛ wo ma naxan mɔɔli mu toma yi duniɲa fari. A na rabama a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan saabui ra.
50004008	Dɔnxɔɛ ra, wo xa wo xaxili dɔxɔ yi fee nan xɔn ma: fe naxan yo findi nɔndi ra, naxan yo findi sɔɔbɛ ra, naxan yo tinxin, naxan yo sɛniyɛn, naxan yo fan, naxan yo findi sɛriyɛ ra, naxan yo rafan Ala ma. Wo xa wo xaxili dɔxɔ yi fee nan xɔn binyɛ nun tantui na naxee kui.
50004009	N naxan masenxi wo bɛ, wo naxan toxi n ma misaali kui, wo bira na fɔxɔ ra. Na kui, Bɔɲɛsa Mangɛ luma nɛ wo sɛɛti ma.
50004010	N bara Marigi tantu wo xa fe ra barima wo man bara wo ɲɔxɔ sa n xɔn. Singe wo nu bara wa n malife, kɔnɔ Ala mu a ragiri.
50004011	N mu yi falaxi xɛ barima n hayi to na se nde ma. N bara n matinkan n xa wasa so se naxan na n yi ra.
50004012	Xa sese yo mu na n yi ra, xa se gbegbe na n yi ra, a birin fan. Xa kaamɛ n suxuxi, xa n lugaxi, n bara wasa a birin na. Xa n bannaxi, xa n tɔɔrɔxi, n bara sɛɛwa a birin na.
50004013	N nɔma fe birin na n Marigi saabui ra, naxan sɛnbɛ fima n ma.
50004014	Kɔnɔ wo fan fe fanyi nan nabaxi n bɛ n malife ra n ma tɔɔrɛ kui.
50004015	Filipikae, wo a kolon, kabi n naxa keli Masedon bɔxi Inyila Isa kawandi tife ra, danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama yo mu n mali fe nde ra fo wo tan.
50004016	Wo tan nan na rabaxi. Wo naxa n mali sanya firin n nu na Tɛsaloniki tɛmui naxɛ.
50004017	N mu na sese fenfe n yɛtɛ bɛ. A xɔli n ma wo tan nan xa fe fanyi sɔtɔ a kui.
50004018	N hayi na naxan birin ma, n bara a sɔtɔ. Wo naxan nasanbaxi n ma Epaforodite saabui ra, a bara n wasa han a bara dangi a i. Na sɛrɛxɛ bara rafan Ala ma, a a kɛnɛn.
50004019	N Marigi Ala fama fe birin fide wo ma wo hayi na naxan ma. Fɛɛrɛ birin na a tan nan yi ra, a na birin nabama a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan saabui ra.
50004020	Ala tantu, Ala tantu. Ala naxan findi won Baba ra, won a tantuma nɛ han duniɲa raɲɔnyi.
50004021	Wo xa Isa xa sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin xɛɛbu.
50004022	Sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin naxee na n sɛɛti ma, a gbengbenyi naxee walife Mangɛ Sesare xɔnyi, e bara wo xɛɛbu.
50004023	Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
51001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, Ala a ragirixi naxan xa findi Isa xa xɛɛra ra. Muxu nun Timote nan yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe
51001002	wo tan ma, Kɔlɔsikae sɛniyɛntɔɛe. Wo bara findi n ngaxakerenyi danxaniyatɔɛ ra barima wo laxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra. Won Baba Ala xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
51001003	Muxu bara Ala tantu, won Marigi Isa Baba. Muxu Ala maxandima wo bɛ tɛmui birin.
51001004	Muxu yi nan mɛxi, wo bara danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, wo man bara Ala xa sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin xanu.
51001005	Wo xaxili tixi fe ra Ala naxan nagataxi wo ya ra koore ma. Wo xa danxaniya nun wo xa xanunteya kelima na nan ma. Wo bara na birin mɛ Ala xa nɔndi kui naxan findixi xibaaru fanyi ra.
51001006	Na xibaaru fanyi bara findi geeni ra duniɲa birin bɛ. A man bara findi geeni ra wo bɛ wo Ala xa hinnɛ yati kolonxi tɛmui naxɛ.
51001007	Won ngaxakerenyi, muxu waliboore Epafirasi nan wo xaranxi na nɔndi ra. A bara findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa walikɛ tinxinxi ra wo bɛ.
51001008	A bara a masen muxu bɛ a wo mixi xanuma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra.
51001009	Na nan a toxi, muxu fan, kafi muxu naxa na kolon, muxu Ala maxandife nɛ wo bɛ tɛmui birin, a xa fahaamui nun xaxili fanyi fi wo ma alako wo xa Ala sago kolon a fanyi ra.
51001010	Wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ alɔ won Marigi wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ. Wo xa fe fanyi mɔɔli birin naba. Wo xa Ala kolon a fanyi ra.
51001011	Wo xa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ a xa sɛnbɛ magaaxuxi saabui ra, alako wo xa wo tunnabɛxi, wo man xa diɲɛ,
51001012	wo man xa Baba Ala tantu sɛɛwɛ kui. A bara a ragiri wo xa nɔ sɛniyɛntɔɛe kɛ sɔtɔde naiyalanyi kui.
51001013	A bara won namini Sentanɛ xa nɔɛ bun ma, naxan findixi dimi ra, a won naso a xa Di xanuxi xa mangɛya niini bun ma.
51001014	Na di bara won xunsara, a bara won ma yunubie xafari.
51001015	Ala mu toma, kɔnɔ a xa Di findixi a misaali nan na. Daali birin fisamante nan a ra.
51001016	A tan nan se birin daa, naxan na koore ma, naxan na bɔxi ma, naxan toma, naxan mu toma, mangɛe, yaamaritɔɛe, nɔlae, sɛnbɛmae. Na birin daaxi a saabui nan na, na birin daaxi a yɛtɛ nan bɛ.
51001017	Beenun se keren xa daa, a tan nu na. A birin na na a tan nan saabui ra.
51001018	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xunyi na a tan nan na. Na luma nɛ alɔ a fate yati yati. A tan nan na fe birin fɔlɛ ra. A tan nan singe rakeli faxɛ ma, alako a xa findi duniɲa fisamante ra.
51001019	A naxa rafan Ala ma a xa Isa rakamali Ala xa fe birin na.
51001020	A man bara tin fe birin masode a ra a xa Di xa faxɛ saabui ra. Bɔɲɛsa xa lu Ala nun duniɲa birin tagi, naxan na koore nun bɔxi ma. Na lanyi bara lu e tagi Ala xa Di wuli saabui ra, naxan banban wuri magalanbuxi ma.
51001021	Singe ra, wo tan nun Ala, wo tagi nu ikuya. A yaxuie yati yati nan nu na wo ra, barima wo nu fe ɲaaxie maɲɔxunma, wo man nu e rabama.
51001022	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, lanyi bara lu wo tagi Ala xa Di xa faxɛ saabui ra, alako wo xa sɛniyɛn, wo xa ti Ala ya i, tantanyi nun marakɔrɔsi yo mu na wo ma sɔnɔn.
51001023	Kɔnɔ a lanma nɛ wo xa danxaniya xa sabati, a xa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ, alako wo naxa makuya fe fanyi ra naxan nagataxi wo bɛ Ala xa xibaaru fanyi saabui ra. Na xibaaru fanyi wo naxan mɛxi, a masenxi nɛ duniɲa birin bɛ. N tan yati walima na nan ma.
51001024	Yakɔsi, n bara ɲɛlɛxin n tɔɔrɔfe ma wo xa fe ra. N yɛtɛ yati fama Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa tɔɔrɛ rakamalide danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa fe ra, naxan luxi alɔ a fate.
51001025	N bara findi danxaniyatɔɛe ɲama xa walikɛ ra. Ala bara n xɛɛ n xa a xa masenyi birin tagi raba wo bɛ.
51001026	Na gundo nu nɔxunxi nɛ mixi birin ma, kabi tɛmui xɔnnakuye. Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, Ala bara na masen a fiixɛ ra a xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe birin bɛ.
51001027	A waxi nɛ na gundo xa masen e bɛ si birin tagi, e xa a xa nɔrɛ tofanyi to. Na gundo nan yi ki, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na wo i, a tan nan nɔxi a niyade wo xa a xa nɔrɛ sɔtɔ.
51001028	Muxu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan ma fe masenma adamadi birin bɛ. Muxu e birin xaranma nɛ lɔnni ra, alako mixi birin xa kamali Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
51001029	Na nan a toxi, n na walife Isa sɛnbɛ ra, naxan n malima a fanyi ra.
51002001	Wo xa a kolon n na gere masofe wo bɛ, n na gere masofe Layodiseyakae nun danxaniyatɔɛ birin bɛ, naxee n kolon kɔnɔ e mu n toxi sinden.
51002002	N na gere maso kui alako wo bɔɲɛ xa limaniya, wo xa boni wo bore ra xanunteya kui, wo man xa xaxili fanyi sɔtɔ. Na kui, wo nɔma nɛ Ala xa gundo kolonde. Na gundo findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan na.
51002003	Lɔnni fanyi nun fe kolonyi nɔxunxi Isa nan ma fe kui.
51002004	N na falaxi nɛ, alako mixi yo naxa nɔ wo madaxude wɔyɛnyi tofanyie ra.
51002005	N makuya wo ra, kɔnɔ n bɔɲɛ na wo sɛɛti ma. N bara ɲɛlɛxin, barima wo na ɲɛrɛfe a fanyi ra wo xa danxaniya kui. Wo mu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bɛɲinma fefe ma.
51002006	Wo to bara tin wo Marigi Isa xa fe ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, wo lan nɛ wo xa bira a fɔxɔ ra.
51002007	Isa xa lu wo bɛ alɔ sanke na sansi bɛ ki naxɛ. A xa lu wo bɛ alɔ fanye, banxi tima naxan fari. Wo xa danxaniya xa sabati alɔ muxu wo xaranxi ki naxɛ. Wo xa Ala tantu tɛmui birin.
51002008	Wo naxa a lu mixi yo xa wo madaxu wɔyɛnyi ɲɔxunmɛ ra. Na wulee findixi adamadi xa maɲɔxunyi nan na. Na fatanxi duniɲa fe nan na. A mu kelixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa ma feo!
51002009	Ala xa fe kɛɲa birin na Isa yi ra.
51002010	Wo fan bara kamali Isa saabui ra, naxan findixi mangɛ ra. Mangɛya birin nun sɛnbɛ mɔɔli birin na a bun ma.
51002011	Isa bara wo sunna, kɔnɔ a mu a rabaxi a adama ki xa ma. A mu sese ba wo fate ma. A wo sunna ki naxɛ, a wo sondonyi nan kui ixaxi.
51002012	Wo bara wo xunxa ye xɔɔra. Na bara maniya alɔ wo nun Isa bara ragata gaburi keren kui. Na xanbi wo fan bara keli ye xɔɔra alɔ Isa kelixi gaburi kui ki naxɛ. Na birin nabaxi nɛ barima wo bara la Ala sɛnbɛ ra, naxan Isa rakelixi faxɛ ma.
51002013	Wo nu luxi nɛ alɔ faxamixie, wo xa yunubie xa fe ra nun wo xa sunnatareya xa fe ra, kɔnɔ Ala bara wo rakisi Isa saabui ra. A bara diɲɛ won ma yunubi birin ma.
51002014	Kalamui naxan nu sɛbɛxi won xili ma, naxan nu nɔma won ma fe kanade, a bara na ba na a mabanbanfe wuri magalanbuxi ma.
51002015	Na kui, Ala bara nɔ mangɛya nun sɛnbɛ mɔɔli birin na duniɲa birin ya xɔri, naxee fatanxi Sentanɛ ra, a naxa xunnakeli sɔtɔ na wuri magalanbuxi saabui ra.
51002016	Awa, wo naxa tin mixi yo xa kiiti ɲaaxi sa wo ma wo xa donse nun minse xa fe ra, sali xungbee xa fe ra, kike nɛɛnɛ sali xa fe ra, xa na mu malabu lɔxɔɛ xa fe ra.
51002017	Na birin findixi fe fanyi tɔnxuma nan na. A nu wama Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe nan masenfe won bɛ, naxan findixi nɔndi yati ra.
51002018	Wo naxa tin mixi yo xa wo xa xunnakeli ba wo yi ra. Mixi ndee katama nɛ na rabade. A luma alɔ e e yɛtɛ nan magoroma, kɔnɔ wule na a ra. A luma alɔ e tan nun malekɛe Ala nan batuma, kɔnɔ na fan wule nan a ra. E birama laamatunyie fɔxɔ ra, kɔnɔ e e yɛtɛ igboma fe fufafu ma.
51002019	E mu fatuxi Isa ma, naxan na xunyi ra. Fate xunyi salonse birin naɲɛrɛma. Kankan xirixi e boore ra, Ala sɛnbɛ fima e birin ma alɔ a wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
51002020	Xa wo bara fatan duniɲa fee ma Isa saabui ra, munfe ra wo wo yɛtɛ luma duniɲa fee xa yaamari bun ma?
51002021	Na yaamari naxɛ, «A mu lan wo xa yi tongo! A mu lan wo xa yi don! Wo man mu lan wo xa a masuxu!»
51002022	Na fe birin fama ɲɔnde. Na sɛriyɛ mɔɔli fatanxi adamadi nan na.
51002023	Na fe mɔɔli maniya lɔnni ra, barima batui, yɛtɛ magore, nun fate tɔɔrɔfe na a kui, kɔnɔ e tide yo mu na, barima e mu nɔma yunubi fee bade mixi bɔɲɛ ma.
51003001	Xa nɔndi na a ra, wo nun Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan birin nakelixi faxɛ ma, wo xa ariyanna fen, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi magoroxi Ala yirefanyi ma dɛnnaxɛ.
51003002	Wo xa ariyanna fe fen, duniɲa fe mu a ra.
51003003	Barima wo bara faxa, wo xa simaya fa nɔxunxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe i Ala xa fonisireya kui.
51003004	Wo Rakisima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi na fa, wo fan luma a xa nɔrɛ nan kui.
51003005	Na nan a toxi wo lanma wo xa adamadi xa fe kobi birin nabɛɲin: yɛnɛ fe, langoe fe, fe sɛniyɛntare, korinteɲa naxan maniyaxi kuye batufe ra.
51003006	Ala xɔnɔma nɛ na fe mɔɔli ma, nun naxee e rabama.
51003007	Singe ra nu, wo yati nu ɲɛrɛma na ki nɛ.
51003008	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, wo xa yi fe birin bɛɲin: bɔɲɛte, geresofe, fe ɲaaxi, mixi xili kanafe, nun konbi.
51003009	Wo naxa wule fala wo bore bɛ. Wo bara na ɲɛrɛ ki fori bɛɲin,
51003010	alako wo xa ɲɛrɛ ki nɛɛnɛ suxu, naxan lanma Ala ɲɛrɛ ki ma. Na kui, wo fama Ala kolonde a fanyi ra. Na birin luma alɔ mixi naxan dugi fori bama a ma, a dugi nɛɛnɛ ragoro a ma.
51003011	Na kui, Girɛki nun Yuwifi e birin keren. Mixi sunnaxi nun mixi sunnatare e birin keren. Xununtaree, mixi xununxi, konyi, nun lasiri, e birin keren. Isa nan findixi a birin na, a man na a birin i.
51003012	Ala wo tan nan sugandixi, wo bara findi sɛniyɛntɔɛe ra, Ala xanuntenyie. Wo lan nɛ wo xa kinikini mixi ma, wo bɔɲɛ xa fan, wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro, wo bɔɲɛ xa bɛxi, wo xa diɲɛ.
51003013	Wo xa wo bore sutura, wo man xa hinnɛ wo bore ra. Xa mixi nde bara fe ɲaaxi raba a bore ra, na kanyi xa diɲɛ alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi diɲɛxi wo ma ki naxɛ.
51003014	Naxan dangi a birin na, wo xa wo bore xanu barima na findima lanyi fanyi ra.
51003015	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nu wama lanyi naxan xɔn won bɛ, won bɔɲɛ xa bira na lanyi fɔxɔ ra. Ala bara wo xili wo xa findi fate keren na, lanyi xa lu wo tagi. Wo xa Ala tantu na ma.
51003016	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa masenyi fanyi xa lu wo bɔɲɛ kui. Wo xa wo bore xaran, wo man xa marasi nun lɔnni fi wo bore ma. Wo xa na raba suuki nun bɛɛti ra naxan fatanxi Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ra. Wo xa Ala tantu na bɛɛtie ra, e xa keli wo bɔɲɛ yati yati nan kui.
51003017	Wo fe naxan birin falama, wo fe naxan birin nabama, wo xa na birin naba wo Marigi Isa xili ra. Wo xa Baba Ala tantu Isa saabui ra.
51003018	Ginɛe, wo xa lu wo xa mɔrie xa yaamari bun ma, alɔ Marigi wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
51003019	Xɛmɛe, wo xa wo xa ginɛe xanu, wo naxa ɲaaxu e ra.
51003020	Dimɛdie, wo xa wo barimixie xui ratinmɛ fe birin kui, barima na rafan Marigi ma.
51003021	Barimixie, wo naxa wo xa die bɔɲɛ raɲaaxu e ma, alako limaniya naxa ba e yi.
51003022	Konyie, wo xa wo marigie xui birin natinmɛ. Wo naxa wali e ya tode xa gbansan na, alako wo xa rafan mixie ma. Wo xa wali e bɛ wo bɔɲɛ fiixɛxi ra, barima wo gaaxuxi wo Marigi Ala ya ra.
51003023	Wo fe naxan birin nabama, wo xa a raba wo bɔɲɛ fiixɛxi nan na, alɔ wo a rabama Marigi bɛ ki naxɛ. Wo mu a rabama mixie xa bɛ.
51003024	Na kui, wo xa a kolon Marigi na sare ragbilenma nɛ wo ma, naxan findima wo kɛ ra. Wo na walife Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nan bɛ, wo Marigi yati yati.
51003025	Naxan fe kobi rabama, Marigi na fan sare ragbilenma nɛ a ma. Mixi birin a gbe sɔtɔma nɛ, Ala mu mixi yo rafisa a boore bɛ.
51004001	Konyi marigie, wo xa wo xa konyie masuxu tinxinyi ra, barima konyi nan wo fan na. Wo Marigi na koore ma.
51004002	Wo xa Ala maxandi tɛmui birin. Wo xa wo yɛtɛ mato, wo xa Ala tantu.
51004003	Wo Ala maxandi muxu fan bɛ. Ala xa sɔɔnɛya raba won ma kawandi kui, alako n xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa gundo masen birin bɛ. N saxi geeli na fe nan ma.
51004004	Wo Ala maxandi n bɛ alako n xa na fala a fanyi ra, a xa fiixɛ fɔɛn, alɔ a lanma n xa a raba ki naxɛ.
51004005	Wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ xaxilimaya ra danxaniyataree ya tode ra. Wo xa na raba sinnanyi ma a raba waxati.
51004006	Wo xa masenyi fanyi ti mixie bɛ, naxan fan. Kuri so tɛmui, fɔxɛ sama nɛ bande, alako a xa ɲɔxun. Wo fan xa fata mixi birin yaabide wɔyɛnyi ra naxan fan.
51004007	N ngaxakerenyi Tikike findixi n xanuntenyi nan na naxan bara n mali a fanyi ra Marigi xa wali xa fe ra. A fama n ma fe birin tagi rabade wo bɛ.
51004008	N a xɛɛxi nɛ wo ma alako a xa muxu xa fe tagi raba wo bɛ, a man xa wo ralimaniya.
51004009	N man bara n ngaxakerenyi tinxinxi, n xanuntenyi Onesimo Kɔlɔsika xɛɛ a xa Tikike mati. E firinyi fama n ma fe birin dɛntɛgɛ sade wo bɛ.
51004010	Arisitaraki, muxu nun naxan na geeli, a wo xɛɛbu. Baranabasi dɛɛxɔ Maraki fan wo xɛɛbu. Wo bara marasi sɔtɔ Maraki xa fe ma. Xa a fa wo xɔnyi, wo xa a rasɛnɛ a fanyi ra.
51004011	Yesu, naxan xili falama Yusutu, a fan wo xɛɛbu. Yuwifi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama birin ya ma, yi mixi saxanyi gbansan nan n malixi Ala xa mangɛya niini wali rabade. E bara limaniya fi n ma.
51004012	Epafirasi, naxan findixi wo xɔnyika ra, a wo xɛɛbu. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa walikɛ nan a ra. A Ala maxandima wo bɛ tɛmui birin alako wo xa danxaniya xa sabati, wo xa Ala waxɔnfe kolon, wo man xa a raba.
51004013	A wali gbegbe rabama wo bɛ, wo tan danxaniyatɔɛ naxee na Kɔlɔsi, Layodiseya, nun Hiyerapoli. N na a seede ra.
51004014	Luki seriba, muxu xanuntenyi wo xɛɛbu, a nun Demasi.
51004015	Wo xa won ngaxakerenyi Layodiseya danxaniyatɔɛe xɛɛbu, nun Nimifa, a nun danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama naxan e malanma a xa banxi kui.
51004016	Wo na gɛ yi bataaxɛ xarande wo xɔnyi, wo xa a so Layodiseya danxaniyatɔɛe fan yi ra, e xa a xaran. Wo tan fan, wo xa bataaxɛ xaran n naxan nasanbaxi Layodiseyakae ma.
51004017	Wo xa a fala Arikipe bɛ, «Fɛntɛn i xa wali ma, Marigi naxan soxi i yi ra alako i xa na raba a fanyi ra.»
51004018	Xɛɛbui nan yi ki, n tan Pɔlu naxan sɛbɛxi wo ma n yɛtɛ bɛlɛxɛ ra. Wo xa ratu a ma n na geeli nan kui yi ki. Ala xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
52001001	Pɔlu, Silifanu, nun Timote nan yi ki, katarabi Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ma naxee na Tɛsaloniki. Ala xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
52001002	Waxati birin muxu Ala tantuma wo xa fe ra, muxu man a maxandima wo bɛ. Tɛmui birin
52001003	muxu wo xa fe falama won Baba Ala bɛ. Muxu a tantuma nɛ wo xa wali ma naxan kelixi wo xa danxaniya nun wo xa xanunteya ma. Muxu a tantuma nɛ barima wo wo tunnabɛxixi wo xaxili tife ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa ra.
52001004	N ngaxakerenyie, wo tan Ala xanuntenyie, muxu a kolon a Ala bara wo sugandi.
52001005	Muxu to xibaaru fanyi masen wo bɛ, a mu findi muxu dɛ wɔyɛnyi gbansan xa ra. Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi naxa sɛnbɛ fi muxu xa xibaaru fanyi kawandife ma, muxu danxaniyaxi a ma. Wo a kolon yati muxu nu ɲɛrɛma ki naxɛ wo xa fe ra, muxu nu na wo ya ma tɛmui naxɛ.
52001006	Wo bara findi muxu nun Marigi fɔxi rabae ra. Hali wo to ɲaxankatɛ gbegbe sɔtɔ, wo Ala xa masenyi suxu nɛ ɲɛlɛxinyi ra, ɲɛlɛxinyi naxan fatan Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ra.
52001007	Na kui, wo bara findi misaali ra danxaniyatɔɛ birin bɛ naxee na Masedon nun Akayi.
52001008	Ala xa masenyi bara rayensen yɛ wo saabui ra. A mu rayensenxi Masedon nun Akayi gbansan xa ma. Yire birin bara a kolon wo danxaniyaxi Ala ma ki naxɛ. Na kui, muxu mu sese falama sɔnɔn na xa fe ra.
52001009	Na mixi naxee bara wo xa fe mɛ, e tan nan fama wo xa fe falade, wo muxu rasɛnɛ ki naxɛ, wo man gbilen kuyee fɔxɔ ra ki naxɛ, wo fa bira Ala Ɲiɲɛ fɔxɔ ra naxan findixi nɔndi ra.
52001010	E man wo xa fe falama, wo Ala xa Di mamɛxi ki naxɛ kelife koore ma. Na nan findixi Isa ra, Ala naxan nakeli faxɛ ma, Isa naxan won natangama xɔnɛ ma naxan na fafe.
52002001	N ngaxakerenyie, wo tan yati a kolon a muxu fafe wo yire na mu findixi fe fufafu ra.
52002002	Wo a kolon, muxu nu bara ɲaxankatɛ nun tɔɔrɛ sɔtɔ Filipi. Kɔnɔ muxu naxa muxu xaxili ti won Marigi Ala ra, muxu limaniya alako muxu xa wo kawandi Ala xa xibaaru fanyi ra, hali geremasoe gbegbe to nu naa.
52002003	Muxu xa kawandi mu fatanxi wule xa ra, a mu fatanxi ɲanige sɛniyɛntare xa ra, a mu fatanxi yanfanteya xa ra.
52002004	Ala to bara muxu mato, a bara a xa xibaaru fanyi taxu muxu ra. Na kui, muxu mu wɔyɛnma xɛ de alako muxu xa rafan mixie ma. Muxu wɔyɛnma nɛ alako muxu xa Ala nan kɛnɛn naxan won sondonyie matoma.
52002005	Wo a kolon yati, Ala fan a kolon, muxu mu dɛiɲɔxunyi wɔyɛnyi yo falaxi wo bɛ. Muxu mu kawandi tixi xɛ alako muxu xa se nde sɔtɔ.
52002006	Muxu hayi mu na mixie xa matɔxɔɛ ma, a na findi wo tan na, a na findi mixi gbɛtɛe ra.
52002007	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xɛɛrae to na muxu ra, muxu nu nɔma muxu xa fe kote dɔxɔde wo xun ma, kɔnɔ muxu mu tin. Muxu naxa mɛɛni wo ma, alɔ dingɛ mɛɛnima a xa die ma ki naxɛ.
52002008	Muxu wo xanuxi nɛ han muxu naxa muxu yɛtɛ yati fi wo ma safe Ala xa xibaaru fanyi xun ma muxu wo kawandi naxan na. Wo xa fe nu bara xɔrɔxɔ muxu ma ki fanyi.
52002009	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa wo maɲɔxun muxu xa wali nun muxu xa tɔɔrɛ ma. Muxu wakili nɛ kɔɛ nun yanyi alako muxu xa kɔntɔfili naxa lu wo sese ma, muxu nu Ala xa xibaaru fanyi kawandife wo bɛ tɛmui naxɛ.
52002010	Muxu ɲɛrɛxi sɛniyɛnyi nun tinxinyi nan na wo xa fe ra, marakɔrɔsi yo mu na muxu ma. Wo bara findi na fe seedee ra, wo nun Ala.
52002011	Wo a kolon yati, a muxu na wo birin bɛ, alɔ babɛ nun a xa die na ki naxɛ.
52002012	Muxu bara wo ralimaniya, muxu bara wo mafuruku, muxu bara wo mayandi alako wo ɲɛrɛ ki xa Ala kɛnɛn, naxan wo xilixi wo xa lu a xa mangɛya niini bun ma, wo xa a xa nɔrɛ kolon.
52002013	Na nan a toxi muxu Ala nuwali sama tɛmui birin barima muxu to wo kawandi Ala xa masenyi ra, wo mu a suxuxi xɛ alɔ mixi wɔyɛn xui. Wo a kolon nɛ a a findixi Ala xa masenyi nan yati ra naxan sɛnbɛ na walife wo tan danxaniyatɔɛe ya ma.
52002014	N ngaxakerenyie, wo bara maniya Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae ra naxee danxaniyaxi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma Yudaya bɔxi ma. Wo baribooree wo tɔɔrɔ ki naxɛ, Yuwifie fan Yudaya danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae tɔɔrɔ na ki nɛ.
52002015	E tan Yuwifie nan Marigi Isa nun namiɲɔnmɛe faxa, e muxu fan ɲaxankata. E xa fe mu Ala kɛnɛnxi. E to muxu tɔɔrɔma muxu xa kawandi wali kui, e ɲaaxuma mixi birin na.
52002016	E mu wama muxu xa si gbɛtɛe kawandi alako nee xa kisi. Na kui, e na e xa yunubi nan tun xun masafe. Kɔnɔ Ala xa xɔnɛ bara e suxu.
52002017	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara makuya wo ya tode ra waxati nde bun, kɔnɔ muxu bɔɲɛ tan mu makuyaxi wo ra. Wo xɔli muxu suxuma ki fanyi ra. Muxu bara fe birin naba alako muxu man xa wo to.
52002018	Muxu nu bara wa gbilenfe wo yire. N tan Pɔlu wa nɛ n xa wo yire li sanmaya wuyaxi, kɔnɔ Sentanɛ nan muxu matɔɔrɔ.
52002019	Marigi Isa gbilen lɔxɔɛ, muxu ɲɔxɔ tima Ala ra nde xa fe ra? Muxu ɲɛlɛxinma nde xa fe ra? Muxu matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔma nde xa fe ra? Wo tan xa mu a ra?
52002020	Iyo, wo tan nan findixi muxu xa xunnakeli nun muxu xa sɛɛwɛ ra.
52003001	Na kui, muxu bɔɲɛ to mu nɔxi sade, muxu bara a ɲanige muxu tan xa lu Atɛn,
52003002	muxu xa won ngaxakerenyi Timote xɛɛ wo ma. Muxu waliboore na a ra Ala xa wali kui naxan findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xibaaru fanyi kawandila ra. Muxu a xɛɛxi nɛ alako a xa wo sɛnbɛ so, a xa wo ralimaniya wo xa danxaniya kui,
52003003	alako wo xa ɲaxankatɛ naxa wo hanmɛ. Wo fan yati a kolon, na ɲaxankatɛ nan nagirixi won ma.
52003004	Hali muxu nu na wo ya ma tɛmui naxɛ, muxu nu a falama nɛ wo bɛ, a mixie fama won ɲaxankatade. Wo bara a to fa, na nan fa rabaxi.
52003005	Na nan a ra, n bɔɲɛ to mu nu saxi sɔnɔn, n naxa Timote xɛɛ naa alako a xa a kolon wo xa danxaniya na ki naxɛ. N nu gaaxuxi nɛ wo bɛ Sentanɛ mixi ratantanyi fa wo ratantanfe, muxu xa wali fa findi wali fufafu ra.
52003006	Kɔnɔ Timote to baxi gbilende muxu yire keli wo xɔnyi, a bara xibaaru fanyi fala muxu bɛ wo xa danxaniya nun wo xa xanunteya xa fe ra. A naxɛ, a wo ratuxi muxu xa fe ra sɛɛwɛ kui, a muxu to xɔli na wo ma, alɔ wo fan to xɔli to na muxu fan ma.
52003007	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, hali muxu to na tɔɔrɛ nun ɲaxankatɛ kui, muxu bara ralimaniya wo xa danxaniya xa fe ra.
52003008	Yakɔsi muxu bɔɲɛ bara sa sɔnɔn, barima muxu bara a kolon a wo xa danxaniya xanxi Marigi.
52003009	Muxu mu a kolon sɔnɔn muxu nɔma Ala tantude ki naxɛ wo xa fe ra. Danyi yo mu na muxu xa sɛɛwɛ ma wo xa fe ra Ala xa fe ra.
52003010	Kɔɛ nun yanyi muxu na a maxandife muxu nii birin na, muxu xa nɔ wo tode, alako naxan luxi wo xa danxaniya ra, muxu xa na rakamali.
52003011	Ala yɛtɛ yati, won Baba, a nun won Marigi Isa xa kira bɔɔ muxu bɛ alako muxu xa wo yire masɔtɔ.
52003012	Xanunteya naxan na wo bɛ wo doro tagi, a nun wo nun mixi birin tagi, Ala xa na xun masa ki fanyi ra, alɔ muxu fan wo xanuxi ki naxɛ.
52003013	Ala xa wo sondonyie sɛnbɛ so alako won Marigi Isa na gbilen lɔxɔ naxɛ a nun a xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe ra, wo xa nɔ tide won Baba Ala ya i sɛniyɛnyi nun tinxinyi kui.
52004001	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara wo tinkan wo lan wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ ki naxɛ Ala waxɔnyi ma. Han ya wo na na nan xun ma. Yakɔsi, muxu wo maxandima, muxu wo mayandi Marigi Isa xili ra, wo xa nu na xun masa.
52004002	Wo a kolon yati muxu wo xaranxi naxan na Marigi Isa xili ra.
52004003	Ala sago na a ra wo xa sɛniyɛn. Wo naxa langoeɲa raba.
52004004	Kankan xa a yɛtɛ suxu sɛniyɛnyi nun tinxinyi kui.
52004005	Wo naxa bira langoeɲa fɔxɔ ra, alɔ Ala kolontaree a rabama ki naxɛ.
52004006	Mixi yo naxa yunubi raba a ngaxakerenyi ra, a fu a ma na fe kui, barima Marigi na fe mɔɔli birin makiitima nɛ. Muxu bara na fala wo bɛ, muxu man gbilen nɛ a fala ra wo bɛ.
52004007	Ala won xilixi nɛ won xa won ɲɛrɛ sɛniyɛnyi kui, won xa gbilen sɛniyɛntareɲa fɔxɔ ra.
52004008	Na kui, mixi naxan tondima yi fee rabatude, a mu tondixi ibunadama xa bɛ, a tondixi Ala nan bɛ naxan a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fixi wo ma.
52004009	Hali muxu mu wo rasi ngaxakerenyie xanufe ma, barima Ala nan bara wo tinkan wo xa wo bore xanu.
52004010	Wo na nan yati rabafe ngaxakerenyie ra naxee na Masedon bɔxi birin kui. Kɔnɔ muxu a falama nɛ wo bɛ, n ngaxakerenyie, wo man xa nu na xun masa.
52004011	Wo xa fe birin naba alako wo xa lu bɔɲɛsa kui. Wo xa mɛɛni wo yɛtɛ ma. Wo xa nu wali wo bɛlɛxɛ ra alɔ muxu a masen wo bɛ ki naxɛ.
52004012	Na kui, wo ɲɛrɛ ki findima a fanyi nan na danxaniyataree tagi, wo man mu wo xa fe kote dɔxɔma mixi gbɛtɛ yo xun ma.
52004013	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu mu wama wo xa lu fahaamutareɲa kui mixie xa fe ra naxee bara laaxira. A mu lan wo xa sunnun alɔ mixi naxee mu e xaxili tixi Ala ra.
52004014	Won laxi a ra a Isa bara faxa, a man fa keli faxɛ ma. Na kui, won man laxi a ra a Ala fama faxamixie fan nakelide naxee nu danxaniyaxi Isa ma, a e rate e nun Isa.
52004015	Marigi xa masenyi nan ya, muxu naxan falama wo bɛ: Won tan naxee ɲiɲɛ a ra, Marigi fa tɛmui naxee lima duniɲa ma, won singe xa mu tema mixi faxaxie bɛ.
52004016	Marigi yɛtɛ yati nan fama gorode keli koore ma. Yaamari fima nɛ xui itexi ra. Malekɛ kuntigi fama nɛ a xui itede. Ala xa sara xui minima nɛ. Isa xa danxaniyatɔɛ naxee bara faxa, nee nan singe kelima.
52004017	Na dangi xanbi, won tan naxee ɲiɲɛ luxi duniɲa, won fan tema nɛ, won nee li nuxui kui, won birin sa naralan Marigi yire kuye ma. Won luma nɛ Marigi sɛɛti ma sɔnɔn abadan.
52004018	Na kui, wo xa wo bore ralimaniya na masenyi ra.
52005001	N ngaxakerenyie, hali n mu sese fala wo bɛ waxati nun lɔxɔɛe xa fe ra yi fee sa rabama tɛmui naxɛ.
52005002	Wo fan yati a kolon a fanyi ra, a Marigi xa lɔxɔɛ fama nɛ alɔ muɲɛti fama kɔɛ ra ki naxɛ.
52005003	Mixie nɛ lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa xa fe falama tɛmui naxɛ, gbaloe dusuma e xun ma na tɛmui nɛ, alɔ furuginɛ difuri na keli a ra. E mu tangama a ma muku.
52005004	Kɔnɔ wo tan, ngaxakerenyie, wo mu na dimi xa kui. Na lɔxɔɛ mu lanma a xa wo tɛrɛnna alɔ muɲɛti.
52005005	Wo birin findixi naiyalanyi nun yanyi die nan na. Kɔɛ nun dimi die xa mu won na.
52005006	Na kui, won naxa xi alɔ booree. Won xa fee rasaxa a fanyi ra, won naxa yanfa.
52005007	Naxee xima, e xima kɔɛ nan na. Naxee siisima, e siisima kɔɛ nan na.
52005008	Won tan naxee findixi yanyi mixie ra, won xa mɛɛni won yɛtɛ ma. Won xa danxaniya nun xanunteya rasabati, won xa won xaxili ti kisi ra. Nee tide luma nɛ won bɛ alɔ kanke makantase nun xun makantase tide luma geresoe bɛ ki naxɛ.
52005009	Ala mu a ragirixi won ma, a xa xɔnɛ xa won li. A a ragirixi nɛ won tan xa kisi nan sɔtɔ Marigi Isa saabui ra, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi
52005010	naxan faxa won ma fe ra. Na nan a toxi, xa muxu ɲiɲɛ nan a ra, xa muxu faxaxi nan a ra, muxu fama nɛ sabatide a i.
52005011	Na kui, wo xa wo bore ralimaniya, wo xa wo bore sɛnbɛ so alɔ wo darixi a raba ra ki naxɛ.
52005012	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara wo mayandi wo xa mixie binya naxee na walife wo tagi, wo rasife nun wo raɲɛrɛfe ra Marigi xa fe kui.
52005013	Wo xa e binya a fanyi ra xanunteya kui e xa wali xa fe ra. Lanyi nan xa lu wo xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama tagi.
52005014	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu man bara wo maxandi, wo xa tunnaxɔnɛe rasi, wo xa limaniyataree ralimaniya, wo xa sɛnbɛtaree mali, wo diɲɛ mixi birin bɛ.
52005015	Wo xa a mato a fanyi ra mixi yo naxa fe kobi ɲɔxɔ fe kobi ra. Wo xa nu fe fanyi nan tun naba wo bore bɛ, a nun mixi birin bɛ.
52005016	Wo xa sɛɛwa tɛmui birin.
52005017	Wo xa Ala maxandi waxati birin.
52005018	Wo xa Ala tantu fe birin kui. Na findixi Ala sago nan na wo bɛ, wo tan naxee danxaniyaxi a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma.
52005019	Wo naxa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xɔlɔn nagoro.
52005020	Wo naxa wo tuli xɔrɔxɔ namiɲɔnmɛe xa masenyie ma,
52005021	kɔnɔ wo xa fe birin mato a fanyi ra. Xa fefe fan, wo xa na suxu gben.
52005022	Xa fefe kobi, wo xa wo makuya na ra pon!
52005023	Ala xa wo rasɛniyɛn a ki nun a kɛɲa ma, a tan Ala naxan bɔɲɛsa fima. Ala xa wo xaxili nun wo nii nun wo fate ratanga, marakɔrɔsi yo naxa lu wo ma won Marigi Isa fa tɛmui.
52005024	Naxan wo xilixi, a na a xui xanbi ra, a fama nɛ a rabade.
52005025	N ngaxakerenyie, wo Ala maxandi muxu bɛ.
52005026	Wo xa ngaxakerenyie birin xɛɛbu sunbui sɛniyɛnxi ra.
52005027	N bara wo yamari Marigi xili ra wo xa yi bataaxɛ xaran ngaxakerenyie birin bɛ.
52005028	Ala xa hinnɛ fi wo ma won Marigi Isa saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi.
53001001	Pɔlu, Silifanu, nun Timote nan yi ki, katarabi won Baba Ala nun Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ma naxee na Tɛsaloniki.
53001002	Won Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
53001003	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu lanma muxu xa Ala tantu wo xa fe ra tɛmui birin. Muxu xa tantui lanxi barima wo xa danxaniya xun masafe ki fanyi, a nun wo xa xanunteya wo bore bɛ.
53001004	Na kui, muxu wo matɔxɔma Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae bɛ wo xa tunnabɛxiya nun danxaniya xa fe ra wo naxee masenfe wo xa ɲaxankatɛ nun tɔɔrɛ birin kui.
53001005	Na bara Ala xa kiiti tinxinxi masen, barima wo na naxan iminife, na nan a masenma a wo daxa wo xa lu Ala xa mangɛya niini bun ma, wo tɔɔrɔfe naxan xa fe ra.
53001006	Ala tinxin. Mixi naxee wo ɲaxankatama, a e sare fima ɲaxankatɛ nan na.
53001007	Wo tan naxee bara ɲaxankata, a malabui fima nɛ won birin ma Marigi Isa a nun a xa malekɛ sɛnbɛmae fama tɛmui naxɛ kelife koore ma.
53001008	E nun tɛ wolenxi nan goroma. Ala kolontaree, naxee mu won Marigi Isa xa masenyi rabatuma, e sare fima ɲaxankatɛ nan na.
53001009	Na mixie xa kiiti findima gbaloe nan na dande yo mu naxan ma. Marigi e makuyama nɛ a yɛtɛ ra nun a sɛnbɛ nɔrɔxi ra
53001010	a na fa tɛmui naxɛ. Na lɔxɔɛ a xa sɛniyɛntɔɛe nun a mantonyie birin a toma nɛ, e kaaba, e a matɔxɔ. Wo fan luma nɛ nee ya ma, barima wo danxaniya nɛ muxu xa seedeɲɔxɔya ma.
53001011	Na kui, muxu Ala maxandima wo bɛ tɛmui birin, alako won Marigi Ala xa wo lu alɔ a mixi naxan xilixi na daxa ki naxɛ. Muxu man a maxandima a xa wo xa ɲanige fanyi birin nakamali a nun wo xa wali fanyi naxee kelima wo xa danxaniya ma. Na rabama a sɛnbɛ nan saabui ra.
53001012	Muxu na maxandi tima alako Marigi Isa xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ wo saabui ra, wo fan xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ Isa ra. Yi birin nabama Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ saabui nan na.
53002001	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara wo mayandi wo bɔɲɛ naxa mini wo to fee mɛma won Marigi Isa fa lɔxɔɛ xa fe ra, a nun won fama a ralande ki naxɛ.
53002002	Xa mixi nde a fala wo bɛ a Marigi xa lɔxɔɛ ɲan bara fa, wo xaxili naxa ifu de! Wo naxa la a ra hali na kanyi wɔyɛn wo bɛ alɔ namiɲɔnmɛ na a ra, xa na mu a kawandi ti wo bɛ, xa na mu a fa bataaxɛ ra alɔ a fatanxi muxu tan nan na.
53002003	Wo naxa a lu mixi yo xa wo madaxu. Na lɔxɔɛ mu a lima fo adamadi gbegbe mɛɛ Ala ra sinden, a nun, Sɛriyɛtare Xungbe, a naxa makɛnɛn, gbaloe ragataxi naxan bɛ.
53002004	A fama nɛ a yɛtɛ itede dangi adamadie xa batuse birin na. Adamadie sese xili falama «ala», a tan tima nɛ na kanke. Na kui, a fama nɛ dɔxɔde Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi kui, a a yɛtɛ findi ala ra.
53002005	N to yi fee fala wo bɛ n nu na wo yire tɛmui naxɛ, wo nɛɛmuxi nɛ?
53002006	Yakɔsi wo a kolon naxan makankanxi Sɛriyɛtare Xungbe ma, alako a naxa mini beenun a xa waxati xa a li.
53002007	Sɛriyɛtareya ɲan na walife nɔxunyi kui. A luma na ki nɛ han naxan a makankanxi a a bama naa tɛmui naxɛ.
53002008	Na tɛmui, Sɛriyɛtare Xungbe makɛnɛnma nɛ. Marigi na fa tɛmui naxɛ, a yi xɛmɛ halakima nɛ a dɛ foye ra, a xa fa nɔrɛ a sɔntɔma nɛ.
53002009	Yi Sɛriyɛtare Xungbe minima Sentanɛ sɛnbɛ nan saabui ra, a fa kaabanakoe, tɔnxumae, nun fe magaaxuxie raba naxee mu findixi nɔndi ra.
53002010	A fama nɛ mixi kisitaree mayendende fe ɲaaxi mɔɔli birin na, barima nɔndi mu rafan nee ma. Na na a ra e mu kisima.
53002011	Na kui, Ala e xaxili ifuma nɛ sɛnbɛ ra, alako e xa la wule ra.
53002012	A rabama na ki nɛ alako mixi birin xa gbaloe sɔtɔ naxee mu danxaniyaxi nɔndi ma, tinxintareya rafanxi naxee ma.
53002013	Kɔnɔ n ngaxakerenyie, fo muxu xa Ala tantu wo xa fe ra tɛmui birin. Marigi wo xanuxi nɛ. Kabi fe fɔlɔ fɔlɛ, Ala bara wo sugandi alako wo xa kisi. A wo rakisima a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa wali nan saabui ra naxan wo rasɛniyɛnma, a nun wo xa danxaniya saabui ra wo to danxaniyaxi nɔndi ma.
53002014	A wo xilixi na nan ma. A wo xilixi muxu xa xibaaru fanyi xa kawandi nan saabui ra alako wo xa xunnakeli sɔtɔ naxan kelima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ma, won Marigi Isa.
53002015	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, wo sanyie xa xan danxaniya kui. Muxu wo xaran naxan na muxu xa kawandi nun bataaxɛ saabui ra, wo xa na suxu gben.
53002016	Won Marigi Isa yɛtɛ yati, naxan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra, nun won Baba Ala, naxan bara won xanu, naxan hinnɛma won na alako limaniya nun xaxili tide naxa ba won yi ra abadan,
53002017	e xa wo sondonyie ralimaniya. E man xa sɛnbɛ fi wo ma, wo xa wali nun wɔyɛnyi birin xa findi a fanyi ra.
53003001	N ngaxakerenyie, a dɔnxɔɛ ra, wo Ala maxandi muxu bɛ alako Marigi xa masenyi xa yensen yɛ mafuren na, a man xa binya yire birin alɔ a binyaxi wo xɔnyi ki naxɛ.
53003002	Wo Ala maxandi muxu man xa ba mixi kobie nun mixi ɲaaxie bɛlɛxɛ, barima mixi birin xa mu danxaniyaxi.
53003003	Kɔnɔ Ala na a xui xanbi ra. A sɛnbɛ fima nɛ wo ma, a wo ratanga Sentanɛ ma.
53003004	Muxu laxi a ra Marigi saabui ra, a muxu yaamari naxee fixi wo ma, wo e rabatuma nɛ alɔ wo ɲan na rabafe ki naxɛ.
53003005	Marigi xa wo sondonyie xun ti kira fanyi xɔn alako wo xa Ala xanu, wo man xa wo tunnabɛxi alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi a rabaxi ki naxɛ.
53003006	N ngaxakerenyie, muxu bara wo yamari won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra wo xa wo makuya danxaniyatɔɛe ra naxee findixi tunnaxɔnɛe ra. Na kui, e mu ɲɛrɛfe muxu xa masenyi ma muxu fa naxan na wo xɔn.
53003007	Wo a kolon yati wo lanma wo xa muxu fɔxi raba ki naxɛ. Muxu to nu na wo ya ma muxu mu findi tunnaxɔnɛe xa ra,
53003008	muxu man mu mixi yo xa bande don a fa lu muxu mu a sare fi. Muxu wakili nɛ kɔɛ nun yanyi ra, alako muxu xa fe naxa findi kote ra wo sese bɛ.
53003009	Muxu nu nɔma muxu xa kɔntɔfili sade wo ya i, kɔnɔ muxu mu tin na ra alako muxu xa findi misaali ra wo bɛ, wo fan xa muxu fɔxi raba.
53003010	Muxu nu na wo ya ma tɛmui naxɛ, muxu yi yaamari nan fi wo ma: «Naxan yo mu tinma walide, hali wo mu na kanyi ki bande.»
53003011	Muxu bara a mɛ a mixi ndee wo ya ma e bara e yɛtɛ findi tunnaxɔnɛe ra. E mu wali yo suxuma bafe naafixiya ra.
53003012	Muxu bara na mixie yamari, muxu e rasi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi won Marigi Isa xili ra, e xa wali bɔɲɛsa kui alako e xa nɔ e yɛtɛ balode.
53003013	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa tagan fe fanyi rabafe ma.
53003014	Wo a mato a fanyi ra, xa mixi nde mu tin muxu xa masenyi danxunde muxu naxan sɛbɛxi yi bataaxɛ kui, dɛfanyi naxa lu wo nun na kanyi tagi alako a xa yaagi.
53003015	Wo naxa a findi wo yaxui ra de, kɔnɔ wo xa a rasi alɔ wo ngaxakerenyi.
53003016	N bara Marigi maxandi naxan findixi bɔɲɛsa kanyi ra, a tan yɛtɛ yati xa bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma tɛmui birin nun a mɔɔli birin na. Marigi xa lu wo birin sɛɛti ma.
53003017	N tan Pɔlu nan yi xɛɛbui sɛbɛfe n yɛtɛ bɛlɛxɛ ra. N ma bataaxɛ birin matɔnxumaxi yi ki nɛ. N bɛlɛxɛ fɔxi nan ya.
53003018	Won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, a xa hinnɛ xa lu wo birin bɛ.
54001001	Won Nakisima Ala nun Isa, won xaxili tima naxan na, e n tan Pɔlu tixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra nan na.
54001002	N na yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe Timote nan ma, naxan findixi n ma di yati ra a danxaniya ki ma. Baba Ala nun won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, e xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi i ma, e xa kinikini i ma.
54001003	N to keli sigade Masedon, n naxa i rasi i xa lu Efɛsɛ alako i xa mixi ndee yamari e naxa xaranyi gbɛtɛe masen mixie bɛ,
54001004	e naxa kiinie madɔxɔ, e man naxa bu e benbae xilie matɛngɛfe ra. Na fe mɔɔli wɔyɛnyi rawuyama nɛ, a mu Ala xa wali rasigama yare ma danxaniya kui.
54001005	N na yaamari fi nɛ alako xanunteya xa gbo, xanunteya naxan fatanxi bɔɲɛ sɛniyɛnxi ra, a nun ɲanige tinxinxi, nun danxaniya fiixɛ ra.
54001006	Mixi ndee bara gbilen danxaniya fɔxɔ ra, e fa lɔɛ, na wɔyɛnyi fufafu saabui ra.
54001007	E wama findife sɛriyɛ karamɔxɔe nan na, kɔnɔ e wɔyɛnma fahaamutareɲa nan kui. E mu soxi fee kui e naxee masenma sɛnbɛ ra.
54001008	Won a kolon Ala xa sɛriyɛ fan, xa a rawalima a sɛriyɛ ki ma.
54001009	Won man a kolon Ala mu a xa sɛriyɛ fixi tinxintɔɛe xa fe xa ra. A a fixi tinxintaree nan ma fe ra, a nun Ala matandilae. A a fixi kaafirie, yunubitɔɛe, diinɛtaree, Ala maberelae nan ma fe ra. A a fixi mixie nan ma fe ra naxee e baba nun e ngae faxama. Faxatie,
54001010	yɛnɛlae, xɛmɛ naxee nun xɛmɛe kafuma, mixi suxuie, wule falɛe, mixi naxee kali tima wule xun, a nun mixi birin naxee Ala xa sɛriyɛ matandima, a a fixi nee nan ma fe ra.
54001011	Ala Xili Xungbe Kanyi xa sɛriyɛ lanxi a xa xibaaru fanyi nɔrɔxi nan ma, a naxan taxuxi n na.
54001012	N bara won Marigi Isa tantu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi naxan bara sɛnbɛ fi n ma, a bara la n na han a naxa n naso a xa wali kui.
54001013	Singe n nu a rasɔtɔma nɛ, n a tɔɔrɔ, n a konbi. Kɔnɔ a naxa kinikini n ma, barima a a kolon n nu na birin nabama kolontareya nun danxaniyatareɲa nan kui.
54001014	Marigi xa hinnɛ bara gbo yɛ. A danxaniya nun xanunteya fixi n ma Isa nan saabui ra, a xa Mixi Sugandixi.
54001015	Nɔndi masenyi nan ya won birin lan won xa la naxan na: Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa faxi duniɲa ma yunubitɔɛe nan nakiside. N tan Pɔlu nu findixi yunubitɔɛ nan na naxan dangi mixi birin na,
54001016	kɔnɔ Ala naxa kinikini n ma hali n findixi yunubitɔɛ ra naxan dangi birin na, alako Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa diɲɛ gbegbe xa findi misaali ra mixie bɛ naxee danxaniyama a ma alako e xa kisi sɔtɔ naxan mu ɲɔnma abadan.
54001017	Mangɛ Ala Kerenyi, naxan mu faxama, naxan mu toma, binyɛ nun nɔrɛ xa lu a bɛ abadan. Amina.
54001018	N ma di Timote, n bara yi marasi fi i ma, naxan lanxi na namiɲɔnmɛ masenyie ma naxee nu falaxi i xa fe ra. I xa na masenyi rakamali, i xa gere fanyi so
54001019	danxaniya nun ɲanige tinxinxi ra. Ndee bara na rabolo, e xa danxaniya fa kana.
54001020	Humeneyo nun Alesandire na na mixie nan ya ma. N nee soxi nɛ Sentanɛ yi ra, alako e xa a tinkan a mu lan e xa Ala rasɔtɔ.
54002001	N ma marasi singe na yi nan na: Wo xa Ala makula, wo xa Ala maxandi, wo xa mixie xa kɔntɔfili masen Ala bɛ, wo xa Ala tantu mixi birin xa fe ra.
54002002	Wo xa na raba mangɛe nun yarerati birin bɛ, alako won xa lu bɔɲɛsa kui, won ma duniɲɛigiri xa raxara, won xa lu Ala xa kira xɔn ma, won xa xili fanyi sɔtɔ.
54002003	Na nan fan, na nan lanxi won Nakisima Ala waxɔnfe ma.
54002004	Ala wama adamadie birin xa kisi, e xa nɔndi kolon.
54002005	Ala keren na a ra. Xarisa fan keren nan a ra, Ala nun adamadie tagi. Na xarisa findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa nan na, naxan findi adamadi ra,
54002006	a fa a yɛtɛ fi xunsare ra mixi birin bɛ. Na nu findixi seedeɲɔxɔya nan na Ala nu wama a xɔn ma tɛmui naxɛ.
54002007	A n tan nan tixi kawandila, xɛɛra, nun karamɔxɔ ra si gbɛtɛe bɛ danxaniya nun nɔndi xa fe ra. N na na nɔndi nan falafe, wule mu a ra.
54002008	Na nan a toxi, a xɔli n ma adamadie xa e bɛlɛxɛ sɛniyɛnxie itala Ala maxandi kui yire birin xɔnɛ nun sɔnxɔ mu naxan na.
54002009	N man wama nɛ ginɛe xa dugie nan so naxee e suturama. E naxa e yɛtɛ raxunma xunsɛxɛ dɛnbɛxi ra, xɛɛma ra, gɛmɛ tofanyie ra, xa na mu a ra dugie ra, naxee sare xɔrɔxɔ.
54002010	A lanma e xa e yɛtɛ raxunma kɛwali fanyi nan na, naxan lanma ginɛe ma naxee birama Ala fɔxɔ ra.
54002011	Ginɛe xa nu fe xaran sabari nun magore kui.
54002012	N mu a luma ginɛe xa xɛmɛe xaran, xa na mu a ra e xa e yamari. Ginɛe xa lu sabari kui,
54002013	barima Adama nan singe daa, beenun Mahawa xa daa.
54002014	Adama xa mu madaxu. Ginɛ nan madaxu, a fa findi yunubitɔɛ ra.
54002015	Kɔnɔ Ala ginɛ rakisima a xa di bari nan kui, xa a luma danxaniya, xanunteya, nun sɛniyɛnyi kui, alɔ a lanma ki naxɛ.
54003001	Nɔndi nan ya: Mixi naxan wama findife danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xunmati ra, a wama wali fanyi xɔn.
54003002	A lanma danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xunmati xa findi mixi ra mixie mu nɔma fe ɲaaxi nde yo falade naxan xun ma. A xa a li a ginɛ keren gbansan nan dɔxɔxi, a findi taxasi mixi ra, naxan a yɛtɛ xaninma xaxilimaya ra, binyɛ na naxan ma, naxan fata xɔɲɛ masuxude, naxan fata mixi xarande.
54003003	A mu lanma a xa findi siisila ra, a mu lanma a xa mawolen. A lanma nɛ a xa findi mixi ra naxan lanyi fenma, naxan bɔɲɛ xinbeli, naxan mu mila.
54003004	A xa fata a yɛtɛ xa denbaya raɲɛrɛde, a xa die xa lu a xa yaamari bun ma xurui kui,
54003005	barima xa mixi mu fata a yɛtɛ xa denbaya raɲɛrɛde, a fa mɛɛnima Ala xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama ma di?
54003006	A naxa findi danxaniyatɔɛ nɛɛnɛ ra de, alako a naxa a yɛtɛ igbo, a fa ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ alɔ Ibulisa a sɔtɔxi ki naxɛ.
54003007	A man xa findi xili fanyi kanyi nan na danxaniyataree tagi, alako mixie naxa yo a ma, a naxa suxu Ibulisa xa gantanyi ra.
54003008	Mixi naxee findixi danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama malie ra, e fan xa findi xili fanyi kanyie nan na. E xa e makuya filankafuiɲa ra, e naxa siisi, e naxa bira kɔbiri fɔxɔ ra yaagitareya kui.
54003009	E xa Ala xa danxaniya masenyi ragata e xaxili fanyi kui.
54003010	E xa mato sinden. Xa e tinxin, e nɔma findide danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama malie ra.
54003011	Ginɛe fan xa findi xili fanyi kanyie ra. E naxa findi naafixie ra, e xa findi taxasi mixi ra, e xa tinxin fe birin kui.
54003012	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama malie xa ginɛ keren gbansan nan dɔxɔ, e xa e xa die nun e xa fɔxɔɛ raɲɛrɛ a fanyi ra.
54003013	Mixi naxee danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama malima a fanyi ra, e binyɛ nun limaniya nan sɔtɔma e xa danxaniya kui Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma.
54003014	N na yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe nɛ i ma, hali n to laxi a ra a gbe mu luxi n xa i yire li.
54003015	Xa a sa li n naxa dugundi, i xa Ala xa mixie ɲɛrɛ ki fanyi kolon. Ala naxan na na, a xa mixie lanxi a xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama nan ma, naxan na nɔndi xa kinki ra.
54003016	Fo won xa a kolon nɛ a Ala ɲɛrɛ ki sɛnbɛ gbo. A gundo makɛnɛnxi nan ya: Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi masenxi adama fate nan na, a xaxili nan tinxin. A mini nɛ malekɛe ma, a kawandixi ɲamanɛe nan tagi. Duniɲa danxaniyaxi a tan nan ma, a texi nɔrɛ nan kui.
54004001	Ala Xaxili a masenma nɛ won bɛ a fiixɛ ra, a ndee fama nɛ danxaniya rabolode waxati dɔnxɔɛ kui, e fa bira ɲinnɛ wule falɛe nun e xa xaranyie fɔxɔ ra.
54004002	Wule falɛ filankafuie mixie madaxuma. E xaxili balanxi gben.
54004003	E tɔnyi dɔxɔma futi xirife ra, a nun donse ndee donfe ra, Ala naxee daaxi alako danxaniyatɔɛe nun nɔndi falɛe xa e don tantui ra.
54004004	Ala se naxan birin daaxi, a fan. A mu raharamuxi mixie bɛ naxee a donma tantui ra,
54004005	barima Ala xa masenyi nun Ala maxandi na rasɛniyɛnma.
54004006	Xa i na nɔndi masen i ngaxakerenyie bɛ, i bara findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa walikɛ fanyi ra, naxan i baloma danxaniya masenyi nun xaranyi fanyi ra, i birama naxan fɔxɔ ra.
54004007	I naxa fe fufafu madɔxɔ kiini ra danxaniya mu naxan kui. I xa Ala fe suxu sɔɔbɛ ra.
54004008	Mixie mɛɛnife e fate ma, na tide mu gbo alɔ e na e xaxili yaka ba. Na xaxili yaka ba nan fama findide mixie bɛ munafanyi ra duniɲa nun aligiyama.
54004009	Nɔndi masenyi nan ya won birin lan won xa la naxan na:
54004010	Won walima tunnabɛxi nan na, barima won xaxili tixi Ala Ɲiɲɛ ra, naxan findixi adamadi birin Nakisima ra, a gbengbenyi danxaniyatɔɛe.
54004011	Na nan na ki, i xa na yaamari birin masen mixie bɛ, i xa e xaran na sɛriyɛe ra.
54004012	Mixi yo naxa yo i xa fonikeya ma. I naxan nabama, i xa findi misaali ra danxaniyatɔɛe bɛ a lanma e xa wɔyɛn ki naxɛ, e xa ɲɛrɛ ki naxɛ, e xa e bore xanu ki naxɛ, e xa danxaniya nun e xa sɛniyɛnyi xa lu ki naxɛ.
54004013	Han n sa fama tɛmui naxɛ, i xa Kitaabui xaran mixie bɛ, i xa e ralimaniya, i xa e xaran.
54004014	I naxa wali bɛɲin naxan soxi i yi ra, masenyi tixi Ala xili ra i xa fe ra naxan ma, forie to e bɛlɛxɛ sa i xunyi ma.
54004015	I xa na rabatu sɛnbɛ ra, alako mixi birin xa i ɲɛrɛ ki to i sigama yare ki naxɛ.
54004016	Mɛɛni i yɛtɛ ma, nun na xaranyi ma i naxan tima tunnabɛxi ra. Xa i na raba i kisima nɛ, i tan nun naxee i xui ramɛma.
54005001	I naxa wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ fala forie bɛ. I xa e ralimaniya alɔ i baba. I xa xɛmɛ fonikee ralimaniya alɔ i xunya xɛmɛmae.
54005002	I xa ɲɛlɛxɛforie ralimaniya alɔ i nga. I xa fonike ginɛmae ralimaniya alɔ i maaginɛe sɛniyɛnyi kui.
54005003	I xa kaaɲɛ ginɛe binya, naxee na e kerenyi ma.
54005004	Xa kaaɲɛ ginɛ xa die na na, xa na mu a ra a xa mamadie, e tan xa Ala waxɔnfe matinkan e xa denbaya bɛ. Die barimixie naxan nabaxi e bɛ, e xa na sare ragbilen e ma. Ala wama na nan xɔn.
54005005	Kaaɲɛ ginɛ yati yati, naxan luxi a keren, a a xaxili tima Ala nan na. A salima, a Ala maxandima tɛmui birin.
54005006	Kɔnɔ kaaɲɛ ginɛ naxan birama a yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra, a tan bara faxa hali a ɲiɲɛ to a ra.
54005007	I xa yi yaamarie masen mixie bɛ, alako e xa lu tinxinyi kui.
54005008	Mixi naxan mu mɛɛnima a xa mixie ma, a gbengbenyi a xa denbaya ma, na kanyi bara danxaniya bɛɲin. A ɲaaxu dangife kaafiri ra.
54005009	Kaaɲɛ ginɛ naxan xili lanma a xa sɛbɛ kaaɲɛ ginɛe xilie ya ma, a lanma a xa simaya xa dangi ɲɛ tongo senni ra. A xa a li a nu dɔxɔxi xɛmɛ keren gbansan nan xɔn ma,
54005010	a nun man a kolonxi tinxintɔɛ ra a xa wali fanyie xa fe ra, alɔ di xurufe, xɔɲɛ rasɛnɛfe, sɛniyɛntɔɛe sanyi maxafe, tɔɔrɔmixie malife, a nun birafe fe fanyi mɔɔli birin fɔxɔ ra.
54005011	Kɔnɔ kaaɲɛ ginɛ naxee findixi sungbutunyie ra, e xili naxa sɛbɛ, barima xa a sa li e waxɔnfee e ragbilenma nɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fɔxɔ ra, e fa dɔxɔ xɛmɛ taa,
54005012	na tɛmui e bara yunubi sɔtɔ, barima e bara e xa laayidi singe kana.
54005013	Bafe na ra, e man findima tunnaxɔnɛe nan na, e nu fa lu e maɲɛrɛ ra naafixiya rabade, e mixi mafalama, e fe fala naxan mu lanma a xa fala.
54005014	Na kui, a xɔli n ma kaaɲɛ ginɛ sungbutunyie xa dɔxɔ xɛmɛ taa, e fa die bari, e mɛɛni e xa denbaya ma, alako won yaxuie naxa nɔ fe ɲaaxi falade e xun ma.
54005015	Ndee ɲan bara e kobe raso, e bira Sentanɛ fɔxɔ ra.
54005016	Xa danxaniyatɔɛ ginɛ bara kaaɲɛ ginɛ ndee sɔtɔ a xa mixie ya ma, a xa a yigiya alako a naxa findi kote ra danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama bɛ. Na kui, danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama nɔma nɛ kaaɲɛ ginɛe malide naxee na e kerenyi ma.
54005017	Danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa forie, naxee fee raɲɛrɛma a fanyi ra, e xa binyɛ xungbe sɔtɔ, a gbengbenyi naxee kawandi nun xaranyi tima.
54005018	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Ninge nɛ mɛngi turuxunma, wo mu lan wo xa a dɛ xiri.» A man sɛbɛxi, «Walikɛ xa a wali sare sɔtɔ.»
54005019	I naxa kalamui ramɛ danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama xa fori nde xa fe ra, xa seede firin, xa na mu a ra saxan, mu na fe toxi.
54005020	Naxee bara yunubi raba, i xa i yaxaseri masa e xa fe ra, birin ya xɔri, alako booree fan xa gaaxu.
54005021	N bara yi yaamarie fi i ma, Ala, a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa, nun malekɛ sugandixie ya xɔri. I xa yi yaamarie rabatu tinxinyi kui. I naxa mixi yo rafisa a boore bɛ.
54005022	I naxa gbata mixie sugandide, i fa i bɛlɛxɛ sa e ma, xa na mu a ra i fan luma nɛ e xa yunubie kui. I xa lu sɛniyɛnyi kui.
54005023	I naxa ye gbansan xa min. I xa wɛni nde min seri ra i furi xa fe ra, barima i luma fura ra.
54005024	Mixi ndee xa yunubie makɛnɛnxi beenun e xa makiitide li, kɔnɔ boore gbee mu toma fo yare.
54005025	Wali fanyi fan makɛnɛnma na ki nɛ, wali ɲaaxi mu nɔxunma.
54006001	Danxaniyatɔɛ naxee na konyiya kui, e xa e marigie binya, alako binyɛ yo naxa ba Ala xili ra, a nun a xa sɛriyɛ ra.
54006002	Konyi naxee marigi findixi danxaniyatɔɛe ra, na konyie naxa yo e marigi ma, a falafe ra a e ngaxakerenyie nan e ra. A lanma e xa e xa yaamari rabatu a fanyi ra dangife a singe ra, barima e na walife e ngaxakerenyi xanuxie nan bɛ. I xa mixie xaran yi yaamarie ra.
54006003	Xa a sa li mixi nde xaranyi gbɛtɛ nan tima, a mu bira won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa masenyi tinxinxi fɔxɔ ra, nun xaranyi naxan findixi Ala gbe ra,
54006004	na kanyi bara a yɛtɛ igbo, a mu sese kolon. A xaxili mu fan. A xa wɔyɛnyi gbo, sɔnxɔɛ rafan a ma. Na findima tɔɔnɛ, lantareya, tɔɔɲɛgɛ, siikɛ,
54006005	tinxintaree xa sɔnxɔ sɔnxɔɛ, nun nɔndi kolontareya. E diinɛ rawalima kɔbiri fe nan na.
54006006	Diinɛ nan findima geeni ra mixie bɛ, naxee e wasasoma e sɔtɔse.
54006007	Won faxi duniɲa ma won bɛlɛxɛe igeli nan na, won man sigama na ki nɛ.
54006008	Xa baloe nun sose na won yi ra, won xa won wasaso na ra.
54006009	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan wama bannafe, na kanyi tantanma nɛ, a suxu gantanyi ra, a fa mila a waxɔnfe ɲaaxie ma. Na waxɔnfe ɲaaxie nan mixie xun nakanama, e fa lɔɛ.
54006010	Kɔbiri xɔli findixi fe kobi birin sanke nan na. Ndee to mila kɔbiri ma, e naxa danxaniya bɛɲin, e fa tɔɔrɔ a ɲaaxi ra.
54006011	Kɔnɔ i tan naxan findixi Ala xa mixi ra, i xa gbilen na fe mɔɔlie fɔxɔ ra. I xa bira tinxinyi, Ala fe, danxaniya, xanunteya, diɲɛ, nun bɔɲɛ bɛxiya fɔxɔ ra.
54006012	Danxaniya gere fanyi so. Kisi suxu, i xilixi naxan ma, i seedeɲɔxɔya tixi naxan ma fe ra seede wuyaxi ya xɔri.
54006013	N bara i yamari Ala ya xɔri, naxan nimase birin nabaloma, n bara i yamari Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ya xɔri, naxan bara seedeɲɔxɔya fanyi ti Ponsi Pilati bɛ,
54006014	i xa Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatu tinxinyi sɛniyɛnxi ra han won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fa tɛmui.
54006015	Ala nan fama Isa raminide a wama a xɔn ma waxati naxɛ. Tantui Kanyi, Mangɛ Sɛnbɛma, firin mu kafuxi naxan ma, Mangɛe xa Mangɛ, Marigie Marigi Ala,
54006016	naxan keren mu faxɛ kolon, naxan xɔnyi na naiyalanyi ra, adamadie mu naxan toxi, adama mu nɔma naxan tode. Binyɛ nun sɛnbɛ na a bɛ abadan. Amina.
54006017	I xa to bannamixie yamari a e naxa e yɛtɛ igbo, e man naxa e xaxili ti naafuli ra, barima naafuli mu buma. E xa e xaxili ti Ala nan na, naxan won kima se birin na alako won xa sɛɛwa.
54006018	E xa fe fanyi raba. E xa kɛwali fanyi nan xa findi e xa bannaya ra. E xa mixi ki e harige ra e xa fonisireya xa fe ra.
54006019	Na birin kui e harige sɔtɔma nɛ yare naxan findima kisi yati yati ra e bɛ.
54006020	Timote, i xa mɛɛni fe ma naxan taxuxi i ra. I xa wɔyɛnyi fufafu nun wule matanga.
54006021	Mixi ndee na falama a lɔnni, kɔnɔ lɔnni mu a ra. Na bara a niya e xa e kobe so danxaniya ra. Ala xa hinnɛ wo ra.
55001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, naxan findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra ra Ala waxɔnki. Laayidi tongoxi won bɛ kisi xa fe ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui nan na.
55001002	N na yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe Timote nan ma, naxan findixi n ma di maxanuxi ra. Baba Ala nun won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, e xa hinnɛ, kinikini, nun bɔɲɛsa fi i ma.
55001003	N bara Ala tantu, n naxan batuma ɲanige fiixɛ ra alɔ n benbae a rabaxi ki naxɛ. N Ala maxandima nɛ i bɛ kɔɛ nun yanyi ra,
55001004	barima n nan n natuxi i yaye nan ma. N man nu wama i tofe han, alako n xa sɛɛwa a fanyi ra.
55001005	N man n natuxi i xa danxaniya nan ma, filankafuiɲa mu na naxan kui, naxan nu na i mama Lowisi fan yi ra, a nun i nga Ewunise. N a kolon i fan danxaniyaxi na ki nɛ.
55001006	Na kui, n bara i ralimaniya i xa Ala sɛnbɛ rawali, a naxan fixi i ma n to n bɛlɛxɛ sa i xunyi ma.
55001007	Ala mu gaaxu xaxili xa soxi won yi ra. A bara xaxili fi won ma naxan findixi sɛnbɛ, xanunteya, nun yɛtɛ suxui ra.
55001008	I naxa yaagi won Marigi xa seedeɲɔxɔya bade. I man naxa yaagi n na, n tan naxan na geeli kui won Marigi xa fe ra. A lanma won birin xa tɔɔrɔ Isa xa xibaaru fanyi xa fe ra Ala sɛnbɛ saabui ra.
55001009	A tan nan won nakisixi, a tan nan won xilixi a xa sɛniyɛnyi ma. A mu na rabaxi won ma kɛwali saabui xa ra, a na ɲanigexi a yɛtɛ nan na. A hinnɛxi won na a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa fe nan na kafi duniɲa fɔlɛ.
55001010	Yakɔsi won bara na hinnɛ to won Nakisima Isa xa fa kui, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi. A bara faxɛ sɛnbɛ kana, a kisi fe ramini a xa xibaaru fanyi saabui ra, alako adama naxa faxa sɔnɔn.
55001011	Ala n findixi kawandila, xɛɛra, nun karamɔxɔ nan na na xibaaru fanyi xa fe ra.
55001012	N na tɔɔrɔfe na wali nan xa fe ra, kɔnɔ n mu yaagima na ra, barima n a kolon n danxaniyaxi naxan ma. N bara la a ra a nɔma n ma kisi ragatade han na lɔxɔɛ.
55001013	N nɔndi naxan masenxi i bɛ, na xa findi i xa misaali ra, i birama naxan fɔxɔ ra danxaniya nun xanunteya ra, alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ.
55001014	Ala naxan taxuxi i ra, i xa mɛɛni na ma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, naxan sabatixi won i.
55001015	I a kolon Asikae birin bara n nabolo, alɔ Figelo nun Heremogene.
55001016	Ala xa kinikini Onesiforo nun a xa denbaya ma, barima a nu luma n nalimaniya ra. A mu yaagi n na n to na geeli kui.
55001017	A to fa Rɔma, a naxa n fen han a naxa n to.
55001018	Marigi xa kinikini a ma na kiiti lɔxɔɛ. I a kolon dangi birin na a n malixi ki naxɛ Efɛsɛ.
55002001	N ma di, i xa i sɛnbɛ so Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa hinnɛ xa fe ra.
55002002	I naxan mɛxi n na seede gbegbe ya xɔri, i xa na masenyi taxu i dugutɛgɛe ra, naxee fan nɔma mixi gbɛtɛe raxarande na ra.
55002003	Won birin xa wakili tɔɔrɛ kui, barima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa sɔɔri fanyie nan won na.
55002004	Sɔɔri naxan na gere kui, a mu birama duniɲa fe fɔxɔ ra, a birama a xa mangɛ waxɔnfe nan fɔxɔ ra.
55002005	Mixi naxan sigaxi gi gbata rabade, xa a mu a gi a sɛriyɛ ki ma, a mu geenima.
55002006	Mixi naxan xɛ rawalima, a tan nan lanma a xa bogi singee sɔtɔ.
55002007	I ɲɔxɔ sa n ma masenyi birin xɔn ma, Marigi fahaamui fima nɛ i ma na fee ma.
55002008	I xa ratu Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, naxan kelixi faxɛ ma, naxan fatanxi Dawuda bɔnsɔɛ ra, alɔ Isa xa xibaaru fanyi a masenxi ki naxɛ, n naxan kawandife.
55002009	Na xibaaru fanyi nan ma fe a niyaxi, n na tɔɔrɔfe geeli kui alɔ fe kobi rabama, kɔnɔ Ala xa masenyi tan mu balanxi.
55002010	Na nan a ra n tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli birin xaninma, alako mixi sugandixie xa kisi sɔtɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra, e lu a xa nɔrɛ kui abadan.
55002011	Masenyi hagigɛ nan ya: Xa won nun Isa bara faxa, won nun Isa man kelima nɛ faxɛ ma.
55002012	Xa won tunnabɛxi, won luma nɛ Isa xa mangɛya kui. Xa won na a rabolo, a fan won naboloma nɛ.
55002013	Xa won mu lu won xui xanbi ra, a tan luma nɛ a xui xanbi ra, barima a mu nɔma a yɛtɛ rabolode.
55002014	I xa mixi birin natu Ala ya i, a a lanma e xa gere lu na masenyi ndee xa fe ra. Na wɔyɛnyi mɔɔli tide yo mu na. A a ramɛmae nan xun nakanama tun.
55002015	I xa i yɛtɛ masen Ala bɛ, alɔ mixi naxan wali fɔxi mu mayaagi, a fata nɔndi masende mixie bɛ a masen ki ma.
55002016	Wɔyɛn ɲaaxi fufafu lu na, barima naxee na mɔɔli falama, e xa kaafiriɲa xun nan tun masama.
55002017	E xa wɔyɛnyi gboma nɛ alɔ fure ɲaaxi, naxan mixi faxama. Humeneyo nun Fileto na nee nan ya ma.
55002018	E bara makuya nɔndi ra, e fa a fala mixie ɲan bara keli faxɛ ma. E bara mixi ndee xa danxaniya kana na wɔyɛnyi mɔɔli ra.
55002019	Kɔnɔ Ala xa banxi tixi yi masenyi nan fari: «Ala a kolon, mixi naxan findixi a gbe ra.» A man a masenxi: «Adamadi naxan Marigi xili falama, a xa tinxintareya rabɛɲin.»
55002020	Se sase mɔɔli gbegbe nan na banxi xungbe kui. Nde fan yailanxi xɛɛma nan na, xa na mu a ra gbeti. Nde yailanxi wuri nan na, xa na mu a ra bɛndɛ. Nde binyɛ wali rabama, nde fan binyɛtare wali rabama.
55002021	Mixi naxan a yɛtɛ rasɛniyɛnma, a luma nɛ alɔ wali binyɛ rabama se sase naxan kui. A to sɛniyɛn, a marigi nɔma a rawalide wali fanyi birin kui.
55002022	Fonike waxɔnfe lu na. Wo nun mixi naxee Marigi xilima bɔɲɛ sɛniyɛnxi ra, wo xa nu tinxinyi, danxaniya, xanunteya, nun bɔɲɛsa fen.
55002023	Wɔyɛnyi tidetare fufafu lu na, barima i a kolon na mɔɔli findima gere nan na.
55002024	A mu lanma Marigi xa walikɛ xa sɔnxɔ. A lanma a xa findi mixi diɲɛxi ra naxan fata mixi xarande, a man wakili tɔɔrɛ ra.
55002025	A lanma a xa matandilae matinxin wɔyɛnyi ɲɔxunmɛ ra, alako Ala xa a niya e xa tuubi, e xa nɔndi kolon,
55002026	e xa xaxili sɔtɔ, e xa e ba Ibulisa xa gantanyi ra. Ibulisa bara e suxu gantanyi ra, alako e xa lu a xa yaamari bun ma.
55003001	I xa a kolon, fe xɔrɔxɔɛe fama nɛ duniɲa lide waxati dɔnxɔɛ,
55003002	barima adamadie birama e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe nan fɔxɔ ra, kɔbiri rafanma nɛ e ma, e e yɛtɛ igboma, e lama e yɛtɛ ra, e Ala rasɔtɔma, e e barimae matandima, e finsiriwaliya rabama, e mu Ala xa fe binyama,
55003003	e mu kinikinima, e mu diɲɛma, e mixi mafalama, e xurutareɲa rabama, e e boore tɔɔrɔma, e mixi fanyi xɔnma,
55003004	e mixi yanfama, e bogonma fee ma, e bɔɲɛ gbo, e waxɔnfe rafan e ma dangi Ala xa fe ra.
55003005	A luxi nɛ alɔ e diinɛ nan nabatuma, kɔnɔ e bara e kobe raso a sɛnbɛ ra. I xa i makuya na mixi mɔɔlie ra.
55003006	E soma denbayae kui, e fa ginɛ sɛnbɛtaree mabɛndun, naxee findixi yunubitɔɛe ra, naxee birama fe ɲaaxi mɔɔli birin fɔxɔ ra.
55003007	Na ginɛ mɔɔli xaranma tɛmui birin, kɔnɔ e mu fahaamui sɔtɔma nɔndi ma.
55003008	Na mixi naxee soma denbayae kui, e luma nɛ alɔ Yannɛsi nun Yanbɛrɛsi naxee Annabi Munsa matandi. Na mixie nɔndi fan matandima nɛ, e xaxili bara kana. E xa danxaniya xɔn mu kuyama.
55003009	Kɔnɔ e mu sigama yare sɔnɔn, barima mixi birin fama nɛ e xa daxuɲa kolonde, alɔ Yannɛsi nun Yanbɛrɛsi xa fe nu kolonxi ki naxɛ.
55003010	Kɔnɔ i tan, i bara n ma xaranyi kolon, n ɲɛrɛ ki, n ɲanige, n ma danxaniya, n ma diɲɛ, n ma xanunteya, n ma tunnabɛxi,
55003011	n ma ɲaxankatɛ, a nun n ma tɔɔrɛ. Tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli mundun na, n mu naxan sɔtɔ Antiyɔki, Ikoniyon, nun Lisitire? Ɲaxankatɛ mundun mu n lixi naa? Marigi bara n nakisi na birin kui.
55003012	Nɔndi na a ra a mixi naxan birin wama birafe Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa sɛriyɛ fɔxɔ ra, a na kanyi tɔɔrɛ sɔtɔma nɛ.
55003013	Kɔnɔ mixi ɲaaxie nun filankafuie xa fe kobie xun nan tun luma masa ra, e fa booree madaxu, e e yɛtɛ madaxu.
55003014	I xa i xiri sɛriyɛ ra i naxan xaranxi, i danxaniyaxi naxan ma. I a kolon i na sɔtɔxi naxan na.
55003015	Kabi i dimɛdi tɛmui, i Kitaabui sɛniyɛnxie kolon, naxee nɔma lɔnni fide i ma. Na lɔnni findima kisi nan na mixie bɛ, naxee danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma.
55003016	Kitaabui sɛniyɛnxi birin fatanxi Ala nan na. A fan xaranyi ra, a fan yaabi ra, a fan matinxinse ra, a fan tinxinyi masenfe ra,
55003017	alako Ala xa mixi xa nɔ wali fanyi birin nabade.
55004001	N bara i yamari Ala ya xɔri, n bara i yamari Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ya xɔri, naxan fama mixi ɲiɲɛe nun mixi faxaxie makiitide, naxan fama a xa mangɛya niini raminide,
55004002	i xa Ala xa masenyi kawandi, i xa wakili tɛmui birin, i xa mixie matinxin, i xa mixie xa yunubie masen e bɛ, i xa e ralimaniya, i xa e xaran. I xa na birin naba diɲɛ kui.
55004003	Waxati na fafe mixie mu tinma xaranyi tinxinxi ra tɛmui naxɛ. E karamɔxɔ wuyaxi fenma nɛ, naxee masenyi mɔɔli nde tima naxan nafan e tuli ma.
55004004	E gbilenma nɛ nɔndi fɔxɔ ra, e fa e tuli mati kiinie ra.
55004005	Kɔnɔ i tan, i xa i yɛtɛ mataxasi fe birin kui, i xa i tunnabɛxi tɔɔrɛ kui, i xa Ala xa xibaaru fanyi rayensen, i xa i xa wali rakamali.
55004006	N tan ɲan bara findi sɛrɛxɛ ra Ala bɛ. A gbe mu luxi n xa taa masara.
55004007	N bara n ma gere fanyi so, n bara n ma ɲɛrɛ raɲɔn, n bara lu danxaniya kui.
55004008	Xunnakeli sare ragataxi n bɛ, naxan findixi tinxinyi ra Marigi kiitisa tinxinxi naxan fima n ma na lɔxɔɛ. N keren xa mu a ra, a na fima mixi birin nan ma, a fafe rafan naxee ma.
55004009	I xa kata fafe ra n yire mafuren mafuren,
55004010	barima Demasi bara n nabɛɲin duniɲa fe xa fe ra, a siga Tɛsaloniki. Kiresen bara siga Galati, Tito bara siga Dalamatiya.
55004011	Luki gbansan nan na n sɛɛti ma. I xa fa Maraki ra, barima a nɔma n malide n ma wali kui a fanyi ra.
55004012	N bara Tikike xɛɛ Efɛsɛ.
55004013	I nɛ fama, i xa fa na xinbeli donma ra, n naxan luxi Tiroyasi, Karapo xɔnyi, a nun n ma bukie. Na sɛbɛli naxee tixi xuruse kiri ma, e tide gbo dangi birin na, i xa fa e fan na.
55004014	Alesandire xabui bara fe ɲaaxi gbegbe raba n na. Marigi fama a sare ragbilende a ma.
55004015	I xa i yɛtɛ ratanga a ma, barima a muxu xa kawandi matandi nɛ a ɲaaxi ra.
55004016	N to n yɛtɛ xunmafala kiiti banxi kui a singe, n malima yo mu nu na. Birin n nabolo nɛ. Ala xa diɲɛ e ma e fe naxan nabaxi.
55004017	Ala nan n malixi, a sɛnbɛ so n yi ra, alako n xa kawandi ti a fanyi ra si birin bɛ. Ala naxa n natanga yɛtɛ magaaxuxi ma.
55004018	Marigi man fama n natangade mixie xa wali kobi birin ma, a fa n nakisi, n xa so a xa mangɛya niini bun ma ariyanna. Matɔxɔɛ na Ala bɛ abadan.
55004019	Pirisila nun Akila xɛɛbu n bɛ, a nun Onesiforo xa denbaya.
55004020	Erasito bara lu Korinti. N bara Tirofimo lu Mileto, barima a mu nu yalanxi.
55004021	I xa kata fafe ra beenun ɲɛmɛ xa so. Ewubulo, Pudɛn, Linosi, Kelodiya, nun won ngaxakerenyi birin bara i xɛɛbu.
55004022	Marigi xa sabati i bɔɲɛ i, Ala xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
56001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, Ala xa konyi nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra. N na walife alako Ala xa ɲama sugandixi xa danxaniya, e man xa nɔndi kolon naxan e raɲɛrɛma Ala xa fe kui.
56001002	Yi danxaniya nun yi nɔndi a niyama nɛ mixi xa a xaxili ti Ala xa kisi ra. Ala, naxan xa laayidi mu kanama, a tan nan yi abadan kisi laayidi won bɛ beenun duniɲa xa daa.
56001003	Waxati to kamali, a naxa a xa xibaaru fanyi makɛnɛn kawandi saabui ra, naxan bara taxu n na Ala won Nakisima xa yaamari ma.
56001004	N bara i tan Tito xɛɛbu, naxan bara findi n ma di yati yati ra won ma danxaniya kui. Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa, won Nakisima xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi i ma.
56001005	N bara i lu Kirɛti alako i xa fee yailan naxee yailan daaxi luxi na, i xa mixie sugandi taae birin kui, e xa findi na danxaniyatɔɛ ɲamae xa kuntigie ra. Alɔ n i yamari ki naxɛ,
56001006	danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama kuntigi lanma nɛ a xa findi tinxintɔɛ ra xili fanyi na naxan xun, ginɛ keren kanyi, naxan xa die danxaniyaxi, mixie mu naxee kolon kalabante xurutaree ra.
56001007	Fo yi xunmatie xa findi xɛmɛ tinxinxie nan na barima Ala xa wali nan taxuxi e ra. E naxa findi mixie ra naxee e yɛtɛ igboma, naxee bɔɲɛ tema mafuren, naxee siisima, naxee mawolen, naxee biraxi geeni tinxintare fɔxɔ ra.
56001008	Fo e xa findi xɛmɛe ra naxee fata xɔɲɛ rasɛnɛde, fe fanyi rafan naxee ma, naxee e yɛtɛ xaninma xaxilimaya ra, naxee tinxin, naxee sɛniyɛn, naxee nɔxi e yɛtɛ ra.
56001009	Fo nɔndi masenyi xa lu e yi ra alɔ e xaranxi a ra ki naxɛ. Na nan a toma e fan nɔma kawandi tide a nɔndi ki ma, e man nɔ na nɔndi matandie ra.
56001010	Na matanditi mɔɔli gbegbe na na, a gbengbenyi sunna mixie ya ma. E dɛ wuya, mixi yanfafe rafan e ma.
56001011	Fo won xa e dɛ balan. E bara denbaya ndee kana, barima e na e xaranfe fee nan na naxee mu daxa. E na birin nabama e yɛtɛ xa geeni tinxintareya nan ma fe ra.
56001012	E xa namiɲɔnmɛ nde nan yati a fala, «Kirɛtikae wule nun e furi nan tun kolon. E tunnaxɔnɔ, e man ɲaaxu alɔ bɔximase.»
56001013	Nɔndi nan yati na a ra. N na a falafe na nan ma, i xa wɔyɛn e ma a xɔrɔxɔɛ ra alako e xa danxaniya a fiixɛ ra,
56001014	e xa ba Yuwifi xa kuye taalie danxunfe. E xa ba mixie xa yaamarie danxunfe naxee bara mɛɛ nɔndi ra.
56001015	Se birin sɛniyɛn sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɛ, kɔnɔ sese mu sɛniyɛn sɛniyɛntaree nun danxaniyataree tan bɛ. E xaxili nun e sondonyi birin bara manɔxɔ.
56001016	E Ala kolonfe falama e dɛ ra, kɔnɔ e xa wali a masenma a e mu a kolon feo! E xa fefe mu fan. Sɛriyɛ matandie nan e ra, naxee mu nɔma wali fanyi yo rabade.
56002001	Kɔnɔ i tan xa nu danxaniyatɔɛe xaran nɔndi masenyi nan na.
56002002	I xa a masen xɛmɔxie bɛ e xa taxasi, e xa ɲɛrɛ a binyamixi ki ma, e xa e yɛtɛ xanin xaxilimaya ra, e xa bira nɔndi nan fɔxɔ ra e xa danxaniya kui, xanunteya kui, a nun tunnabɛxiya kui.
56002003	Na kui, i man xa a masen ginɛ mɔxie bɛ, e xa ɲɛrɛ sɛniyɛnyi kui, e naxa findi mixi mafalɛe ra, e naxa siisi. E xa nu marasi fanyi fi
56002004	sungbutunyie ma alako e xa e xa mɔrie nun e xa die xanu.
56002005	E man xa e rasi e xa e yɛtɛ xanin xaxilimaya ra, e xa sɛniyɛn, e xa banxi walie suxu, e yuge xa fan, e xa e yɛtɛ magoro e xa mɔrie bɛ, alako Ala xa masenyi naxa bɛxu.
56002006	I man xa sɛgɛtalae fan nasi e xa e yɛtɛ xanin xaxilimaya ra
56002007	fe birin kui. I tan yɛtɛ xa findi misaali ra e bɛ i xa wali fanyie saabui ra. I xa kawandi xa findi nɔndi nun sɔɔbɛ ra.
56002008	I xa masenyi xa tinxin, alako i matandimae xa yaagi, barima e mu fefe kobi kolon e naxan falama won ma fe ra.
56002009	I xa a masen konyie bɛ, e xa e yɛtɛ magoro e marigie bɛ fe birin kui. E xa e raɲɛlɛxin, e naxa e matandi,
56002010	e naxa sese muɲa, e xa a masen a e marigie nɔma lade e ra ki fanyi. Na konyi mɔɔli binyɛ fima nɛ won Nakisima Ala xa masenyi ma fe birin kui.
56002011	A lanma won xa ɲɛrɛ yi mɔɔli ra barima Ala xa hinnɛ bara makɛnɛn, naxan nɔma findide kisi ra mixi birin bɛ.
56002012	A xa hinnɛ won xaranma alako won xa gbilen tinxintareya nun duniɲa fee fɔxɔ ra, won xa won yɛtɛ xanin xaxilimaya ra, won xa won ma duniɲɛigiri raɲɛrɛ tinxinyi nun Ala yaragaaxui kui.
56002013	Won to na yi duniɲa ma, won na fe fanyi nan mamɛfe won xaxili tixi naxan na. Won na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa nɔrɛ nan mamɛfe, won Nakisima Marigi Ala.
56002014	A tan nan a yɛtɛ fi won bɛ, alako a xa won xunsara won ma yunubie xa fe ra, a xa ɲama nde rasɛniyɛn e xa findi a yɛtɛ gbe ra, naxee sɛnbɛ soxi wali fanyie rabafe ma.
56002015	I xa mixie kawandi yi fee ra. I xa mixie ralimaniya. I xa e rasi. I xa nɔndi makɛnɛn e bɛ i sɛnbɛ birin na. Mixi yo naxa yo i ma.
56003001	I xa e ratu, e xa e yɛtɛ magoro mangɛe nun mangasanyi bɛ, e xa e xa yaamarie suxu. E xa gbata wali fanyi mɔɔli birin nabafe ra,
56003002	e naxa mixi yo mafala, e naxa gere so, e xa marafanyi nun bɔɲɛ fanyi masen birin bɛ.
56003003	A singe won fan nu daxuɲa nan nabama. Yaamari matandimae nan nu won na. Won nu bara lɔɛ kira xɔn. Won nu bara bira won yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra a nun duniɲa fe mɔɔli birin fɔxɔ ra, han na nu bara won findi konyie ra. Won nu won ma duniɲa xaninma ɲaaxuɲa, tɔɔnɛ, gbɛsɛnxɔnnanteya, nun maraɲaaxuɲa nan kui. Won fan mu nu rafan mixie ma.
56003004	Kɔnɔ won Nakisima Ala to a xa bɔɲɛ fanyi nun a xa xanunteya makɛnɛn, a naxa kisi fi won ma.
56003005	A mu won nakisixi won ma wali fanyie xa fe xa ma, a won nakisixi a xa kinikini nan ma, won xunxafe ye xɔɔra a nun a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra. Na bara a niya won xa bari a nɛɛnɛ ra, won ma duniɲɛigiri birin xa masara.
56003006	Ala bara won ki! A bara a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi ragoro won ma won Nakisima Isa saabui ra.
56003007	Na kui, won ma yunubie to bara xafari a xa hinnɛ saabui ra, won bara nɔ findide kɛtongoe ra, won bara won xaxili ti abadan kisi ra.
56003008	Nɔndi masenxi nan na ki. A xɔli n ma i xa na fee masen a fanyi ra, alako naxee bara danxaniya Ala ma, e xa fe birin naba alako e xa bira fe fanyi raba fɔxɔ ra. Na fee findixi fe hagigɛ fanyie nan na mixi birin bɛ.
56003009	Kɔnɔ i naxa i gbe raso mixie xa wɔyɛn fufafu ya ma. E naxan falama benbae xa fe ra, e xa gbɛsɛnxɔnnɛya, e xa gere wɔyɛnyi Ala xa sɛriyɛ xa fe ra, e sese tide mu na.
56003010	Naxan yo mixie tagi isoma, i xa a rasi keren, i xa a rasi firin. Xa na birin kui a mu i xui mɛ, i xa a rabolo,
56003011	barima i a kolon a na mixi mɔɔli mu fan. A bara a yɛtɛ danka a xa tinxintareya ra.
56003012	N na Aritema xa na mu Tikike xɛɛ i ma, i xa fe birin naba alako i xa n li Nikopoli, barima n bara a ɲanige n xa ɲɛmɛ radangi naa.
56003013	Fe birin naba alako i xa sɛriyɛ karamɔxɔ Senasi nun Apolosi mali e xa biyaasi kui. E mali, e hayi na se naxan birin ma, e xa a sɔtɔ.
56003014	A lanma danxaniyatɔɛ naxee na won ma kɔnti ma, e xa e matinkan tunnabɛxi ra wali fanyie ma, alako e xa mixie hayi xɔrɔxɔɛe fan, e naxa fa lu na ki fufafu.
56003015	Naxee na n fɛ ma be, e birin i xɛɛbu. I xa won xanuntenyie danxaniyatɔɛe birin xɛɛbu muxu bɛ. Ala xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
57001001	N tan Pɔlu nan yi ki, naxan bara findi geelimani ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bɛ. Muxu nun won ngaxakerenyi Timote nan yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛfe, katarabi Filemon ma muxu xanuntenyi nun muxu waliboore,
57001002	a nun Apiya muxu maaginɛ, a nun Arikipe muxu gereso boore Ala xa gere xa fe ra, a nun danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama naxan e malanma i tan Filemon xɔnyi.
57001003	Won Baba Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi, won Marigi Isa xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa fi wo ma.
57001004	Tɛmui birin, n nɛ n Marigi Ala maxandima i bɛ, n a tantuma nɛ i xa fe ra,
57001005	barima n bara a mɛ i danxaniyaxi Marigi Isa ma ki naxɛ, i man sɛniyɛntɔɛe birin xanuxi ki naxɛ.
57001006	N Ala maxandife i bɛ alako ngaxakerenya naxan kelima i xa danxaniya ma, a xa a niya i xa fahaamui xa gbo, i xa nɔ fe fanyi birin kolonde naxan na won yi ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi saabui ra.
57001007	N ngaxakerenyi Filemon, i xa xanunteya bara n nasɛɛwa ki fanyi, a man bara limaniya fi n ma, barima sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɔɲɛ fan bara sɛɛwa i saabui ra.
57001008	Na kui, hali n to nɔma i yamaride Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili ra, i xa fe raba i lanma i xa naxan naba, n mu na rabama.
57001009	N i mayandima won ma xanunteya nan ma fe ra. N tan Pɔlu nan wɔyɛnfe i bɛ yi ki, xɛmɔxi naxan na geeli Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa fe ra.
57001010	N i mayandife n ma di Onesimo nan ma fe ra, n bara findi naxan baba ra n ma geelimaniya kui.
57001011	Singe, a tide yo mu nu na i bɛ, kɔnɔ yakɔsi, a tide bara gbo i bɛ ki fanyi, alɔ a gboxi n fan bɛ ki naxɛ.
57001012	Hali a to rafan n ma alɔ n ya firinyi, n na a ragbilenfe i ma.
57001013	N bara wa a xɔn a xa lu n yi ra, alako a xa n mali i tan ɲɔxɔɛ ra n ma geelimaniya kui, n bara naxan sɔtɔ Ala xa xibaaru fanyi xa fe ra.
57001014	Kɔnɔ n mu waxi fefe rabafe n mu i maxɔrin. Na kui, i xa fe fanyi raba kelima nɛ i ɲanige nan ma, beenun n tan xa i yamari.
57001015	Tɛmunde, Onesimo bara ba i yi ra waxati nde bun ma, alako a man xa gbilen i ma abadan.
57001016	I tan bɛ yakɔsi, a tide bara dangi konyi ra. A bara findi i ngaxakerenyi yɛtɛ yati ra. N tan bara a xanu ki fanyi, kɔnɔ a lan i tan nan xa a xanu dangi n na a xa mixiɲa nun a xa danxaniya xa fe ra.
57001017	Na kui, xa i n kolonxi i ngaxakerenyi ra, i xa a fan nasɛnɛ alɔ n tan yɛtɛ nan faxi i ma.
57001018	Xa a fefe ɲaaxi niyaxi i ra, xa i xa doni yo a ma, na kote birin xa findi n tan gbe ra.
57001019	N tan Pɔlu nan yi sɛbɛfe n yɛtɛ bɛlɛxɛ ra, i xa a kolon n a birin nagbilenma nɛ i ma. Kɔnɔ hali n mu i ratu, i danxaniyaxi n tan nan saabui ra.
57001020	N ngaxakerenyi, i fan xa yi fe raba n bɛ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra. I fan xa n bɔɲɛ rasɛɛwa, Marigi xa fe ra.
57001021	N to yi sɛbɛfe, n a kolon i mu tondima n waxɔnfe rabade, i ɲan nde sama nɛ a xun.
57001022	Fe keren luxi: I xa nu n yigiyade yailan, barima n laxi a ra, n fama nɛ gbilende wo yire wo xa Ala maxandi saabui ra.
57001023	Epafirasi i xɛɛbu, muxu nun naxan bara findi geelimani ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra.
57001024	N walibooree Maraki, Arisitaraki, Demasi, nun Luki, e fan i xɛɛbu.
57001025	Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
58001001	Tɛmui dangixi Ala naxa masenyi ti won benbae bɛ namiɲɔnmɛe saabui ra. A na raba nɛ sanmaya wuyaxi, a na raba nɛ ki wuyaxi ra.
58001002	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, naxan findixi waxati dɔnxɔɛ ra, Ala a xa masenyi ti won bɛ a xa Di saabui ra. A bara a xa Di findi duniɲa kɛ tongoma ra, a duniɲa daa a xa Di nan saabui ra.
58001003	Yi Di findixi Ala xa nɔrɛ tofanyi nan na, a findixi Ala misaali yati nan na. A duniɲa bun tima a xa masenyi sɛnbɛma nan na. A to gɛ yunubie xafaride, a naxa a magoro Ala Nɔrɛ Kanyi yirefanyi ma ariyanna kui.
58001004	Na kui, a tide dangi malekɛe ra, a xili fisamante nan sɔtɔ.
58001005	Ala mu a masenxi malekɛ yo bɛ, «N ma di nan i ra, to n bara findi i Baba ra.» A mu a masenxi malekɛ yo bɛ, «N tan findima a Baba ra, a tan findima n ma di ra.»
58001006	Ala to a xa Di fisamante ramini duniɲa, a naxa a fala, «Ala xa malekɛe xa a batu.»
58001007	A a masenxi malekɛe xa fe ra, «Ala xa malekɛe luma nɛ alɔ foye, a xa walikɛe luma nɛ alɔ tɛ.»
58001008	Kɔnɔ a a masenxi nɛ a xa Di xa fe ra, «Ala, i xa mangɛ kibanyi buma nɛ abadan. Tinxinyi nan findixi i xa mangɛya tɔnxuma ra.
58001009	Tinxinyi nan nafan i ma. Ɲaaxuɲa mu rafan i ma fefe ma. Na nan a toxi, Marigi, i Marigi Ala bara i sugandi sɛɛwɛ kui. I findixi fisamante nan na dangife i booree ra.»
58001010	A man a masenxi nɛ, «Marigi, i bara duniɲa ti a fɔlɛ ra, i tan nan koore daaxi.
58001011	Koore nun bɔxi fama kanade, kɔnɔ i tan buma nɛ abadan. E forima nɛ alɔ dugi.
58001012	I koore nun bɔxi mafindima nɛ alɔ donma mafindima ki naxɛ. E fama nɛ masarade alɔ sose masarama ki naxɛ. Kɔnɔ i tan mu masarama, i xa fe mu ɲɔnma abadan.»
58001013	Ala mu a masenxi malekɛ yo bɛ, «I xa dɔxɔ n yirefanyi ma, han n xa gɛ i yaxuie ragorode i sanyi bun ma.»
58001014	Malekɛe tan findixi Ala xa walikɛe nan na, fate mu na naxee bɛ, a naxee xɛɛma kisi kɛtongoe malide.
58002001	Won xa won ɲɛngi sa na masenyi xɔn ma a fanyi ra, won naxan mɛxi, alako won naxa kira bɛɲin.
58002002	Ala xa masenyi sɛnbɛ nu gbo, a nu bara naxan so malekɛe yi ra. Adamadi naxee na matandi, e naxa sare xɔrɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ. Xa nee sa sare xɔrɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ,
58002003	won tan go? Xa won kisi xungbe rabolo, won ma fe fa luma di? Won Marigi yati nan singe a masenxi won bɛ, mixi naxee a xui mɛxi e fan bara findi na seedee ra.
58002004	Ala bara e xa seedeɲɔxɔya fari isa tɔnxumae ra, fe magaaxuxie, kaabanako mɔɔli birin, nun buɲae ra Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi naxee fixi e ma a waxɔnki.
58002005	Ala mu mangɛya fima malekɛe ma tina e xa duniɲa yamari, muxu duniɲa naxan xa fe falafe wo bɛ yi ki.
58002006	Yi seedeɲɔxɔya sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui: «Munse lanxi adama ma, i to i maɲɔxunma a xa fe ma? Munse lanxi adama xa di ma, i to i ɲɛngi sama a xa fe xɔn ma?
58002007	I bara a ragoro malekɛe bun ma waxati dondoronti kui. I bara dariyɛ nun binyɛ fi a ma,
58002008	i bara se birin lu a sanyi bun ma.» Na kui, Ala to se birin sa a xa mangɛya bun ma, sese mu na a mu naxan yamarima. Kɔnɔ won mu se birin toma a xa mangɛya bun ma sinden.
58002009	Won munse toma? Ala naxa Isa ragoro malekɛe bun ma waxati dondoronti kui, kɔnɔ Isa xa faxɛ naxa findi xunnakeli nun binyɛ ra a bɛ. Na kui, Ala naxa hinnɛ won na, a Isa faxa adamadi birin ɲɔxɔɛ ra.
58002010	Ala nan se birin daaxi, se birin na a tan nan bɛ. A man wama adamadi gbegbe xa so a xa nɔrɛ kui. Na kui, a nu lanma a xa e Rakisima xa fe rakamali tɔɔrɛ ra.
58002011	Naxan adamadie rasɛniyɛnma, nun naxee rasɛniyɛnxi, e birin fatanxi Baba keren nan na. Na kui, a mu yaagi e xilide a ngaxakerenyie.
58002012	A naxa a masen, «N i xili masenma nɛ n ngaxakerenyie bɛ, n i matɔxɔma nɛ ɲama tagi.»
58002013	A man naxa a masen, «N nan n ma lanlanteya sama Ala nan ma.» A man naxa a masen, «N na be, muxu nun die Ala naxee fixi n ma.»
58002014	Na die to findi fate nun fasɛ ra, Isa fan naxa a yɛtɛ misaali e ra, alako a xa nɔ Ibulisa xun nakanade a yɛtɛ xa faxɛ saabui ra. Faxɛ sɛnbɛ nu na Ibulisa nan yi ra.
58002015	Isa naxa a yɛtɛ misaali a ngaxakerenyie ra alako a xa e ratanga faxɛ xa gaaxui ma e xa duniɲɛigiri kui, naxan luxi alɔ konyiya.
58002016	A na birin naba Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ nan malife ra, a mu a raba malekɛe xa bɛ.
58002017	Na nan a toxi a naxa a yɛtɛ maniya a ngaxakerenyie ra, alako a xa nɔ sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi wali rabade kinikini nun tinxinyi ra Ala bɛ, a fa findi ɲama xa yunubie xafarima ra.
58002018	Isa fata mixie malide e xa maratantanyi kui, barima a fan maratantanyi nun tɔɔrɛ kolon nɛ.
58003001	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyi sɛniyɛnxie, wo tan naxee xilixi ariyanna ma, wo xaxili xa ti Isa ra, Ala xa xɛɛra nun a xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi, won danxaniyaxi naxan ma.
58003002	A tinxin nɛ Ala bɛ, naxan nu bara a ti na wali ra, alɔ Annabi Munsa fan a rabaxi ki naxɛ Ala xa banxi kui.
58003003	Isa xa binyɛ dangi Munsa gbe ra, alɔ banxiti xa binyɛ dangixi a xa banxi ra ki naxɛ.
58003004	Banxi birin tixi mixi nde nan saabui ra, kɔnɔ Ala nan duniɲa birin daaxi.
58003005	Annabi Munsa findixi konyi dugutɛgɛ nan na Ala xa banxi kui, alako a xa seedeɲɔxɔya ba masenyi xa fe ra naxan fama tide.
58003006	Kɔnɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi findixi Ala xa Di dugutɛgɛ nan na, naxan Ala xa banxi yamarima. Won tan fan findixi na banxi nan na, xa won lama Isa ra, xa won won xaxili tima a ra, na nan findixi won ma matɔxɔɛ ra.
58003007	Na na a ra, wo xa wo ɲɛngi sa Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa masenyi xɔn ma. A sɛbɛxi, «Xa wo bara a xui ramɛ to,
58003008	wo naxa wo kobe raso a ra, alɔ wo a rabaxi ki naxɛ gbengberenyi ma. Na tɛmui a nu wo matofe nɛ, kɔnɔ wo naxa a matandi.
58003009	Mɛnni wo benbae bara kata e xa n mato. E naxa n ma wali to ɲɛ tongo naani bun ma.
58003010	Na kui, n naxa xɔnɔ na waxati mixie ma. N naxa a fala, ‹E bɔɲɛ makuya n na tɛmui birin, e mu n ma sɛriyɛ kolon.›
58003011	Na na a ra n naxa n kali xɔnɛ kui, ‹E mu soma n ma malabui kui feo!› »
58003012	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa mɛɛni wo yɛtɛ ma a fanyi ra alako wo bɔɲɛ naxa lu ɲaaxuɲa nun danxaniyatareɲa kui, wo fa gbilen Ala fɔxɔ ra, Ala naxan na na.
58003013	Lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ wo xa wo bore ralimaniya. Wo xa gbilen na ma lɔxɔɛ birin alako yunubi naxa fa wo nɔ, wo bɔɲɛ fa balan Ala mabiri.
58003014	Xa won sa won xaxili tima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra alɔ won a fɔlɔxi ki naxɛ, lanyi bara lu won nun Isa tagi.
58003015	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Xa wo bara a xui ramɛ to, wo naxa wo kobe raso a ra, alɔ wo a rabaxi ki naxɛ wo to a matandi.»
58003016	Nde Ala matandi, e to gɛ a xui ramɛde? Mixie xa mu a ra naxee mini Misira bɔxi ra Annabi Munsa saabui ra?
58003017	Ala xɔnɔ nɛ ndee ma ɲɛ tongo naani bun ma? Mixie xa mu a ra naxee yunubi rabaxi, e fa sɔntɔ gbengberenyi ma?
58003018	Ala a kali nde bɛ a e mu soma a xa malabui yire? Mixie xa mu a ra naxee a matandixi?
58003019	Na kui, won bara a fahaamu a e xa danxaniyatareɲa nan a niya e mu so.
58004001	Ala xa laayidi, a naxan tongo won bɛ sofe a xa malabude, na mu kanaxi. Wo xa fe birin naba alako sofe na malabude kui a naxa kana wo bɛ.
58004002	Won bara na xibaaru fanyi mɛ alɔ booree a mɛxi ki naxɛ, kɔnɔ a mu sese fanxi e ma e xa danxaniyatareɲa xa fe ra.
58004003	Kɔnɔ won tan naxee bara la a ra, won fama nɛ sode na malabude kui. A sɛbɛxi na xa fe ra, «N to xɔnɔ e ma, n naxa n kali, e mu soma n ma malabude.» Kɔnɔ Ala xa wali bara ɲɔn kabi duniɲa fɔlɛ,
58004004	barima a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui na lɔxɔɛ solofere nde xa fe ra, «Lɔxɔɛ solofere nde Ala xa wali naxa kamali. A naxa a malabu.»
58004005	A man sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «E mu soma n ma malabude.»
58004006	Ala nu bara a ɲanige mixi ndee xa so a xa malabude kui, kɔnɔ na mixi singe naxee na xibaaru mɛxi, e mu so e xa danxaniyatareɲa xa fe ra.
58004007	Na nan a toxi Ala bara lɔxɔɛ gbɛtɛ sugandi naxan findixi to ra. Na fe singe to bara dangi a xɔnnakuye ra, Ala man naxa a masen Dawuda saabui ra, «Xa wo bara a xui ramɛ to, wo naxa wo kobe raso a ra.»
58004008	Xa a sa li Yosuwe nu bara malabui fi e ma nu, Ala man mu nu lɔxɔɛ gbɛtɛ xa fe falama nu.
58004009	Han ya malabui luxi Ala xa ɲama bɛ e mu naxan sɔtɔxi sinden.
58004010	Naxan soma Ala xa malabui kui, a a malabuma nɛ a xa wali birin ma, alɔ Ala malabuxi a xa wali kui ki naxɛ.
58004011	Won xa fe birin naba sofe ra na malabui kui, alako mixi yo naxa bira tantanyi kui alɔ Isirayilakae a rabaxi ki naxɛ.
58004012	Ala xa masenyi sɛnbɛ gbo, a walima mixi bɔɲɛ ma. A xaaɲɛn dangife santidɛgɛma dɛ firinyi ra. A soma won bɔɲɛ nun won sondonyi nan kui, a so won sɔɔra nun won nadɔxɔdee xɔn. A won sondonyi waxɔnfe nun maɲɔxunyi birin makiiti.
