58004013	Nimase yo mu nɔma a nɔxunde Ala ma. Ala fe birin toma nɛ, fe birin dɛntɛgɛ fama sade a tan nan bɛ.
58004014	Isa, won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi xungbe, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, a to so ariyanna kui, won fan xa bira won ma danxaniya fɔxɔ ra won bara naxan makɛnɛn.
58004015	Won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi won ma sɛnbɛtareya kolon, a kinikinixi won ma na nan ma. Sentanɛ naxa kata a ratantande mɔɔli birin na alɔ won tan, kɔnɔ a mu a nɔ.
58004016	Na na a ra, won xa won maso a xa hinnɛ kibanyi ra lanlanteya ra, alako won xa kinikini nun hinnɛ sɔtɔ a tɛmui.
58005001	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi birin tongoxi adamadie nan ya ma, a fa ti Ala xa wali ra adamadie bɛ, alako a xa hadiya nun sɛrɛxɛ mɔɔli birin ba yunubie xa fe ra.
58005002	A mixie xa fe kolon naxee na dimi kui, e lɔɛxi, barima a fan na e ya ma, a tantanma.
58005003	A xa sɛnbɛtareya a niyama nɛ a xa sɛrɛxɛ ba a yɛtɛ xa yunubie bɛ, a nun ɲama xa yunubie xa fe ra.
58005004	Mixi mu nɔma yi binyɛ sɔtɔde a yɛtɛ ra, fo Ala a xili alɔ a Haruna xili ki naxɛ.
58005005	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan mu sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi binyɛ sɔtɔ a yɛtɛ xa ra. Ala nan a fixi a ma, a falafe ra, «To i bara findi n ma di ra. N tan fan bara findi i Baba ra.»
58005006	A man sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «I bara findi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra abadan, Melekisedeki mɔɔli.»
58005007	Isa bara a xui ite Ala maxandi ra a xa duniɲɛigiri kui, a bara a makula, a na wafe. A na raba nɛ barima a a kolon a Ala nan nu nɔma a ratangade faxɛ ma. Ala bara a xa duba suxu, barima a nu bara tin lufe a xa yaamari bun ma.
58005008	Isa findixi Ala xa Di nan na, kɔnɔ na kui a naxa a matinkan fo a xa Ala rabatu hali na findixi tɔɔrɛ nan na a bɛ.
58005009	Isa xa fe to kamali, a naxa findi saabui ra a mantonyie birin xa abadan kisi sɔtɔ.
58005010	Ala naxa a ti sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi ra Melekisedeki daaxi.
58005011	Fe gbegbe na na kui muxu wama naxan masenfe wo bɛ, kɔnɔ na tagi rabafe xɔrɔxɔ, barima wo mu soma fee kui mafurenyi ra.
58005012	A nu lanma wo xa findi karamɔxɔ ra yi waxati, kɔnɔ han yakɔsi wo hayi na karamɔxɔ nde ma naxan wo xaranma Ala xa masenyi singee ra. Wo mu fata fe tilinxi fahaamude sinden, alɔ diyɔrɛ naxan mu fata sube donde, fo a xa xiɲɛ min sinden.
58005013	Mixi naxan hayi na Ala xa na masenyi singee ma, a mu gɛxi tinxinyi kolonde, a mu mɔxi a xa danxaniya kui. A luxi alɔ diyɔrɛ naxan xiɲɛ gbansan minma.
58005014	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan mɔxi a xa danxaniya kui, naxan bara gɛ tinxinyi nun tinxintareya tagi raba kolonde, a nɔma nɛ xaranyi tilinxi fan kolonde. A tan luxi alɔ xɛmɔxi naxan baloma sube fanyi ra.
58006001	Na nan a toxi won lanma won xa siga yare ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa xaranyi kui. Won xa dangi na masenyi singee ra, won xa so fe tilinxie kui. Na masenyi singee nan ya: wali ɲaaxi bɛɲinfe naxan mixi xaninma yahannama,
58006002	danxaniyafe Ala ma, xunxafe ye xɔɔra, bɛlɛxɛ safe mixie ma, kelife faxɛ ma, nun Ala xa kiiti dɔnxɔɛ.
58006003	Xa Ala tin, won xa siga yare ma won ma xaranyi kui.
58006004	Mixi naxan bara gɛ Ala xa naiyalanyi tode, naxan bara Ala xa ki nɛmunnɛmun, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi bara lu naxan bɛ,
58006005	naxan bara a kolon a Ala xa masenyi fan, naxan bara Ala sɛnbɛ kolon naxan fama rawalide waxati naxan sa fama,
58006006	xa a sa li na mixi mɔɔli bara danxaniya bɛɲin, a mu nɔma tuubide sɔnɔn. A luxi alɔ a man bara Ala xa Di mabanban wuri magalanbuxi ma, a fa a rayaagi ɲama ya xɔri.
58006007	Bɔxi naxan bara tunɛ ye sɔtɔ a fanyi ra, a fa sansi ramini a kanyi bɛ, Ala baraka ragoroma nɛ a ma.
58006008	Kɔnɔ bɔxi naxan tunbe nun ɲooge tun naminima, na bɔxi mu fan. A gbe mu luxi a xa danka, a raɲɔnyi a fa gan.
58006009	Muxu xanuntenyie, hali muxu xa wɔyɛnyi xɔrɔxɔ, muxu bara la a ra wo na kira fanyi nan xɔn, naxan findi kisi kira ra.
58006010	Ala tinxin, a mu nɛɛmuma wo xa wali ma. A wo xa xanunteya kolon, wo naxan masenxi wo xa wali kui a xili ra, a nun wo naxan masenxi sɛniyɛntɔɛe bɛ. Han ya wo na na wali nan kui.
58006011	Muxu wama nɛ wo xa wo tunnabɛxi na birin kui han a raɲɔnyi, alako wo xa fe sɔtɔ wo wo xaxili tixi naxan na.
58006012	Wo naxa wo tunnaxɔnɔ. Wo xa bira danxaniyatɔɛe xa misaali fɔxɔ ra, naxee kɛ sɔtɔma Ala naxan laayidixi e bɛ. E na sɔtɔma e xa danxaniya nun e xa tunnabɛxi nan saabui ra.
58006013	Ala to laayidi tongo Iburahima bɛ, a mu nɔ a kalide fe nde ra naxan gbo a bɛ. Na na a ra, a naxa a kali a yɛtɛ ra,
58006014	a falafe ra, «N baraka sama nɛ i xa fe. I bɔnsɔɛ wuyama nɛ.»
58006015	Iburahima to gɛ mamɛ tide, Ala naxa a xa laayidi rakamali a bɛ.
58006016	Adama a kalima fe nde ra naxan gbo a bɛ. Na marakali sɛnbɛ fima nɛ a xa wɔyɛnyi ma, alako mixi naxa nɔ na matandide.
58006017	Na nan a toxi, Ala fan naxa a rakali alako mixie, na laayidi tongoxi naxee bɛ, e xa a kolon Ala xa natɛ mu masarama.
58006018	Ala naxa na laayidi tongo, a man naxa a rakali, alako won xa nɔ limaniya xungbe sɔtɔde. Wule yo mu na na fe firinyi kui. Won bara fe birin nabolo a xa fe ra, won fa won xaxili ti a ra.
58006019	Mixi xaxili tife Ala ra, a luma nɛ alɔ hanga naxan banbanxi ye bun ma. Won fan won xaxili tima Ala ra na ki nɛ naxan na a xa hɔrɔmɔlingira kui dugi gbakuxi xanbi ra,
58006020	Isa soxi dɛnnaxɛ won ya ra, a xa findi won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi ra abadan, alɔ Melekisedeki.
58007001	Melekisedeki nan nu na Salamu mangɛ ra, a man nu findixi Ala Xili Xungbe Kanyi xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ nan na. Iburahima to gɛ mangɛ ndee xun nakanade, Melekisedeki naxa sa naralan a ra, a duba a bɛ.
58007002	Iburahima naxa farilɛ fi a ma. Melekisedeki xili fasarixi yi ki «mangɛ tinxinxi.» A man nu findixi Salamu mangɛ nan na, naxan xili fasarima yi ki «bɔɲɛsa mangɛ.»
58007003	A baba mu kolon, a nga mu kolon, a xa taruxui mu kolon. A xa simaya fɔlɔxi tɛmui naxɛ, a nun a ɲɔn tɛmui, na fan mu kolon. Na kui, a luxi nɛ alɔ Ala xa Di, naxan findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra abadan.
58007004	Wo a mato Melekisedeki tide nu gboxi ki naxɛ. Hali won baba Iburahima, a naxan sɔtɔ a wasaso se ra, a naxa na farilɛ fi a ma.
58007005	Ala xa sɛriyɛ a falama ɲama xa farilɛ so Lewi bɔnsɔɛ yi ra, naxan findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛe ra. Na ɲama fan kelixi Iburahima bɔnsɔɛ nɛ, e findi Lewi ngaxakerenyie nan na.
58007006	Kɔnɔ Melekisedeki tan, hali a to mu nu na Lewi bɔnsɔɛ xa taruxui kui, Iburahima naxa farilɛ so a yi ra. Melekisedeki naxa duba Iburahima laayidi kanyi bɛ.
58007007	Birin a kolon mixi naxan dubama a boore bɛ, a tide gbo na kanyi bɛ.
58007008	Lewi xa mixi naxee farilɛ rasuxuma, e faxama nɛ, kɔnɔ Melekisedeki tan mu faxaxi.
58007009	Na kui, a luxi nɛ alɔ Lewi, naxan luma farilɛ rasuxu ra, a nu bara farilɛ fi Melekisedeki ma Iburahima saabui ra,
58007010	barima Lewi bɔnsɔɛ nu na a benba Iburahima fate i, a naralan Melekisedeki ra tɛmui naxɛ.
58007011	Xa a sa li fe birin nu nɔma kamalide Lewi bɔnsɔɛ xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛɲa saabui ra nu, ɲama Ala xa sɛriyɛ sɔtɔxi naxan na, e hayi mu nu na Melekisedeki xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛɲa ma nu, naxan mu fatanxi Haruna bɔnsɔɛ ra.
58007012	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛɲa na masara, yaamari fan xa masara.
58007013	Yi masenyi birin falaxi mixi naxan ma fe ra, a kelixi bɔnsɔɛ nɛ sɛrɛxɛdubɛ mu na bɔnsɔɛ naxɛ.
58007014	Birin a kolon a won Marigi kelixi Yuda bɔnsɔɛ nɛ. Annabi Munsa mu yaamari yo fi na bɔnsɔɛ mixie ma e xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ wali raba.
58007015	Muxu naxan masenxi, a fiixɛ, barima sɛrɛxɛdubɛ gbɛtɛ bara mini, naxan maniya Melekisedeki ra,
58007016	naxan mu findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra a bɔnsɔɛ xa fe ra. Na kanyi findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra, barima faxɛ mu nɔ a ra.
58007017	Yi seedeɲɔxɔya bara raba a xa fe ra, «I findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ nan na abadan, Melekisedeki daaxi.»
58007018	Yaamari singe bara ba na a xa sɛnbɛtareya xa fe ra, a mu nu nɔma a xa wali rabade.
58007019	Na yaamari mu nɔ fefe rakamalide, kɔnɔ fe nɛɛnɛ bara mini won xaxili tima naxan na, naxan nɔma won malide won makɔrɛde Ala ra.
58007020	Na fe nɛɛnɛ mu tixi marakali xanbi.
58007021	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ singee bara wali suxu marakali xanbi, kɔnɔ Isa nan findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra yi marakali ra Ala naxan masenxi, «Marigi bara a kali, a mu a xa natɛ masarama: I tan nan findixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra abadan.»
58007022	Na kui, Ala bara saatɛ tongo won bɛ Isa saabui ra, naxan fan boore bɛ.
58007023	Na xanbi, sɛrɛxɛdubɛ singee nu wuya, barima e to faxa, mixi gbɛtɛe nu tima e ɲɔxɔɛ ra.
58007024	Kɔnɔ Isa tan mu faxama, a buma nɛ abadan. A xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛɲa mu radangima mixi gbɛtɛe ma.
58007025	Na nan a toxi a nɔma mixi rakiside naxan a makɔrɛma Ala ra a tan saabui ra. A ɲiɲɛ to a ra, a nɔma findide e xa saabui fanyi ra Ala yire abadan.
58007026	Won hayi na na sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi mɔɔli nan ma naxan sɛniyɛn, yunubi mu na naxan ma, naxan mu fe ɲaaxi yo kolon, naxan mu luma yunubitɔɛe ya ma, naxan xa fe itexi dangife koore ra.
58007027	Isa mu luma alɔ boore sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie, naxee lanma e xa sɛrɛxɛ ba lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ e xa yunubie xa fe ra, a nun ɲama xa yunubie xa fe ra. A tan bara a yɛtɛ ba sɛrɛxɛ ra kerenyi ra.
58007028	Yaamari singe nu mixi sɛnbɛtaree nan tima sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigie ra, kɔnɔ na marakali nɛɛnɛ naxan faxi na yaamari singe dangi xanbi, a bara Ala xa Di ti sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi ra, naxan bara gɛ kamalide abadan.
58008001	Masenyi xunyi nan ya: Won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi magoroxi Ala Xili Xungbe Kanyi xa kibanyi yirefanyi ma ariyanna kui.
58008002	A walima Ala xa hɔrɔmɔlingira yati yati nan kui, Marigi naxan tixi, adamadie bɛlɛxɛ fɔxi mu naxan na.
58008003	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi birin lanma a xa sɛrɛxɛ mɔɔli birin ba Ala bɛ. Na kui a nu lanma se nde xa lu yi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ fan yi ra a naxan bama sɛrɛxɛ ra.
58008004	Xa won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi nu na duniɲa nu, a mu nu findima sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra nu, barima Ala xa yaamari ɲan bara mixi gbɛtɛe ti na sɛrɛxɛ wali ra.
58008005	Na mixie Ala batuma hɔrɔmɔlingira nan kui, naxan misaalixi hɔrɔmɔlingira ra naxan na ariyanna. Na nan a toxi Ala naxa Annabi Munsa yamari hɔrɔmɔlingira tife ra, a falafe ra, «A mato a fanyi ra, i xa hɔrɔmɔlingira ti alɔ a masenxi i bɛ geya fari ki naxɛ.»
58008006	Kɔnɔ yakɔsi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara wali sɔtɔ naxan tide gbo boore sɛrɛxɛdubɛe xa wali bɛ tife ra Ala nun adamadie tagi. A tide gbo barima a faxi saatɛ naxan na, na fan saatɛ fori bɛ. A xa saatɛ mabanbanxi laayidie nan na, naxee fan dangi laayidi forie ra.
58008007	Xa na saatɛ singe nu nɔma a xa wali rabade nu, Ala mu fama a firin nde ra nu.
58008008	Ala naxa yi marakɔrɔsi raba ɲama ra, «Marigi xa masenyi nan ya: Waxati na fafe, n saatɛ nɛɛnɛ tongoma Isirayila nun Yudaya ɲama bɛ tɛmui naxɛ.
58008009	Na mu luma alɔ na saatɛ singe n naxan tongo e benbae bɛ, n e ramini Misira bɔxi ra tɛmui naxɛ. E to n ma saatɛ bɛɲin, n fan naxa e bɛɲin. Marigi xa masenyi nan na ki.
58008010	Saatɛ nan ya n naxan tongoma Isirayila ɲama bɛ, na waxati dangi xanbi. Marigi xa masenyi nan ya: N nan n ma sɛriyɛ rasoma nɛ e xaxili kui, n a sɛbɛ e sondonyi ma. N findima e Marigi Ala nan na, e fan findi n ma ɲama ra.
58008011	Mixi yo mu a boore matinkanma, mixi yo mu a falama a ngaxakerenyi bɛ, ‹I xa Ala kolon,› barima na waxati e birin n kolonma nɛ, kelife mixi xuri ma han mixi xungbe.
58008012	N diɲɛma nɛ e xa tinxintareya ma, n e xa yunubie xafarima nɛ.»
58008013	A to yi saatɛ xili fala saatɛ nɛɛnɛ, a bara boore findi saatɛ fori ra. Saatɛ fori tan lanma a xa ba na, a tide mu na sɔnɔn.
58009001	Saatɛ singe bun ma, yaamari ndee nu na batui xa fe ra, nun Ala xa hɔrɔmɔlingira xa fe ra, naxan nu na duniɲa.
58009002	Na hɔrɔmɔlingira to ti, yire nde nu na naxan nu xili yire sɛniyɛnxi. Lanpui nu na a kui, a nun teebili sɛrɛxɛ taami nu saxi naxan ma.
58009003	Yire sɛniyɛnxi firin nde nu na dugi gbakuxi xanbi ra, naxan nu sɛniyɛn dangife boore ra.
58009004	Surayi ganse xɛɛma daaxi nun saatɛ kankira nu na na yire kui. Xɛɛma nu saxi saatɛ kankira birin ma. Tɔnbili xɛɛma daaxi mana nu ragataxi naxan kui, Haruna xa xuli naxan fuga, a nun walaxɛe, saatɛ sɛbɛxi naxee ma, e birin nu na na saatɛ kankira kui.
58009005	Ala xa malekɛ nɔrɔxi masolixi firinyi nu tixi saatɛ kankira fari, e yunubi xafari yire makoto. A mu lanma won xa so na wɔyɛnyi birin kui yakɔsi.
58009006	Na yire to gɛ yailande na ki, sɛrɛxɛdubɛe nu luma so ra na yire sɛniyɛnxi singe nan kui, e e xa wali raba naa.
58009007	Kɔnɔ sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi nan gbansan nu nɔma sode na yire sɛniyɛnxi firin nde kui. Ɲɛ yo ɲɛ a nu soma naa sanmaya keren, a wuli xanin a xa yunubie nun ɲama xa yunubie xa fe ra e naxan naba a kolontareya ma.
58009008	Na kui, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nu wama a masenfe nɛ a yire naxan nu sɛniyɛn dangife yire birin na, a mɛnni mu nu rabixi mixie bɛ na hɔrɔmɔlingira singe xa waxati.
58009009	Na birin findixi misaali nan na yi waxati mixie bɛ. A a masenma a na sɛrɛxɛ birin mu nɔma batulae xaxili rasɛniyɛnde.
58009010	Na yaamari singee, donse, minse, nun sali ye xa fe ra, e nu fixi mixie ma e xa yunubie nan xa fe ra, han waxati nɛɛnɛ fama tɛmui naxɛ.
58009011	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi to findi won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi ra, a bara fa hɛɛri ra, a naxan sɔtɔ won bɛ. A bara so Ala xa hɔrɔmɔlingira fanyi kui, adamadi mu naxan yailanxi yi bɛndɛ fuɲi fari.
58009012	Kɔnɔ a mu so si kontonyi nun ninge wuli xa ra, a so na yire sɛniyɛnxi fisamante kui a yɛtɛ wuli nan na. A so nɛ kerenyi ra, barima na nu findixi xunsare nan na adamadi bɛ naxan mu ɲɔnma abadan.
58009013	Xa si kontonyi nun tura wuli, a nun tɛ xube naxan fatanxi ninge sɛrɛxɛ ra a sa mixi sɛniyɛntaree ma, xa na fe mɔɔli nɔma mixi rasɛniyɛnde nu,
58009014	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wuli mu dangima xɛ na ra? A naxa a yɛtɛ ba sɛrɛxɛ kamalixi ra Ala bɛ, Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi xa yaamari bun ma, alako a xa won xaxili rasɛniyɛn wali ɲaaxie ma, naxee won faxama. A na raba nɛ won bɛ alako won xa Ala Ɲiɲɛ batu.
58009015	Na kui, a bara findi saabui ra yi saatɛ nɛɛnɛ xa fe ra, mixi xilixie xa kɛ sɔtɔ naxan buma abadan, alɔ a laayidixi e bɛ ki naxɛ. A faxa na nan ma, a findi xunsare ra yunubie xa fe ra naxee rabaxi na saatɛ fori xa waxati bun ma.
58009016	Saatɛ naxan findi kɛ fe ra, na mu kamalima sinden, fo saatɛ tongoma faxa.
58009017	Kɛ mu nɔma sɔtɔde beenun saatɛtongoe xa faxa. A mu sɔtɔma saatɛtongoe baloxi tɛmui naxɛ.
58009018	Na nan a toxi na saatɛ singe mu tongoma wuli xanbi.
58009019	Annabi Munsa to Ala xa sɛriyɛ masen ɲama bɛ, a naxa ningee nun si kontonyie wuli tongo, a nun ye, a fa na kasan Kitaabui nun ɲama ma se nde ra naxan yailanxi hisopi burɛxɛ nun yɛxɛɛ xabe gbeeli ra, a fa a fala, a naxɛ,
58009020	«Wuli nan ya naxan saatɛ xirima wo nun Ala tagi.»
58009021	Annabi Munsa man naxa wuli kasan hɔrɔmɔlingira ma, a nun hɔrɔmɔlingira yirabase birin ma.
58009022	A sɛriyɛ ki ma, fayida se birin nasɛniyɛnma wuli nan na. Yunubi mu xafarima wuli ifili xanbi.
58009023	A nu lanma se naxee misaalixi fee ra ariyanna kui, e xa rasɛniyɛn sɛrɛxɛe ra. Ariyanna xa marasɛniyɛnyi rabama sɛrɛxɛe nan na naxee fan booree bɛ.
58009024	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi mu soxi hɔrɔmɔlingira xa kui adamadie naxan yailanxi, naxan misaalixi hɔrɔmɔlingira ra naxan na ariyanna. A so ariyanna yati nan kui, alako a xa won ma dɛntɛgɛ sa Ala bɛ.
58009025	A mu soxi naa sanya wuyaxi, alɔ sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi naxan soma Ala xa hɔrɔmɔlingira kui ɲɛ yo ɲɛ wuli nde ra, naxan mu findixi a gbe ra.
58009026	Xa a nu na ki nɛ nu, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi nu lanma nɛ a xa tɔɔrɔ sanmaya wuyaxi kabi duniɲa fɔlɛ ra. Kɔnɔ na mu a ra. Yakɔsi yi waxati dɔnxɔɛ, a naxa mini sanmaya keren, alako a xa yunubi xa fe kana a yɛtɛ sɛrɛxɛ saabui ra.
58009027	Adamadie faxama nɛ sanya keren, e fa makiiti.
58009028	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi fan bara faxa sanmaya keren, alako a xa yunubi ba mixi gbegbe ma. A man fama nɛ a firin nde, kɔnɔ na waxati a mu fama yunubie xa fe xa ra, a fama mixie nan bɛ naxee xaxili tixi kisi ra.
58010001	Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ misaalixi fe fanyi nan na naxan fama fade. A findixi misaali gbansan nan na. Na nan a toxi a Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ mu nɔma Ala batulae rasɛniyɛnde kerenyi ra, na sɛrɛxɛe saabui ra naxee bama ɲɛ yo ɲɛ.
58010002	Xa a sa li a nu nɔma e rasɛniyɛnde nu, mixie mu nu luma sɛrɛxɛe ba ra tɛmui birin, barima sɛrɛxɛ keren gbansan nu nɔma e xa yunubi birin xafaride kerenyi ra, na yunubi xa fe maɲɔxunyi yati mu luma e xunyi.
58010003	Kɔnɔ ɲɛ yo ɲɛ na sɛrɛxɛe findima maratuse nan na mixie bɛ a yunubie na e ma.
58010004	Tura nun si kontonyi wuli mu nɔma yunubie bade.
58010005	Na nan a toxi, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi to so duniɲa, a naxa a masen Ala bɛ, «I mu wama sɛrɛxɛ xɔn. I mu wama hadiya xɔn. I bara fate yailan n bɛ.
58010006	I mu wama sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi xɔn ma, i mu wama sɛrɛxɛ yunubi xafari daaxi fan xɔn ma.
58010007	N naxa a masen, ‹N bara fa. A sɛbɛxi n ma fe ra Kitaabui kui, Ala, n na fafe i sago rabade.› »
58010008	Singe a naxa a masen, «I mu wama sɛrɛxɛ yo xɔn ma. E mu rafan i ma. I mu wama hadiya yo xɔn ma. I mu wama sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi xɔn ma, i mu wama sɛrɛxɛ yunubi xafari daaxi fan xɔn ma.» A nu bara na fala hali na yaamari to nu toma a xa sɛriyɛ kui.
58010009	Na dangi xanbi, a bara a masen, «Ala, n na be. N bara fa i sago rabade.» Na kui, a naxa fe singe ba na, alako fe firin nde xa ti.
58010010	Na ɲanige nan a niyaxi won nasɛniyɛnxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fate saabui ra, naxan baxi sɛrɛxɛ ra kerenyi ra.
58010011	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ birin e xa wali rabama lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ. E luma sɛrɛxɛe ba ra naxee mu nɔma yunubie xafaride.
58010012	Kɔnɔ Isa tan, a to gɛ sɛrɛxɛ keren bade yunubie xa fe ra, a naxa a magoro Ala yirefanyi ma, a luma dɛnnaxɛ abadan.
58010013	A na a mamɛfe a xa ti a yaxuie ma,
58010014	barima a bara mixie rakamali kerenyi ra, a naxee rasɛniyɛnxi a xa sɛrɛxɛ kerenyi saabui ra.
58010015	Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi na tagi rabama won bɛ yi masenyi ra. A singe, a naxa a masen,
58010016	«Saatɛ nan ya n naxan tongoma Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ bɛ: Na waxati na dangi, n nan n ma sɛriyɛ luma nɛ e bɔɲɛ ma, n na sɛbɛma nɛ e sondonyi ma.»
58010017	A man naxa a masen, «N mu ratuma e xa yunubie nun e xa wali kobie ma sɔnɔn.»
58010018	Yunubi na gɛ xafaride tɛmui naxɛ, sɛrɛxɛ mu bama na yunubi xa fe ra sɔnɔn.
58010019	N ngaxakerenyie, na kui won bara limaniya sɔtɔ sofe ra na yire sɛniyɛnxi fisamante kui Isa wuli saabui ra.
58010020	Isa bara na kisi kira nɛɛnɛ rabi won bɛ, alako won xa dangi na dugi ra naxan gbakuxi hɔrɔmɔlingira kui a fate saabui ra.
58010021	Won ma sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi to tixi Ala xa banxi xunyi ra,
58010022	won xa won makɔrɛ Ala ra bɔɲɛ fiixɛ nun danxaniya ra. Na danxaniya won nalimaniyama nɛ, barima won bɔɲɛ rasɛniyɛnxi won ma yunubie ma, won fate fan maxaxi ye tinse ra.
58010023	Won xa won xaxili ti Ala ra tunnabɛxi kui, barima naxan laayidi tongoxi won bɛ, a mu nɔma na kanade.
58010024	Won xa mɛɛni won bore ma, alako won xa won bore ralimaniya won xa lu xanunteya nun wali fanyi kui.
58010025	Won naxa won ma malanyie rabolo de, alɔ ndee na a rabafe ki naxɛ. A lanma won xa won bore ralimaniya. Won to a kolon Ala xa lɔxɔɛ na fafe, won naxa tagan na ma.
58010026	Xa a sa li, won Ala xa nɔndi kolon, kɔnɔ won man nu fa lu yunubi raba ra won ɲanige ra, sɛrɛxɛ gbɛtɛ mu na sɔnɔn naxan nɔma won ma yunubie xafaride,
58010027	fo gaaxui xungbe Ala xa kiiti ya ra, naxan findima tɛ mankanɛ ra a matandilae bɛ.
58010028	Xa mixi nde Annabi Munsa xa sɛriyɛ matandi, e a faxama nɛ kinikinitareɲa kui, seede firin xa na mu a ra saxan xa seedeɲɔxɔya saabui ra.
58010029	Kɔnɔ ɲaxankatɛ dangima na tan na mixie bɛ, naxee Ala xa Di maboronma e sanyi ra, e a xa saatɛ wuli rasɔtɔ naxan e rasɛniyɛnxi, e Ala Xaxili rasɔtɔma naxan hinnɛxi e ra.
58010030	Won yi masenyi kanyi kolon, «N tan nan mixi gbeɲɔxɔma, n tan nan e sare fima e ma.» A man sɛbɛxi, «Marigi fama nɛ a xa ɲama makiitide.»
58010031	Ala Ɲiɲɛ xa ɲaxankatɛ magaaxu.
58010032	Wo xa ratu na lɔxɔɛ singee ma. Wo to naiyalanyi to, wo naxa wo tunnabɛxi gere xɔrɔxɔɛ kui naxan findixi tɔɔrɛ ra wo bɛ.
58010033	E naxa wo konbi, e naxa wo ɲaxankata ɲama ya xɔri. Wo fan naxa lu mixie sɛɛti ma, naxee bara na tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli sɔtɔ.
58010034	Wo naxa kinikini geelimanie ma, wo naxa tin a ra sɛɛwɛ kui e xa wo harige ba wo yi ra, barima wo a kolon harige nde na wo bɛ naxan dangi na boore ra pon, a bu abadan.
58010035	Wo naxa fe rabolo, wo xaxili tixi naxan na, barima na sare gbo.
58010036	Wo hayi na tunnabɛxi ma, alako wo xa Ala sago rakamali, wo fa fe sɔtɔ a naxan laayidixi wo bɛ.
58010037	A sɛbɛxi, «A gbe mu luxi sɔnɔn. Naxan lanma a xa fa, a fama nɛ, a mu dugundima.
58010038	N ma tinxintɔɛ kisima nɛ danxaniya saabui ra. Kɔnɔ xa a sa li a man naxa gbilen xanbi, n mu ɲɛlɛxinma a xa fe ra.»
58010039	Won mu findixi fe rabɛɲinyie xa ra, naxee xa fe xun nakanama. Won tan findixi danxaniyatɔɛe nan na, naxee kisima.
58011001	Danxaniya kanyi, a a xaxili tima fe nde ra a laxi naxan na. Hali a mu na fe toma a ya ra, a a kolon nɔndi nan a ra.
58011002	Won benbae xili fanyi sɔtɔ na nan ma.
58011003	Danxaniya saabui ra, won a kolon a Ala nan duniɲa daaxi a xa masenyi ra. Se naxan toma naa a fatanxi fe nan na naxan mu toma.
58011004	Danxaniya saabui ra, Habila naxa sɛrɛxɛ ba Ala bɛ naxan nu fan dangife Kabila gbe ra. Ala naxa na sɛrɛxɛ suxu, a Habila findi tinxintɔɛ ra a xa danxaniya saabui ra. Hali Habila to faxaxi, a naxan nabaxi danxaniya ra na findima nɛ masenyi ra won bɛ.
58011005	Danxaniya saabui ra, Enoki naxa te koore ma, a mu faxa. Mixi yo mu nɔ a tode, barima Ala nu bara a rate koore ma. Beenun a xa te, Ala nu bara a masen a Enoki rafan a ma.
58011006	Mixi mu nɔma rafande Ala ma danxaniya xanbi. Mixi naxan a makɔrɛma Ala ra, a lanma a xa la a ra a Ala na na, a nun a xa la a ra a Ala mixie nan sare fima naxee a fenma.
58011007	Danxaniya saabui ra, Nuha naxa kunkui banban alako a xa denbaya xa kisi. Ala nu bara banbaranyi xa fe fala a bɛ beenun a xa duniɲa li. Nuha nu gaaxu Ala ya ra. A xa danxaniya a masenma kiiti bara kana duniɲa bɛ. Nuha naxa tinxinyi sɔtɔ kɛ ra a xa danxaniya saabui ra.
58011008	Danxaniya saabui ra, Iburahima naxa Ala xui ratinmɛ sigafe ra bɔxi ma a mu dɛnnaxan kolon, alako a xa mɛnni sɔtɔ kɛ ra.
58011009	Danxaniya saabui ra, Iburahima naxa sabati na bɔxi ma, Ala nu bara naxan laayidi a bɛ. A naxa lu mɛnni alɔ xɔɲɛ a xa kiri banxie kui, alɔ Isiyaga nun Yaxuba, naxee findixi na kɛtongoe ra.
58011010	A nu na a mamɛfe a xa taa sɛnbɛma sɔtɔ, Ala taa naxan kɔɔrinxi, a a ti.
58011011	Danxaniya saabui ra, Sara dibaritare fan naxa nɔ di baride ɲɛlɛxɛforiɲa kui, barima a nu laxi a ra a Ala mu a xa laayidi kanama.
58011012	Na nan a to, xɛmɛ keren saabui ra, xɛmɔxi naxan mu nu nɔma di sɔtɔde sɔnɔn, na naxa bɔnsɔɛ xungbe sɔtɔ, «naxan xasabi maniyaxi tunbuie xasabi ra naxee na koore ma, a nun mɛyɛnyi xasabi ra naxan na baa dɛ ra. E kɔnti mu nɔma kolonde.»
58011013	Yi mixie bara faxa e xa danxaniya kui, e mu fee sɔtɔ naxee nu laayidixi e bɛ. E nu laxi a ra a fanyi ra, a na laayidie mu kanama. E nu a kolon a e findixi «xɔɲɛe nan na duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari.»
58011014	Mixi naxee na fe mɔɔlie falama, e a masenfe nɛ a e na taa gbɛtɛ fenfe e sabatima dɛnnaxɛ.
58011015	Xa e kelide xɔli nu bara e suxu nu, e nu nɔma gbilende naa.
58011016	Kɔnɔ e nu taa gbɛtɛ fenma naxan fan e kelide bɛ, taa naxan na ariyanna. Na kui, Ala mu yaagixi e ra, e xa a xili e Marigi Ala, barima a nu bara taa yailan e bɛ.
58011017	Danxaniya saabui ra, Iburahima mu tondi Isiyaga bade sɛrɛxɛ ra, Ala nu a matoma tɛmui naxɛ. A mu tondi a xa di kerenyi bade sɛrɛxɛ ra, di naxan nu laayidixi a bɛ,
58011018	Ala nu bara a fala naxan ma fe ra, «Isiyaga nan findima i bɔnsɔɛ ra, i xili luma naxan xun ma.»
58011019	Iburahima nu a kolon a Ala sɛnbɛ gbo, hali Isiyaga faxa, a nu nɔma na rakelide faxɛ ma. Fayida na nan naba misaali ra, barima Ala a xa di ragbilen nɛ a ma.
58011020	Danxaniya saabui ra, Isiyaga naxa duba Yaxuba nun Esayu bɛ e xa simaya xa fe ra.
58011021	Danxaniya saabui ra, Yaxuba naxa duba Yusufu xa die bɛ, a nu luxi dondoronti a xa faxa. A naxa Ala batu, a yi masuxuxi a xa xuli ra.
58011022	Danxaniya saabui ra, Yusufu naxa masenyi ti a xa saya makɔrɛ, a lanma e xa naxan naba a fure ra Isirayilakae minima Misira bɔxi ra tɛmui naxɛ.
58011023	Danxaniya saabui ra, Munsa to bari, a barimae naxa a nɔxun kike saxan bun ma a xa tofanyi xa fe ra, e mu gaaxu mangɛ xa yaamari ya ra.
58011024	Danxaniya saabui ra, Munsa to mɔ, a naxa tondi findide Firawuna xa di ginɛ xa di ra.
58011025	A naxa wa a xɔn ma, a xa tɔɔrɛ sɔtɔ Ala xa ɲama ya ma, dinɛ a xa ɲɛlɛxin yunubi ra waxati dunkedi bun ma.
58011026	A bara a kolon Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa magore nan fan dangi Misira naafuli ra. A nu sare matoma a fama naxan sɔtɔde yare.
58011027	Danxaniya saabui ra, Munsa naxa keli Misira bɔxi ma, a mu gaaxu Firawuna xa xɔnɛ ya ra. A naxa a tunnabɛxi, barima a nu gaaxuxi Ala nan ya ra, naxan mu toma.
58011028	Danxaniya saabui ra, Munsa naxa Sayamalekɛ Dangi Sali raba, a wuli kasan naadɛe ma, alako sayamalekɛ naxa Isirayilakae xa di singee faxa.
58011029	Danxaniya saabui ra, Isirayilakae naxa Xulunyumi baa igiri a xaraxi ra. Misirakae to bira e fɔxɔ ra, e naxa madula ye xɔɔra.
58011030	Danxaniya saabui ra, Yeriko tɛtɛ naxa bira a yɛtɛ ra, Isirayilakae to gɛ a rabilinde xi solofere bun ma.
58011031	Danxaniya saabui ra, langoe ginɛ Raxabi naxa kisi kaafirie ya ma, barima a nu bara Isirayilaka yire rabɛnyie yigiya a fanyi ra.
58011032	N munse sama na fari sɔnɔn? Waxati mu luma n bɛ n xa Gedeyon, Baraki, Samison, Yefite, Dawuda, Samuweli, nun namiɲɔnmɛe xa fee fala.
58011033	Danxaniya saabui ra, e naxa nɔ mangataae ra, e naxa ɲɛrɛ tinxinyi kui, e naxa fe laayidixi sɔtɔ, e naxa nɔ yɛtɛ xaaɲɛe ra,
58011034	e naxa ratanga tɛ xungbe nun santidɛgɛma ma, e xa sɛnbɛtareya naxa findi sɛnbɛ ra, e naxa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ gere kui, e fa sɔɔri galie keri.
58011035	Ginɛ ndee naxa e ngaxakerenyi faxaxie to, naxee rakelixi faxɛ ma. Mixi ndee naxa ɲaxankata, e tondi minide na tɔɔrɛ kui, alako e xa marakeli fanyi sɔtɔ.
58011036	Mixi ndee naxa bɔnbɔ, e mayele sɔtɔ, e lu geeli kui, e xirixi yɔlɔnxɔnyi ra.
58011037	Mixi ndee naxa magɔnɔ, e naxa tɔɔrɔ, e naxa a ibolon, e naxa faxa santidɛgɛma ra. Ndee naxa lintan, yɛxɛɛ nun si kiri ragoroxi e ma, se birin baxi e yi ra, e ɲaxankataxi, e halakixi,
58011038	e nu fa lintan gbengberenyi ma, geyae longori ra, fɔnmɛe nun yilie kui. A mu nu lanma duniɲa mixie xa na binyɛ sɔtɔ na danxaniyatɔɛe xa lu e ya ma.
58011039	Na mixi naxan birin xili fanyi sɔtɔ e xa danxaniya saabui ra, e mu fee sɔtɔ naxee nu laayidixi e bɛ.
58011040	Ala mu tin e xa fe xa kamali won xanbi. A bara fe fanyi ɲanige won bɛ naxan dangi fe singe ra.
58012001	Na danxaniyatɔɛ gali, naxee bara e xa danxaniya masen duniɲa bɛ, e man xa findi misaali ra won bɛ. Won xa fe birin nun yunubi birin nabolo naxan won tɔɔrɔma won ma ɲɛrɛ kui. Won xa won gi tunnabɛxi ra kira xɔn ma Ala naxan saxi won ya ra.
58012002	Won xa won ya ti Isa ra, naxan danxaniya kira rabixi won bɛ, naxan fama won ma danxaniya rakamalide. Isa tin nɛ wuri magalanbuxi xa tɔɔrɛ ra, alako a xa sɛɛwa yare. A mu gaaxu na yaagi ra. Na kui, a xa faxɛ dangi xanbi, a naxa a magoro Ala xa kibanyi yirefanyi ma.
58012003	Wo xa ratu a xa misaali ma, a tɔɔrɔxi ki naxɛ yunubitɔɛe saabui ra, alako wo naxa tagan, limaniya naxa ba wo yi ra.
58012004	Wo mu yunubi gerexi sinden, han wo wuli xa mini.
58012005	Wo tan, Ala xa die, wo bara nɛɛmu Ala xa masenyi ma wo ralimaniyaxi naxan na, a falafe ra, «N ma di, i naxa yo Marigi xa marakɔrɔsi ma, limaniya naxa ba i yi ra, a i xuruma tɛmui naxɛ.
58012006	Marigi a xanuntenyi nan xuruma. A naxee birin kolonxi a xa die ra, a e ɲaxankata.»
58012007	Wo xa tin na ra, barima Ala na wo xurufe nɛ alɔ a xa die. Di mundun na, naxan baba mu a xuruma?
58012008	Xa Ala mu wo xuruma, alɔ di birin xuruma ki naxɛ, a luxi nɛ alɔ wo mu findixi a xa die ra, a lima a halalɛ mu wo ra.
58012009	Won babae won xuruma duniɲa, won fan e binya. A mu lanma won xa tin a ra, Baba Ala naxan na ariyanna, a xa won xuru alako won xa kisi?
58012010	Won babae nu won xuruma waxati di nan bun ma e yɛtɛ xaxili ra, kɔnɔ Ala tan won xuruma won ma munafanyi yati nan ma fe ra, alako won xa lu Ala xa sɛniyɛnyi kui.
58012011	Na xurui xɔrɔxɔ, a mu mixi rasɛɛwama a fɔlɛ, kɔnɔ a dɔnxɔɛ ra, a fɔxi tinxinxi raminima nɛ yare bɔɲɛsa kui.
58012012	Na na a ra, wo xa wo sɛnbɛ so, wo tan naxee bɛlɛxɛe taganxi, naxee xinbi tɔɔrɔxi.
58012013	Wo xa wo ɲɛrɛ kira tinxinxi xɔn ma, alako mabɛnyie naxa telexun, e xa yalan.
58012014	Lanyi xa lu wo nun mixie tagi. Wo xa lu sɛniyɛnyi kui, xa na mu a ra wo mu Marigi toma.
58012015	Wo xa mɛɛni wo bore ma, alako mixi yo naxa mini Ala xa hinnɛ kui. Wo naxa lu xɔnɔ ra wo bore ma, na fa mixi gbegbe tɔɔrɔ wo ya ma.
58012016	Wo mɛɛni de! Wo naxa yɛnɛ raba. Wo naxa sɛriyɛ kana alɔ Esayu, naxan a xa foriɲa tide masaraxi bande lenge keren xa fe ra.
58012017	Wo a kolon a to nu waxi a baba xa duba a bɛ, a xa foriɲa kɛ sɔtɔ, a baba naxa tondi. Esayu naxa a mayandi yaye ra, kɔnɔ a baba mu tin na ra.
58012018	Wo mu wo makɔrɛ na yire ra wo xa wo bɛlɛxɛ din a ra alɔ Isirayilakae fe naxan to gbengberenyi ma. Tɛ nun nuxui fɔɔrɛ nu na geya fari dɛnnaxɛ, foye xungbe nu bɔnbɔ a ra.
58012019	Wo mu sara xui nun Ala xui magaaxui mɛxi. Isirayilakae to na mɛ, e naxa Munsa mayandi alako e naxa na xui mɛ sɔnɔn.
58012020	E naxa gaaxu Ala xa yaamari ya ra, «Mixi nun sube yo din yi geya ra, na kanyi fama nɛ magɔnɔde, a faxa.»
58012021	Na fe nu magaaxu han Annabi Munsa naxa a fala, «N bara gaaxu han n bara sɛrɛn.»
58012022	Kɔnɔ wo tan bara wo maso Siyoni geya yire ra, Ala Ɲiɲɛ xa taa naxan na ariyanna, Darisalamu naxan na koore ma, malekɛ wulu wulu malanxi dɛnnaxɛ sɛɛwɛ kui.
58012023	Ala xa ɲama fan na na, naxee xili sɛbɛxi buki kui ariyanna. E findixi Ala xa di singee nan na. Duniɲa Makiitima Ala na mɛnni nɛ, a nun tinxintɔɛ nii naxee xa fe bara kamali.
58012024	Isa fan na naa, naxan bara findi saabui ra saatɛ nɛɛnɛ rakamalife ra, naxan wuli bara findi sɛrɛxɛ ra. Na fan dangi Habila gbe sɛrɛxɛ ra.
58012025	Wo naxa tondi Ala xa masenyi ra. Mixi naxee tixi duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari, e to tondi na masenyi ra, e naxa ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ. Yakɔsi, won munse sɔtɔma sɔnɔn xa a sa li won tondima masenyi ra, naxan fatanxi Ala yati yati ra naxan na koore ma?
58012026	Singe Ala xui naxa bɔxi rasɛrɛn, kɔnɔ yakɔsi a bara laayidi tongo, «N man bɔxi rasɛrɛnma nɛ, kɔnɔ yi biyaasi n koore fan nasɛrɛnma nɛ.»
58012027	A to a fala, «n man,» na nu wama a masenfe nɛ a se daaxi birin nasɛrɛnma nɛ, a fa kana. Fe naxan mu rasɛrɛnma, na nan luma, a mu kana.
58012028	Won fama lude mangɛya niini naxan bun ma, na tan mu sɛrɛnma, na mu kanama. Na kui, won xa Ala tantu, won xa a batu yaragaaxui nun binyɛ ra a wama naxan xɔn,
58012029	barima won Marigi Ala luxi nɛ alɔ tɛ naxan se birin ganma.
58013001	Wo xa wo tunnabɛxi wo bore maxanufe ra ngaxakerenya kui.
58013002	Wo xa xɔɲɛ rasɛnɛ a fanyi ra. Mixi ndee xɔɲɛ yigiyama nɛ, a fa sa li e mu a kolon xa malekɛ na a ra.
58013003	Wo xa ratu geelimanie ma nun mixie ma naxee ɲaxankataxi. Wo xa fe fanyi raba e bɛ alɔ wo birin na fate bɛndɛ keren nan kui.
58013004	Wo birin xa futi binya. Yɛnɛ nun langoeɲa naxa lu wo ya ma, barima Ala fama nɛ na sɛniyɛntareɲa makiitide.
58013005	Wo naxa a lu kɔbiri xa fe milɛ xa wo raɲɛrɛ. Naxan na wo yi, wo xa wo wasa so nɛ. Ala yati naxa a masen, «N mu i rabɛɲinma, n mu i raboloma.»
58013006	Na nan a toxi won nɔma a falade limaniya ra, «N Marigi n dɛmɛnma, n mu gaaxuma. Adama tan nɔma munse rabade n na kɔrɛ?»
58013007	Wo xa ratu wo xa yareratie ma, naxee bara Ala xa masenyi masen wo bɛ. Wo xa e ɲɛrɛ ki mato, e xa danxaniya xa findi misaali ra wo bɛ.
58013008	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa mu masarama. A nu na ki naxɛ xoro, a man na na ki nɛ to, a man luma na ki nɛ abadan, na birin kɛɲa keren.
58013009	Wo naxa bira xaranyi mɔɔli gbɛtɛe fɔxɔ ra. Wo bɔɲɛ xa sɛnbɛ so Ala xa hinnɛ saabui ra. Yaamarie, donse raharamuxie xa fe ra, nee mu nɔma wo malide.
58013010	Hɔrɔmɔlingira walikɛe mu nɔma sɛrɛxɛ donde naxan baxi won tan bɛ.
58013011	Sɛrɛxɛdubɛ kuntigi xuruse wuli bama nɛ sɛrɛxɛ ra hɔrɔmɔlingira kui yunubie xa fe ra, kɔnɔ na xuruse fate tan ganma nɛ taa fari ma.
58013012	Na nan a toxi, Isa fan to wa ɲama rasɛniyɛnfe a yɛtɛ wuli saabui ra, a naxa ɲaxankata taa fari ma.
58013013	Won fan xa bira a fɔxɔ ra na yaagi kui taa fari ma,
58013014	barima won na taa naxan kui, a mu buma. Won taa nan fenfe naxan fama fade.
58013015	Won xa tantui fi Ala ma sɛrɛxɛ ra tɛmui birin Isa saabui ra. Na sɛrɛxɛ findima won ma masenyi nan na naxan a xili matɔxɔma.
58013016	Wo man naxa nɛɛmu fe fanyie rabade mixie bɛ. Wo xa wo booree ki, barima na fe mɔɔlie findima sɛrɛxɛe nan na naxee rafanxi Ala ma.
58013017	Wo xa wo xa yareratie xui ratinmɛ, wo xa e xa yaamarie suxu, barima e na mɛɛnife wo ma, alako wo naxa gbilen Ala fɔxɔ ra, xa na mu a ra na dɛntɛgɛ sa fama nɛ e tɔɔrɔde. Wo xa fe birin naba alako e xa nɔ na dɛntɛgɛ sade sɛɛwɛ kui bɔɲɛ mawa xanbi, barima na nan findima wo xa munafanyi ra.
58013018	Wo xa Ala maxandi muxu bɛ, barima muxu a kolon muxu xaxili fiixɛ, muxu wama ɲɛrɛfe fe fanyi mɔɔli birin nan kui.
58013019	Wo man xa Ala maxandi muxu bɛ, alako n xa nɔ gbilende wo yire mafuren mafuren.
58013020	Ala naxan bɔɲɛsa fima mixi ma, Ala naxan won Marigi Isa rakeli faxɛ ma, Isa naxan mɛɛnima a xa mixie ma a xa saatɛ wuli saabui ra, saatɛ naxan mu kanama abadan,
58013021	Ala xa fɛɛrɛ birin fi wo ma alako wo xa nɔ a sago rabade. Ala xa fe lu won bɔɲɛ ma naxan nafan a ma a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra. Matɔxɔɛ na a bɛ abadan. Amina.
58013022	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa wo haakɛ to n bɛ yi masenyi xa fe ra, barima n mu wɔyɛnyi xɔnkuyaxi a gbe ra.
58013023	Wo xa a kolon won ngaxakerenyi Timote bara a yɛtɛ sɔtɔ. Xa a mu bu fade, muxu birin fama nɛ wo yire.
58013024	Wo xa wo xa yareratie nun sɛniyɛntɔɛ birin xɛɛbu muxu bɛ. Italikae naxee na be, e fan bara wo xɛɛbu.
58013025	Ala xa hinnɛ wo birin na.
59001001	N tan Yaki nan yi ki, Ala nun a xa Mixi Sugandixi Marigi Isa xa konyi. N bara wo xɛɛbu, wo tan Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ fu nun firinyi naxee yensenxi ɲamanɛe ma.
59001002	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa sɛɛwa tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli birin kui,
59001003	barima wo a kolon a wo tɔɔrɛ naxan sɔtɔma danxaniya kui, a wo duluxɔtɔma nɛ.
59001004	Wo xa duluxɔtɔ han a raɲɔnyi alako wo xa danxaniya xa tilin, wo xa findi mixi kamalixie ra, fefe mu luxi naxee xa fe ra.
59001005	Xa fahaamui mu na mixi nde yi ra wo ya ma, a kanyi xa Ala maxandi. A a sɔtɔma nɛ, barima Ala mixi birin kima a yiriwaxi ra a xa fonisireya ma.
59001006	Kɔnɔ fo mixi xa Ala maxandi danxaniya ra, a naxa siikɛ, barima mixi siikɛxi luma nɛ alɔ mɔrɔnyi, foye naxan bɔnbɔma, a a matutun.
59001007	Na kanyi naxa a maɲɔxun a a se nde sɔtɔma Ala ra,
59001008	barima a xaxili mu tixi Ala gbansan xa ra, a sanyie na kira wuyaxi nan xɔn.
59001009	Danxaniyatɔɛ setare xa sɛɛwa barima Ala bara a xa fe ite.
59001010	Kɔnɔ banna tan xa sɛɛwa Ala to bara a xa fe magoro, barima a xa fe ɲɔnma nɛ alɔ sansi fuge tofanyi.
59001011	Soge xɔnɛ na te, sansi lisima nɛ han a fuge bira, a xa tofanyi ɲɔn. A na na ki nɛ banna fan bɛ. A na a xa walie kui tɛmui naxɛ, a birima na lɛɛri nɛ.
59001012	Ɲɛlɛxinyi na mixi bɛ naxan a tunnabɛxima tɔɔrɛ kui, barima xa a bara gɛ na tɔɔrɛ raxande, Ala kisi xunnakeli fima nɛ a ma. Ala na nan laayidixi a xanuntenyie bɛ.
59001013	Mixi nɛ wama tantanfe, a naxa a fala a Ala nan a ratantanfe, barima Ala mu birama fe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra, a man mu adama yo ratantanma fe ɲaaxi ra.
59001014	Adama yɛtɛ waxɔnfe ɲaaxi nan a ratantanma. Na nan a mabɛndunma han a a rabira.
59001015	Adama waxɔnfe ɲaaxi xa di findixi yunubi nan na. Yunubi fan na raba, a xa di findima faxɛ nan na.
59001016	N ngaxakerenyi xanuxie, wo naxa la wule ra.
59001017	Ki hagigɛ birin fatanxi Daali Mangɛ nan na naxan na koore, naxan soge, kike, nun tunbuie daaxi, naxan mu masarama abadan.
59001018	A yɛtɛ sagoe ma, Ala bara won nakisi a xa nɔndi masenyi saabui ra, a won findi a xa die ra, alako won xa binyɛ sɔtɔ dangife a xa daalise birin na.
59001019	N ngaxakerenyi xanuxie, wo xa yi wɔyɛnyi mɛ: Wo birin xa wo tuli mati wo bore ra, wo naxa gbata wɔyɛnyi ra, wo bɔɲɛ naxa te mafuren na,
59001020	barima adamadi xa xɔnɛ mu a tutunma Ala xa tinxinyi ma.
59001021	Na na a ra, wo xa tondi fe ɲaaxi nun fe kobi mɔɔli birin nabade. Wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro, wo xa nɔndi suxu naxan bara masen wo bɛ, barima na nan nɔma wo rakiside.
59001022	Wo xa Ala xa masenyi rabatu. Xa wo a ramɛ gbansan kɔnɔ wo mu a raba, wo bara wo yɛtɛ madaxu.
59001023	Xa mixi nde Ala xa masenyi ramɛ, kɔnɔ a mu bira a fɔxɔ ra, a luma nɛ alɔ mixi naxan a yatagi matoma kike ma,
59001024	a fa siga, a nɛɛmu a yatagi ma a na ki naxɛ.
59001025	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan Ala xa sɛriyɛ kamalixi matoma a fanyi ra, a a tunnabɛxi, a mu nɛɛmu sɛriyɛ ma kɔnɔ a a rabatu, na kanyi barakama nɛ. Ala xa sɛriyɛ xɔrɛya fima nɛ adamadie ma.
59001026	Mixi yo a yɛtɛ maɲɔxun diinɛla ra, kɔnɔ a mu a dɛ nɔxi, na kanyi na a yɛtɛ madaxufe nɛ. A xa diinɛ tide yo mu na.
59001027	Diinɛ fiixɛ naxan nafan Baba Ala ma, a tan nan ya: won xa mɛɛni kiridie nun kaaɲɛ ginɛe ma e xa tɔɔrɛ kui, duniɲa fe man naxa wo madaxu.
59002001	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa mixie rafisa e boore bɛ, barima wo danxaniyaxi won Marigi Isa Nɔrɛ Kanyi nan ma, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi.
59002002	Wo xa wo maɲɔxun yi ma: Mixi nde naxa fa wo malanxi dɛnnaxɛ, xurundɛ xɛɛma daaxi na a bɛlɛxɛ ra, dugi tofanyi ragoroxi a ma. Setare fan naxa fa, dugi fori toɲaaxi ragoroxi a ma.
59002003	Xa wo dugi tofanyi kanyi xɛɛbu a fanyi ra, wo fa a fala a bɛ, «I magorode fanyi nan yi ki,» kɔnɔ wo fa a fala setare tan bɛ, «Ti mɛnni,» xa na mu a ra, «Dɔxɔ bɔxi, n bun ma be,»
59002004	wo mu mixi rafisaxi a boore bɛ xɛ na ki? Wo mu ɲɛrɛxi maɲɔxun kobi xa ra na ki?
59002005	N ngaxakerenyi xanuxie, wo wo tuli mati n na. Ala bara mixie sugandi naxee findixi setaree ra duniɲa ki ma, alako e xa findi bannamixie ra danxaniya ki ma. Ala bara e sugandi alako e xa findi kɛtongoe ra a xa mangɛya kui. Na nan laayidixi mixie bɛ naxee Ala xanuxi.
59002006	Kɔnɔ wo tan, wo bara setaree mabere. Bannamixie xa mu wo tɔɔrɔma, e wo xanin kiitisa xɔn ma?
59002007	E tan xa mu wo Marigi xili fanyi rasɔtɔma?
59002008	Wo xa Mangɛ Alatala xa sɛriyɛ nan nabatu, alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «I xa i boore xanu alɔ i yɛtɛ kan gundi.» Xa wo na raba, wo bara bira fe fanyi fɔxɔ ra.
59002009	Kɔnɔ xa wo mixi ndee rafisa e boore bɛ, wo bara yunubi raba. Sɛriyɛ nan wo makiitima, barima wo bara findi sɛriyɛ matandilae ra.
59002010	Xa mixi sɛriyɛ birin nabatu kɔnɔ a yire keren matandi, na kanyi bara sɛriyɛ birin matandi,
59002011	barima naxan a falaxi, «I naxa yɛnɛ raba,» a tan nan man a falaxi, «I naxa faxɛ ti.» Hali i mu yɛnɛ raba, kɔnɔ xa i faxɛ ti, i findixi Ala xa sɛriyɛ matandila nan na.
59002012	Na kui, wo xa wɔyɛn, wo man xa wo ɲɛrɛ alɔ naxee fama makiitide sɛriyɛ ra naxan xɔrɛya fima mixi ma.
59002013	Kiiti lɔxɔɛ, Ala mu kinikinima mixi ma naxan mu kinikini a boore adama ma. Kinikini sɛnbɛ gbo kiiti bɛ.
59002014	N ngaxakerenyie, a tide yo mu na xa mixi a fala a a danxaniyaxi, kɔnɔ a mu kɛwali fanyi rabama. Yi danxaniya mɔɔli nɔma mixi rakiside?
59002015	Xa wo ngaxakerenyi mageli na a ra, lɔxɔɛ keren baloe mu na a yi ra,
59002016	mixi nde fa lu wo ya ma a a fala a bɛ, «Siga, i naxa kɔntɔfili, i xa dugi nde ragoro i ma, i xa i dɛge,» kɔnɔ a fa lu a mu a xa kɔntɔfili ba, na kanyi xa wɔyɛnyi tide yo mu na.
59002017	Danxaniya na na ki nɛ. Xa a mu mixi tutunma wali fanyie rabafe ma, a tide yo mu na.
59002018	Kɔnɔ mixi nde nɔma a falade, «I tan, danxaniya kanyi nan i ra, kɔnɔ n tan fe fanyi raba nan n na.» Kata i xa i xa danxaniya masen n bɛ wali fanyi xanbi. N tan n ma danxaniya masenma i bɛ n ma kɛwali fanyi nan saabui ra.
59002019	I laxi a ra, a Ala keren na a ra. Na fan ki fanyi, kɔnɔ hali ɲinnɛe laxi na ra, e sɛrɛn gaaxui ra.
59002020	I tan xaxilitare, i mu a kolon danxaniya naxan mu kɛwali fanyi raminima, a tide yo mu na?
59002021	Munfe a niya won baba Iburahima naxa findi tinxintɔɛ ra Ala ya i? A mu fatan a xa kɛwalie xa ma, a to a xa di Isiyaga fi Ala ma sɛrɛxɛbade fari?
59002022	I bara a to, danxaniya nu walife nɛ a nun a xa kɛwali. Kɛwali nan danxaniya rakamalima.
59002023	Na kui, a naxa raba alɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui ki naxɛ, «Iburahima naxa la Ala ra. Alatala fan naxa na findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ.» Iburahima xili naxa fala «Ala xanuntenyi».
59002024	Wo bara a to, adamadi xa kɛwali findima tinxinyi nan na a bɛ, a xa danxaniya gbansan xa mu a ra.
59002025	Langoe ginɛ Raxabi fan xa kɛwali xa mu findi tinxinyi ra a bɛ, a to xɛɛrae rasɛnɛ a xɔnyi, a kira masen e bɛ e e gima naxan na?
59002026	Mixi nii na siga, a fate faxama nɛ. Na kui, xa kɛwali fanyi mu na, danxaniya fan ɲɔnma nɛ.
59003001	N ngaxakerenyie, a mu lanma mixi wuyaxi xa findi karamɔxɔ ra wo ya ma, barima karamɔxɔe fama makiitide nɛ a xɔrɔxɔɛ ra dangi mixi gbɛtɛe ra.
59003002	Won birin tantanma fe wuyaxi ma. Xa mixi nde mu tantanma a xa wɔyɛnyi kui, a mu tantanma dɛdɛ. Na kanyi nɔma a yɛtɛ birin suxude tinxinyi kui.
59003003	Mixi na wa soe xa a waxɔnfe raba, a karafoe nan nasoma a dɛ i. Na nan nɔma a fate birin naɲɛrede.
59003004	Kunkui fan na na ki nɛ. Hali kunkui belebele, foye xungbe naxan tutunma, mixi a raɲɛrɛma feya xurudi nan na, a a ragi a na wa sigafe dɛnnaxɛ.
59003005	Nɛnyi fan xurun, kɔnɔ a fe igboma. Wo a mato, tɛ dondoronti di nɔma wondi belebele gande.
59003006	Tɛ nan na nɛnyi fan na, naxan findixi duniɲa fe kobi ra. Fate birin nɔxɔma fe ɲaaxi ra a xa wali saabui nan na. Mixi nɛnyi nɔma tɛ sode a xa duniɲɛigiri birin na, barima tɛ nan na nɛnyi ra, tɛ naxan kelima yahannama.
59003007	Adamadi nɔma daalise mɔɔli birin xurude. Sube xaaɲɛe, xɔnie, bubusee, nun baa ma yɛxɛe, adamadi bara e birin xuru,
59003008	kɔnɔ mixi yo mu nɔma adamadi nɛnyi xurude. Xɔnɛ na a ra naxan ma lintanyi mu danma, naxan xa kasarɛ mu ɲɔnma.
59003009	Won won Baba, won Marigi, batuma nɛnyi kerenyi naxan na, won man adamadi dankama a tan nan na, Ala naxan daaxi a yɛtɛ misaali ra.
59003010	N ngaxakerenyie, dubɛ nun dankɛ minife dɛ keren na, a mu fan.
59003011	Ye xɔnɛ nun ye bɛxi nɔma minide dulonyi keren na?
59003012	N ngaxakerenyie, xɔrɛ bili nɔma tugi bogi raminide? Mangoe bili nɔma xɔrɛ bogi raminide? Fɔxɛ ye minima dulonyi naxan na, ye bɛxi mu minima mɛnni ra.
59003013	Nde findixi fahaamula nun xaxilima ra wo ya ma? A xa na masen a ɲɛrɛ ki fanyi nun a xa kɛwalie ra, a naxee rabama bɔɲɛ bɛxi kui, naxan fatanxi fahaamui ra.
59003014	Xa tɔɔnɛ ɲaaxi nun milɛ na wo bɔɲɛ kui, wo naxa wo yɛtɛ igbo na fee kui, wo naxa nɔndi masara wule ra.
59003015	Na xaxili mɔɔli mu kelixi koore xɛ. A kelixi duniɲa nɛ, Ala kolontareya, nun Ibulisa ma.
59003016	Tɔɔnɛ nun milɛ na dɛnnaxɛ, ya isoe nun fe kobi mɔɔli birin toma na nɛ.
59003017	Kɔnɔ fahaamui naxan kelixi koore ma, a sɛniyɛn, a mixi bɔɲɛ sama, a diɲɛma, a kinikinima, a kɛwali fanyi raminima, a mu mixi rafisama a boore bɛ, a mu filankafuiɲa rabama.
59003018	Maale bogi minima a garansanma bɛ ki naxɛ, tinxinyi fan minima mixi bɛ na ki nɛ naxan birama lanyi nun bɔɲɛsa fɔxɔ ra.
59004001	Wo sɔnxɔma, wo gerema. Na rakelima mun ma? A mu kelima wo waxɔnfe kobie xa ma naxee e boore gerema wo bɔɲɛ kui?
59004002	Wo wama se nde xɔn, kɔnɔ wo mu a sɔtɔma. Wo faxɛ tima, wo mila wo boore xa se ma, kɔnɔ wo mu nɔma wo waxɔnfe sɔtɔde. Wo sɔnxɔma, wo gerema, kɔnɔ na birin, wo mu sese sɔtɔma barima wo mu Ala maxandima.
59004003	Wo na Ala maxandi fan, wo man mu sese sɔtɔma, barima wo xa maxandi mu fan. Wo maxandi tima alako wo na naxan yo sɔtɔ wo xa a rawali wo waxɔnfe kobie kui.
59004004	Wo tan danxaniyataree, wo mu a kolon naxan duniɲa maxanuma na bara Ala findi a yaxui ra? Duniɲa xanuntenyi findixi mixi nan na naxan Ala xɔnxi.
59004005	Wo mu Ala xa Kitaabui xa masenyi kolon? Ala wama nɛ won xaxili, a bara naxan fi won ma, a xa bira a tan keren nan fɔxɔ ra.
59004006	Kɔnɔ na birin kui, Ala xa hinnɛ gbo dangi fe birin na. Kitaabui a masenma, «Ala mu tinma yɛtɛ igboe ra, kɔnɔ a hinnɛma yɛtɛ magore ra.»
59004007	Na kui, wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro Ala bɛ. Wo tondi Ibulisa bɛ, a fan a gima nɛ wo ya ra.
59004008	Wo wo maso Ala ra, a fan a masoma nɛ wo ra. Yunubitɔɛe, wo wo yɛtɛ rasɛniyɛn. Filankafuie, wo wo bɔɲɛ rafiixɛ.
59004009	Wo wa, wo sunnun, wo nimisa. Wo xa yele xa findi wo bɛ wa ra, wo xa sɛɛwɛ xa findi sunnunyi ra.
59004010	Wo wo magoro Marigi bɛ, a fan wo xa fe itema nɛ.
59004011	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa fe kobi fala wo bore xa fe ra. Mixi naxan fe kobi falama a ngaxakerenyi xa fe ra, a a yɛtɛ rafisa a bɛ, na kanyi bara Ala xa sɛriyɛ matandi. A a yɛtɛ rafisaxi Ala xa sɛriyɛ nan bɛ na ki. Xa i bara na raba, i mu na Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatufe xɛ, i na a matandife nɛ.
59004012	Sɛriyɛsa keren peti na a ra, kiitisa fan keren peti na a ra. A tan nan nɔma mixi rakiside, a tan nan nɔma mixi ralɔɛde. Kɔnɔ i tan, nde na i ra, i to i yɛtɛ findixi i boore makiitima ra?
59004013	Wo wo tuli mati, wo tan naxee a falama, «To, xa na mu tina, muxu sigama nɛ taa nde, muxu ɲɛ keren ti na yulɛya raba kui, muxu geeni sɔtɔ.»
59004014	Wo na fe mɔɔli falama kɔnɔ wo ɲan mu a kolon naxan fama rabade tina. Wo xa duniɲɛigiri findixi munse ra? Wo luxi nɛ alɔ wuyɛnga naxan toma dondoronti, a fa lɔɛ.
59004015	A lanma nɛ wo xa yi nan fala, «Xa Ala tin, muxu tina toma nɛ, muxu yi nun yi raba.»
59004016	Kɔnɔ yɛtɛ igboe nan na wo ra. Na mu fan.
59004017	Na kui, xa mixi fe fanyi kolon a lanma a xa naxan naba kɔnɔ a mu a rabama, na bara findi na kanyi bɛ yunubi ra.
59005001	Yakɔsi wo wo tuli mati, wo tan bannae. Wo xa wo wa xui ite, barima gbaloe nan fafe wo ma.
59005002	Wo xa bannaya xun bara rakana, wo xa dugie bara bɔrɔ.
59005003	Wo xa xɛɛma nun gbeti bara xɔrixɔri. Na findima seede nan na wo xili ma, a a niya wo fate xa gan tɛ ra. Wo bara naafuli malan yi waxati, kɔnɔ waxati dɔnxɔɛ na a ra.
59005004	Wo wo tuli mati, wo tan naxee tondixi wo xa xɛ xabae sare fide. Wo xa walikɛe wa xui bara Ala, Daali Mangɛ, tuli li.
59005005	Wo xa duniɲɛigiri kui, wo mu tɔnyi dɔxɔxi wo waxɔnfe sese ma. Wo wo yɛtɛ nan tun nalugama. Wo fa luxi nɛ alɔ xuruse turaxi a kɔn naxaba lɔxɔɛ ma.
59005006	Wo bara kiiti ɲaaxi sa tinxintɔɛe ma naxee mu nu tixi wo kanke, wo e faxa.
59005007	Na kui, n ngaxakerenyie, wo xa diɲɛ han Marigi fa lɔxɔɛ. Wo xa a raba alɔ xɛsa a rabama ki naxɛ. A diɲɛ han tunɛbirɛ, naxan a niyama sansi xa mɔ, a bogi.
59005008	Wo fan xa diɲɛ. Wo xa limaniya, barima Marigi fa lɔxɔɛ bara makɔrɛ.
59005009	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa fe kobi fala wo bore xa fe ra, xa na mu a ra kiiti na sa, a mu fanma wo bɛ. A gbe mu luxi kiitisa xa fa.
59005010	N ngaxakerenyie, wo xa lu alɔ namiɲɔnmɛ naxee kawandi ti Marigi xili ra, e e tunnabɛxi tɔɔrɛ kui.
59005011	Won a kolon barakɛ na mixi bɛ naxan a tunnabɛxima tɔɔrɛ kui. Wo bara a mɛ Ayuba a tunnabɛxi ki naxɛ. Wo man bara a to Marigi naxan nabaxi a bɛ a xa tɔɔrɛ dangi xanbi. Marigi xa xanunteya nun a xa kinikini gbo.
59005012	N ngaxakerenyie, naxan dangi fe birin na, wo naxa wo kali koore ra, wo naxa wo kali bɔxi ra, wo naxa wo kali sese ra. Wo na «iyo» fala, a xa findi nɔndi ra. Wo na «ade» fala, a xa findi nɔndi ra. Xa na mu a ra kiiti na sa, a mu fanma wo bɛ.
59005013	Mixi na wo ya ma naxan tɔɔrɔxi? A kanyi xa Ala maxandi. Mixi na wo ya ma naxan ɲɛlɛxinxi? A kanyi xa Ala tantu bɛɛti ra.
59005014	Mixi na wo ya ma naxan furaxi? A kanyi xa danxaniyatɔɛ ɲama kuntigie xili, e xa Ala maxandi a bɛ, e xa ture nde maso a ma Marigi xili ra.
59005015	Ala maxandi naxan fatanxi danxaniya ra, a furema rayalanma nɛ. Marigi furema rakelima nɛ. Xa a bara yunubi raba, Marigi a xafarima nɛ.
59005016	Na kui, wo xa wo xa yunubie fala wo bore bɛ, wo xa Ala maxandi wo bore bɛ, alako wo xa yalan. Tinxintɔɛ Ala maxandi naxan tima, na Ala maxandi xa wali sɛnbɛ gbo.
59005017	Eliya nu findixi adamadi nan na alɔ won tan. A to Ala maxandi a bɔɲɛ birin na alako tunɛ naxa fa, Ala naxa a xa dubɛ suxu. Tunɛ mu fa bɔxi ɲɛ saxan kike senni.
59005018	Na dangi xanbi, Eliya man naxa Ala maxandi tunɛ man xa fa. Koore naxa tunɛ bɛɲin, bɔxi sansie naxa bogie ramini.
59005019	N ngaxakerenyie, xa mixi nde wo ya ma a bara nɔndi kira bɛɲin, kɔnɔ mixi gbɛtɛ fa a ti kira fanyi xɔn ma,
59005020	wo xa a kolon, mixi naxan yunubitɔɛ bama a xa yunubi fe ma, a bara a niya yunubitɔɛ xa kisi, a xa yunubi birin bara xafari.
60001001	N tan Piyɛri, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa xɛɛra, n bara wo xɛɛbu yi sɛbɛli ra, wo tan mixi sugandixi naxee yensenxi ɲamanɛe ma alɔ Pontu, Galati, Kapadose, Asi, nun Bitiniya, e findi xɔɲɛe ra dɛnnaxɛ.
60001002	Baba Ala nu bara wo sugandi kabi a rakuya alɔ a nu wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ. A Xaxili bara wo rasɛniyɛn, alako wo xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xui ratinmɛ, wo man xa sɛniyɛn a wuli saabui ra. Ala xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa `xa gbo wo yi ra.
60001003	Tantui na Ala bɛ, won Marigi Isa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Baba. A bara kinikini won ma, a a niya won xa bari a nɛɛnɛ ra Isa xa marakeli saabui ra. A to Isa rakeli faxɛ ma, a naxa a niya won fan xa a kolon kisi na won bɛ yare.
60001004	Na kisi findixi kɛ sɛniyɛnxi nan na naxan mu ɲɔnma, naxan mu kanama, naxan nagataxi won bɛ ariyanna kui.
60001005	Wo to danxaniyaxi Ala ma, a wo makantama nɛ a sɛnbɛ ra, alako wo xa kisi sɔtɔ, a fama naxan naminide wo ma waxati dɔnxɔɛ.
60001006	Na kui, sɛɛwɛ na wo bɛ, hali wo to na tɔɔrɛ mɔɔli birin kui yi saxanyi.
60001007	Na fe xɔrɔxɔɛe a niyama nɛ fe ɲaaxi birin xa ba wo xa danxaniya kui, a xa findi danxaniya sabatixi ra. A maniyaxi xɛɛma nan na naxan gbi bama tɛ ra. Wo xa danxaniya tide gbo xɛɛma bɛ. Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa na fa, a wo matɔxɔma nɛ, a wo xun nakelima nɛ, a wo binyama nɛ wo xa danxaniya xa fe ra.
60001008	Wo bara Isa xanu, hali wo to mu a toxi. Hali wo to mu a toxi fa, wo lama a ra. Sɛɛwɛ xungbe naxan tagi mu nɔma rabade, a bara gbo yɛ wo yi,
60001009	barima wo bara kisi sɔtɔ, wo xa danxaniya nu wama naxan xɔn.
60001010	Namiɲɔnmɛe yati nu katama ki fanyi ra na kisi xa fe kolonfe wo naxan sɔtɔxi Ala xa hinnɛ saabui ra.
60001011	E nu wama na kisi fa tɛmui nun a fa ki kolonfe Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Xaxili naxan xa fee masen e bɛ. Na Xaxili naxan nu sabatixi e i, a naxa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa tɔɔrɛ nun a xa xunnakeli masen e bɛ beenun nee xa raba.
60001012	Ala a masen nɛ namiɲɔnmɛe bɛ, a e mu nu na xɛɛra ibafe e xa waxati mixie xa bɛ. E nu na a ibafe wo tan nan bɛ. E xɛɛra naxan ibaxi, mixi gbɛtɛe bara na xibaaru fanyi ti wo bɛ Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi saabui ra, naxan kelixi koore ma. Hali malekɛe yati wama na masenyi kolonfe.
60001013	Na nan a ra, a lan wo xa wo xaxili yailan fe ma wo naxan nabama, wo xa wo ɲɔxɔ sa wo yɛtɛ xɔn ma, wo xa wo xaxili birin ti Ala xa hinnɛ ra, a naxan fima wo ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fa lɔxɔɛ.
60001014	Wo naxa bira wo waxɔnfe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra alɔ wo nu a rabama ki naxɛ beenun wo xa Isa kolon. Wo xa wo Baba Ala xui rabatu.
60001015	Wo ɲɛrɛ ki xa sɛniyɛn alɔ Ala naxan wo xilixi a sɛniyɛnxi ki naxɛ.
60001016	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «Wo xa sɛniyɛn, barima n tan sɛniyɛn.»
60001017	Wo nɛ Ala maxandima, wo a falama a bɛ a wo Baba, Ala naxan mixi birin makiitima a wali ra tinxinyi ra. Na kui, waxati dɔnxɔɛ naxan luxi wo bɛ yi duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari, wo a masen wo ɲɛrɛ ki ma a wo a binyaxi.
60001018	Wo xun mu saraxi se ra naxan kanama alɔ xɛɛma nun gbeti. Ala bara wo ratanga wo babae ɲɛrɛ ki kobi ma.
60001019	Wo xunsaraxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi wuli nan na, naxan baxi sɛrɛxɛ ra, alɔ yɛxɛɛ fanyi lanyuru yo mu na naxan ma.
60001020	Ala nu bara a sugandi beenun duniɲa xa daa, kɔnɔ a naxa a masen duniɲa bɛ yi waxati dɔnxɔɛ wo tan nan xa fe ra.
60001021	Wo danxaniyaxi Ala ma a tan nan saabui ra, Ala naxan nakeli faxɛ ma, a fa a xun nakeli. Na kui, wo la Ala ra, wo xa wo xaxili ti a ra.
60001022	Wo to bira nɔndi fɔxɔ ra, wo bara sɛniyɛn, xanunteya fiixɛ bara lu wo bɔɲɛ ma wo ngaxakerenyie bɛ. Na na a ra wo xa wo bore xanu wo bɔɲɛ birin na.
60001023	Wo bara bari a nɛɛnɛ ra Ala xa masenyi saabui ra. Na masenyi misaalixi sansi xɔri nan na, naxan mu kanama abadan. A mu kanama alɔ sansi xɔri boore naxan sama bɔxi ma.
60001024	Ibunadama misaalixi sansi nan na. A xa nɔrɛ luxi alɔ sansi fugaxi. Sansi tan lisima nɛ, a fuge fa bira,
60001025	kɔnɔ Marigi xa masenyi tan buma abadan. Na masenyi nan findixi xibaaru fanyi ra naxan ibaxi wo bɛ.
60002001	Wo xa fe ɲaaxi, wule, filankafuiɲa, milanteya, nun xili kanɛ bɛɲin.
60002002	Wo xa bira Ala xa masenyi fɔxɔ ra alɔ diyɔrɛ wama xiɲɛ xɔn ki naxɛ. Na nɔma a niyade wo xa kisi xa sabati,
60002003	barima wo bara Ala xa hinnɛ kolon.
60002004	Wo wo makɔrɛ Isa ra naxan misaalixi gɛmɛ kɛndɛ ra banxi tima naxan fari. Adamadie bara mɛɛ a ra, kɔnɔ Ala tan na gɛmɛ nan sugandixi barima a rafan a ma ki fanyi ra.
60002005	Wo fan misaalixi gɛmɛ kɛndɛe nan na naxee tixi Ala Xaxili xa banxi ra. Wo bara findi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ sɛniyɛnxie ra alako wo xa wo bɔɲɛ ba sɛrɛxɛ ra Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra. Na nan nafan Ala ma.
60002006	A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui, «N bara gɛmɛ nde sugandi, naxan tide gbo. N a dɔxɔma Siyoni nɛ, a findi tuxui gɛmɛ nan na. Naxan lama a ra, na kanyi mu yaagima.»
60002007	Wo tan naxee danxaniyaxi, naxee lama a ra a na gɛmɛ sugandixi tide gbo, xunnakeli na wo bɛ. Kɔnɔ yi masenyi sɛbɛxi danxaniyataree nan bɛ, «Banxitie mɛɛ gɛmɛ naxan na, na nan findixi gɛmɛ kɛndɛ ra banxi tuxui ma.»
60002008	A man masenxi, «Mixie e sanyi radinma na gɛmɛ ra, e fa bira.» E birama nɛ barima e mu tinma Ala xa masenyi ratinmɛde. Ala bara na ragiri e ma.
60002009	Kɔnɔ Ala wo bɔnsɔɛ nan sugandixi, a xa findi mangɛ xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛe ra. A wo si rasɛniyɛn, a wo xunsara. A naxa wo ramini dimi kui, wo xa lu a xa nɔrɛ bun ma. A na birin naba nɛ alako wo xa a matɔxɔ duniɲa ma.
60002010	Singe wo mu nu findixi si ra, kɔnɔ yakɔsi wo bara findi Ala xa ɲama ra. Singe Ala mu nu kinikinixi wo ma, kɔnɔ yakɔsi a xa kinikini bara kamali wo bɛ.
60002011	N xanuntenyie, wo xa limaniya. Wo naxa bira duniɲa fee fɔxɔ ra, barima nee wo bama Ala xa kira nan xɔn ma. Bekae mu na wo ra. Wo xɔnyi mu na yi duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari xa ra.
60002012	Wo xa duniɲa mixie xa tɔɔɲɛgɛ xun nakana wo xa wali fanyi saabui ra, alako e fan xa Ala matɔxɔ lɔxɔɛ dɔnxɔɛ ma.
60002013	Wo wo yɛtɛ magoro duniɲa mangɛ birin bɛ Marigi xa fe ra. Yaamari soxi e tan nan yi, a findi mangɛ xungbe ra,
60002014	a findi mangɛ xa xɛɛrae ra, alɔ gomina. E fe kobi rabae makiitima, e fe fanyi rabae matɔxɔ.
60002015	Ala wama nɛ wo xa xaxilitaree dɛ balan wo xa wali fanyi saabui ra.
60002016	Wo xa ɲɛrɛ alɔ mixi naxee bara xɔrɛya sɔtɔ, kɔnɔ na xɔrɛya naxa a niya wo xa lu fe ɲaaxi kui. Wo xa findi Ala xa konyie ra.
60002017	Wo xa mixi birin binya. Wo xa wo ngaxakerenyie xanu. Wo xa gaaxu Ala ya ra. Wo xa mangɛ xungbe binya.
60002018	Konyie, wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo marigie bɛ binyɛ kui, hali e findi mixi xa fe maxɔrɔxɔxi ra. Wo naxa mixi fanyie xa gbansan xui ratinmɛ,
60002019	barima fe fanyi nan a ra tinfe e xa i tɔɔrɔ tinxintareya ra Ala xa fe ra.
60002020	Xa wo tɔɔrɛ nde sɔtɔ wo xa wali kobi xa fe ra, fe fanyi mu a ra. Kɔnɔ xa wo tɔɔrɛ nde sɔtɔ wo xa fe fanyi xa fe ra, Ala na kolonma nɛ wo bɛ.
60002021	Wo xilixi na nan ma, barima Isa fan tɔɔrɔ nɛ wo bɛ, na fa findi misaali ra wo bɛ wo birama naxan fɔxɔ ra.
60002022	«A mu yunubi raba, a mu wule fala.»
60002023	E to a konbi, a mu a gbeɲɔxɔ. E to a tɔɔrɔ, a mu wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ fala. A naxa kiiti so kiitisa tinxinxi yi ra.
60002024	A naxa faxa wuri magalanbuxi ma won ma yunubie xa fe ra, alako won xa fe ɲaaxi lu na, won xa ɲɛrɛ tinxinyi kui. A xa fie nan wo rayalanxi.
60002025	Wo nu luxi nɛ alɔ xuruse rabɛɲinxie, kɔnɔ yakɔsi wo bara gbilen wo kantama ma, naxan a ɲɔxɔ saxi wo nii xɔn ma.
60003001	Wo tan ginɛe, wo fan xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo xa mɔrie bɛ, alako wo xa mɔri danxaniyataree xa nɔ danxaniyade wo tan e xa ginɛe wali ki saabui ra, hali wo mu sese fala e bɛ,
60003002	e xa wo xa marasɛniyɛnyi nun yaragaaxui gbansan to.
60003003	Ginɛe, wo naxa kata wo yɛtɛ rayabude xunmasee ra, alɔ xun dɛnbɛ, tulirasoe xɛɛma daaxi, xa na mu dugi tofanyie.
60003004	Ginɛe xa tofanyi xa findi bɔɲɛ fanyi nan na. Tofanyi nan na ki naxan mu kanama. Na nan tide gbo Ala bɛ.
60003005	Singe ra ginɛ sɛniyɛnxie nu na ki nɛ. E xaxili nu tixi Ala ra, e e yɛtɛ magoroxi e xa mɔrie bɛ,
60003006	alɔ Sara naxan nu Iburahima xui rabatuma, a nu fa a xili «n marigi». Wo findixi a tan nan bɔnsɔɛ ra, xa wo fe fanyi raba, wo mu tin gaaxui yo xa wo xaxili ya iso.
60003007	Wo tan fan, xɛmɛe, wo nun wo xa ginɛe, wo xa lu lanyi kui. Wo xa wo bore fahaamu. Xɛmɛ xa a kolon a a sɛnbɛ gbo a xa ginɛ bɛ. Xɛmɛe xa ginɛe binya barima wo birin nan kɛ keren tongoma, naxan findi kisi ra, Ala naxan fima a xa fonisireya kui. Wo xa wo xa ginɛe binya, alako Ala xa wo xa maxandi suxu.
60003008	Wo xa lan wo bore ma, wo xa wo bore fahaamu. Ngaxakerenya xanunteya xa lu wo tagi. Wo kinikini wo bore ma, wo man xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo bore bɛ.
60003009	Wo naxa fe ɲaaxi ɲɔxɔ fe ɲaaxi ra, wo naxa konbi ɲɔxɔ konbi ra. Wo lan nɛ wo xa duba wo bore bɛ, barima wo xilixi na nan ma, alako wo xa dubɛ sɔtɔ kɛ ra. A sɛbɛxi Kitaabui kui,
60003010	«Naxan wama simaya ɲɔxunmɛ xɔn ma, hɛɛri gbo naxan kui, na kanyi naxa fe kobi fala, wule naxa mini a dɛ kui.
60003011	A xa gbilen fe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra. A ɲɛrɛ ki xa fan. A xa bira bɔɲɛsa fɔxɔ ra tunnabɛxi kui,
60003012	barima Marigi ya tixi tinxintɔɛe nan na, a tuli matixi e xa maxandi ra. Kɔnɔ, a a kobe rasoxi nɛ fe kobi rabae tan na.»
60003013	Nde nɔma wo tɔɔrɔde xa fe fanyi rabafe bara wo bɔɲɛ suxu?
60003014	Hali wo tɔɔrɔ tinxinyi xa fe ra, wo hɛɛri nan sɔtɔma. Wo naxa gaaxu fe ya ra duniɲa mixie gaaxuma naxan ya ra, wo bɔɲɛ naxa ifu.
60003015	Kɔnɔ wo xa Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi findi wo Marigi ra wo bɔɲɛ kui. Wo xa fata a xa fe tagi rabade mixie bɛ wo laxi wo xa kisi ra fe naxan ma,
60003016	kɔnɔ wo xa na masenyi ti dɔyindɔyin binyɛ kui. Wo xa na raba bɔɲɛ fiixɛ ra alako wo yaxui naxee wo tɔɔɲɛgɛma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xa fe ra, e xa lu yaagi kui.
60003017	Xa Ala a ragirima, a fisa i xa tɔɔrɔ fe fanyi xa fe ra, dinɛ i xa tɔɔrɔ fe ɲaaxi xa fe ra.
60003018	Isa tinxintɔɛ fan faxa nɛ kerenyi ra tinxintaree xa yunubie xa fe ra, alako a xa wo maso Ala ra. E naxa a fate faxa, kɔnɔ Ala Xaxili naxa a nii ragbilen a ma.
60003019	Ala Xaxili siga nɛ kawandi tide mixie bɛ naxee nu na geeli kui laaxira, naxee singe nu bara tondi Ala xui ratinmɛde.
60003020	Ala nu na e mamɛfe Annabi Nuha nu kunkui banbanma tɛmui naxɛ. Mixi solomasaxan gbansan nan kisi kunkui kui ye ma.
60003021	Na fe bara findi misaali ra danxaniyatɔɛ xunxa fe ra, naxan mixi rakisima yi waxati Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa marakeli saabui ra. Na xunxafe ye xɔɔra, a mu nɔxɔɛ bama mixi fate, kɔnɔ a findima natɛ tongoe nan na Ala mabiri.
60003022	Isa bara te Ala yirefanyi ma ariyanna. Malekɛe, ɲinnɛe, nun sɛnbɛmae birin na a xa yaamari bun ma.
60004001	Isa xa tɔɔrɛ duniɲa bɛndɛ fuɲi fari, a xa findi misaali ra wo bɛ, naxan a niyama wo xa limaniya. Danxaniyatɔɛ naxan fate ɲaxankatama, na bara yunubi fe lu na.
60004002	Na kui, a bara duniɲa waxɔnfe lu na, a xa bira Ala waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra a xa simaya kui naxan luxi.
60004003	Wo tɛmui naxan nabaxi duniɲa waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra, na bara wasakɛ. Wo bara bu duniɲa fe kobi kui alɔ yɛnɛ rabafe, siisife, xulunyi ɲaaxi, beere minfe, nun kuye batufe, naxan findixi fe ɲaaxi ra.
60004004	Duniɲa mixie dɛ bara ixara, barima wo mu birama e fɔxɔ ra sɔnɔn na duniɲa fee rabade. Na kui, e wo xili kanama,
60004005	kɔnɔ e dɛntɛgɛ sama nɛ kiitisa bɛ, naxan fama mixi baloxie nun faxamixie makiitide.
60004006	Na nan a ra, Ala xa xibaaru fanyi naxa iba faxamixie fan bɛ, alako Ala xa e nii rakisi, hali mixie to bara gɛ e fate tan makiitide.
60004007	Lɔxɔ dɔnxɔɛ bara makɔrɛ. Wo xa wo xaxili raxara, wo xa wo yɛtɛ suxu, alako wo xa nɔ Ala maxandide.
60004008	A gbengbenyi wo xa wo bore xanu a fanyi ra, barima xanunteya yunubi gbegbe nan makotoma.
60004009	Wo xa wo bore rasɛnɛ bɔɲɛ fanyi ra, hali wo mu a findi wɔyɛn xunxuri ra.
60004010	Ala hinnɛxi wo ra ki naxɛ, wo fan xa hinnɛ wo bore ra na ki nɛ, alako wo xa findi Ala xa walikɛ fanyie ra, naxee a xa hinnɛ itaxunma.
60004011	Xa mixi wama masenyi nde tife, a xa Ala xa masenyi ti. Xa mixi wama a boore malife, a xa na raba Ala sɛnbɛ ra, alako Ala xa matɔxɔɛ sɔtɔ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra. Matɔxɔɛ nun sɛnbɛ na a bɛ abadan. Amina.
60004012	N xanuntenyie, na ɲaxankatɛ naxa wo tɛrɛnna, wo naxan tofe. Fe nɛɛnɛ mu a ra.
60004013	Tɔɔrɔfe alɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi tɔɔrɔ ki naxɛ, na xa findi sɛɛwɛ ra wo bɛ, alako wo man xa ɲɛlɛxin a xa nɔrɛ masen lɔxɔɛ.
60004014	Xa e wo konbi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi xili xa fe ra, hɛɛri na wo bɛ, barima Ala Xaxili nɔrɔxi na wo ma.
60004015	Wo naxa ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ nii bafe ma, muɲɛ tife ma, fe kobi rabafe ma, xa na mu a ra naafixiya ma.
60004016	Kɔnɔ xa wo ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔ barima Isayankae nan wo ra, wo naxa yaagi, wo xa Ala matɔxɔ Isayanka xili xa fe ra.
60004017	Ɲaxankatɛ waxati bara wa fɔlɔfe Ala xa ɲama ma. Xa a fɔlɔ won tan ma, a raɲɔnma danxaniyataree ma di?
60004018	«Xa tinxintɔɛ kisife xɔrɔxɔ, Ala kolontare nun yunubitɔɛ tan luma di?»
60004019	Mixi naxee ɲaxankatama, barima e na Ala waxɔnfe rabafe, e xa e xaxili ti e Daali Mangɛ ra naxan xa lanlanteya mu kanama.
60005001	Danxaniyatɔɛ kuntigie, n bara wo ralimaniya. Kuntigi nan n fan na alɔ wo tan. N seedeɲɔxɔya bama Isa xa tɔɔrɛ xa fe ra. Isa na fa a xa nɔrɛ masende duniɲa bɛ, n fan a sɔtɔma nɛ.
60005002	Wo xa wo ɲɛngi sa Ala xa ɲama xɔn ma naxan na wo xa kantari bun ma, alɔ xuruse kantɛ mɛɛnima a xa gɔɔrɛ ma ki naxɛ. Wo xa danxaniyatɔɛe danxun wo ɲanige ra alɔ Ala wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ. Wo naxa na raba alɔ e na wo karaxan. Wo naxa a raba kɔbiri geeni xa fe ra, wo xa a raba wo bɔɲɛ birin na.
60005003	Wo naxa danxaniyatɔɛe yamari a xɔrɔxɔɛ ra, naxee bara taxu wo ra. Wo xa findi misaali ra e bɛ.
60005004	Xuruse kantama xungbe na fa, a wo binyama nɔrɛ ra naxan mu masarama.
60005005	Fonikee, wo fan xa wo yɛtɛ magoro forie bɛ. Wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro wo bore bɛ, barima a sɛbɛxi, «Ala yɛtɛ igboe gerema nɛ, kɔnɔ a hinnɛma yɛtɛ magoree ra.»
60005006	Wo xa wo yɛtɛ magoro Ala sɛnbɛ bun ma, alako a xa wo xa fe ite a waxati.
60005007	Wo xa wo xa kɔntɔfili birin so a yi ra, barima a ɲɛngi sama wo xɔn ma.
60005008	Wo wo ɲɔxɔ sa wo yɛtɛ xɔn ma. Wo naxa yanfa. Wo yaxui Ibulisa na fe birin nabafe alako a xa wo xa fe kana. A luxi alɔ yɛtɛ naxan mixi fenfe a xa a don.
60005009	Wo ti a kanke i wo sabatixi ra wo xa danxaniya kui. Wo a kolon a Sentanɛ danxaniyatɔɛ birin tɔɔrɔfe na ki nɛ duniɲa kui.
60005010	Wo na gɛ tɔɔrɔde dondoronti, Ala hinnɛnte fama wo xa fe yailande, a wo ralimaniya, a sɛnbɛ so wo yi naxan mu kanama. Ala wo xilixi nɛ a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa saabui ra wo xa lu a xa nɔrɛ bun ma abadan.
60005011	Sɛnbɛ na Ala nan bɛ abadan. Amina.
60005012	N bara yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma, n ngaxakerenyi duluxɔtɔxi Silasi saabui ra, alako n xa wo ralimaniya, n xa seedeɲɔxɔya ba a wo na Ala xa hinnɛ yati nan bun ma.
60005013	Isayanka naxee na Babilɔn, Ala naxee sugandixi alɔ wo tan, nee bara wo xɛɛbu, a nun n ma di Maraki.
60005014	Wo wo bore xɛɛbu xanunteya sunbui ra. Ala xa wo bɔɲɛ sa, wo tan naxee na Isa fɔxɔ ra.
61001001	N tan, Simon Piyɛri, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa konyi nun a xa xɛɛra, n bara yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma. Won tan naxee bara danxaniya Isa ma, won birin bara danxaniya keren sɔtɔ won Marigi Ala nun won Nakisima Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa tinxinyi saabui ra.
61001002	Ala xa hinnɛ nun bɔɲɛsa gbegbe fi wo ma Ala nun won Marigi Isa kolonfe saabui ra.
61001003	Won to bara Ala kolon, naxan won xilixi a xa nɔrɛ nun a xa fanyi saabui ra, a bara fe birin so won yi a sɛnbɛ ra, won hayi na naxan ma ɲɛrɛfe ra a waxɔnki.
61001004	Ala xa nɔrɛ nun a xa fanyi bara a niya won xa fe laayidixi sɔtɔ naxan maniyɛ mu na, a falafe ra a won xa won gi fe ɲaaxie ma duniɲa ma, naxee fatanxi mixi waxɔnfe kobi ra, won fa lu Ala xa nɔrɛ kui.
61001005	Na kui, wo xa katɛ birin naba ɲɛrɛ ki fanyi xa sa wo xa danxaniya xun ma, Ala kolonfe xa sa wo ɲɛrɛ ki fanyi xun ma,
61001006	wo xa yɛtɛ suxui xa sa Ala kolonfe xun ma, wo xa tunnabɛxi xa sa wo xa yɛtɛ suxui xun ma, wo xa Ala yaragaaxui xa sa wo xa tunnabɛxi xun ma,
61001007	ngaxakerenya xa sa wo xa Ala yaragaaxui xun ma, xanunteya fan xa sa wo xa ngaxakerenya xun ma.
61001008	Xa na fe mɔɔli xun luma masa ra wo bɛ, na a niyama nɛ wo xa nɔ walide Marigi Isa bɛ, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi, na man a niya wo xa nɔ a kolonde a fanyi ra.
61001009	Kɔnɔ xa na mu a ra, wo bara nɛɛmu Ala wo xa yunubi dangixie xafarixi ki naxɛ. Na kui, wo bara lu alɔ dɔnxui naxan mu se igbɛma a fanyi ra.
61001010	N ngaxakerenyie, Ala bara wo xili, a bara wo sugandi. Wo katɛ birin naba alako wo xa danxaniya xa sabati. Xa wo na raba, wo mu birama abadan.
61001011	Na kui, Ala wo rasɛnɛma nɛ a fanyi ra a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa mangɛya niini bun ma, naxan findixi won Marigi nun won Nakisima ra.
61001012	N mu taganma wo ratufe ra na fe ma, hali wo to nɔndi kolon, a man sabatixi wo bɔɲɛ i.
61001013	Fanni n na duniɲa, a lanma n xa nu wo ratu na fee ra,
61001014	barima won Marigi Isa, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara a masen n bɛ n mu buma duniɲa ma sɔnɔn.
61001015	Kɔnɔ n katɛ birin nabama nɛ, alako n na keli wo xun ma lɔxɔ naxɛ, wo xa nɔ ratude na fee ma tɛmui birin.
61001016	Muxu to won Marigi Isa sɛnbɛ nun a fa ki masen wo bɛ, a mu findixi kiini madɔxɔxi xa ra. Muxu naxan masen wo bɛ Isa xa nɔrɛ xa fe ra, a findixi nɔndi yati yati nan na, muxu naxan toxi muxu ya ra.
61001017	Baba Ala Nɔrɛ Xungbe Kanyi bara a binya, a xunnakeli fi a ma yi masenyi ra, «N ma Di xanuxi nan yi ki, n sɛɛwaxi naxan na.»
61001018	Muxu na xui mɛ nɛ, naxan keli koore ma, muxu to nu na a sɛɛti ma geya sɛniyɛnxi fari.
61001019	Muxu a kolon namiɲɔnmɛe xa masenyie findixi nɔndi yati nan na. Wo lan wo xa wo ɲɔxɔ sa na xɔn ma a fanyi ra, alɔ mixi a ɲɔxɔ sama lanpui xa yanbɛ xɔn ma ki naxɛ kɔɛ ra han subaxɛ. Wo na na masenyi fahaamu wo bɔɲɛ kui, na luma nɛ alɔ looloe xa naiyalanyi naxan makɛnɛnma subaxɛ ma.
61001020	Wo xa a kolon a fanyi ra a namiɲɔnmɛ yo xa sɛbɛli mu fatanxi a yɛtɛ ra.
61001021	Namiɲɔnmɛ xa masenyi mu fatanxi adamadi ɲanige xa ra, a fatanxi Ala Xaxili yati nan na, naxan na masen namiɲɔnmɛe bɛ.
61002001	Mixi ndee nu na Isirayila ɲama ya ma, naxee nu a falama e yɛtɛ bɛ, a namiɲɔnmɛe, kɔnɔ wule falɛe nan nu nee ra. Karamɔxɔ wule falɛe fama lude wo fan ya ma, naxee xa xaranyi mixi ralɔɛma. Na kui, na wule falɛe bara e Marigi rabolo, naxan e xunsaraxi. Na fe bara e xun nakana.
61002002	Mixi gbegbe birama nɛ e fɔxɔ ra e xa fe ɲaaxi kui. Ala xa nɔndi maberema nɛ e tan xa fe ra.
61002003	E wo madaxuma wulee ra e xa milanteya xa fe ra, kɔnɔ kiiti dɔxɔxi e ya ra a rakuya. E xa xunnakanɛ mu kanama.
61002004	Malekɛe to yunubi raba, Ala mu diɲɛ e ma de! A naxa e woli yahannama, a yɔlɔnxɔnyie sa e ma na dimi kui beenun kiiti lɔxɔɛ xa a li.
61002005	Ala mu diɲɛ duniɲa ma Annabi Nuha xa waxati, a kaafirie sɔntɔ nɛ banbaranyi ra. Kɔnɔ a naxa Nuha rakisi, naxan nu tinxinyi kawandima, a nun a xa mixi solofere.
61002006	Ala Sodoma nun Gomora ratɔn nɛ, a e birin gan, e xa findi misaali ra mixi kobie bɛ.
61002007	Kɔnɔ a naxa Loti ratanga na gbaloe ma. Loti findixi tinxintɔɛ nan na, naxan bɔɲɛ nu bara raɲaaxu a ma na mixi ɲaaxie xa wali kobie xa fe ra.
61002008	Yi mixi tinxinxi nu sabatixi e tagi, a bɔɲɛ raɲaaxuxi a ma tɛmui birin e xa ɲaaxuɲa xa fe ra.
61002009	Na nan a masenxi, a won Marigi fata mixi fanyi fulunde fe xɔrɔxɔɛ kui, a man fata tinxintaree ragatade han kiiti lɔxɔɛ na fa tɛmui naxɛ.
61002010	A gbengbenyi, a yi rabama mixie nan na naxee biraxi e waxɔnfe ɲaaxi tun fɔxɔ ra, e fa Marigi xa mangɛya matandi. Nee e yɛtɛ igboma. E suusa ariyannakae rasɔtɔde.
61002011	Hali malekɛe, naxee sɛnbɛ gbo e bɛ, nee mu suusa adamadie rasɔtɔde Marigi ya xɔri.
61002012	Na xurutaree luxi alɔ wula sube naxee xaxili mu na, naxee suxuma, e faxa. E konbi tima fee ma, e mu naxee kolon. E xa fe raɲɔnma nɛ alɔ na wula sube naxee xaxili mu na.
61002013	E tinxintareya sare nan sɔtɔma. E ɲɛlɛxinma wanduya rabafe ra yanyi xare ra. E luma nɛ wo xa xulunyie ya ma alɔ nɔxɔɛ na sa se sɛniyɛnxi ma. E ɲɛlɛxinma nɛ wo ratantanfe ra.
61002014	E yɛnɛ rabama tɛmui birin. E mu taganma yunubi rabade. E mixie madaxuma naxee xa danxaniya mu sabatixi. Milanteya na e bɔɲɛ kui. E birin dankaxi.
61002015	E bara kira tinxinxi bɛɲin, e fa bira Beyori xa di Balami xa kira fɔxɔ ra, naxan nu wama wali tinxintare sare xɔn ma.
61002016	Ala naxa a xa yunubi masen a bɛ a xa sofale saabui ra naxan wɔyɛn adamadi xui ra, a fa Annabi Balami xa daxuɲa iti.
61002017	Na mixie luxi nɛ alɔ tigie ye mu na naxee kui. E luxi nɛ alɔ nuxuie, turunnaadɛ naxee tutunma. Dimi nan dɔxɔxi e ya ra.
61002018	E wɔyɛn xungbe nan falama naxan tide yo mu na, e e yɛtɛ igboma, e mixie madaxuma fe sɛniyɛntaree ra, mixi naxee baxi bade yunubitɔɛe ya ma.
61002019	E xɔrɛya laayidi mixie bɛ, kɔnɔ e yɛtɛ kan findixi duniɲa xa konyie ra, barima e mu nɔma e yɛtɛ bade e waxɔnfe ɲaaxie yi ra naxee fama e xun nakanade. Mixi naxan birin luma a waxɔnfe ɲaaxi xa nɔɛ bun ma, a bara findi a waxɔnfe ɲaaxi xa konyi ra.
61002020	Xa mixi bara ba duniɲa fe kobie ya ma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa kolonfe saabui ra, won Nakisima nun won Marigi, e man gbilen na fee ma, han nee man nɔ e ra, awa e xa tɔɔrɛ dangima a singe ra.
61002021	E lufe e mu tinxinyi kira kolon, na fisa e bɛ, dinɛ e xa na kira kolon, e fa e kobe so sɛriyɛ sɛniyɛnxi ra, naxan nu bara fi e ma.
61002022	Yi taali e xa fe masenma a fanyi ra: «Bare bara a xa bɔxunyi don. Xɔsɛ maxaxi, a man bara a yɛtɛ manɔxɔ.»
61003001	N xanuntenyie, n ma bataaxɛ firin nde nan yi ki, n naxan sɛbɛ wo ma. N bara wa xaxili fanyi fife wo ma yi bataaxɛe saabui ra, naxee wo ratuma na xaranyi ra wo naxan sɔtɔxi tɛmui dangixi.
61003002	N man bara wa wo ratufe namiɲɔnmɛ sɛniyɛnxi singee xa masenyi ma, a nun won Marigi nun won Nakisima xa yaamari ma, a xa xɛɛrae naxan nadangixi wo ma.
61003003	Kɔnɔ a gbengbenyi, wo xa a kolon a mixie fama nɛ duniɲa raɲɔnyi, naxee yoma mixie ma, e bira e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra.
61003004	E a falama nɛ, «Isa bara a xa laayidi kana, barima han ya a mu gbilen duniɲa ma alɔ a a fala ki naxɛ. Kafi won benbae faxa, duniɲa luxi alɔ a fɔlɛ.»
61003005	Na mixie bara nɛɛmu a Ala koore nun bɔxi daaxi a xa masenyi nan na. A fɔlɛ ra, Ala xa masenyi nan a ragiri bɔxi xa maba ye xɔɔra.
61003006	Ala xa masenyi man naxa a ragiri ye xa din duniɲa ma Annabi Nuha xa waxati.
61003007	Na masenyi kerenyi man fama nɛ a ragiride koore nun bɔxi xa gan kiiti lɔxɔɛ, tinxintaree ɲaxankatama tɛmui naxɛ.
61003008	Kɔnɔ, n xanuntenyie, wo naxa nɛɛmu fe keren ma: Won Marigi tan bɛ, lɔxɔɛ keren luxi nɛ alɔ ɲɛ wulu keren, ɲɛ wulu keren fan luxi nɛ alɔ lɔxɔɛ keren.
61003009	Marigi mu dugundima a xa laayidi rakamalide, alɔ mixi ndee a maɲɔxunma ki naxɛ. A xa diɲɛ gbo wo mabiri, barima a mu wama mixi keren xa lɔɛ. A wama nɛ duniɲa mixi birin xa tuubi.
61003010	Marigi fa lɔxɔɛ findima tɛrɛnna nan na mixie bɛ. Na lɔxɔɛ koore lɔɛma nɛ xui magaaxuxi ra, duniɲa birin ganma nɛ, adamadie xa wali nan tun luma Ala ya i.
61003011	Wo to a kolon duniɲa ɲɔnma na ki nɛ, a lanma wo xa ɲɛrɛ Ala waxɔnyi ra sɛniyɛnyi kui.
61003012	Wo mamɛ tima ki naxɛ, a xa a niya na lɔxɔɛ xa fa sinnanyi ma. Na lɔxɔɛ koore nun bɔxi ganma nɛ tɛ ra, e fa xunu.
61003013	Won koore nɛɛnɛ nun bɔxi nɛɛnɛ nan mamɛfe, tinxinyi sabatima dɛnnaxɛ, alɔ a laayidixi won bɛ ki naxɛ.
61003014	N xanuntenyie, wo xa katɛ birin naba na mamɛ ti kui, alako na lɔxɔɛ xa wo li bɔɲɛsa kui, a naxa wo li fe ɲaaxi kui.
61003015	Wo xa a kolon a won Marigi xa diɲɛ findixi kisi nan na wo bɛ, alɔ won xanuntenyi Pɔlu fan a sɛbɛxi wo ma ki naxɛ. Ala yati nan na lɔnni fixi a ma.
61003016	A na nan masenma a xa bataaxɛ birin kui. A xa sɛbɛli ndee fahaamu xɔnɔ. Xaxilitaree, naxee xa danxaniya mu raxaraxi, e na sɛbɛlie mafindima e waxɔnki. E na mɔɔli rabama Kitaabui gbɛtɛe ra, kɔnɔ na fe fama e ralɔɛde.
61003017	N xanuntenyie, wo to bara na birin kolon, wo xa wo ɲɔxɔ sa wo yɛtɛ xɔn ma, alako kaafirie naxa wo ba wo xa danxaniya sabatixi kui.
61003018	Wo xa sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ won Marigi nun won Nakisima Isa xa hinnɛ nun a kolonfe saabui ra. Tantui na Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa bɛ abadan. Amina.
62001001	Kisi masenyi, naxan nu na kabi a fɔlɛ, muxu tuli naxan mɛxi, muxu ya naxan toxi, muxu bɛlɛxɛ naxan masuxuxi,
62001002	muxu bara na seede ba. Naxan na kisi ra, na bara a yɛtɛ masen. Muxu bara a to, muxu bara na kisi xa fe kawandi ti, naxan mu ɲɔnma abadan, naxan nu na Baba Ala fɛ ma, beenun a xa a yɛtɛ masen muxu bɛ.
62001003	Muxu naxan toxi, muxu naxan mɛxi, muxu wo fan kawandife na nan na, alako won birin xa lu lanyi kui, won nun Baba Ala nun a xa Di Isa, a xa Mixi Sugandixi.
62001004	Muxu yi fe sɛbɛfe nɛ wo ma, alako muxu xa sɛɛwɛ xa kamali.
62001005	Muxu naxan mɛxi Isa ra, muxu xa na dɛntɛgɛ sa wo bɛ. Ala findixi naiyalanyi nan na. Dimi yo mu na a i.
62001006	Xa won a fala won nun Ala na a ra, kɔnɔ won ɲɛrɛma dimi kui, won bara wule fala, won mu ɲɛrɛfe nɔndi kira xɔn ma.
62001007	Kɔnɔ, xa won ɲɛrɛma naiyalanyi kui Ala xa kira xɔn, won nun danxaniyatɔɛe nan luma lanyi kui. Ala xa Di Isa wuli nan won nasɛniyɛnma yunubi birin ma.
62001008	Xa won a fala yunubi yo mu na won ma, won bara won yɛtɛ madaxu, nɔndi yo mu na won bɛ.
62001009	Xa won na won ti won ma yunubie ra, Ala e xafarima nɛ, a won nasɛniyɛn won ma tinxintareya ma. Ala tinxin, won nɔma won xaxili tide a ra.
62001010	Xa won a fala yunubi yo mu na won ma, won bara Ala findi wule falɛ ra, a xa masenyi mu na won bɔɲɛ kui.
62002001	N ma die, n bara na birin sɛbɛ wo ma, alako wo naxa yunubi raba, kɔnɔ xa a sa li mixi nde naxa bira na kui, Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa fama won xunmafalade Baba Ala bɛ. Isa tinxin.
62002002	A tan nan findixi sɛrɛxɛ ra won ma yunubie xafarife ra. A mu won ma yunubie gbansan xafarixi, a na nan nabaxi duniɲa mixi birin bɛ.
62002003	Xa won sa Ala xa yaamarie rabatu, na nan a masenma a won Ala kolon.
62002004	Xa mixi nde a fala, «N tan Ala kolon», kɔnɔ a mu a xa yaamarie rabatuma, wule falɛ nan a ra, nɔndi mu na a bɛ.
62002005	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan Ala xui suxuma, Ala xa xanunteya bara gɛ kamalide na kanyi bɛ. Na kui, won nɔma a kolonde won na Ala fɔxɔ ra.
62002006	Naxan yo a falama a nun Ala nan a ra, a lanma a xa a ɲɛrɛ Isa xa kira xɔn.
62002007	N xanuntenyie, n yaamari naxan masenma wo bɛ, fe nɛɛnɛ mu a ra. Wo a kolon kabi a fɔlɛ. Yaamari fori nan a ra, wo naxan singe mɛ nu.
62002008	Kɔnɔ i man na mato n yaamari nɛɛnɛ nan sɛbɛfe wo ma. Nɔndi nan a ra naxan makɛnɛnxi Isa ɲɛrɛ ki kui a nun wo tan fan ɲɛrɛ ki kui, barima dimi na ɲɔnfe, Ala xa naiyalanyi laxixɛ bara mini fɔlɔ.
62002009	Naxan a falama a a na Ala xa naiyalanyi kui, kɔnɔ a a ngaxakerenyi xɔnxi, na kanyi man na dimi nan kui.
62002010	Naxan a ngaxakerenyi xanuma, na kanyi sabatixi Ala xa naiyalanyi nan kui, fefe mu na naxan a rabirama.
62002011	Kɔnɔ naxan a ngaxakerenyi xɔnma, na kanyi na dimi nan kui. A ɲɛrɛma dimi nan kui, a mu a sigade yati toma, barima dimi bara a ya dɔnxu.
62002012	N ma die, n xa a masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra: Wo xa yunubie bara xafari Isa xili saabui ra.
62002013	Forie, n xa a masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra: Wo bara a kolon a tan naxan nu na kabi a fɔlɛ. Fonikee, n xa a masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra: Wo bara nɔ Sentanɛ ra.
62002014	N ma die, n bara na masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra, barima wo bara Baba Ala kolon. Forie, n bara na masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra, barima wo a kolon naxan na na kabi a fɔlɛ. Fonikee, n bara na masen wo bɛ yi sɛbɛli ra: barima wo sɛnbɛ gbo. Ala xa masenyi sabatixi wo bɔɲɛ kui. Wo bara nɔɛ sɔtɔ Sentanɛ xun ma.
62002015	Wo naxa duniɲa fe xanu, xa na mu a ra wo mu nɔma Baba Ala xanude.
62002016	Naxan findixi duniɲa fe ra, alɔ ibunadama waxɔnfe kobi, milɛ, nun yɛtɛ igboɲa naxan kelixi see sɔtɔfe ma, na sese mu kelixi Baba Ala ma. A kelixi yi duniɲa nan ma.
62002017	Duniɲa nun a waxɔnfe ɲɔnma nɛ, kɔnɔ naxee Ala waxɔnfe rabama, e kisima nɛ abadan.
62002018	N ma die, won na waxati dɔnxɔɛ nɛ yi ki. Wo bara a mɛ, a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi yaxui nde na fafe. Wo bara a kolon a yaxui gbegbe bara fa. Won a kolon na nan ma a won na waxati dɔnxɔɛ nɛ yi ki.
62002019	Na mixie kelixi won tan nan xun ma, kɔnɔ won ngaxakerenyi mu nu e ra, xa na mu a ra e mu nu kelima won xun ma nu. Kɔnɔ e to mu tin lude won ya ma, e bara a masen a won ngaxakerenyie mu nu e ra.
62002020	Ala xa Sɛniyɛntɔɛ bara wo sugandi, a Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi fi wo ma. Na nan a toxi wo birin nɔndi kolonxi.
62002021	N mu yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛxi wo ma wo xa nɔndi kolontareya xa ma. N a sɛbɛxi wo xa nɔndi kolonyi xa fe nan ma, wule yo mu na naxan kui.
62002022	Wule falɛ na nde ra? Naxan a falama a Isa mu findixi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi ra. Na kanyi bara findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi yaxui ra. A bara tondi Baba Ala nun a xa Di ra.
62002023	Mixi naxan tondima Ala xa Di ra, a bara tondi Baba Ala fan na. Naxan bara tin Ala xa Di ra, a bara tin Baba Ala fan na.
62002024	Wo masenyi naxan mɛ a fɔlɛ, wo xa na ragata wo bɔɲɛ ma. Xa a na na ki nɛ, a lima wo bara sabati Baba Ala xa Di nun Baba Ala i.
62002025	Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi bara kisi laayidi tongo won bɛ, kisi naxan mu ɲɔnma abadan.
62002026	N bara yi bataaxɛ sɛbɛ wo ma mixi ndee nan ma fe ra naxee wama wo madaxufe.
62002027	Ala bara a Xaxili fi wo ma, a na wo bɔɲɛ i. Wo hayi mu na karamɔxɔ gbɛtɛ ma. Ala Xaxili nan wo matinkanma nɔndi birin na. Wule yo mu na a xa masenyi kui. Wo xa bira a fɔxɔ ra tun.
62002028	N ma die, wo nun Isa xa lu a ra, alako a na gbilen tɛmui naxɛ yaagi yo naxa won makuya a ra. Won xa la a ra tɛmui birin.
62002029	Wo to a kolon a tinxin, wo xa a kolon fan a tinxintɔɛ birin fatanxi a tan nan na.
62003001	Wo xa a kolon, Baba Ala won xanuxi nɛ han a won xili «a xa die». Won findixi a xa die yati yati nan na. Duniɲa mu nɔma won kolonde na ra, barima e mu Ala kolon.
62003002	N xanuntenyie, yakɔsi Ala xa die nan won na. A mu masenxi sinden won luma ki naxɛ, kɔnɔ won a kolon, a Isa na fa, won masarama nɛ, won fa lu alɔ a tan, barima won a toma nɛ a na ki naxɛ yati.
62003003	Mixi naxan a yigi tixi Isa ra, a a yɛtɛ rasɛniyɛnma, alɔ Isa sɛniyɛnxi ki naxɛ.
62003004	Mixi naxan yunubi rabama, a findixi sɛriyɛ matandila nan na, barima yunubi, sɛriyɛ matandi nan a ra.
62003005	Wo a kolon a Isa fa won ma yunubi nan xafaride. Yunubi yo mu nu na a tan ma.
62003006	Mixi naxan sabatixi Isa i, na kanyi mu luma yunubi raba ra sɔnɔn. Naxan luma yunubi raba ra, na kanyi mu Isa toxi, a man mu a kolon.
62003007	N ma die, mixi yo naxa wo madaxu. Mixi naxan tinxinyi rabama, a tinxin alɔ Marigi tinxinxi ki naxɛ.
62003008	Yunubitɔɛ tan fatanxi Ibulisa nan na, barima Ibulisa nan yunubi raba kabi duniɲa fɔlɛ. Ala xa Di fa nɛ alako a xa Ibulisa xa wali kana.
62003009	Mixi yo findi Ala xa di ra, a mu luma yunubi raba ra, barima Ala bara wali nde fɔlɔ a bɔɲɛ kui. A mu nɔma lude yunubi kui, barima a fatanxi Ala nan na.
62003010	Ala xa die nun Ibulisa xa die tagi rasama yi ki nɛ: Naxan mu tinxin, Ala xa di mu a ra. Naxan mu a boore adamadie xanuma, a mu Ala kolon.
62003011	Masenyi nan ya wo naxan mɛxi kabi a fɔlɛ: Won xa won bore xanu.
62003012	Won naxa lu alɔ Kabila, naxan fatan Sentanɛ ra, a fa a xunya yati faxa. A na raba munfe ra? A na raba nɛ barima a ɲɛrɛ ki mu nu gɛxi tinxinde alɔ a xunya ɲɛrɛ ki.
62003013	N ngaxakerenyie, wo naxa wo maɲin duniɲa xa xɔnnanteya xa fe ra wo mabiri.
62003014	Xanunteya naxan luma won bɔɲɛ kui won boore adamadie bɛ, a a masenma a won bara faxɛ kira lu na, won ti kisi kira xɔn ma. Xanunteyatare tan tixi faxɛ kira nan xɔn ma.
62003015	Mixi naxan a boore adamadi xɔnma, na kanyi luxi nɛ alɔ faxɛti. Wo a kolon a kisi mu na faxɛti bɛ.
62003016	Won xanunteya kolonma Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa xa misaali nan saabui ra, naxan tinxi a nii fide won bɛ. Won fan lan nɛ won xa tin na rabade won boore adamadie bɛ.
62003017	Se kanyi naxan a bɔɲɛ balanma tɔɔrɔmixi ya ra, a mu Ala xa xanunteya kolon.
62003018	N ma die, won ma xanunteya naxa findi wɔyɛnyi tun na, a xa findi maraba nan na, xa na mu a ra nɔndi yo mu na a kui.
62003019	Na kui, won nɔma a kolonde a nɔndi na won yi, won bɔɲɛ fa sa Ala mabiri.
62003020	Hali won bɔɲɛ sa won makiiti, Ala gbo won bɔɲɛ bɛ, a fe birin kolon.
62003021	N xanuntenyie, xa won bɔɲɛ mu won makiiti, won bara xaxilisa sɔtɔ Ala ya i.
62003022	Ala won ma duba birin suxuma nɛ, barima won birama a xa sɛriyɛe nun a waxɔnfe nan fɔxɔ ra.
62003023	A xa sɛriyɛ nan ya: Won xa danxaniya a xa Di ma, a xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa. Won man xa won bore xanu, alɔ Ala won yamarixi ki naxɛ.
62003024	Mixi naxan Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuma, na kanyi nun Ala na a ra. A a kolonma Ala Xaxili Sɛniyɛnxi nan ma, Ala naxan fixi won ma.
62004001	N xanuntenyie, wo naxa la xaxili birin na. Wo xa a mato a fanyi ra xa na xaxili fatanxi Ala nan na, barima wule falɛe bara gbo duniɲa naxee e yɛtɛ findixi namiɲɔnmɛe ra.
62004002	Mixi naxan birin laxi a ra a Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa bara fa duniɲa ma a adama ki ma, wo nɔma nɛ a kolonde a na kanyi tan xaxili fatanxi Ala nan na.
62004003	Kɔnɔ mixi naxan birin mu laxi Isa ra, na gbe xaxili mu fatanxi Ala ra, a fatanxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi yaxui nan na, wo bara naxan ma fe mɛ, a a na fafe duniɲa ma. N xa a fala wo bɛ, a ɲan bara fa.
62004004	N ma die, wo tan, Ala nan gbe wo ra. Wo bara nɔ na namiɲɔnmɛ wule falɛe ra, barima Ala Xaxili naxan na wo fɔxɔ ra, na sɛnbɛ gbo Sentanɛ xaxili bɛ naxan na duniɲa mixie fɔxɔ ra.
